Who doesn't come to the playa to enjoy getting heckled on your bike, humiliated in a cute way, told to join a crazy party, get fed fresh berries in the hot sun, and enjoy a shot in your mouth with a slap in the face?! The HeckleBerries offer the unique experience of sick burns, sweet berries, shots that offer a consensual face slap, and of course rude babes.

Who doesn't come to the playa to enjoy getting heckled on your bike then stumble into a party for fresh berries and dust storm shots? The HeckleBerries offer the unique experience of sick burns, sweet berries,  shots that offer a consensual face slap, and of course rude babes.

We're in the business of serving dusty berries and sick burns. We will heckle you until you hate us but nourish you until you love us! Fresh fruit on playa only tastes sweeter after having it served with sass. You're welcome to love us, hate us, heckle us, and dance with us, while we pair berries, burns, tequila, and dust together in the magical intersection that is the HECKLEBERRIES.

Do you love ranting, raving, heckling, and being obnoxious? Do you love fresh organic berries? How about both… The HeckleBerry Camp is a place where you can get some fresh berry cocktails, roast your bartender with our megaphones, and have constructive educational conversations on consent! Join us for workshops, heckle competitions, movement, and…. BERRIES!

We are a daytime bar with cold home brewed beverages, games and a friendly welcoming atmosphere. Enjoy a cold beer (incl. non-alcoholic), cider, mead, soda, and gluten free served daily from 10am until after dark. We have a pool table and daily events including our Playa famous pickle party! Bring your keg and we will refrigerate and tap it, or bring a bottle to share. We have daily pop up events that happen based on the hosts spontaneity. We are adding table games into the mix this year.

We have two art cars, bipolar express trains, we drive around the playa and play music, this year we will still build art.

Experience the ultimate musical journey at BiPolar Express Mutant Vehicle support camp! Groove to electrifying DJ sets on our top-notch sound system while enjoying refreshing drinks from our bar. Unwind with healing meditative music sessions that soothe the soul. Join us for an unforgettable fusion of beats and serenity at BiPolar Express!

Bipolar Express Support Camp!
We will take you to the far reaches of the playa at night and cool you down on a hot day

Deep playa express (Mutant Vehicle) and our Depot camp are designed to help people travel from one experience to another through playa dust with comfort/safety and have fun doing that. Join our R.I.D.E. events!

Step into a world where a psychedelic dream meets a desert carnival. Look for our kaleidoscope of purples and our signature lips and tongue logo—we're a vibrant, welcoming oasis on the playa.

At our camp, creativity knows no bounds. Join us for crafting, contests, parties, our one-of-a-kind "triathlon," advice of all kinds, and other surprises we dream up each year. Whether you stop by for an activity or just to relax and connect, you'll find a community that feels like home.

Don't miss our legendary Wednesday Night Prom! Dress up (or down), grab a dance partner, and lose yourself in a night of music, mischief, and magic under the stars.

Come share stories, make memories, and, of course, indulge in our signature purple tastings. You never know what magic awaits!

Imagine if Willy Wonka and the Cheshire Cat had a baby—now look for our kaleidoscope of purple colors with our iconic lips and tongue logo. Our camp offers advice, crafting, contests, parties, a "triathlon," yoga, and more. We let our creativity run wild and each year try new things along with our annual favorites. Stop by anytime to join in on our playa family time conversations or come to one of our scheduled activities to smile and make memories. Join us for multiple purple tastings

Martini Village offering up cold refreshments, entertainment and laughs! Stop by daily from 3pm-6pm for our scheduled events, check out our activity board or just pop in to see what we have going on at the Tiki bar, play a game or get some advice. Participate in the fun and be prepared to be immersed in the 10 principles of the playa.
Just The Tip, inside Martini Village, of course has dick jokes, double entendres and lots of inappropriate gesturing, along with amazing people.
Local Kooling, inside Martini Village, is a place to stop by to share a cool drink and time with cool new friends.

Reboot, reconnect, and restore. Our camp offers a sanctuary of relaxation and cultural immersion through the Reboot Experience, a journey designed to refresh your mind, body, and spirit.

Step into our Carpathian Tea Ceremony, where you'll savor herbal blends sourced from the mountains of Ukraine, prepared with care and accompanied by storytelling that weaves together history, tradition, and mindfulness. Then, immerse yourself in the Sound Healing Session, a meditative experience of deep relaxation, where vibrations and frequencies guide you into a state of inner harmony.

"Kurenivka: Reclaiming Home" is our cozy corner at Burning Man, a heartfelt nod to Ukrainian culture amidst the echo of distant turmoil. Here, art and stories weave through the air like the scent of borsch, bridging worlds and warming hearts. It's our way of lifting Ukraine's spirit onto the global canvas, painting strokes of unity, resilience, and hope against the backdrop of challenge. Our gathering is a delicate tapestry of healing and connection, a place where shared moments and cultural treasures light up the path home. We're not just about celebration; we're about coming together to honor our journey, fostering a sense of belonging for all who seek refuge in the embrace of community.

Kurenivka: Ukrainian Heartbeat on the Playa
Kurenivka is a unique and welcoming camp focused on sharing the modern Ukrainian culture with the Burning Man community. Combining tradition and modernity, our camp offers an immersive experience that showcases the spirit and resilience of Ukraine.
Join us daily from 4 PM to midnight at our bar, where you can enjoy our signature cherry liquor and groove to underground electronic music. Explore our 24/7 Interactive Museum of War in Ukraine, which offers a firsthand perspective on the challenges faced by our community during these trying times. 
Visit our location in Black Rock City, as we connect, share, and spread our distinct spirit with everyone.

Ukraine is very radical: we have gone through Chernobyl, we gave this planet its largest aircraft and two Klitschko brothers. It is important for us to introduce Ukraine as radically good. This means that we should dispense with references to our radical achievements, but don't go unnoticed! 

Cossacks, our heroic ancestors, really loved to fight. When the opportunity arose, the Cossacks gathered from all over Ukraine in a secret place and organized their life in a very strange way: think of something between a pirate's lair and the Shaolin monastery. 

As burners do, Cossacks from different regions of Ukraine settled camps together, and each camp was called 'Kooren.' This ancient word is saved as the name of one of the most remote areas of modern Kyiv called Kurenivka. So we call our Ukrainian camp Kurenivka!

Kurenivka is the first Ukrainian camp at Burning Man. Ukraine is very radical: we have gone through Chernobyl, we gave this planet its largest aircraft and two Klitschko brothers. It is important for us to introduce Ukraine as radically good. This means that we should dispense with references to our radical achievements, but don't go unnoticed! 
We have come from afar, and all our rituals have maximum radical force. We invite you to create a strong bond with our heroic ancestors who will protect you for the rest of your life!
Our sign says "this is a room full of balloons." What could be inside? Come by and find out!

Electric Kool-Aid Vision Quest brings its special brand of free love to the playa for the second time in 2017 after four years as a theme camp at Firefly, New England's regional burn. We provide a beautiful lounge space with a dance pole and glow-in-the-dark purple heart bar, serving what else but Electric Kool-Aid. A major focal point at our parties are the resident dancers who show off their pole skills, as well as teaching newcomers basic pole skills allowing for participatory fun for all! We host several parties throughout the week, with entire camp participating in the production of these events offering a welcome environment for all burners to drop in, grab a drink and mingle on their way out to playa.

The Reflection Tree, a two-meter tower of 2,160 LEDs with a sensor array that picks up and redisplays the most saturated color in every direction. The LEDs change over time as they flow up, allowing the viewer to "go back in time" by viewing the colors of previous playa passers-by.

Electric Kool-Aid Vision Quest brings its special brand of free love to the playa for the first time in 2016 after three years as a theme camp at Firefly, New England's regional burn. Electric Kool-Aid provides a beautiful lounge space with a custom-built glow-in-the-dark purple heart bar serving what else but Electric Kool-Aid, and features the Reflection Tree, a two-meter tower of 2,160 LEDs with a sensor array that picks up and redisplays the most saturated color in every direction. The LEDs change over time as they flow up, allowing the viewer to "go back in time" by viewing the colors of previous playa passers-by. Theme nights at the Electric Kool-Aid Lounge will include Futuristic Space Femme-bot Alien Matriarchy, where residents of the planet Liminality including ladies dressed as high priestesses and men dressed as temple prostitutes usher you into a fantastic new world where everything is better and nothing sucks… unless you want it to.

Vibe Check is an oasis on the playa, here to welcome you in with a cold drink and a shady place to take a load off. Pull up for a drink at our swing bar or relax in a hammock while meeting new friends and enjoying good music.

Vibe Check is an oasis on the playa, here to welcome you in with a cold drink and a shady place to take a load off, or maybe a midnight rager, we're flexible. Pull up for a drink at our swing bar or relax in a hammock while meeting new friends and enjoying some bass.
Happy hour is Wednesday @ 7 with Pain & Pleasure trivia; or If thinking isn't your forte, pop by Monday for Beautify Your Bod – all you need is skin! Thursday will be fire with stargazing & miso soup.
Our group of misfits await you.

Vibe Check is an oasis on the playa that provides a place for you to come and enjoy whether you are looking for a cool spot during the day for a cold drink, or a place to relax and chill with new friends day or night. Our events range from morning yoga to midnight miso, and our beautifiers always have what you need to make your body shine. Great music, special cocktails and a group of misfits await you.

Our small oasis provides a cool respite from a long day or night on the playa. Our mornings provide a shaded space for all, with yoga sessions with our certified yoga instructor, unique Hypnotic transformative bliss with our Reiki Master and Hypnospecialist, and always tea and coffee are on hand. We provide a vibe that connects the community through participation, inclusion, giving, laughter and a positive, energetic spirituality that connects all of us. Special evening social events, drinks and food, keep us all nourished on this sacred space we call home.
Come declare how you are a legend in your own Saga. Receive your new Norse name and let our maidens and men decorate your face with white warrior paint.
Valhalla, Where good Vikings go to party!

Step into the cool ambiance of our cozy KAIF Lounge, a haven where relaxation, creativity, and connection come to life. Unwind with a refreshing slushy (virgin, or not?) in a crisp waffle cone, complemented by expertly crafted cocktails. Immerse yourself in spiritual practices, find your rhythm in poi flow workshops, and sip your way into bliss. Whether you seek movement, mindfulness, or just a moment to savor, KAIF Lounge is your escape on the Playa.

Step into the cool ambiance of our air-conditioned, LED-illuminated cozy KAIF lounge, a haven where you can unwind with a refreshing slushy (virgin, or not?) in a crisp waffle cone, complemented by healthy snacks. Join us for a delightful escape designed for your relaxation and pleasure.


We welcome you in our A/C LED-lit lounge where you can enjoy slushy drinks (virgin, or not?) served in waffle cones and healthy snack while relaxing in comfy ambiance.

Welcome to Planet Palm Tree, an otherworldly camp for all intergalactic and desert  wanderers alike looking to take a breather, explore new connections, or enjoy good music. 

Our camp welcomes explorers with open arms, and our Alien Welcoming Dance party is no exception – the camp's alien-themed welcome party kicks off. The air is filled with cosmic tunes from our aerospace DJ and the drinks will be plentiful.

At the heart of the camp is a unique mini golf course designed for all ages, with holes out of this world. We will be holding a tournament with a galactic prize for the winners. Even if you're not in the mood to compete, it's the perfect way to enjoy the surreal beauty of your surroundings as you stop by our camp any time of day or night.

YEE-HAW Palm Tree Country Club returns to the Playa once again after spending our off-burn days on Planet Palm Tree!!!! 
Do your eyeballs seek to be thrilled by fire poofers and flame dancers, well BOOM BOOM, we got the fire for you baby!!!!
It all goes down this Wednesday as the fun starts with our Cacao opening ceremony followed by Manifest your Spirit Animalia Dance Party - lets get funky!! We will zoom into tea time and our Style & Swag giveaway before ending the night with our Alien Welcoming Dance Party - lets get weird!!!!  We will quench your thirst with the nectar of the gods via the most bougie bags of wine on playa.

Our camp is absolutely thrilled, grateful, and elevated to bring Palm Tree Country Club back to Burning Man. We plugged ourselves in the multiverse in 2020. In 2021, we rested and healed. 2022 BOOM, we've finally awoken from this dream, full of new ideas, motivated with creativity, desiring for connections, and ready to provide genuine and unique experiences at our camp that any Burner can enjoy.
Start off your burn with incredible style by visiting our fashion giveaway on Monday afternoon. Groove yourself into some Burner Bingo to win prizes. Quench your thirst with the nectar of the gods by slapping a bag of wine while enjoying exquisite cheese we have flown in each night. Do you like your beats fast and your bass down low? Then come vibe out to incredible DJs sets at sunrise and sunset.

Our camp welcomes you to come sneak a groove at our bingo night on Thurs for a change to win many fun prizes, including the opportunity to metamorpihize into the most majestic of unicorns. Come enjoy the art of slapping a bag of wine while enjoying our exquisite cheese which we airdrop into the playa each night, being hosted in our club lounge on Tues and Fri. We'd love you to enjoy our interactive art zone and mini golf course, both open 24/7. Looking for a bass-y dance party? Come to our Alien Welcoming party on Wed night as dance under to stars to beats down low. We're also hosting a special festival fashion attire giveaway on Monday afternoon. We hope to see all you beautiful burners at one of our events. Look for the LED palm trees erupting with FIRE !!!!!

Palm Tree Country Club is back to bring class to the playa with a range of activities for the hoightiest and toightiest of club members, including wine and cheese pairings, mini golf, and new for this year, bouncy horse racing. Come take our horses out for a spin and sample wines from our classy country club staff.

Palm Tree Country Club is back to bring class to the playa with a range of activities for the hoightiest and toightiest of club members, including wine and cheese pairings, mini golf, and BYO bike polo. Come decorate your balls and sample wines from our classy country club staff.

Relax in the comfort of lawn chairs under shady palm trees after you visit our nightly (9pm-10pm) boxed wine and string cheese bar to socialize with other high-class guests like yourself. If you're feeling energetic you can find a tee time at our challenging and memorable par-5 3-hole golf course, where you can even decorate (and keep) your own golf ball!

This is a HIGHLY participatory workshop where women will learn to make and decorate their own sexy Armor Bikini to keep, wear, and share on the Playa. Recyclable aluminum is used to hand hammer a custom fit costume using traditional hand metal working techniques used for props in films and space operas. Patterns are provided in a variety of sizes. The thin sheet aluminum is cut by hand and then pounded into custom form at our special work stations. When done, the armor can be decorated with various baubles, bangles and jewelry bits which we supply, Bikinis are secured with nylon thong. We have offered this workshop for several years and they are amazingly popular. Many have told us it is their favorite thing they have done at Burningman.

DragonCampArmory teaches women to hand-make their own sexy  armor bikini. Participants will trace, cut, pound, and decorate thin sheet aluminum into a cool, amazing custom fitting metal bikini costume.

This is a HIGHLY participatory workshop where women will learn to make and decorate their own sexy Armor Bikini to keep, wear, and share on the Playa. Recyclable aluminum is used to hand hammer a custom fit costume using traditional hand metal working techniques used for props in films and television. Patterns are provided in a variety of sizes. The thin sheet aluminum is cut by hand and then pounded into custom form at our special work stations. When done, the armor can be decorated by the girls with various baubles, bangles and jewelry bits which we supply. Bikinis are secured with sturdy thong.
Animatronic Dinosaurs and Dragons provide a lively background.

DragonCamp Armory teaches women to hand-make their own sexy cyber armor bikini. Participants will trace, cut, pound, and decorate thin sheet aluminum into a cool and amazing custom fitting metal bikini costume (think Game of Thrones). Photo-ops against our castle dungeon set, or climb astride one of our animatronic dinosaurs or Dragons to share a waking dream!

DragonCamp Armory teaches women to hand-make their own sexy cyber armor bikini. Participants will trace, cut, pound, and decorate thin sheet aluminum into a an amazing custom fitting metal bikini costume to wear and share on the playa and beyond. Photo ops on our Dungeon set with Lifelike Aimatronic Raptor Dinosaur and Giant Green Dragon.

Contact Dragoncamparmory@gmail.com

The Sunrise Diner is a retro diner serving breakfast, coffee and Elvis to help feed the hungry, the hungover, and the happy-to-be-here burners every morning. Come join us and jam to throwback tunes while waking up right!

The Sunrise Diner is a retro diner serving breakfast sandwiches (vegetarian & GF available) and coffee daily to help feed the hungry, the hungover, and the happy-to-be-here burners every morning. Come join us every morning to jam to throwback tunes while waking up right, or hang out with us over coffee every afternoon.

Feeling hungover (or still a bit drunk)?  The Sunrise Diner will help you start your morning right, with a hot breakfast sandwich and coffee in our retro diner.  Vegetarian and gluten-free options available.  Serving 9 -
 noon, Monday - Thursday.
Party too hard last night? The Sunrise Diner serves breakfast sandwiches and coffee for all you folks nursing hangovers, along with anyone else who wants a delicious breakfast.

Four score and a couple months ago some Seattle burners brought forth on this playa, a new theme camp, conceived in brunch, and dedicated to the proposition that all burners deserve to be gifted breakfast sandwiches every morning. Also coffee.

Imagine – you are wandering through Playa on your way home from a night of adventure or just starting out in search of adventure. Your stomach growls a bit, maybe you feel just a tiny bit thirsty. From afar you see a gathering of carts, lit up and welcoming. What's going on over there? You pedal towards it and stumble upon The Market. You are suddenly surrounded with stands offering their goods. You eat, you drink, and maybe you even get your future told. As you bumble back home, you wonder – was it a dream? Is this still today, or is it already tomorrow?

The fake ID camp.
Find the owl - Unzip the door - Be delighted - Enjoy the AC - Vibe to the music  - Have a popsicle - Smile for your ID - Go lay your ass on the grass and play giant jenga while it prints.

Find the owl. Unzip the door. Enjoy the air conditioning. let me see you move to this groove. Come get a popsicle. Let me take your picture for a Black Rock City ID. Now go sit your azz on the grass and play giant jenga while it prints.

Look for the Emergence owl! Come by our camp camera-ready to get your custom play ID made or listen to one of many people who love to talk about geeky things. While you hang we'll give you a popsicle (21+ gets adult version) and let you lay all up on our pillows or roll in our grass.
Emergence is a safe place to share knowledge and ideas that reflect the magic of Burning Man and conscious living.
Emergence: Revealing Beauty
The Museum of One (MOO) showcases art, one piece a day. It's an antidote to the experience typical of most museums, where you can't possibly see everything. There is no FOMO at the MOO.

Plaisance: "A joyful pleasantness" captures the spirit of frenchness and fake-frenchness. Join us for French toast, Iced glace, and Let-Them-Eat-Cake. Our front porch offers iced tea, lemonade, and cheap french wine.

Plaisance: a joyful pleasantness which captures the spirit of frenchness and fake-frenchness. Our French toast and Iced glace are examples of our events. Come by early for French Press coffee, or relax on our shaded veranda with lemonade and iced tea.

Plaisance: a joyful pleasantness which captures the spirit of frenchness and fake-frenchness. Our French toast and Iced glace are examples of our events. Come by early for French Press coffee, or relax on our shaded veranda with lemonade and ice tea.

Plaisance is French for "a concept of pleasantness in the moment."  We are a Faux French camp highlighting the greatness of everything French.  French Toast, French press coffee, French glacé cones (aka sno-cones), and the finest in cheap French wine. This is capped off by some of the finest fake French accents west of the Louisiana Purchase.  We offer many different educational and entertaining workshops (e.g., Ask a Drunk Lawyer), and afternoon refreshments on our Veranda.
A fine Fake French camp filled with fine Fake French people! Look for our flying flamingo flag!
Plaisance Camp:  The pleasant place to be.  Our faux Frenchness will satisfy all your Francophile desires.

Plaisance: This group is for the Plaisance Tribe and Faux French burners.  Plaisance is a community of seekers, healers, creatives, doers and volunteers.  Who embrace and inspire one another and Burning Man's 10 principles.

Plaisance is a camp of Healers and Da Vinci artisans. We'll offer Reiki, Massage, Energy Healing, Emotional and Mental Health, Meditation, Sign Language and more. Parties include Fireball, Fireball, Fireball, Get ready for the Weekend , Chili cook-off  and will have a Bloody Mary bar with everybody in camp bringing their favorite hot sauce or other accoutrements.  With shade for public chill space and workshops. 

If you find yourself on walkabout in the morning, the Coffee Goddess may gift a cup of joe.
Plaisance is a camp of Healers and Midway Carnies. We'll offer Reiki, Massage, Aroma Therapy, Energy Healing, Emotional and Mental Health, Meditation, and more.
If we are not there when you get there, we are definitely somewhere.

How to design a pendant that tells a story.  Learn the do's and don'ts of designing and manufacturing a pendant.  Come and help design a pendant and see it come to full fruition.   Want to build a pendant, come to our workshops and we will provide the materials to do so.

The One-Eyed Monster Art Car is home to the Puzzle Quest Camp and Sgt Pepper's Pendants Lectures and Display.  Stop by to learn about pendant designing and manufacturing.  Or if you want a challenge, participate in the Puzzle Quest!

Just your friendly neighbors next door.  We are here to provide creature comforts – cold booze,  hot tea, mist and buffer massages.  Whether it be a piping hot midnight cup of custom blended tea, or a citrusy boozy creation while you briefly escape that blazing playa sunshine, we are here for you.  We will keep you cozy with the comforts of home.  Let's get weird and stay magical.

Look for the revolving, illuminated Kosmik Dust sign and come by some evening for a rousing game of Fire Skee Ball and Roaster Hockey.

Stop by to take a ride on the Pedal Pub!  Or, just enjoy fellow rider's company and maybe a fruit smoothie while at the Kosmik FlameXchange.  Grab a glass of iced tea or lemonade to quench your thirst.

Kosmik Dust abounds with interactivity day and night. Whether you like to interact with our friendly, knowledgeable veteran burners or prefer a technological experience, we have it all. Look for the star tunnel for sun tea, lemonade and cookies, play in our motion activated installations, ride the human-powered eight passenger pedal pub, and enjoy browsing the Djinn Exchange.

Look for the Star Tunnel for iced tea, lemonade and cookies or play in our motion activated sound garden.  Chill in the shade of our Kosmik Kafe or pedal with us across the playa under the cool canopy of the Pedal pub, our pedal powered bike bar.

Look for the star tunnel for sun tea, fresh baked cookies in solar ovens, play in our motion activated sound garden, take a few snap shots in our photobooth, chill in the shade of our Kosmik Kafe or warm by the fire pit. Make a tutu on tutu tuesday and if you see our peddle pub in motion, jump on and help peddle for a shot.

Stop in for our daily Iced Tea, Lemonade and Fresh Baked Kookies in our solar ovens not to mention scheduled hot dogs, burritos and sno cones. Take a pic in our Photo Booth and create music in our walk through Sound Garden or enjoy great company in our expanded shade structures.

Swan Forest is the heart and soul of our camp, where creativity, community, and transformation come together. Named after both the Prodigal Swan and the Forest House art cars, our camp serves as a space for artistic expression, connection, and shared experiences. The Prodigal Swan, with its dynamic sound and light displays, invites exploration and interaction, while the Forest House brings a sense of nature and futurism to our environment. Together, these art cars provide a unique space for immersive experiences, where all are welcome to engage in a vibrant, inclusive community.
We are the Dusty Beavers. We are a camp at Burning Man. We are from Québec, Canada and France. We bring love, joy and maple goodies to Burning Man!

Directly from the Great White North, land of the maple leaf, comes the sugar shack of your dreams. Yes, a sugar shack on the Playa! Maple taffy on snow. Yes, snow on the Playa, in August. We will make it happen. Join us after dark for a taste of sweetly delicious "tire d'érable sur neige." The Dusty Beavers are an international group: Canadians and French.

At Elemental Studios, you don't need a Multi Pass to join in our camp's love of the movie Fifth Element. We invite all visitors (humanoid, alien or cyborg) to participate in our unique and 'Super Green' workshops. Each day is dedicated to an element; Earth (Mon), Wind (Tue), Water (Wed), Fire (Thur) and Love (Fri). Come relax under our shaded structure and light up humanity with your amazing creations. Instructions may be in the Divine Language. All materials provided while supplies last. Non-alcoholic, highly caffeinated bevvies available. Younglings or children at heart are always welcome. Come for the creative expression, stay for the community! 

Adjîset,
Leeloo (Slay Bunny) & Korben Dallas (Mischief)

Home of the Playa Mediation Booth and the original Leopard Lounge! Need a help mediating a problem with a neighbor, partner or friend? Come talk to our professional mediators.
We are leopards of all ages.  Come join us for martinis that are as dry as the playa!  Serving Black Rock City since 1998.

MARA Camp invites you to experience ancient Belarusian magical practices and traditions that facilitate ritual purification and inspire new beginnings. Step into our three-tent Laznia complex for traditional steam bath rituals that cleanse both body and spirit, following the sacred practices where Belarusians have celebrated birth, honored death, and found renewal for centuries. Rest in our Harbata tea space where you can sample herbal teas while listening to electronic ethnomusic and traditional incantations. Visit our Draniki Station in the afternoon to taste traditional Belarusian potato pancakes and connect through the universal language of food.

Enjoy our Sonic Playground—a psychedelic, first-of-its-kind audio experience where Burners bend beats, not just hear them. Twelve speakers create a trippy 360° directional sonic vortex, while a joystick-controlled panel lets you warp, whirl, and whoosh music through space. Step inside, take control, and feel the music—literally.

2025 marks Hōme Camp's fourth year on playa and our vision for this year remains the same: to co-create a colorful, welcoming oasis at Burning Man. A home. A home of kindness, laughter and respect. A home where everyone contributes. A home where we eat great food and play great music. A home where we can kick back and relax amongst the chaos. Always clean, always nourishing, always light & colorful. And, of course, a home where we host our spa parties.
Home is an oasis on the playa where we invite your inner child to come dance barefoot and connect with new and old friends through taking care of one another.

Hōme (Camp) is an intimate canvas, a place to which friends, old and new, return.
Hōme "Sunset Spa at Hōme" Lounge is filled with vibey music, spontaneous treats and spa treatments (from fish foot baths and cold towels, to 'quick fix' neck and shoulder massages that will be offered by one of the many 'Homies' who hang out there). From 2pm - 6pm on Tuesday, Thursday and Saturday friends (everyone obviously) will be able to pop in and enjoy a sunset spa treatment of their choice.

We see our vastly diverse areas of passion and expertise as one of our key strengths, and what makes Muffin Bottoms, Muffin Bottoms.

We are the local diner and breakfast spot, and sometimes dive bar. Our camp members went to college together, and our favorite thing to do after a long night of drinking and ruckus was to get together the next morning at the local diner (the 'waffle shop'). The perfect recharge after a night of fun. Best of all though, we all enjoyed the camaraderie of hashing out details and reviewing the highlights of the night before. This ritual has followed us to the Burn, where our group has been informally hosting morning meals for our playa friends at our homestead. Everyone sits around in our cozy camp common area drinking coffee, eats a fantastic breakfast, and shares their experiences from the night before. 

Our gift is breakfast. Our ask is to share your adventures from last night.

Experience the essence of a vibrant Latin dance party infused with the relaxed vibe of Miami. Encircled by palm trees, our spacious, shaded dance floor beckons. Relax on our plush, elevated chill pads or sway in hammocks. Savor the night with bottomless, hand-muddled frozen mojitos served by attendants in traditional guayabera shirts as world-class DJs deliver an electrifying mix of Cuban and Latin rhythms. Immerse yourself in culture with daily dance lessons and indulge in complimentary cotton candy. Join us on Thursday, from 10 PM to 3 AM, for the iconic 9TH ANNUAL HAVANA NIGHTS, the pinnacle of our week-long dance celebration.

CouchBurners, a cross section of CouchSurfers and BRC inhabitants, welcome weary, wild, and wondrous travelers alike to chat, relax, perform, interact, and play some international games and sports. Come learn tips and suggestions on successful international travel, converse in your original language, relax in our lounge and bar, watch or play some bocce,vollyeball, or giant pool. Or come at night, get some chips in exchange for drinking at our bar, and play Poker, Slots, Roulette or Blackjack at the CouchBurners Casino.

We are a sanctuary for those who embrace the mystique of the winged wonders that navigate the darkness. Take a break from the stimulation of BRC with a visit to our Bat Cave, a sensory deprivation experience featuring sound blocking headphones and inversion tables inside a cooling cave environment. "Hang out" in our lounge equipped with surround sound, moody lighting, and espresso martinis for 21+ Burners. We encourage a sense of unity and Radical Inclusion. Sane or Bat Shit Crazy, with wings or without, it doesn't matter to us. All creatures are welcome in our colony.

We are a San Francisco-based camp that celebrates the whimsical spirit of Summer Camp. We want to revisit  the connection, growth, and playful wonder that comes with those magical childhood weeks. Think back to those golden days of campfire singalongs, friendship bracelets, and endless play—our mission is to teleport you right back to that delightful, wonder-filled time of your youth, but reimagined on the Playa.

We are Two Lanterns with a Green Man, turn on, tune in and drop out  http://www.ebold.com/~bobo/

By day come by and help build the Global Village (you’ll help build a miniature clay city) or be joined in an Unofficial Playa Civil Union, in the afternoon be here for Weird Poker (no money bets!) when there is no wind, at night groove to the riddims. And don’t forget your free stuff and the Aeolian Orchid!!

Come play with us at Parks & Wrecked! We have the Playa's finest swim-up ball pit bar. Slide into the pit and climb on our playground! Enjoy fine libations! Listen to sweet boppin tunes! Come park your butt and we'll do the wreckin'!

Parks and Wrecked! Provides a colorful and creative 'park' experience to the citizens of black rock city. We curate a welcoming space to experience fun, wonder, playfulness, freedom, and silliness- values of the utmost importance at this park.

Come enjoy the best iced tea on the playa! Our tea dragon will serve you nothing but the best! If tea isn't your thing, jump into our swim up ball pit bar and have a drink! Or just lounge with us in our hammock! Come evening time we have card and board games if you'd like to chill with us!
Come and discover how amazing friends without benefits can be! Cupcakes, tea, booze n ballpits < 3
Come by and learn how great it can be to have no benefits in your friendships! Get hydrated, fed and relax in our lovely faux pool!

We create a space where servers get to create their ideal burning man experience by choosing interactions offered to guests who come by, and guests choose whichever of their offerings tickles their fancy. The result is consensual weird and wonderful experiences, and it's hard to leave our camp, because you never know what might happen next: one moment it's sweet and moving, and the next it's rowdy and hysterical. During self-service hours, guests use menus to engage in interactions between themselves.

We create a unique and extremely interactive space where servers can offer any stripe of interaction – body part wrestling, improvised songs & skits, slo motion races, bullfights, spinning games, conversations about edgy & odd topics, (we have hundreds of tantalizing menu items that may be on our individual menus!) - and guests choose which they'd like to indulge in. It can be hard to leave, because you never know what might happen next…

At the Interaction Cafe we create a space where servers get to create their ideal burning man experience by choosing interactions to guests who come by, and guests in turn get to choose whichever of their offerings tickles their fancy. The result is consensual weird and wonderful experiences. It's hard to leave our camp, because you never know what might happen next. One moment it's sweet and moving, and the next it's rowdy and hysterical.

Black Rock Observatory is a mobile astronomical observatory dedicated to showing people just how amazing the universe is. Started at Burning Man in 2014, we have expanded beyond the borders of Black Rock City to educational institutions and events all along the West Coast.

Camp Metal-Morphosis provides metal workshop M-F 12-2pm.
Make your own pendant and learn metal work skills at our camp.
Some burners come every year !

Camp Metal-Morphosis- Transforming an ordinary disc of copper into an embossed, uniquely stamped piece of wearable artwork made by you. Participants learn an ancient metalsmithing technique using special tools.

Camp Metal-Morphosis welcomes you! Thor will use his mighty hammer to emboss a copper Burning Man pendant for you! Metalsmiths will be on hand to teach you how to use special stamps to embellish the pendant. Add a cord to turn it  into a wearable, personalized necklace.

Come one, come all! Enter through the Metal Morphosis threshold into the magical world of transforming metal. Behold Thor's Hammer at center stage.  Bam! In one single blow a copper disc is transformed into an embossed medallion with the Burning Man symbol. After you receive a medallion, you will be invited to take it to the workshop stations to further embellish and refine it and make it wearable. Professional metalsmiths will guide you. This is an activity that can be done by people of all ages and abilities. Visit for only ten minutes and have a gift to takeaway, or stay the entire afternoon and create a masterpiece.

Welcome to Camp 3907! The beauty of Black Rock City is we are all on equal ground--in fact, we're 3,907 feet above sea level, and so are you! We are Elevators, here to Elevate your experience. Elevate yourself with our 12' tall Mood Swing!  We will gladly supply you with (mis) information while you have a drink at the bar, then browse our clothing boutique with all the latest fashions. Be sure to join in our classes including make your own Rope Man, followed by a dive into our expanded pit of 1000 rubber chickens!

Jump into our Pit-O-Chickens, and join us in making your own Rope Man or for a yoga playshop. We are 3907: we are here to Elevate your Experience!

Come visit the Baconeers for BACON, BOOZE and BEATS! 3 huge parties featuring 90's Hip-Hop, break-beats, funk and more. We're cooking up more than 300 pounds of bacon this year, so come get your fix. The new game plaza will have offer some weird and exciting fun. Evening videos, karaoke and periodic bacon sightings! Sunday from 6-9 PM. Tuesday from 2-5 PM. Thursday from 2-5 PM.

Come visit the Baconeers for BACON, BOOZE and BEATS! 4 huge parties featuring 90's Hip-Hop, break-beats, funk and more. We're cooking up more than 300 pounds of bacon this year, so come get your fix. The new game plaza will have offer some weird and exciting fun. Evening videos, karaoke and periodic bacon sightings!

The Baconeers are bringing BACON back! Come join us Sunday afternoon, Tuesday night and Thursday afternoon for Bacon, Booze and Beats! Camp DJ Exodus will spin 90's hip-hop and lots of great dance music. Come shake your ass and maybe get it stamped!
Karaoke, music, videos & movies on Sunday, Tuesday and Thursday nights as well. Come visit in the daytime for friendly shade, games and periodic bacon! The Power of Bacon Compels You!
The Baconeers return for more BACON, BOOZE and BEATS!

The Baconeers are back! Visit us Sunday, Tuesday and Thursday for The Bacon Bash from 2 to 4. Tons of Bacon, Booze and Beats! Want to bang on something? Our huge drum tower ¡BANG! aims to please daily and nightly. Evening drums, video and karaoke, too. Come get Porked by The Baconeers!

Join the Baconeers once again for good music and parties! Join us for shade and friendly fun on any day, but definitely stop by Sunday, Tuesday and Thursday for afternoon parties. Resident DJ Exodus and special guests will play classic 90's hip-hop, funk, break-beats and misc. other fun stuff! Come get a cup, a drink, and maybe some bacon! And if you're passing by in the morning, stop by for a cup of coffee and relax on the couches in the shade!

The Baconeers are back for more mischief! Come visit our new drum installation !BANG!, enjoy some shade and periodic live DJ music. Always shade and cool libations to share. The Porta Potty Pigs will be hosting the usual potty comfort station with unlimited toilet paper, wipes, nice smelling things, and lots of fun! Join us in the evenings for fun videos and music, too.
The Baconeers (& Porta Potty Pigs) return again to provide luxury and comfort during your potty visits. Lots of music, parties and libations, too!

Baconeers! Join us for bacon... sometimes or anytime! Enjoy DJ Exodus as he rocks the camp nightly with his custom video screen & old-school spinning fun. Shade and cool refreshments in the afternoons! Lights, dancing & debaucherous fun at night! Inquire about Mustaches & Margaritas! Join us for 90's hip-hop and break-dance parties!

Come by for a cold beer, daily drink specials and a game of corn hole, basketball and other games provided.  Open daily from around noon till 5ish.  We give away 500 shot glasses on Thursday w/ a shot of Irish Car Bomb starting 4:20pm till they are gone on Thursday only.  Lots of fun daily activities.

Come by for a cold beer, daily drink specials and a game of corn hole, basketball and try our competitive relay challenge.  Open daily from around noon till 7ish.  We give away 1000 shot glasses on Thursday w/ a shot of Irish Car Bomb starting 4:20pm till they are gone on Thursday only.  Lots of fun daily activities.

Camp Hot Mayo is Back to share.  We open everyday at noon.  Our bar serves cold beer, and some drink specials, Irish Car Bombs aka Irish Slammers on Thursday @ 4:20pm, we have our basketball hoop, lots of games and a silent disco.  Come Visit and see our list of events and times on our white boards. https://www.facebook.com/Camphotmayo/

We are a fun loving Camp that would love for you to stop by and have a cold beer and enjoy one of our daily drink special.  Come play our giant jenga, shoot some hoops, bocce ball or corn hole.  We will have daily theme parties so look in the directory for what we will have in store for our playa family!  Our Camp Hot Mayo Clinic is still to be determined on what day it will be held. Our Irish Car Bombs on Thursday at 4:20 and Sangria at Noon on Friday.  We are so excited to Be Home!

Camp Hot Mayo is ready for another wonderful year at Burning Man.  Please come by for a beer or Daily Drinks at our glorious bar.  We will be serving canned Beer everyday and a Daily Drink (usually something tied to the theme of the day).  Our annual Irish Car Bomb party will be mobile this year.  We plan on taking it our on the playa for the first time ever.  Also, our annual Sangria party on Friday will be as big as ever.  Come by to play some Basketball or Dirty Jenga or join in our first ever Horse Race, by either betting on the race or being a part of the race.

Come visit Camp Hot Mayo, we have nice cold daily drink specials with a fabulous bar, with comfortable seating and the most amazing people to meet. Thursday is our famous Irish Car Bomb party, and we have a B-Ball hoop that shoots flames w/ some 3 on 3 action and fun giant Jenga game.
A relaxing place to come and chill, we offer shade, misting machines and a chance to connect with fellow human beings. Try to lift the heavy suspended rocks and guess their weight!
A relaxing place to come and chill, we offer shade, misting machines and a chance to connect with fellow human beings. Try to lift the heavy suspended rocks and guess their weight!

Bamboo is a wonderful plant, one of the fastest growing on the planet. This light weight, carbon dioxide sucking and oxygen giving plant is a viable replacement for wood. It is the structure of our yurt and we welcome you to come see it. You might have to try to lift the heavy rocks that are suspended in front of the yurt as well!
Club Bambooze welcomes everyone to chill in our bamboo yurt! Come see the intimate cool shaded structure made completely out of bamboo. Try to lift the heavy suspended rocks in front of our yurt.

We're not Good Vibrations—we're Great Vibrations. Our camp is a sanctuary of movement, relaxation, and high-frequency energy, dedicated to restoring and elevating Burners through the power of vibration. By day, we offer 24/7 high-end massage chairs, morning sound baths, and spontaneous spa experiences featuring cooling face masks, mint water, and head massages. As the sun sets, we transform into the ultimate pre-party spot, hosting Sunset Dance Parties with a perfectly tuned sound system, vibey beats, and handcrafted drinks. With a Turkish-inspired aesthetic, soft lighting, and welcoming community, Great Vibrations is here to keep the vibes immaculate, the energy flowing, and the playa dust-free.

Strap in, space pioneers! Our camp is your launchpad to a retro-futuristic world where yesterday's dreams of tomorrow come to life. Slide through our neon-lit stargates and experience micro-penis-gravity with big dipper energy—zero-G not included, but the vibes are stellar.

Have at least a marginal interest in space? Us too! Slide into our stargates to experience micro-penis-gravity with big dipper energy. Pop by our Refueling Station for out of this world drinks, karaoke, lecture series and more!
Have at least a marginal interest in space? Us too! Slide into our stargates to experience micro-penis-gravity with big dipper energy. 3-2-1 Initiate FULL Burn!
Have a burning question about deep space exploration? Or a sketchy story you're eager to get off your chest? Come get blasted out of this world with the Space Racers!
Martian Rover Racing, Extraterrestrial Tramp Stamps, geeky space talks, and Out-Of-This-World drinks -- Space Racers is a Martian paradise for all!
Welcome to our living room, g. Grab a croissant and dance for an hour or ten. We're grateful you're here.

Nourish your body with warm croissants and enter the Sound Spa with soft downtempo music, at our colorful, comforting home. We're a tight knit community of friends committed to supporting one another. We strive to invite, host and involve any camper who walks through. Our offerings include: backgammon tournaments for the mighty, movement classes for the almighty, and breakfasts for the lucky.

Gspot is a community of global friends who have united through experience-based art projects. Through music, cuisine, art, and cultural exploration, we have forged genuine connections and are committed to supporting one another. Our camp is designed to be inclusive and interactive, welcoming visitors from all backgrounds. We believe that true engagement occurs through hosting, inviting, and involving our campers in a variety of activities. Our restoration tent provides a cool and tranquil space for meditation, breathwork, and group discussions. Here, we will facilitate conversations on cultural adaptation, drawing from the diverse experiences of our campers who have migrated and immigrated to the US from all over the world.

Gratitude Love and Fun. We are a group of healers, dancers, friends, artists, creatives and foodies. Deep playa and camp dancing on Disco Roboto; Iron Giants disco floor. Morning Daytime games and community gatherings.. Sunset trips to deep playa and a Friday Grace and Ease Shabbat Gratitude circle.

Gratitude Love and Fun. We are a group of healers, dancers, friends, artists, creatives and foodies. Deep playa and camp dancing on Disco Roboto; Iron Giants disco floor. Morning Healing yoga. Sunset trips to deep playa and a Friday Gratitude Shabbat circle.

Gratitude Love and Fun. We are a group of healers, dancers, friends, artists, creatives and foodies.  Deep playa and camp dancing on Iron Giants disco floor.  Morning Healing circles, yoga and meaningful workshops.  Sunset trips to deep playa and a Friday Gratitude Shabbat circle.
We are Degenaissance, a camp founded to celebrate the thrill of the quest. Journey to our lands to test your skill, fill your belly and slake your thirst.

Banana Hammocks is a queer-centric camp full of individuals from all parts of the rainbow. We are extremely straight-friendly and pride ourselves in being silly and whimsical. We offer different activities every day as well as a 24/7 hydration station and hammock forest.

Banana Hammocks is back with 1000000000% more sex-a-PEEL
Relax and chill on one of our many hammocks, enjoy the relaxing beats of our DJs. Hydrate yourself at our Hydration station or lose your inhibitions at our DE-hydration station. 
Hop our our Art Car! The Dusty Busty!

A collective of Lucid & Light lucky individuals serving up Rad-Attitude Adjustments every DAWN & DUSK with a themed streetside Fireplace Art Piece and an Tomorrow, Today Alchemy Tea Lounge; shoe-free shade and more for all those building, volunteering, and interacting within Black Rock City!

A collective of Lucid & Light lucky individuals serving up Rad-Attitude Adjustments every DAWN & DUSK with a themed streetside Fireplace Art Piece and an Alchemy Tea Lounge; shoe-free shade and more for all those building, volunteering, and interacting within Black Rock City!

An inclusive collective from south of the border and to the north, we bring positive reinforcement and frosty (organic plant-based allergen-free) superfood treats to all desert ANIMALS building, volunteering, and interacting within Black Rock City!

We bring positive reinforcement and frosty organic, plant-based superfood treats to hundreds of dedicated artists, volunteers, and citizens in Black Rock City who build on the playa! New this year, a tea lounge to serve treats at camp! Nearing closer to a decade of serving the community, we can't wait to spontaneously run into your and activate your fun frosty treat kid self again :)

The goal of Camp Raditude and its members, is to nurture and be stewards of the ritual creative spirit at Burning Man; mostly through their bellies, aiming to reach their hearts. Having seen nearly a decade of all the intricately magical, and incomprehensible large-scale art installations out on the playa, we know that it takes more than just the creator's imagination to make this art a success. No matter how many robots are brought to the playa each year, the key is that it takes a community; a multitude of specified hostesses, task masters, wing nuts, and daring humans to take a leap and come together in creative unity.

The goal of Camp Fer Sherbert and its members is to nurture and be stewards of the ritual creative overlord spirit of Burning Man. We do this by having frosty vegan superfood treats to support the hundreds of dedicated artists, volunteers, and citizens in Black Rock City who build large-scale art installations on the playa in the heat of the midday sun. Through our reverently ridiculous expression of this service over the last three years as a placed theme camp, we have created interactivity of new friends, lovers, international treat-enthusiasts, and learned that spontaneous love transcends all spectators into divine interactivity!

It's like 'For Sure', but 'Fer Sherbert' :)

Fer Sherbert! 

We bring positive reinforcement and frosty vegan superfood treats to artist, volunteers, and citizens... its like 'For Sure', rather FER SHERBERT!

The infamous crown-jewel of Burning Man bars.  Morning, noon or night, there's always something happening at Spanky's.  Come for the kink... stay for the wine.  Enjoy our rides & attractions day or night.  Come by in the mornings to enjoy the antics of Morning Painjoy Radio.  Learn about kink and consent at one of our early-afternoon Spanky's University (Spank U) classes.  Various massages and hairwash is available.  DJs spin daily/nightly.  Themed parties. 
 Games and contests.  There's something for everyone at Spanky's.  Check us out at www.spankyswinebar.com

The infamous crown-jewel of Burning Man bars- The legendary "Spanky's Wine Bar" is celebrating our 11th year!

Lead by the notorious "Admiral Painjoy", our village is a large, group of theme camps with something for everybody; The Camp for Sensual Pleasures (The Orgasmator Experience and Eros Tangier), Hello Camp (hilarious namebadges - since 1999), The Buffer Zone (car buffer massage), Body Painting, Camp Lola (massage, grilled cheese, cattle prodding), and more.

Spanky's hosts a myriad of events;
Spank U!, MPR (Morning Painjoy Radio), Many great DJs, The Festival of Bubastis (FemDom fetish party), Spank-dat-Bootie - (mash-up music party DJ'd by Adrien Roberts), and the Wine-Down Party

And playa-famous toys/structures, The Chairway to Heaven Tower, The Teeter Totter of Death, The Spank-o-Matic machine, the Latex Vac-u-Bed, The Playa-Penthouse, The Orgasmator, and 5 art-cars.

Spanky’s Wine Bar – Home of the “Shattered American Dream Lounge” (join us for some wine!), The Spank-O-Matic machine, The infamous Burning Band, Villains & Virgins, the MPR radio show (Morning Painjoy Radio), the Carne Armada, the orgASSmatron and the newest toy… The “Burn Your Own Man” machine.

A windswept grove of white palm trees by day, with fun activities abound; an iridescent oasis in the dark of night. Welcome to the magical playground of Decadent Oasis, where we invite you to dance, play, perform, and chill. Fun experiences and games, dance parties, and friendly folks imbue within an eco-conscious camp made from mostly reclaimed/reused materials. Stop by for a warm welcome and find shelter from the storm.

On the edge of the desert is a welcoming Oasis of light and sound. Come dance, play, perform, and relax amid our glowing grove of palm trees and tented lounge. We invite you to join us for an ever-changing array of activities, music, games, acro-yoga, hoops, and performances on our stage.

Every big city needs a park.Escape from the Metropolis to an Oasis of light and sound! A glowing grove of palm trees, shade sails, and ever-changing activitiesmusic, games, acro-yoga, hoops, and performances on our stage. We invite you to come play, dance, and perform….

Ringed by palm trees, our camp is a desert haven: a party bus and lounge surrounded by shade sails and colorful flags–plus stripper island, hammocks, live DJs, dance performances, & light sculpture. Come shake your booty in a refreshing environment!

Join the legendary Death Ship at its home camp, where an interdimensional Viking feast hall awaits weary travelers.  Join us for  libations and savor slow-cooked dead animal at dusk-ish, Tuesday 
 and Thursday, or just ride with us out on playa.

Join the legendary Death Ship at its home camp, where an interdimensional Viking feast hall awaits weary travelers.  Join us for  libations and savor slow-cooked pit barbecue at dusk-ish, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, or just ride with us out on playa.

Beware, weary travelers, the siren call of our dark corner of the playa: a haven for those who seek refuge from the cacophony of Burning Man. Enter the realm of the Death Ship, a shuttle to another dimension where time and space fold upon themselves. The air is thick with the scent of exotic librarians and the sounds of distorted steel, beckoning you to join us in our cosmic journey. Explore our mysterious corners, where strange and otherworldly creatures mingle with the mortals.
Beware, for the Death Ship is not for the faint of heart. Only those who dare to venture into our lair will find the ultimate reward: two room-temperature beef tacos... or an agonizing trip to the frozen underworld!
Behold the mighty Death Ship.  Stop by!  Take a ride!  Battle a mighty pan-dimensional serpent and be untethered from linear time!  We tried it.  Not too bad!

A ship for weary ghosts and the wanderers, the Blazing Death Ship is ready to ferry your spirit to the 9th World of Niflhel, where you will spend eternity being rent asunder by the great wolf Gorm and having your blood sucked from your body by the Dragon-Serpent Nithhogg -until the day comes to ride the great ship Naglfar to Asgard, to wage war on the gods.  Or you could have a drink at our bar, which is essentially the same experience.

A welcoming camp with no amplified music or generators. First time burners greeted with joy and mentored with care. We welcome campers from across the world and beyond. We've had people from every continent camp with us in the past. Many activities all week long.

Hushville is a Burning Man village that is open to anyone who wants to camp with us, provided they abide by three rules:

1. No generators of any kind, of any size, at any time
2. No amplified sound
3. Leave No Trace! No trace of your presence or the presence of Hushville

Who Camps With Hushville?

We have a diverse population. While most of our campers come from the USA and Canada, many other countries are also represented. Some have been coming to Burning Man since the 90s; for others, it's their first year. Hushville hosts a number of theme camps, artists, musicians, BRC volunteers, art installation volunteers and just plain good people. So, if you're on your own or with a group looking to meet some GREAT people, we would love to have you come join us in 2023!

Hushville is an aural oasis in the middle of the maelstrom that is Black Rock City! We're a Village that is open to all - Theme Camps, small groups, and solo campers; new Burners and grizzled veterans alike.

Hushville is an aural oasis in the magnificent madness that is Black Rock City. We welcome individuals, small groups, and theme camps so long as you abide by our 3 rules - No amplified sound, no generators, and leave no trace.

Hushville, an aural oasis in an undulating sea of chaos, is open to any camper who pre-registers and can abide our three simple rules: 1) No Generators; 2) No Amplified Sound; and 3) Leave No Trace. Because Hushville is a village in Black Rock City, we can't promise that it will be quiet... just quieter.

Now in its sixth year, the Village of Hushville is an aural oasis in an undulating sea of chaos, and is open to any camper who can abide by three simple rules:1.) no generators2.) no amplified sound3.) clean up after yourselfA strong community has been building within the village over the years, but newcomers are always welcome. Fire Conclave Convergence is where Fire Performers, Ambient Drummers, and Documentarians who will be performing in the Great Circle will be signing in and receiving procedural information. Those with a Black Rock passport can also get their passport stamped.

All fire performers accepted into Fire Conclave must check in to Fire Conclave Convergence in the 6:00 portal.  Check in hours are Monday-Friday 10 AM- 6 PM.

Mandatory Check In point for all members of the Fire Conclave. Members of Controlled Burn welcome all members of the fire community. Great place to check out the fire activities on the playa. Ambient Drummers are welcome to join fire activities, BUT must check in before Thursday of the event.

Mandatory check in point for all members of the Fire Conclave. Members of Reno’s fire group welcome all members of the fire community. Check out the happenings with fire art on the playa. Ambient drummers are welcome to join fire activities.

Ignite the Man – On Saturday night, the Fire Conclave in its full force will create the fire circle around the Man. But before that happens all members of the Fire Conclave must sign in at this camp, Fire Conclave Convergence. Open Monday – Friday from 9 AM – 6 PM, There will be no signs in on Saturday. If you are interested in learning more about the Fire Conclave stop by.

One & only place for all Fire Conclave members, Helmsmen and Drummers to sign in. Members will have access to fire tool repair, information for reherasal and Burn Night. Other event information will also be posted.

Gathering convergence for members of the Fire Concalve. Daily activites will include: Check in by each members of the Fire Conclave, knowledable represensatives will be checking & repairing fire tools, Fire Safety meeting for all Fire Watch that are responsible for the safety of the fire performers, Leaving & receiving messages, radio distribution for Burn night and great discusssions of fire art in the world.

When the sun's peeking up over the horizon and you look like an extra from World War Z, stop into Sunrise Tavern and revive your spirits with a wholesome breakfast - bacon, coffee, bloodies, mimosas, and hospitality at its dustiest!
Goooood morning playa people!! Come find us for good times with Stardust the Whale and Fjorgn. Located just north of the end of the Universe.

Join us at "The Pit Stop" and live out your Talk Show dreams as guest, host, or audience member- you decide! Live events all week. Before you leave, get a spritz and a spritzer at the bar from one of our lovely campers. The Show starts when You get here!

Boogie at the Dino Disco with Larry the Dinosaur, cool down at our Spritz Station, or decompress at the Grounding Cave in a shiftpod with everything you need to relax your nervous system and integrate the Burn in real time. Available all day Wednesday through Saturday.

Welcome to SHITTY GLITTER, a boutique Bed and Breakfast providing the most luxurious hospitality experience in Black Rock City. Stop by for a rest in the clean white linens on one of our freshly made canopy beds (changed daily) and be sure to chat with a camp concierge to get the most out of your stay. Be sure to swing by The Parlor on Wednesday evening for our breakfast (for dinner) party where we'll be serving breakfast burritos and dancing the night away. If you're in need of some relaxation, check out our in-house spa, SPAcate, where we'll be providing cold Tecate, face masks, massage chairs and other gadgetry to put you in the ultimate state of relaxation.

Every year at Burning Man, since 2007, we set up a professional shooting gallery and photographers to give out playa names and take your Black Rock Yearbook Photo! Hosting the archive for tens of thousands of Burners online at blackrockyearbook.com

Since 2007, the Black Rock Yearbook has been sharing and reflecting on the year that was with the Black Rock Yearbook.  Come by our camp in your best to get your yearbook photo taken!  Stay to meet fellow burners and have a relaxing cocktail.

Black Rock yearbook Camp is where everyone should go to get their
Yearbook photos taken. We have a fun covered lunge area where all
playa citizens can come get a drink, relax and get their official
Yearbook photos taken!

During photo hours it is fun to meet playa citizens from all over the
playa and from all over the world. Later after Burningman is in our
memories you can go to blackrockyerbook.com and see your photos and
all those of your fellow playa citizens that came in. We also will
schedule photo shoots with camps and art projects to have a more
complete photo yearbook of the rest of the playa too!

Come visit us at: www.blackrockyearbook.com
One of the largest photography projects at Burning Man.  For over 12 years the Black Rock Yearbook has photographed over 10,000 Burners on playa and posted them in a Yearbook freely posted on our website.  Come by and see what was happening the year you were there.

Black Rock Yearbook - For 11 years the Black Rock Yearbook has been your place to get your exclusive playa yearbook photo taken.  Dress up and come by our lounge for your photo, a drink and to chill.  Check out our website to see our past yearbooks - www.blackrockyearbook.com

Put on your best outfit and come by the Black Rock Yearbook for your official (unofficial) playa photo!  We are open daily with our photo team ready to take your photo which is released in an annual online yearbook!
Are you ready for your Yearbook Photo?  Get your best playa wear on and come by!  You won't want to miss being in our annual Black Rock Yearbook we release every spring.

Since 2007 the Black Rock Yearbook has been making a Burning Man Yearbook.  Come by our camp dressed in your playa finest and get your yearbook photo.  We are open from 11am to 4pm every day on playa.   We also take submissions to schedule a shoot of your camp group photo on playa.

Welcome to the Black Rock Yearbook, shooting yearbook photos since 2007.  Every year Burners come to our camp to get their official yearbook photo!   After Burning Man, we put together a downloadable PDF and post it at our website: www.blackrockyearbook.com
Black Rock Yearbook where you come to be immortalized in your playa finery.  See old friends and meet new ones!

The Class of 2010 Black Rock Yearbook is ready to memorialize you in the next Yearbook edition.  Come by in your playa finery or lack of, for your photo.  Please contact us to come by your camp, mutant vehicle, or art installation to take a photo for the yearbook.

Black Rock Yearbook ! Recording your memories so you don’t have to Drink with students,get spanked by a teacher in detention and be let out by having your picture taken for the yearbook. We want pictures of your art and the makers. contact us to schedule, we come 2 u

Black Rock Yearbook Recording your memories, so you don’t have to! Stop by solo or with your whole class for your 08 yearbook photo. Our honor/detention bar will be open as long as are so bring your own cup…

Black Rock Yearbook…recording your memories so you don’t have to!Swing by any day,after noon until sundown, and take your yearbook shot, bring along the whole club or have us swing by for a class shot. Vote for the "most likely…" and be prepared to hang out in Detention for a few drinks with the teacher you wish you had.

Black Rock Cinemas is pleased to announce the return of "Movies on the Playa" with new features and events.  We screen a selection of world class short films to entertain, amuse, challenge, inspire, educate and otherwise get the conversation kicked up a notch. Our large, air-conditioned Cinema Tent is perfect in the afternoon heat and our Outdoor Cinemas with fire pits and blankets are wonderful in the cool night air. We continuously screen 5-6 short films on a 75-minute loop. New films are presented every day. Be sure to check out our Late-Night Trash Cinema after 1:00am for an extra laugh. Films so bad, they're good. Check our schedule for special events and Red Carpet Premiers. Come enjoy the Playa's most underrepresented art form: film.

The most sizzling spot on the Playa, serving up a symphony of pancakes from 10AM-4PM daily along with Live Music, Open-Bar and a chill lounge with classes and workshops. Bring your plate and dancing shoes and let's get this pancake party flipping!

The most sizzling spot on the Playa, serving up a symphony of pancakes from 10AM-1PM daily, we've got all the toppings that could win a Michelin star in the land of dust and dreams. Groove to House beats with a plateful of pancake with maple syrup that flows like liquid gold and butter that slides smoother than our DJ's transitions. Choose from a lineup of toppings like Bananas & Nutella that's nuttier than our tracklist. Whip it good with Whipping Cream or dive into the savory side with Bacon & Eggs that'll make you question if you're at a gourmet brunch or a desert rave. Experience live musical performances between 11PM-1PM that'll make you flip more than just pancakes. Get lost in group classes from 1PM-4PM. Bring your plate and dancing shoes and let's get this pancake party flipping!

Atlas is a community of volunteers, dreamers & doers who get together to create unforgettable experiences. This year we're bringing the xTent to Burning Man: a 7 Dimension Sensual Sound & Light stage that can host 400 guests with live DJ performances mixed with Fire, Water Misters, Fog, Wind, Lights, Lasers & Projection Mapped Walls.

We're a network of volunteers inspired by the 10 Principles of burning man, united in the pursuit of a more creative & connected world. We're on a mission to extend Burning Man's culture to our everyday lives.

Badlands is a live music open jam camp. 
Formed in 2011, we have always had a drum kit (or 3), amps, guitar, bass, keys, and a PA with microphones available for anyone that wants to come by and play. All levels of musicianship (within reason haha) are welcome!! We are open from 1-5 Mon-Fri and oftentimes have random night jams too! We have topless bartenders and bottomless drinks at our bar and a comfy shaded area with games and couches to relax, enjoy music and get out of the sun.

Live funk jams for 11 years! Come join us if you are a seasoned musician and have a performer inside of you burning to get out. We welcome everyone, but don't feel bad if you are so horrible that we ask you to stop making sounds and just dance along with us.
Badlands Village is a wonderful place to find yourself. The Dirty Beetles tent has ongoing music events and the Badlands side stage has live music most afternoons.
Badlands Village! Join us for live funk jams! Are you a musician, dancer, clown or other type of performer? Come by and get down with us! We usually get going in the early afternoon. Yeah!
BADLANDS funky tea house! Come and join us on the front porch and put a little bit of chicken grease on your ankle bone to get you shaking proper on the playa!

StarFist's infamous international tea service. Mon-Sat 2-5pm – serving a delightful selection of hot and cold infusions from around the world as we pamper and delight our guests. Offering a refuge from heat and dust, unparalleled hospitality and secret surprises for the lucky few. 

Morning meditation/yoga sessions most days at 11:11am and our fascinating evening StarFist Lecture Series, exploring a range of thought-provoking topics and stirring debate in our sumptuous StarFist Lounge.

Lie back on an air mattress and take a few moments to slow down and enjoy yourself. You will leave feeling fresh, alive, and with just a bit more pep in your step! Open 11am-2pm Mon-Fri

Cool off in our shaded waiting area while you await your scalp massage! Relax and take a moment to unwind before heading back into the dust!

We lie you down on an air mattress in the shade and mist you down with lavender scented water while giving you a luxurious scalp massage! Come in hot and dusty, Leave refreshed and ready to take on the day!

The Lavender Lounge has been on the Playa for over 10 years providing a mid day chill space. This is a family friendly treatment with lavender oil-water mist and head message.

Our camp is a vibrant and welcoming space designed to foster creativity, connection, and interactive experiences. This year, we are offering a unique blend of art, workshops, and communal activities that invite participants to engage, play, and express themselves. Whether you're looking for a place to relax, connect with others, or take part in hands-on experiences, our camp provides a dynamic and inclusive environment for all.

Nestled in the heart of BRC, Unitopia Camp emerges as a beacon of creativity, inclusivity, and communal harmony, guided by the mystical spirit of the Unicorn. Our ethos revolves around celebrating the unique journey of each individual, fostering deep connections through radical self-expression and inclusivity. Here, amidst the dust and dreams, we create a vibrant tapestry of art, music, workshops, and shared experiences that resonate with the core principles of Burning Man.

Unicorn Space Launch is a collective of incredible baby blue and baby pink unicorns that love to make the world a better place. Come visit us for some intellectually stimulating conversation paired with an aperol spritz or freshly blended margarita.

This year hApPY KaOs! presents GalápaKaos Island, a living, evolving wonderland where curiosity thrives and the unexpected awaits! 
We emerge from the abyss onto the shores of GalapaKaos Island, where creatures adapt, transform, and become something entirely new.
Here, evolution is messy, playful, and inevitable. Step through our iconic saloon doors and into a world where the strange and unexpected thrive.

This year HaPpy kAoS presents S.S. HaPpy kAoS! A deep sea spin on our technicolor kaos. So come on down to the wharf and board our ship for some deep sea hydration, cuddles in the mermaid cove, and if you're lucky you'll be mystified by the magic at the bottom of the abyss! Walk the plank of destiny, it's you're only way out.

This year HaPpy kAoS presents HaPpy KoW-Oz! An animaltastic spin on our technicolor kaos.  So come on down to the Happy Kow-Oz Saloon and follow the yellow brick road to let your imagination run wild!
Come have a dump full of shits and giggles and a safe space for dookey themed games and activities.  (NOT A SCAT or ADULT THEMED CAMP)

A fun bunch of weirdos here to bring joy to anyone ready to receive it.  Come doodle and Kraft, drink and play or just Kuddle in our puddle.  Maybe even spin our wheel to see what Kaos we'll make you do next.

A fun bunch of weirdos here to bring joy to anyone ready to receive it. Come doodle and craft, drink and play or just cuddle in our puddle. Maybe even spin our wheel to see what we’ll make you do next!  Adult babies are always at play here so release your inner child and come jump in the fun!

Better Together Camp is where sparks fly and connections are made—literally, we're not responsible for any Playa-induced lightning strikes. 😎 Our Speed Dating isn't your average meet-and-greet; it's all about real conversations, radical self-expression, and a little bit of magic. Whether you're a Burning Man newbie or a dusty veteran, we've got a spot for you to connect, laugh, and maybe even find your Playa soulmate (or just a good chat). In our camp, everyone's welcome, and everyone's encouraged to be their weird, wonderful selves. Come for the speed dating, stay for the unforgettable memories, and remember: we're better together.
Everyone is an artist. We provide the art supplies and the art wall, you bring the inspiration. Stop by, say hi to our alien comrade Big Chungus, and paint with us.

Camp One More's ethos is "Yes!" or even "Okayyy". How did we get here? By a series of excellent choices of course! Join Camp One More for a bevvy at the Excellent Choice Bar during Canadian Breakfast which is neither traditionally Canadian nor a typical breakfast. 
Let us valet your bike and come hang out; enjoy the high low-key vibes in the Excellent Choice Lounge or Liff Laff Luff tent. Make sure to stop and hop on our Wee-saw for a moonlit bounce!

Camp One More's ethos is "Yes!" or even "Okayyy". How did we get here? By a series of excellent choices of course! Join Camp One More for a bevvy at the Excellent Choice Bar during Canadian Breakfast which is neither traditionally Canadian nor a typical breakfast. We welcome you to hang out and enjoy the high low-key vibes in the Excellent Choice Lounge or Liff Laff Luff tent. Make sure to stop and hop on our see saw for a moonlit bounce!

Welcome to Daydream, where reality takes a vacation and dreams throw the parties! Nestled in  Black Rock City, our sanctuary is all about radical inclusion and self-expression. Get ready to dive into enchanting art installations, mystical workshops, and dance parties that make reality jealous.   And oh boy, our legendary dream parties kick off the day with beats that'll wake up even the sleepiest spirits!

Need a breather from the chaos? Slip into our Dreamers' Lounges for some cool tranquility amidst the madness.

But wait, there's more! Join us for our sunset workshops that'll unleash your creativity. 

Join us in forging radical connections and embracing transformation as we journey together through the wonders of the playa.
