Step into a magical daydream . . . let your mind wander . . . move your body . . . relax your mind . . . unwind in our lounge . . . dive deep into our famous meditation series . . . Daydream is a home of the Psychedelic Talks, Pizza School, your Future Self Meditation series, Sound Healings, and more.  Come refresh and renew yourself in our daily program of wellness.  

In the afternoon enjoy the sounds of some of the worlds top dis and aspiring artists in our Daydream Lounge. 

Tuesday night is our "Am I Dreaming?" special event featuring our lounge and music until early morning. 

Wednesday Afternoon is our famous PIZZA SCHOOL

Thursday night is our "Family Dinner and Dance" party. 

ALL week from 9am to 9pm, it's Daydream Lounge FULL of activity for you.  Come Dream a Little Dream with Daydream.

What a day (or night) for a Daydream! Come and create, express, relax, renew, revive, and be inspired. By day, we are an art participatory camp where you can help create a community collaborative mural in our from yard. Come to our lounge and check out our Daydream Museum. At night, come and ROAR! to the sounds of our incredible musical lineup while you dance in our auditorium of sounds and lights.  

What is a Waking Dream if not a Daydream? Come and be a part of the magic!

Daydream seeks to stop the daily digital noise in our lives, tame the internal "wanting-machine" and allow ourselves the time and space to daydream. Being a Daydreamer has less to do with "going to Burning Man" --- it's more about allowing yourself to Dream, still -- again -- or finally. Daydream is creating a space to unleash that venerable, childish part of you to FLOW in a loving, stimulating and creative dream-like state.
Share, Learn, Grow, Evolve - PlayaSkool is a global community of movers and shakers dedicated to creating positive impact through arts and education.  We are PlayaSkool!

Our Mission is simple:  We work hard, we play hard.  We share.  We learn.  We grow.  We Evolve.  We are Play)A(Skool -- dedicated to creating meaningful and positive experiences.  

This year we will feature a daytime and evening schedule to include some of the most provocative thought leaders, artists, musicians and entertainment on the playa!  

We are launching our new Playa-Ed program that includes thought leaders in the world of Power, Money, Art, Relationships, Fashion, Music and Futurism.  As the founders of TEDx in Black Rock City, we are taking things in a different direction - more collaborative and more interactive than ever before! 

At night we are transformed into a mesmeric, interactive environment melding the worlds of art, design, and science under one fire-laden roof. Incendia, one of our art projects for the year will be the gathering place for some of the top entertainment and visual art on the playa this year. 

Day or night --- come and check us out!

We are Play)A(Skool - an international group of movers and shakers dedicated to creating a learning and experiential platform for citizens to Black Rock City to participate in.  We are the home of TEDxBlackRockCity and proud to host the 5th annual TEDx on playa. In addition, we host Black Rock City Art Forum where the makers, designers and operators of Art Cars share their stories with all.  We host Fuck Up Fridays where you can share you story of your greatest fuck up and what you learned from it.  On Saturday we are all things Burning Man and we feature speakers from different areas of Burning Man to share their stories with you.   In addition, we have some pretty legendary parties . . . our Tuesday Homecoming Party is always a great way to start your Burn.  On Friday night we feature some of the best up and coming International DJ's.  At Play)A(Skool we believe that sharing leads to learning.  And learning leads to personal growth.  And personal growth -- helps us evolve.

Pink Heart welcomes all Burners with open arms and open hearts! Whether you're seeking refreshment, connection, or a moment of reflection, our camp is here to nourish your body, mind, and spirit. Rehydrate with ice-cold water, indulge in our beloved vegan coconut ice cream (served Tuesday and Wednesday from 1–4 PM), or unwind with soothing buffer massages at our Vibration Station.

Find your way home through our iconic Pink Heart Arch Beacon, or rest in our lush pink cocoon of shade, complete with soft fur couches and welcoming smiles. Share your journey, process your transformation, or simply bask in the beauty of Black Rock City from our vibrant lounge. This is your space to pause, connect, and be seen.

We welcome all Burners! Whatever state you are in, you are welcome at Pink Heart. Recalibrate your body, mind and spirit with chilled water, vegan ice cream served on Tues and Wed from 1pm-4pm, and transformative buffer massages. Process how Black Rock City has blown your mind and changed you into something different. Find your way home via our Pink Heart Arch Beacon or stop and feel safe in our comfy pink cocoon of shade. Share your experiences (and yourself) on our pink fur couches while gazing upon the beautiful open Playa.

The Department of Wonder is our on-playa bike shop. We offer bike repair service and education every day of the event through man-burn.  We will be offering a workshop around fixing and maintaining bikes in playa specific conditions.

Wonder Camp does bike repair with a smile. When possible we help our visitors to learn a bit about their playa bike while getting repaired... Radical Self Reliance! Most days we are open 11am-2pm.
Wonder Camp is a place to bring your broken bicycle, art project, mutant vehicle, etc. Come with a tee shirt for a print and a worn body for a massage.

Playa Choir is a performance art piece open to all participants.  Come and join us for a rowdy,  spirit-lifting musical experience!  Radical Inclusion, no audition required!  Singers of all skill levels, ages and persuasions are welcome! Also seeking musicians, dancers and aerialists. Rehearsals are Tuesday through Saturday 10:30 a.m. to 1:00 pm.  Join us on the risers or just come to listen.  Full  performances are on Sunday: Sunrise at the Temple and 11:00am in the Playa Choir Dome.  An additional collaboration performance with the Black Rock Philharmonic tbd.   Performances are a non-denominational, non-religious, spiritual, moving experience. More information and music can be obtained in advance at our website Playachoir.com.

YES! explores the philosophy of saying "yes" as a catalyst for growth, connection, and authentic living. We believe in the power of wholehearted participation—and that a true "yes" comes from deep internal alignment. Sometimes, that means saying YES! to stillness, to rest, to solitude, or to a different path entirely. Our camp is a haven for adventurers, seekers, and anyone ready to engage with life from a place of resonance and presence. We celebrate the liberating energy of YES!—in all the forms it takes.

Bringing the gift of Fire to humanity since the dawn of time, Prometheatrics has been a fixture of Black Rock City's Esplanade since 2002 and hosts a fine interactive collection ready to surprise and delight you! Step inside the Tesseract to experience yourself as you truly are: infinite! Trace your face at our Self Portrait Studio and take home a masterpiece or shoot a selfie in Clesthyra's Eye. Enjoy a bounce on our Danpoline, enter the dream-space of the Infinitipi or admire the playa's colors through the radiant FrameBows. Join us for dusk and dawn spin jams on our mirrored stage, where there's a safety on duty and all wicks are welcome. We're honored to be a part of what makes our city magical, and eager to share what makes us shine!

Join us for dusk and dawn spin jams on our mirrored stage, where there's a safety on duty and all wicks are welcome. We're honored to be a part of what makes our city magical, and eager to share what makes us shine!

Prometheatrics is proud to return with the Hypercube, a four-foot mirror box suspended point-down from bungee cords, providing participants with a deeper sense of self-discovery as they’re closed in tight with an infinite number of their own reflections. We also offer a self-running self-portrait studio involving the projection of your photograph onto the back of a drawing surface for a skill-free rendition of yourself, in addition to a trampoline (for more of your bouncing needs) and an I-Ching light display which slowly cycles through the King Wen sequence.

We are MISTO, a Ukrainian camp symbolizing 'city' in Ukrainian—a place that honors the rich cultural heritage of Ukraine. https://www.instagram.com/mistocamp/ 

MISTO is the cultural heart of Ukraine at Burning Man, created to join  talented individuals that come together to showcase Ukrainian rich arts and traditions.

MISTO unfolds as a colorful and lively camp, inviting you to immerse yourselves to experience Ukrainian hospitality, savor delicious food like Ukrainian borscht, and to share Ukrainian uniqueness and talents with the world.

The MOOP Museum, aka MoMu, features a curated display of the finest museum-caliber MOOP around. Our exhibit is always morphing. When our curators are on duty, MOOP collectors can bring us their finds for appraisal and intake into our collection. With small exceptions, everything on the walls is available for permanent loan if patrons see something they'd like to take home with them.

A few select, high-value MOOP items are part of our permanent collection and not available for loan. Our permanent exhibit also includes educational elements, art made from MOOP, and a spoken-word MOOP receptacle.

Our gift shop is stocked with handcrafted, high-quality items made with MOOP. We hope you'll find something you like to take as a souvenir of your visit.

Did you stumble across something on the playa that someone can reuse, like a functioning bike light, or a super-rad dinosaur figurine in the dust? Bring it to MoMu, the MOOP Museum, and have our curators evaluate it for acceptance into our exhibit. All are welcome to peruse the exhibit and may even find something they want to take with them on permanent loan.

BRCvr invited you to come play and learn about immersive technologies and storytelling. Learn about the BurnerSphere and how you can participate.

BRCvr was an official virtual Burning Man experience in 2020 and 2021. We brought a virtual version of Black Rock City; it was inclusive of its iconic art, camps, and, most importantly, its citizens into the virtual space when it was needed the most.  Using the experience of bringing the same spirit, culture and Principles of the real-world event into an interactive VR-first expression that cultivates conversation, connection, and community, we are now stewards of radical inclusion for remote burners, bringing them into our camp to directly interact with us on playa Within The Window.  Come make new friends at The Window!

The Society for Temporal Preservation consists of time travelers tasked with preserving the fabric of spacetime. Space time is like a cat though, it takes care of itself. This is good, because now we can leave a bowl of food out and ignore it while we visit Black Rock City. We serve as ambassadors of the temporally free, working to introduce Black Rock City to the magic (science) of time travel.
Our goals include:
- Exposing burners to the wonders (AND HORRORS!) of time travel
- Instilling a sense of hope and responsibility in regards to an individual's place in time
- Getting the anti-matter out of the carpet. That stuff is STICKY

Won't you be our neighbor? A throwback to the American front porch born from the melting pot of different cultures and ethnicities; our front porch invites friendly greetings, recognition, acceptance, and fosters neighborly community. Come sit in our adirondack chairs and have a chat. We will be offering no-frills cowboy coffee in the mornings and ice cold lemonade in the afternoons. Grandma is eagerly awaiting your arrival so she can serve you some fresh apple pie. Stop by and visit our yard sale full of trinkets. No early birds!

Priscilla – the imperfect camp with Aussie roots and an international twist, where radical self-expression meets a bloody good time. We're the camp you know and love for our inclusive, high-energy parties like the infamous Rizzle Sizzle (snags done the Aussie way). Under our unmissable pink camo nets, we bring the chaos, the charm, and a solid dose of Who Gives A F*ck energy.

It's a place where strangers become family in no time, friends reunite in the dust, and memories are made that'll last long after the desert fades.

Come for the snags, stay for the sass.

Priscilla xoxo

Priscilla, the Imperfect camp with an Aussie twist addressing radical self-expression and how to unleash your imperfect. We're still the camp that you know and love, with Dildo Olympics (with a Disco Twist) gracing our backs with its sticky presence, our usual tear-the-house-down inclusive parties including a Rizzle & Sizzle (with sausages and arguments about whether tomato sauce belongs in the fridge or in the cupboard) and new hosts of the Official Paris Olympics After Party featuring real life French people - wow! Come for a refreshing dose of 'Who Gives A F*ck' and stay for the bloody good company. xoxo - Priscilla & the gang

Priscilla, Queen of the Doof travels the path of Imperfection in 2023, addressing radical self-expression and how to unleash your imperfect with Imperfection @ Priscilla. We're still the camp that you know and love, with Dildo Olympics cuming back for its 5th year on playa, our usual tear-the-house-down inclusive parties (approached imperfectly) and with some new additions to our interactivity schedule! 

Come for a refreshing dose of 'Who Gives A F*ck' and stay for the bloody good company.

xoxo - Priscilla & the gang
Transporting a bunch of queens to the desert to help others in the quest to find their most fabulous selves. EXPRESS YOURSELF!

Our trashy drag queens will spin you off the street and straight into our loving, weird and fabulous theme camp, Priscilla, Queen of the Doof!. Here you'll find yourself participating in our LipSync Battle, The Doof party, and our famously infamous DILDO OLYMPICS! We are a camp that comes from Australian each year that welcomes ALL people, and have the moto of 'wear whatever makes you feel fabulous at that particular point in your life, not something that you have chosen to fit in with what's seen as fabulous for other people'. We are open to all and we hope our way of living and thinking rubs off on you.
xoxo

Olympus is the home of the gods! We are a Bay Area based Burning Man camp dedicated to self-expression, inclusivity, and the celebration of every individual. Since 2016, Olympus has always strived to help people discover the best versions of themselves, their inner god. There is no limitation in terms of mythology; gods from all cultures, times, and places are welcome. Olympians also create own mythologies if the spirit takes them. The only limit is one's imagination. The mission of Olympus is for every burner to foster radical self-love, self-expression, and a connection with their own divine spirit.

We offer Oh Shiny! Tours for anyone who wants to get out and explore the incredible art. We give priority to people with physical disabilities. We also provide crutches and wheelchairs for anyone who gets injured on the playa. Public charging station for Medical Equipment. Stop by and check out our obstacle course!

Mobility Camp offers accessible Camping and provides mobility services to the Disabled and Walking wounded. We loan out crutches, wheelchairs, knee scooters, etc. Tours into the Deep Playa 3-4 times a day. Charging station for Medical Equipment.

We provide Loaner Wheelchairs, Walkers, Crutches, Knee Scooters etc. For Burners who need them. We also Have wheelchair Accessible "Shiny Tours" out to the Playa 3-4 times a Day and to Major Burns.
A Public charging station for Medical Equipment is also available.

Mobility Camp is a handicapped friendly Camp, providing mobility support for both Disabled and Walking Wounded Burners. Our Shiny Tours take you out to the big scale Art. We loan out wheelchairs, rollators, knee scooters, crutches. We have a charging station for Medical Devices. Our Front Desk also hosts a book Crossing Zone.

Wheelchair accessible Camping and information on Accessibility.
https://www.mobilitycamp.org/  website has extensive information on how to prepare for the Burn. On Playa loan of wheelchairs, walkers and crutches for the walking wounded.
Mobility Camp provides a wheelchair friendly Camp, and services and education to the Mobility Impaired and information and Education to those who want to be more accessible.
Mobility Camp! Disabled services, loan of Mobility Equipment, accessible Playa Tours!

Tired of stumbling around in the dark like a lost puppy? Lit AF's mission is to save the darkwads and bring light to the darkside! What we provide to the Burning Man community:

- Fairy lights galore for your bike, backpack, or clothes - batteries included!
- Daily events and workshops to bling out your gear and become the brightest light in the desert!
- Darkwad Patrol - our team of dedicated light-lovers will be out and about on the playa, scouting for lost souls in need of illumination.

Lit AF's mission is to save the darkwads and bring light to the darkside! What we provide to the Burning Man community:

- Fairy lights for those who need them along with AA or coin cell batteries
- Daily workshops on how to attach lights to bikes, backpacks, clothes, etc.
- Darkwad Patrol at night on the playa. When we find poor darkwad souls, we offer lights for them to see the way (with their consent).

* We want to empower others to light themselves up and to learn more about the amazing power of electricity (pun intended)!

* Let's save the darkwads and bring light to the darkside together!

A
Hunting party
Sometimes has a greater chance
Of flushing love and God
Out into the open
Than a warrior
All
Alone.

-  Hafiz

The Hunting Party is where movement and magic swirl wild forms in the dust. Exploring the mystical realms within and without, we stalk the many-faced prey of the One - we are the flock and the fledging, the church and the people, the dungeon and the steeple. We explore the ever-emerging edge of intimate truth and togetherness. Before, during, and after, we dance.

By day, we play with reverent abandon and reckless devotion in honor of each other - and what we create when we turn our heartbeams to a dynamic and fluid center. We serve homemade kimchi by the arched fingerful and deliver fresh, happy juices into keen mouths. By night, we play with spontaneity and serendipity, drunk only on the magic of connection and juice. The dome becomes a place to mellow out and venture into the frontierlands of mind, body, and spirit where we, the Hunting Party seek the We in You.
Welcome to Fucking Joe Camp!  Where everybody knows your name, and we're always glad you came!
Welcome to Fucking Joe Camp!  Where everybody knows your name, and we're always glad you came!

Nuage is a cloud-inspired Mutant Vehicle with an elevated platform, adorned with floating aluminum butterflies and dynamic LED lighting, creating a mesmerizing fusion of light, sound, and movement as it glides across the playa.
Visit our camp to learn about your drinking water and the procedures to have your water tested.
Visit us and learn about Hydrology and how it can relate to Civic Responsibility.
Camp Cohere is a group of long-time burners who are feeling called to share their wisdom, joy and experience in a camp designed to support and foster shared experiences around human connection.

Hungry! Hung over? You've been hankerin' for something warm in your belly? Swing on by Camp Delicioso and Crêperie, where you'll find an International collective of foodies who'll entertain and serve you the best damn OG French crêpe in Black Rock City.  EST 2007 We've got sweet and savory flavors that'll satisfy even the most discerning Playa palate.  And while the crêpes are cooking, and the coffee is grinding, we'll serve up a saucy dance music set too! 9ish to noonish Tue, Wed and Thu. If you miss us giving you crêpe, come on over anyway.  We have various events happening throughout the week Tue - Fri.

Well known for our authentic French Crepes and international crew for over 15 years and counting. We serve freshly made Sweet & Savory  crepes Tue - Thur.  Also, you may encounter our mobile crepe cart roaming the deep playa late at night or showing up at random camps delivering yummy treats.
Come join us for Delicioso crepes, serving up authentic yumminess for over 12yrs!

Camp Delicioso & Creperie was born 12 burns ago when founding members, Jethro and Zesther, who met for the first time in Black Rock City as virgin campers in 2005, decided to create a camp with their international community of friends, family and foodies from around the globe.

What you'll taste and see are yummy creations of love from a colorful menagerie of Deliciosans cooking and serving hundreds of crepes for campers from every delicious sector on the Playa! 

We genuinely love people and strive to provide a warm, colorful and inviting environment for our visitors—from our beautiful bistro tables to our colorfully decorated dome to our bar and giant lampshade and stage, we strive to create a beautiful oasis in the desert.

They frame the wildest theories upon the most irrelevant facts, or upon the merest fancies. Mr. Darwin thinks that whales may be bears which have enormously increased their bulk, washed their paws into fins by constant swimming, and stretched their mouths by keeping them open to catch insects in the water. So also he thinks that men and women may have been developed out of monkeys, monkeys out of mushrooms, and mushrooms out of " monads," or little clots of jelly. Where is the proof? Where is a single instance of a bearwhale, or a man-monkey, to be seen? Of course there is not one.

Destiny Lounge returns to challenge you with Rock Yer Balls, our large two player game, give you Free Blowjobs on a warm afternoon (all ages and genders welcome), and completely confuse you with the Vortex of Destiny! Enjoy our comfy lounge, completely surrounded by amazing 3D artwork!
Come play Rock Yer Balls, Get a Free Blowjob, and experience the amazing Vortex of Destiny! You may never be the same again!

Sandy Taco; We are a gay camp, with deep shade and Taco events.  
Enjoy our shade and misters during the day, and Beautiful Glow in the dark Art and Structures at Night.

Our Taco Events are: 
Tuesday 5-7pm, Thursday Noon-2pm, Saturday Noon-2pm 

We have a cocktail bar and focus on adult themes during our hosting times.  Look forward to some giant jenga and naked twister as some of the fun during our seductive parties.

Sandy Taco; We are a gay camp, with deep shade and Taco events.  The events will be impromptu, so stop by during the week to inquire about when we might have our next Taco distribution.  

We have a cocktail bar and focus on adult themes during our hosting times.  Look forward to some giant jenga and naked twister as some of the fun during our seductive parties.

Come join in with our wobbly world of Weebles , Music, Fire and Mayhem
Evenings eclectic music , slushy's, fiery chill out areas
Wednesday Main event Pyjama party with funkiest PJ giveaways and Sounds

Come join in with our wobbly world of Weebles , Music, Fire and Mayhem
Enjoy crepes Tuesday and Thursday mornings.
Evenings for eclectic music , slushy's, fiery chill areas

We are a multi national /racial family camp of 6 -7 years.
We aim to provide daily food and drinks as well as night time music in a warm /cozy and party environment with flames , lights laser.
We provide Human Weebles as an original means of interactivity.
Please come join out wibley wobley world!

Come join us 10am to 2 pm for French style crepes, thirst quenching slushes, disFUNKtional chat and some cool sounds of all genre.
A cool and cozy space with chilled daytime vibe and a more party vibe early evenings
Celebrating all that is chaotic! KAOS campers hail from across the US. We celebrate curious minds, artists, engineers, makers, and anyone with an open mind. We bring something new every year!
Celebrating all that is chaotic! KAOS campers hail from across the US. We celebrate art in all forms, as well as its creators.
Kaos brings a human-scale fabric art maze, LED-based art, and late night Death Marches back to the playa!
Kaos brings a human-scale fabric art maze, flying space bar, and late night Death Marches back to the playa!
Kaos brings a human-scale fabric art maze, flying space bar, and late night Death Marches back to the playa!

Kaos brings a human-scale fabric art maze, and late night Death Marches, back to the playa!
Kaos abounds! Kaos follows the diner! Kaos walks to deep playa!  Kaos provides blinding LED illumination to keep our site of the playa warm and colorful!

Kaos is the complexity of causality or the relationship between events. This means that any ‘seemingly’ insignificant event in the universe has the potential to trigger a chain reaction that will change the whole system.

Join us to witness the beauty of kaos in our battle against entropy. Come to chill in the desert zone garden hookah lounge, see things you wouldn’t believe your mind could have generated in the fnorest, and become entranced in a mind blowing display of math on the center screen.

Immerse yourself in the ancient wisdom of the I-Ching, considered by many as both the first, and the best, guide to personal development. In our space, we expertly guide you through the very same Taoist teachings that have guided wise souls for centuries. Participants will be provided with all necessary materials to continue this transformative practice beyond the playa, including coins for throwing, and a copy of our specially crafted guide, "Changes." Learn to become "like water," adaptable yet potent. The secrets of balance and harmony await you.

In our space, we expertly guide you through the very same Taoist teachings that have guided wise souls for centuries. Participants will be provided with all necessary materials to continue this transformative practice beyond the playa, including coins for throwing, and a copy of our specially crafted guide, "Changes." Learn to become "like water," adaptable yet potent. The secrets of balance and harmony await you.

Life involves changes, and we are honored to help Burner's navigate the powerful playa energy by teaching them to consult the I-CHING. We offer a simple and practical take on Lao Tsu's teachings. We also practice Tai Chi at sunrise and sunset when possible, come join us!

The I-Ching is here to help us navigate life's challenges. Our camp offers I-Ching readings, and teaches campers how to throw the coins for themselves. Also, we invite everyone to follow along with our morning and evening Tai Chi practices.

Tai Chi feels like dancing the tango with the Universe. Your body ebbs and flows like the tides. You're feeling it now- the bliss of acceptance, the warmth of the chi, and the power of metamorphosis. Come move with us so we can be together. There is no division.

Camp Peachy is all about good vibes, great beats, and a whole lot of peachy fun. Established in 2016, we bring a mix of music, interactive art, and our signature peach cocktails to the playa.

🍑 Peach Cocktails: Stop by for an peach cocktail served up with a smile (and possibly some mischief).
🍑 Bum Art: Let us paint your peach, press it onto canvas, and then you make it your own! Once decorated, your masterpiece gets displayed on our infamous Bum Wall to dry—ready for you to collect and cherish.
🍑 DJs & Dance Parties: Whether it's sunset grooves or late-night bangers, our DJs keep the energy high and the dance floor moving.

We believe in gifting, playfulness, and co-creation, so come join the party, grab a drink, and get peachy with us! 🍑🎶✨

Camp Peachy is all things peachy! Everyone is welcome at Camp Peachy and if you visit during the afternoon expect to have great music, cold drinks and great vibes. As soon as you enter our camp you're one of us, you're a peach!
We're just peachy! Come chill with us and enjoy some peach iced tea, peach bellini's and our peachy bum walls!

Join us as we bring the legendary spirit of the Monkey King to life on the Playa! Our camp is offering immersive culture through drinks, games, music, and interactive art. Our Monkey King Art Car is decorated as the Flower Fruit Mountain like the original story.
🐵 Totems of Power: Touch-activated totems glow with Sun Wukong's mythical energy—sharing light and spirit with the Playa.
💧 Flower Fruit Moutain Bar: Providing Cultural Drink/Alcohol to cool down your temperature in dessert!
🐒 Sunwukong Lair : A Comfortable indoor spot you can rest and enjoy interactivities like Music, Gaming, Story Episode on Projector, and Karaoke. 
🎶 Open-Deck DJ Stage/Art Car: A collaborative music space open to DJs of all styles and backgrounds.
Come vibe, connect, and be part of the Monkey King experience! 🔥

A community of heart centered leaders, dreamers, luminaires and innovators, from all around the world, that are driven by having a real impact on society. 

Every year we end the the week by having a new 75-people family that we can reach out to in every corner of the Planet. 
\nWe achieve this through the power of creating together and of course... partying together.

Our beautiful 2-story Art Car is a beacon on Playa that allows us to throw our own parties until Sun rises, as well as take our whole Polaris family to the best parties on playa at any time, while dancing on top of it. \n\n"Polaris - Love and Care for Each Other"

An international, illuminating, and intergalactic camp, Polaris serves as a shining symbol of radical way finding. Steadfast in our statement to love and care for one another, our coordinates in the constellation of Black Rock City offers a signal to those searching within the starlight.

An international, illuminating, and intergalactic camp, Polaris serves as a shining symbol of radical wayfinding. Steadfast in our statement to love and care for one another, we offer a beacon of starlight for travelers!

The Polaris motto is "Love and Care for Each Other". We're a mutant vehicle camp guided by our Northern Star. We are an international group of misfits, artists, dancers, yogis, teachers, writers, engineers, and more. All are welcome here!

Cyberia seeks to elevate the human spirit through activities that encourage us to look inside, to understand ourselves, and to connect with our fellow human beings. Our camp motto is 'love and care for one another' and these words are manifest in everything we do, from our camp architecture to our workshops, classes and lectures. Come join us for meditation, yoga, shibari, or chill music in our chillax lounge.

There's a cool breeze blowing on the playa - Cyberia! We are a community of veteran burners bound together by a shared vision of how technology can elevate the human spirit. Our camp fuses technology, art, and human consciousness. Join us for meditation, yoga, and tantra classes - and our lecture series on Artificial Intelligence. Or just hang out in our chillax dome and enjoy an ice-cold Korean coffee.

There's a cool breeze blowing on the playa - Cyberia! We are a community of veteran burners bound by caring and sharing, both on and off the playa. Join us each day for meditation, yoga, belly dancing, and tantra classes. Or just hang out in our chillax dome and enjoy an ice-cold Korean coffee.
Cyberia - the coolest place on the playa! Come join us for daily meditation, yoga, and Shibari classes. We are also serving Korean iced-coffee to help beat the heat!
Cyberia - the coolest place on the playa, with a chillax dome and snow cone machines churning out frozen treats. Step out of the heat and join us for daily meditation, yoga, and Shabari classes.

Polaris of Black Rock City casts shadows of intrigue upon the surface of the playa surrounding it. This mosaic of luminance attracts curious pilgrims, to discover a spectrum of rainbow beams hidden within the structure. Polaris shall demonstrate to the viewer, the ubiquitous influence of light in our everyday lives.

At the edges of the far north Polaris exists as a life saving replenishment for all over-heated polar bears. Replenish your body, mind and spirit. Cool down, chill out and spend some time with ursus maritimus, the polar bear. Replenish life in the Polarium. Just follow the north star!

Looking for a place to cool down and relax? The Black Rock City Municipal Pool might be the place for you! There's something for everyone: come by for a refreshment and shady misting during one of our Open Swim sessions, bike through at night for a bit of poolside lounging in peace, or put your dancing boots to good use at our Spring Break party! Access to our Spa is supposed to only be available for members, so stop by our Membership Office and fill out your application. 

Want to book the pool for your next event? Reach out with a request and let's make a splash together!

Looking for a place to cool down and relax? The Black Rock City Municipal Pool might be the place for you! There's something for everyone: come by for a refreshment at one of our Open Swim sessions, bike in after sunset for one of our movie nights, or put your dancing boots to good use at our Spring Break party! Access to our Spa is only available for members, so stop by our Membership Office and fill out your application. 

Want to book the pool for your next event? Reach out with a request and let's make a splash together!

Games for Progress! Play! Scientists vs. Morlocks! Discover! Nuclear Fusion Bocce-Golf! Learn! The modern wonders of the Atomic Age! We are a diverse group of like minded individuals that started off as strangers and became family. By becoming each other's chosen family, we feel we can be open and honest regarding our mental, spiritual, emotional, and physical health and have helped each other work through past and present trauma on and off playa. By building community and trust within each other, we are able to connect through art, music, and self expression. The goal of our community is to show genuine connection, love, and support with each other that we may not normally obtain in our default lives. Through this action we strive to create a safe space for individuals to learn and grow into the best version of themselves.

Cosmic Casbah celebrates diversity and provides to all citizens of Black Rock City.  Come visit our magical shade lounge, enjoy our libations, hookah, photo booth, music, and festivities.
Cosmic Casbah celebrates diversity and provides to all citizens of Black Rock City. Come visit our magical shade lounge, enjoy our libations, robotics, photo booth, music, and games.

Cosmic Casbah celebrates diversity and provides to all citizens of Black Rock City. Come visit our magical shade lounge, enjoy our libations, creative expression rituals, photo booth, music, and games.

Cosmic Casbah provides to all wandering burners of the playa. Calling all adventurers to come relax under our palatial shade structure, and sip Persian tea at sunset, while adorning your body for the night's adventures. Come Rock the Casbah with us on Thursday, help us dance up a big ole cloud of dust!

Cosmic Casbah provides to all wayward wanderers of the playa.  Calling all adventurers to come sit under our palatial shade structure, drink and awaken your senses with our infusions, dive into our cuddle puddle filled with furry friends, laugh and play on our precocious pump track and if you don't know what that is... all the more reason for you to come visit.

Stop your caravan at our Spacious Oasis, and take refuge in the shade, sip some tea or coffee and have your fortune, future, or present told. We are an open meeting of the minds, offering space for meditation and writing sessions.

PG Squirt House is your pre-party haven on the playa, featuring an inviting lounge adorned with plush playa-tech couches and vibrant, neon decor. Unwind with our interactive offerings, including creative drink "squirts" to energize you for the night ahead, trampoline bouncing, and engaging board games. Join us for our "Golden Hour" parties and "Ask the Bartender" series, where experts discuss intriguing topics like neuroscience and conscious relationships. Come experience the warm embrace of our radically inclusive camp, where diversity thrives and unforgettable memories are made.

A place with the grooviest of tunes and vibes to get anyone dancing. Come in to lounge or for a quick drink to get the party started!  We got Pre-Game in our name and that's what we are all about.  No better way to get the party started then with the PG Squirt House Crew!

Its golden hour on the playa. You are excited for another night’s adventure but wonder, “just what do I do between then and now?”  Answer: come lounge on the coziest of couches, have a drink with a squirt of b-vitamin energy or some electrolytes and relax amongst your new-found friends at PG SQUIRT HOUSE. Good vibes, good music, and adult beverages featuring electrolyte squirts await you. 
This year PG Squirt House also feature a lecture series and poster session from our resident neuroscientists.  Want to know how psychedelics affect your brain, what happens to your brain as you age? Relax with a sangria and heckle our over-eager PhD’s. 
Always friendly and a little snarky, PG Squirt House is your Pre-Game playa oasis.

Playa Pinups and Fine Art Fatales.name: Playa Pinups and Fine Art Fatales

history.description: We are a camp consisting of playa photographers and models dedicated to capturing the beauty and diversity of the citizens of Black Rock City, while offering an opportunity to enhance personal expression through the creation of several types of art.

We are a camp consisting of playa photographers and models dedicated to capturing the beauty and diversity of the citizens of Black Rock City, while offering an opportunity to enhance personal expression through the creation of several types of art.

Heart Fusion invites you to step through its pulsating hearts into an LED-lit Heart Glow Labyrinth of reflection, mindfulness, and wonder. Join us to share a relaxing beverage, and take a break in the heart chill cubes. Then continue into an immersive experience of throbbing lights which everyone will add a light to within the cuddle puddle dome. The space invites you to lay down, take in the light installation, relax, and cuddle. Plus, we're keeping the Labyrinth lit, and the dome open, for chill vibes and late-night heart talks all week. Come find your glow!

Oh My Fur & Whiskers! You're late! You're late, for a very important date! Come follow the White Rabbit into our garden, where you can journey down a whimsical Acculturation Path with glowing & mesmerizing flowers & sparkly things. See where the rabbit has gone, Down The Rabbits Hole, to get some enlightenment and inspiration for your life! Enjoy our Tea Party, day or night, where you may encounter some personalities like Queen Elizabeth, Mr. T, Ice-T, or some Tea-Rex's!  Who knows?!  We offer restorative libations of all types during the day and Hot Toddies to warm you up on your nightly adventures.

Come journey to our cozy Scotch Bar & let us please you with amazing scotch & our favorite camp cocktails. Stroll into our space as you make your grand entrance along our Red Carpet!  Relax & mingle in our Red Lounge & share with us tall tales of the Black Rock. Share with us your journey through the vastness of the Playa. Orate us with the splendor of your travels. Meditate in our night garden & take a stroll along our Acculturation Path to our WanderDust neigbors! We are the calm in the eye of the storm, a place to get your bearings to the next way point along your quest.

We are Camp Scotch & Hop! Serving the Playa with fancy cold cocktails during the day, and relaxing hot beverages at night. Come wander thru our village, ponder in our meditation path, have fun in our playground, or relax enjoying a fancy beverage in our lounge!  Bunnies always welcome.

Jump around and be silly playing Hop Scotch and drinking Scotch. All ages are welcome, but must be 21+ for the Scotch.

Scotch & Hop a place for the young and old, silly and serious to have a good time and jump around. With a variety of games of hopscotch, everyone is invited to join in, and play a game and when finished hang out, and reminisce at the Scotch bar and enjoy some wonderful libations. For the younger in the crowd we have treats so that they can relax after some hopping. It's a great place to get out of the sun and remember such a simple fun game.

Too long has “hop” been in front of “scotch”! Come and Enjoy some “Scotch” with your hop! A playground for adults featuring, what else but hopscotch, and maybe a couple of other games. A relatively simple child’s game kicked up a notch! Prizes include, Scotch!

Scotch & Hop is a playground of Hop Scotch and a Scotch Bar. Come jump around and test your agility and reminisce of playing a childhood game. Then relax with a nice adult glass of Scotch and Scotch cocktails.

Too long has “hop” been in front of “scotch”! Come and Enjoy some “Scotch” with your hop!  A playground for adults featuring, what else but hopscotch, and maybe a couple of other games. A  relatively simple child’s game kicked up a notch! Prizes include, Scotch!

DANCE in our lighted "Psychedelic JELLY-fish Forest" which responds to your touch and enjoy live music from the house band or DJ sets late afternoon/evenings.  Join us for band "jam-a-longs", midnight acoustic "Jelly Jams" in the Jelly Forest , sports tourneys, or other activities listed daily at the tower … or very small cocktails at our "Mini-Bar".

Feel the POWER of the FLOWER TOWER as you climb our 3-story tower with observation deck for a prime view over BRC.  Dangle from the tower's swings, hammocks, and lyra.  Enjoy music from the house band late afternoon/evenings.  Join us in band "jam-a-longs", sports tourneys, or other activities listed daily at the tower.

"Upsie Daisy" as you climb our 3-story tower with observation deck for a prime view over BRC.  Dangle from the tower's swings, hammocks, and lyra.  Enjoy music from the house band.  Join us in band "jam-a-longs", sports tourneys, or other activities listed daily at the tower.  Welcome to the home of the SF Danglers Dress-Up Street Hockey Society.

Rising Up out of the Chaos of the Default World comes your Beacon of Hope:  Camp Upsie Dasium!  Featuring a 45 foot high climbable Tower, Silhouette Theater, over 1500 sq ft of Shade, Live Music and Tastings. Come Climb the Tower and Enjoy the View of BRC. We are open to Burners who want to use our camp for small events.

Oh Mi Gato Hat Cafe, formerly known as Oh Mi Gato Cat Cafe, delighting your senses with a combination of Colombian coffee, relaxing yoga movements, really cool hats and Latino party vibes. Drinks, art, music and hot food. What else do you want in your present and your future?

Oh Mi Gato Cat Cafe, offering a unique cat experience for cat lovers, haters, and cat spirits. Come sip, snack, relax, and dance salsa with us. Clean your claws at our 24/7 spa and visit our cat art gallery space.

I Love Elephants is a vibrant, interactive camp celebrating art, movement, and mindful connection. Home to the Be Here Now Pavilion (in partnership with the Ram Dass Foundation), we host transformative workshops, ecstatic dance, and dharma talks. Our camp features a 45' marquee with glowing elephant art, a mutant vehicle called The Orb, immersive projection spaces, and a 3,500 sq ft padded dance floor. From misting oases to hands-on art, we're a hub of creativity and radical participation. No spectators—just a herd of devoted Burners co-creating the magic. Come play, paint, dance, and be part of the elephant love!

Join us at the "I Love Elephants" camp to celebrate the majesty and wisdom of elephants. Our passion spans from the spiritual essence of Ganesh to the communal spirit of elephant herds. Immerse yourself in an projection experience of Samskara, the Android Jones masterpiece! Dive into daily yoga, sound baths, music, and enlightening talks. Unleash your creativity in the Yaari Tent of Glow, painting laser-cut elephants or exploring body art. Our focus is unconventional, but it underscores a vital lesson: elephants, in their unique compassion, teach us about love and the necessity of community. Engage with informative panels, meet dedicated elephant activists, and embrace the call to action. Be part of a movement for change. Join us at Burning Man for an unforgettable experience.

We love elephants & the wisdom of Ganesh: We love them in herds, on carousels, in paint, in song, and thru our Asana practice. Express your own love for them! We are host to a spectacular Immersion Dome & share profound workshops! We have daily yoga, ecstatic dance and music! You can paint wood elephants in our Tent of Glow. Body painting too!  This may seem irreverent, but elephants look strange, yet are the most compassionate animal on this planet! Humans are more strange – we can learn much from these loving creatures. Conventional approaches to saving elephants isn't working – we need the unconventional! Be Unconventional – Join "I Love Elephants" camp! We also have a multitude of info-panels with little known elephants facts. Meet our Elephant conservation activists too!

We love Elephants & the wisdom of Ganesh: We love them in herds, on carousels, in paint, in song, and thru our Asana practice. Express your love of them! We are hosting talks, yoga, sound baths and music everyday! Be guided to bliss under our huge Ganesh tent! Paint laser cut wood elephants in our Yaari Tent of Glow. Body painting too! We are a group of celebrated yogis, kirtan musicians and artists. Be guided to bliss under our huge Ganesh tent! Our Hanuman dome offers a sacred space for our more intimate events. This may seem irreverent, but elephants look strange, yet are the most compassionate animal on this planet! Humans are more strange – we can learn much from these loving creatures. Conventional approaches to saving elephants isn't working – we need the unconventional! Be Unconventional – Join "I Love Elephants" camp at Burning Man! We also have a multitude of info-panels with little known elephants facts. Meet our World Elephant activists too ;)

"...And Then There's Only Elephants" Oh my, how we love them: In herds, and on carousels, in paint and on the Playa. Help us express our love for them...we'll show you ours, and you can show us yours. Trumpet one and all for elephants! Let's have some fun! This may seem irreverent, but elephants look strange, yet are the most compassionate animal on this planet. Humans are more strange - we can learn much from these loving creatures. Conventional approaches to saving elephants is not working - we need the unconventional! Be Unconventional - Join "I Love Elephants" theme camp at Burning Man!

We love Elephants and share our passion full time in the default world and live our elephant fantasies on the Playa. Ride our life-like elephant, as we take your picture, or even video you for inclusion in our fun website film! Enjoy jungle beverages like coconut water or beer. Draw elephants, trumpet for elephants and more. We have yoga! See our schedule in the program guide!. Meet our conservation group's director who is equally nuts for elephants. You'll love elephants even more as he shares stories over beverages and snacks. Oh, and we've been told our misting system is best ever on the playa! The misting equipment design is one of a kind!

Join us, 1 to 3 PM,  for our afternoon Fire and Ice parties with Snowcones and FireFries.

Be sure to check our on-site/in camp schedule for times and other events!There’s something for everybody at Contraptionists Camp, come and join the Fun!

DISTRIKT is a 501c3 Non-Profit music and arts organization, supporting an inclusive and diverse community of performers and artists through events, partnerships, community involvement, mentorship and relationship building. DISTRIKT was founded in 2010 based on the ethos of the Ten Principles of Burning Man, and over the past decade has evolved into globally recognized philanthropic organization.  

DISTRIKT is an ever-evolving organization with a core believe that it is important for us to have a strong connection and experience with the community that we celebrate.

Our mission is to leverage our wide community reach to support efforts focused on helping our community, our country and our planet.
DISTRIKT is a 501c3 non-profit music and art collective born of the Burning Man event.  Our mission?  Building and supporting an inclusive and diverse community by embracing people, music and art.

PhoCureBurn is a Vietnamese-inspired café serving comfort food to the citizens of Black Rock City. We believe food has the power to bring people together and foster a sense of community. Our goal is to create a welcoming space where burners can connect, share stories, and form lasting memories—whether over an iced (!!) coffee or a steaming bowl of pho.

It all began in 2019 when three of the founders, Michelin, Cheeky, and OMG, hosted a Pho pop-up in deep playa. The experience was so delicious and meaningful, it inspired them to create PhoCureBurn, a Vietnamese-inspired cafe serving comfort food to the citizens of Black Rock City.

PhoCureBurn believes that food has the power to bring people together and create a sense of community. We aim to create a space where people can come together, share stories over an iced(!!!) coffee or a bowl of pho, and form lasting memories.
Building communities one hot bowl of Pho at a time

HOTD(Hair Of The Dog) is the oldest longest running bar at Burning Man.  We hold a piece of the original fire.  HOTD gives raw performances and spontaneous acts and entertainment powered by you!  HOTD is a donation bar ran on participation and gifts by burners like you! 
If you bring the booze and the music, then we supply the music and the booze!

HOTD is the oldest and longest running bar at Burning Man.  We hold a piece of the original fire.  HOTD gives raw performance and spontaneous acts, powered by you.  You bring the booze and the music, we bring the music and the booze.

HOTD is the first and longest running bar at Burning Man.  HOTD holds a piece of the original fire, and we take that seriously.

We bring the music & the booze, you bring the booze & the music!  HOTD is open until the bartenders pass out, and then we reopen when you get behind the bar.  All performers are welcome, and we'll give you a well lubricated audience.  As long as you're doing it, we'll love it.  Come join us.

HOTD is the first and longest-running bar at Burning Man.  We hold a little piece of the original fire.  We have free flowing opinions, poorly made cold drinks, sometimes painful music, and a magic, home town bar vibe.  Awesomely placed on Rod's Road, when you find us, you'll be glad you did.   http://thehotd.com

If you ever had a secret desire to sing onstage with a live band, Good Enough Live Band Karaoke will unleash your inner rockstar and make it happen!  We are a full rock band with backup singers and a rocking sound sytem that will bolster you while you belt out your favorite shower tune. From Chapelle Roan,AC/DC and Nirvana to Taylor Swift, The Killers, Amy Winehouse, Shania Twain, The Misfits,  and everything in between, we play and YOU sing.

If you ever had a secret desire to sing onstage with a live band, Moolandia Live Band Karaoke will unleash your inner rockstar and make it happen! From Aerosmith and Nirvana to Taylor Swift, The Killers, Amy Winehouse, the Tragically Hip and everything in between, we play and YOU sing. It’s a bit terrifying, hugely exhilarating, and completely awesome! We provide a real, live rock’n’roll experience. Moolandia Live Band Karaoke is part of Lustre Village at 2:30 and E. Shows are scheduled on Monday and Wednesday nights, and the schedule  for daytime shows will be posted in Lustre.

My Dad's House is a cozy, classic respite from the maximalism of BRC and we offer a cornucopia of Dad-led wonderment. Be it dance parties, movement workshops, live jams, philosophy discussions, cereal breakfasts, poetry slams, socialist propaganda, or super-tan buttholes, there's something for everyone :]

At the same time, we're seeking to creatively redefine fatherhood, to reclaim masculinity, and to reparent ourselves, our friends, and our inner children. Y'all are warmly invited to hang out, write a letter to your Dad in our garage, and enjoy a sense of shelter, of safety, of home (and to boogie down and heckle and giggle and tickle and squirm too!). 

So c'mon by, ditch the shit, and stay a while.

My Dad's House is actually your dad's house. He's out back talking about how interstellar plasma opened the door to new dimensions while leading a pu'er tea ceremony. Some Malort shots may have been involved as well. It was his idea, really, but we're running with it.

We're an antiquated reprieve from the dusty digitization, complete with some cozy lounge spaces, a cheeky bar, and a stage full of stooges. If you're in the neighborhood, swing by for some live tunes, uncouth art, cheap booze, or to just take a nap in the shade. 

Looking for a place to perform some radical self-expression? Drop us a line. We're stoked to facilitate individual offerings to the playa with our infrastructure.

The Grand Hotel at Ashram Galactica – Your Home Away From Home Away From Home

Your Home Away from Home Away from Home –  The Grand Hotel at Ashram Galactica sets the standard for hospitality in the Black Rock City Metropolitan Area. Enjoy a crisp cocktail and conversation. Our well-informed and obsequious concierge will be happy to advise the traveler of all the city offers.

Your Home Away from Home Away from HomeOpening on the site of a 5000-year-old monastery, the Grand Hotel at Ashram Galactica sets a new standard for hotel and conference facilities in the Black Rock City Metropolitan Area. Plan an overnight stay in one of our four luxurious suites, enjoy a crisp cocktail at the world-famous Twilight Bar, play Quantum Croquet on the lush hotel grounds, or relax with one of our renowned Nepalese aromatherapy massages at the Poshram Spa. Our well-informed and obsequious concierge will be only too happy to book a room or advise the weary traveler of the many sights, sounds and sensations the city has to offer.
The Twisted Swan and Bacchus!  Come for a calm cool after noon or a nice cold pint at night.

Come escape the burn at the burn.  Enjoy and ice cold pint of whatever is on tap or just some whiskey to warm the sub cockles of your heart.  We are a geeky Celtic pub and we like it that way.  Come tilt your glass to whate'er may come.
Open 8PM-2AM  M-F come for good beer, irish coffee, mead and whisky.  Water for those who want it.

A celtic themed playa pub designed to give an environment where burners can hang out and be able to talk to each other with good beer on tap, whiskey, and maybe a warm Irish Coffee for the cold nights! For the music lovers and those who play various instruments can join in the music sesiun, a celtic jam session mid-day on Thursday. We are also planning on a role playing and table top game day!

TheTwisted Swan, the new incarnation of the Dusty Swan, a full service celtic pub with a bar, pull tap, whiskey, irish coffee, live music sessions, and a good old fashioned pub feel in BRC! 
Come each night we have a theme to suite your geek needs along with our friendly pub feel.  If nothing else for a respite from your woes and a pint.
Twisted Swan Celtic Pub, a true celtic experience on playa!

Stop in for a cold draught beer, fine Irish whiskey, hot Irish coffee, and wonderful Celtic music. Recite a limerick and get a Guinness, get your 
Who on at our Doctor Who night or show your best knees on Kilted Thursday, and thrill to our music seisiun featuring the playa's finest celtic musicians!

Want to participate at Tomorrow Today driving to the Playa in an old VW Bus or other unique camper? Well, Welcome Home to VW Bus Camp, a wonderful Burning Man theme camp which has been placed and participated on the Playa every Burn since 1998. So first, make sure to change out your leaky fuel lines, check your tires, carry a fire extinguisher and pack lots and lots of spare parts and then join us and participate in Camp's many interactive projects. Yep, we still have a tie dye party amongst other cool stuff. This is a wonderful opportunity for you to bring out your own projects to share and teach us all something new. Welcome Home and see you in the dust!

Driving out to Curiouser & Curiouser in an old VW Bus or other unique camper? Make sure to change out your leaky fuel lines, check your tires, carry a fire extinguisher and pack lots and lots of spare parts. So, you are welcome to camp with us, a fine Burning Man theme camp which has been placed on the Playa since 1998. Join us and learn about life in Black Rock City and participate in Camp's many interactive projects. This is a wonderful opportunity for you to bring out your own project and teach us something new. Welcome home and see you soon, in the dust!

"Come to kindly terms with your ass, for it bears you" opens John Muir's How to Keep Your VW Alive DIY repair guide, for the Compleat Idiot. For Animalia we invite all Playa Idiots and would be idiots to visit Bus Camp for our Leopard Lounge and Day Spa where we offer tequila shots, foot massage and clean white cotton socks, Grateful Dyed tie dye party, crafts, camp tours of our asses, I mean buses, and how we feed and take care of these old beasts. We've been doing this on Playa since 1998. To quote John Muir again "The type of life your bus contains differs from yours by time scale, logic level and conceptual anomalies but is "Life" nonetheless. It's Karma depends on your desire to make and keep it Alive!" Camp's "Life" is Equality and Community, come visit and see for yourselves.

For Waking Dreams VW Bus Camp and Leopard Lounge is bringing back our fabulous lounge and day spa, Grateful Dyed tie dye party, Mother's High Tea, Hooping, Games, Live Music, Brain Freeze Challenge and wait there's much, much more! Enter camp, tour and experience 1990's style Burning Man. Expect so many surprises and so much fun that you will never want to leave. Also, bring a white cotton T shirt for Wednesday's Grateful Dyed party!

For Metamorphoses VW Bus Camp is bringing back our fabulous Leopard Lounge and Day Spa, Grateful Dyed tie dye party, Mothers' High Tea, Hooping, Games and Brain Freeze. Now celebrating our 22'd Burn on the Playa, for the first time we will play the role of a "Living History of Burning Man" camp. Think of us as interpreters of an event we all think we already really know? Wander through camp and experience the closest most of you will ever get to a circa 1990's Burning Man theme camp, check out the cool old buses and hang with us. For the 1% of Burners out there with more Playa experience, please visit us and let us hear how full of it we are.

VW Bus Camp and Leopard Lounge is happy and thankful to be able to share our dusty collection of iconic old VW campers and our inviting and playful Leopard Lounge and Day Spa with citizens of BRC for our 21st Burn. Returning are favorite projects like the Grateful Dyed tie dye party, Hoop Jam and the new acts that you'll need to visit to see!

Come visit and celebrate with us our 20th Burn on the Playa for Radical Ritual and experience a taste of Burning Man from the1990's, a happy continuum, one which still feels fresh and fun. The Leopard Lounge and Day Spa is returning better than ever, along with our Grateful Dye and Hoop Jam parties, Mothers' High Tea, many games, Sparkles, lectures, live music, and lots of beautiful VW Buses!

Our 19th Burn on the Playa, VW Bus Camp will share the Vitruvian Van, your opportunity to learn about the proportions and function of the VW Bus, this light and once inexpensive, ubiquitous utility van, one of the world's only vehicles that can carry its own weight and travel over any road, repurposed here for magic. VW Bus Camp is returning with our greatest ever Leopard Lounge and Day Spa, Grateful Dyed tie dye Party, Hoop Jam, games, lectures, vehicle repair and much, much, more!

Experience VW Bus Camp's twisted take on Carnival of Mirrors by participating in the distorted 1960's spectacle that our VW Buses now represent. Take in our Leopard Lounge and Day Spa, carnival booths and games, Grateful Dyed tie dye party, lectures on trippy subjects including VW repair and maintenance, thoughts on the dead french philosophers and take part in our silly effort to reimagine the '60s and contemplation of the safety of Lawn Jarts!

VW Bus Caravaners, stop and camp with the VW Bus Caravansary at Black Rock City. Stay and participate with us at the great Burning Man Caravansary, before continuing on your paths across the wilderness of Nevada and places beyond, VW Bus Camp, where camaraderie and the spirit of Burning Man has lived on now for 17 Burns.

All VW Bus pilots landing on the Playa are invited to join us for our 16th Burn as we return, not expectantly waiting for cargo from John Frum, or even Larry Harvey, but to deliver and share fun with citizens of BRC. Camp’s Newbielandia newbie acculturation project, tie dye party, hooping extravaganzas, yoga, Leopard Lounge day spa and tiki bar, Playa famous vehicle repair, Burners Without Matches, live music, lectures on olive oil and original Buddhism will return!

Survivors of an ill conceived ticket lottery, VW Bus Camp invites Black Rock City’s great new cohort of Playa virgins arriving in a VW bus to join us on our fertile camp ground, ready to be re-sown with love and with play. This, our 15th year on the Playa.

VW Bus Camp welcomes all Transitional Beings and new camp mates to join us for our 14th year on the Playa.  Relax in our Urban Jungle Day Spa, party in the Leopard Lounge Tiki bar and the Rasta bar, ride BusZilla 2 the VW Bus based articulated art car, grab one of our many hula hoops and hoop away while enjoying a brew, learn tie dying, all in a camp of dusty Burners and their fabulous VW Buses!

Enter VW Bustropolis and experience unique ways of metro living. Relax in our Urban Jungle Day Spa, get a new/old look at Bus Camp’s Grateful Dyed tie dye party, hitch a ride on BusZilla 2 our  gas/electric articulating VW Bus people mover, Hula Hoop while enjoying fine brews at camp’s Hoopa Dome!

Camp with us in your VW bus and evolve, devolve, this our 12th year on the Playa. Visit and ride BusZilla 2, our articulating VW bus based, Mothra fighting, electric/gas late Pleistocene people mover. Return for great hula hooping and beer. We are evolutionary proof that the slowest survive on love!

VW Bus Camp welcomes all arriving in a VW Bus or other unique camping         vehicle to join our camp. Visit us and experience the unique American         Dream that comes from experienced Burners still driving these archaic         and slow vehicles, hula hooping to a non-stop 4th of July, dreaming of         strong tail winds!

Come celebrate VW Bus Camp’s 10th year on the Playa by joining camp in your VW or other unique camping vehicle. You will be welcomed by our giant Bus Camp Man while enjoying the Leopard Lounge, snuggling in the Hubble Cuddle Dome, playing Hoops and Beer, listening to Radio Dionysus, utilizing the Bus Camp Free Store, riding in our helicopter, and participating in our Sawmi’s Lunar Eclipse celebration The Marrige of the Sun and the Moon!

VW Bus Camp welcomes all arriving on the Playa in a VW Bus or other strange and unique camping vehicle to join us, now in our 9th year at Burning Man.  In 2006 we shall conspire in The Bat Cave and play Hoops and Beer in our most beautiful VW Bus village!

VW Bus Camp welcomes all Burning Man participants arriving in a VW Bus or other amazing and personal camping vehicle to join us, now in our 8th year. Visit us and experience a unique Burning Man community, one that can only be delivered to you from experienced burners in a VW Bus!

VW bus owners and worshipers unite for the 7th incarnation of VW Bus Camp. Be ye air or water cooled or just enjoy the smell of a toasty engine, all are equally welcome. Renowned for a relaxed atmosphere of sharing and creating, join us as we shed the dogmatic shackles of our so-called normal lives in the true spirit of burning man.

VW Bus Camp is maturing like a fine wine. Join us for our 6th consecutive year. Eclectic bus owners unite, share the nomadic spirit in the Bus Camp Lounge with good food, good drink, and of course our world famous great vibes. (And yes, our water-cooled friends are welcome also).

VW Bus Camp is back for our 5th consecutive year. Eclectic bus owners unite, share the nomadic spirit in the Bus Camp Lounge with good food, good drink, and of course great vibes. (And yes, our water-cooled friends are welcome also)
Good vibes, good times, nomadic spirits unite at the 4th annual VW Bus Camp. Owner or worshiper, air or water cooled, all are welcome.

VW Bus Camp is back for our 3rd consecutive year. Celebrate your nomadic spirit, bring your bus and good vibes. Create, share, emulate, and “Burn” with us. Enjoy the all new Bus Camp lounge and Massage tent.
Welcome all air and water-cooled nomadic bus gypsys’ to our concentric crop circle of fun. Join our Phamily in the all new Bus Camp Lounge as we Burn together with peace, love and buses.
The Bus spiral will become a growing mechanical crop circle, alive with its inhabitants and aircooled engines.

Atlantis returns from the dust with mezcal, myth, and music. Our lounge is open 24/7. Two DJ parties to incite dance rituals. By day: tea, meditation, and rest. By night: light, rhythm, and strange delights. Come curious. Stay so long that you forget why you came.

The demigods of Atlantis invite dusty desert travelers to relax at our mystical shaded and fanned oasis. Our mischievous hosts will offer up savory treats to our guests in hopes they might become enchanted by the oasis and never leave. We invite our new friends to join us each afternoon in bacchanalian festivals and indulge in rituals of song and dance. Once the sun sets, mysterious lights illuminate the caves of Atlantis which reward nocturnal travelers with sweet treats and interactive surprises.

Don't call us a sound camp. We are a dance camp. 
Sunsets/Sunrise dj's, drinks, and dancing.
"dance" camp

High Tea - Late Afternoon, Daily
Open Bar - Post Tea, Daily 
Art Lounge - 24/7
Sunset Sound Dance Parties - 4pm till Sundown, MWF
Imagine a future a thousand years from now.  We have lost all history and technology, but discovered strange artifacts and the sun gods.  Let's worship deep house with them…
Our on-playa, under-the-sea home.
The lost city of the playa
Atlantis is once again reborn.  Join us in the lost city for a taste of the life aquatic, wetter and wilder than ever before.
Atlantis is an underwater oasis on the playa, celebrating the sensory stimulation of life aquatic and the beauty and mystery of The Lost City.

Nowhere is more fertile than under the sea.  Whether exploring an underwater UV oasis under our dome or walking through a maze of sculptures exploring underwater fertility, we encourage you to come get wet with us.

Camp As-Is wants you to come as you are because that's how we do.  We're dancers, builders, and menders.  Rusty MetalWorxz can mend your stainless, steel, & aluminum so bring it 10a-2p.  Fire circle, shaded flow space, benches, fans and music sit along side our mutant vehicle The Rusty Iris who will keep the downbeat playing all week.

Beans, flicking, roasting, steamy dripping love, room for cream – our secret steps to the finest cup of coffee. Bring your brewtiful self over to Camp Bean Water to enjoy a cup and let us show you the full potential of a coffee shop. All cups of coffee our baristas serve-up are made to order and come with positive affirmations. Looking for something to fill your now stimulated colon, our cooks can fry you up mouth-watering arepas. Love and good vibes are abundant in our cafe, so drip on in. We're open every weekday morning. We have special evening events like arepa night and a special sunrise opening.

It's not the end of the world, it's the safe word! Think Armageddon for all your bike needs. We've been providing Bike Love Bike Repair on-playa for about 15 years, and we offer professional bike repair daily. Or fix your own bike at our Public Bike Repair stations, 24x7! We also host great parties, don't miss our Wednesday afternoon Alley Cat Race and After Party with Funny Bike Demo! Our well-stocked BoozeBar opens on (polite) demand. Blend yourself a refreshing frozen beverage on our Blender Bike while you're there! Our 28ft dome 'living room' / shade structure provides the perfect hang-out space, no matter the weather. Open to visitors 24x7. Drop in any time!

Our 28ft dome 'living room' / shade structure provides the perfect hang-out space, no matter the weather. Open to visitors 24x7. Drop in any time!

It's not the end of the world, it's the safe word! Think Armageddon for all your bike needs. We've been providing bike-love to the 3:00 sector for over 10 years, and we offer professional bike repair daily. Check out our Armageddon Emporium activities while you're here for bike repair. We also host great parties, don't miss our Weds Alley Cat Race and After Party with Funny Bike Demo! Our 28ft dome 'living room' and outdoor shade structure provide options for the perfect hang-out space, no matter the weather. Open to visitors 24x7. Drop in any time!

Armageddon Bike Camp - it's not the end of the world, it's the safe word! Think Armageddon for all your bike needs. We offer professional bike repair daily. We've been providing bike-love to the 3:00 sector for over 10 years!  We also host a couple of great parties: a Tuesday night-time party and a Thursday afternoon Alley Cat bike race/scavenger hunt, Funny Bike Demo and Disco dance party, at our awesome Prism dance floor. Get a ride, or take a slide on our art car, the Classic Slide, and enjoy classic rock (and renditions) in camp or on the playa. Our 28ft dome 'living room' and outdoor shade structure provide options for the perfect hang-out space, no matter the weather open to visitors 24x7. Drop in any time!

Armageddon - it's not the end of the world, it's the Safe Word! We offer professional bike repair daily, providing bike-love to the 3:00 sector for over 10 years.

Armageddon - it's not the end of the world, it's the Safe Word! Come to Armageddon for bike repair, yoga, music or just to 'set a spell' in our community dome! We offer professional bike repair daily, serving the 3:00 sector for 10 years. Morning yoga classes in our dome are the best way to start your playa day! And our dome is a great place to hang out and watch the world go by, at any time. Come for a visit!

And our dome is a great place to hang out and watch the world go by, at any time of day. Come for a visit!

We offer professional bike repair daily, serving the 3:00 sector for 8 years. Morning yoga classes in our dome are the best way to start the day! And our dome is a great place to hang out and watch the world go by, at any time of day. Come for a visit!.

Street Life Hip Hop on the Playa.name: Street Life Hip Hop on the Playa

history.description:
Sunny days, where the beats don't fade,
Where the bass kicks in and the records play.
Can you tell me how to get, how to get to Street Life?

Old-school jams and a dance floor bright,
Cookies, rhymes, and a vibe so tight.
Follow the groove, the funk feels right—
Welcome to Street Life, day or night!

When Hip Hop hit Sesame Street, sunny days'd have beats on repeat. Where clouds sweep away on dance floor, old-school sounds make hearts soar. Follow the groove, vibes shining bright. Welcome to Street Life, day or night.

If Hip Hop went to Sesame Street, the sunny day's  would be filled with droppin beats. Where everyone sweeps the clouds away on the dance floor. Follow the old-school sounds that make your heart pound. And you'll be on your way to where the vibes are bright.  This is how you get to Street Life.

Street Life is where Hip Hop meets childhood. Our camp invites the Playa in with Sesame Street character art, dancing camp members on megaphones, and beats! We host 4 Hip Hop Happy Hours during the week and serve "grown folks vodka lemonade." This year we are excited to introduce a Studio 54 Disco & Funk Brunch! 

We invite folks to hang out, dance, get their face painted, snack on candy and childhood treats as well as take photos in our photo booth with Oscar, Big Bird, and Cookie Monster. The vibe we cultivate is both nostalgic and super hype with hip hop beats. All are welcome!
Street Life is where Hip Hop meets Sesame Street. Come dance, vibe out, & drink vodka lemonade in the shade hip hop beats.
Street Life - Hip Hop Comes to the Playa

Picture Big Bird swigging a 40 while Barkley and the Martians dance to whatever music was on the radio during the decades of your childhood.  From Public Enemy to Madonna, Beastie Boys to Beyonce, enjoy music that runs the gamut  of genres while still making you nostalgic each time you recognize those first few notes of that song you used to love.  When you take a break to catch your breath, enjoy some snacks and grown-folks lemonade, play a few games, and raid our craft stash to decorate yourself like your favorite character.  Come dance your way down memory lane with us, as we combine the nostalgia we feel for Sesame Street with the swag, bounce, and flavor of the music we love.

Miki Beach is inspired from an array of beach lounges in Miami and the Caribbean, and mimicking these beach lounge vibes, we are striving to create an open, breezy, colorful environment to relax and have fun.  
Miki Beach is your desert oasis so come celebrate with us at one of our playful parties, sip on one of our delectable libations, visit us for our Brazilian BBQ on Saturday or participate and become a winner on one of our silly activities such as the Miki Beach State Fair.

Miki Beach is your place to find an oasis in the desert. With beach, breezy vibes that combine Miami and Cuban flavors with a dash of NYC eccentricity, our goal is to welcome you in from the playa, provide luscious amounts of electric music, sensual delights, and the warmest, most welcoming vibes possible.

Miki Beach is your place to find an oasis in the desert.  With beach, breezy vibes that combine Miami and Cuban flavors with a dash of NYC eccentricity, our goal is to welcome you in from the playa, provide luscious amounts of amazing house music, sensual delights, and the warmest, most welcoming vibes possible.

Miki Beach is your place to find an oasis in the desert.  With beach, breezy vibes that combine Miami and Cuban flavors with a dash of NYC eccentricity, our goal is to welcome you in from the playa, provide luscious amounts of amazing house music, sensual delights, and the warmest, most welcoming vibes possible.
Miki Beach has a simple mission - to create a community that inspires collaboration between house music lovers, DJs and local artists while celebrating the principles of Burning Man.

MIKI BEACH CAMP is a unique twist from the traditional Burning Man theme camp. Inspired by the relaxing beach vibes, and cultivated with the electrifying energies of Miami and New York, MIKI BEACH will allow you to indulge and experience Burning Man in a unique way. Consider this camp "The Remix”.
Live coverage of Burning Man streaming 24-7 during the event. Real news, Fake news, mayhem, music and good times.
Live coverage of Burning Man streaming 24-7 during the event. Real news, Fake news, mayhem, music and good times.

We are your unofficial source during the event for all sorts of real and imagined information. The usual suspects are returning for year 23 broadcasting on playa.  Artists and camps wanting to put the word out on their projects and events are welcome to drop off prerecorded PSA's or just drop in and tell us about it live on the air. You can even meet our questionable Dj and engineering talent.
We only ask a small favor. Please don't tell our families and church friends we are at Burning Man, they still think we are spinning tunes in a Brothel.

Radio Electra 89.9 FM. 
Out on the playa once again for our 22nd year! Bringing you our usual eclectic array of music, mayhem and critical commentary!  We welcome Theme Camp representatives and artists to stop in and tell our listeners about your projects and camp events live on the air.  Or you can give us a prerecorded PSA.  We are here to help make your project a success.

Radio Electra 89.9 FM
Playing an eclectic array of music, commentary and mayhem.
Stop in and say hello. Bring us you public service announcements to play on the air. We are here to help make your project a success.

Bringing you the best music news and commentary on your FM dial for 19 years on the playa. Tune in during the event for music, news, mayhem, and commentary. Theme camps and artists are always welcome to drop off Public Service announcements about interactive events and projects they wish to have everyone know about.

Radio Electra 89.9 FM returns yet again for our 17th year for your listening pleasure or displeasure. Tune us in during the event for an eclectic array of music, news, interviews and commentary. Artists and camps wishing to get the word out about events or projects on playa are always welcome to stop in for a live interview or just drop off a prerecorded PSA for our play list.

Radio Electra 89.9 FM. Once again we return offering an Electra Eclectic array of music, mayhem, commentary and art. Camps, villages,and artists wishing to make radio announcements about events may stop in or contact us by email prior to the event. Please feel free to email us or drop off any prerecorded announcements you may have. You can even come in for a live interview. We want to hear from you about what you do to participate. Stop in, Tune in, Participate, Enjoy!

Xpat Alien has searched far and wide, through many galaxies, to find a new place to rest our travel weary heads. Earth fits the bill and we have decided to stay.
We bring with us the Crop Circle Cantina, complete with 80' of circular shade, phenomenal DJs spinning epic tunes, a bar top with stripper poles for dancing shenanigans, six 3-butt benches to relax on, Colorado brewed craft beer and root beer on tap, and glasses full of ice filled with our own Alien Punch.
