Xpat Alien - The Crop Circle Cantina serves up intergalactic beats in our well traveled landing craft.
Xpat Alien and the Crop Circle Cantina. Providing the finest in terrestrial based partying.

The number of Aliens choosing Earth as their permanent residence is growing. XPAT ALIEN has been smoothing the transition to Earth based partying since 2008. Come share a ice-filled, sweet, cosmic beverage, swap intergalactic tales with fellow XPATs, and levitate on our bartop anti-gravity poles at the Crop Circle Cantina. Look for the blue and silver, alien circus spaceship.

Après Ski Injury is an interactive camp offering an Après-Ski Bar, a Morning Coffee Bar as well as a thrill ride: A ski ramp in the middle of the desert! Our bar is open every afternoon till late night and offers not only drinks, but entertainment, fun games and fire.
You can also ski!

We will have also events (see WhatWhereWhen) and ski-races.

Music Vizards is an interactive camp offering an Apre-Ski Bar as well as a brand new thrill ride: A ski jump in the middle of the desert! 
Our bar has open every afternoon till late night and offers not only drinks, but entertainment, fun games and fire.
You can also ski jump!
Music Vizards: Apre-Ski Bar and music, dance, music visualization and ski jumping the desert!

Trippy and spacey, laser eyed and shiny objects, landscape, aliens and faces are beating in all different frequencies of the current music being played, projected onto you. Real-time rendering and FFT make it possible. Buckle up for a deep dive into the vast reaches of music!
Join us at our cocktail bar, with VJ Delta T & Eck

Music Vizards are a music visualization dedicated camp, providing a unique dance experience with live CGI rendered real time projectors.
Come and enjoy the atmosphere and when partying brave enough, get an Austrian Cauldron Goulash at dawn (3 times a week).

We seek out the weary, the overheated and the disconnected to offer our signature Icy Hands experience.  The instantaneous sense of relief, joy and connection turns recipients into PARTICIPANTS and makes them part of a larger whole.  Icy Hands epitomizes "the gift that keeps on giving"  by coaching recipients through providing the experience to others.  Hands are cooled to near freezing temperatures by means of a simple block of ice, then with full positive consent of the recipient, those hands are placed upon the neck and jaw, providing an immediate sense of cool, calm and connection. 

Block of Ice: $5.  Memories, endorphins, friendship and dopamine rush: PRICELESS.

Chill out with the Icy Hands crew as they defrost between midday mercy missions: share cool stories, images and video of those touched by icy hands under the sizzling playa sun.  Learn how to turn a simple block of ice into smiles, goosebumps and a truly incredible shared experience!

Happy Hair Salon is a transformational hair salon where we showcase hair extensions as performance art. We offer hair extension makeovers, rave braids, beard braids, bubble braids and the like while serving snow cones and offering shade and relaxation in our antigravity chairs. Burnt out? Playafied beyond belief? Come to Happy Hair and we will help you get your groove back, but this time even better. Cause u might have the perfect outfit for Burning Man, but what do you really have if you don't have Happy Hair?

Happy Hair Salon is a colored hair extension, rave braid, bubble braid salon where we give burners hair makeovers while serving them snow cones. You might have the perfect outfit and shoes for Burning Man, but if you don't have Happy Hair, what do you really have anyways?

Happy Cones Camp welcomes overheated burners to come enjoy a cool shaved ice snowcone  to custom flavor at our flavoring bar during the heat of the afternoon. We provide everything you need, just bring yourself

Come for piping hot pour over coffee! Meet interesting people! Challenge the Strip Plank! A harrowing game of skill and poise, walk the plank, grab the cock all while the crowd heckles you with supportive guff. Each time you fail, you can try again, but the price is an article of clothing! Winners get to skip the coffee line, losers lose more than their shirt... 9am to Noon, Monday through Saturday.
Wednesday from 5pm-6pm we will be hosting Capers Erotic Fiction Reading and Improv Competition! There may be puppets! Also, Thursday-Saturday , from 5pm-7pm our bar will be taken over by the mutinous Priva-tea-ers for piping cold ice tea! Join and walk the plank (with your pinkie out)!

A harrowing game of skill and poise, walk the plank, grab the cock all while our trained bullhorn artists heckle you with supportive guff. Each time you fail, you can try again, but the price is an article of clothing! Winners get to skip the coffee line, losers lose more than their shirt...9am to Noon, Monday through Saturday.

Avast ye blearly-eyed landlubbers! Come drink deeply from the bottomless depths of our coffee! While you await your pour-over brew, enjoy the company of new friends, neighbors, and the saltiest sea dogs to ever sail the playa. And, if your heart be stout, walk the dreaded Strip Plank! To win is to skip the line, to fail is to lose more than their shirt...Yarrr!
Also, the law of the sea be: bring yer own mug!

Avast ye blearly-eyed landlubbers! Drink deeply from the bottomless depths of our coffee! Walk the dreaded Strip Plank! Board our stalwart vessel Airpusher and party with us!

Coffee Mon.-Saturday. 9am-12pm.
Airpusher Boarding Parrrty Tuesday and Thursday 3pm-6pm.

Avast ye blearly-eyed landlubbers! Drink deeply from the bottomless depths of our coffee! Walk the dreaded Strip Plank or find yourselves locked in the pillory (spanking optional)! Coffee Mon.-Fri. 9am-11am.

Our Desert Oasis Bar and Lounge offers craft cocktails alongside our popular self-postcard station, where participants write messages to their future selves that we mail before ticket sales as reminders of playa magic. Join us for daily morning yoga sessions, smutty poetry readings, and UV paint dance parties under our powerful blacklight system. Stop by our Playa Confessional booth to record your deepest burn revelations, then return for Absolution Happy Hour where we broadcast the previous day's confessions while serving themed forgiveness cocktails. When night falls, our burn barrel becomes a gathering place where strangers become friends over shared warmth and stories.

Come create large format pinhole photography to capture art installations and the community in the desert! We have built a darkroom every burn since 1999. We host art-making workshops every morning. We take the workshop on an art tour using old-school pinhole cameras loaded with photographic paper. This allows participants to slow down, observe their surroundings more closely, and truly immerse themselves in the process of capturing images. Plus, the unique aesthetic of pinhole photography adds a distinctive charm to the photographs, making them truly special mementos of the experience.

Come create large format pinhole photography to capture art installations and the community in the desert! We have built a darkroom every burn since 1999. We host art-making workshops every morning. We take the workshop on an art tour using old-school pinhole cameras loaded with photographic paper. This allows participants to slow down, observe their surroundings more closely, and truly immerse themselves in the process of capturing images. Plus, the unique aesthetic of pinhole photography adds a distinctive charm to the photographs, making them truly special mementos of the experience.

The pinhole project provides daily art making workshops and hosts a gallery of the pinhole photography art we create throughout the week. We maintain a large fleet of cameras which we use to document the art and community of Burning Man. We believe this traditional analog form of photography provides a nice contrast for folks to slow down and become more present with art making. Our offering is art making, communal effort, inclusion and gifting. Ideally, we like to take pinhole photographs of playa artists in front of their installations. We believe documenting creators with their work is a delicious form of acknowledgement and provides a wonderful gift.

Black Rock Disc Golf Club has a mushroom-themed disc golf course which embraces fun, games, friendly competition, collaboration, and creativity. We provide a place where folks can join together and throw one of the custom stamped discs loaned out at the camp. You can win one at one of our tournaments or events! The course is accessible 24/7, and discs glow in the dark so don't hesitate to swing by late night/early morning for a round. 


We also have some mushroom hazards on the course! We have tall ones, small ones, ones that glow, and ones that show you what disc golf is all about. It's definitely a psychedelic experience to walk through, even if you aren't in the mood to play a round. Just make sure to listen for the call of, "FORE!"

24/7 LED disc golf! We have discs, and multiple tournaments!  Newbies welcome!
24/7 Disc golf!  Want to try disc/frisbee golf?  Come any time! Discs provided.  Newbies welcome!

An open landscape, a frisbee, and stuff to throw that frisbee at!  Come play disc golf courtesy of the Black Rock Disc Golf Club!  We have 9 holes to throw at and some cool stuff to throw around.  Can't throw?  We'll teach you!  It's guaranteed to be a good time!  Open all day, and all night - obstacles, baskets, and discs all light up!  Check Playa Events for scheduled tournament times.

This year we're bringing the disc golf course to a whole new level and will be building out the psychedelic forest to incorporate some trippy art and oomfy shade structures for the community to enjoy. As burners begin or end their adventure into open playa, they can stop by the disc golf course 24/7 to throw some discs through our glowing nine-hole disc golf, trip out under our 10' tall mushrooms, or grab a drink and relax in the Gopher's Hole during happy hour.

We'll be constructing a trippy forest to act as obstacles for the 9-hole disc golf course. The disc course will be open for play all of the burn, with LED discs for night play. The forest will be made different fun obstacles and will include 15' tall tye-dye trees to 10' tall mushrooms to dozens of 3' mushrooms, all of which will  light up bright for the fairies to prance through deep into the night.

Disc Golf! Frisbee Golf! Come play or learn 24/7 with giant glowing mushrooms and more for obstacles!

Want to participate or camp with us?  Email at BlackRockDiscGolfClub@gmail.com or find us on Facebook.

See you on the playa!

Black Rock Disc Golf Club is back again!  Come play disc/frisbee golf with us!  Need discs?  We brought them!  Newbie or expert, join us for some fun and learning!  Giant mushrooms are built for obstacles on the course and everything is lit 24/7 so come play whenever!

Ignited States is all about our states of mind, our states of being, our states of consciousness. It's about lighting up our worlds. It's about igniting and fanning the flames of our creativity. And sometimes, it's about igniting the fire in our bellies with a shot of fireball.

- Ignite your artful state by making a flag or tetrahedron to illustrate the state you're in or immersing yourself in the lights and sounds of our two interactive art pieces, Point of Interest and Lucid
- Ignite your wakeful state with beverages and bad advice
- Ignite Your ready to party state at Let's Get This Party Started, Bangers & Mash, Fireball Friday Happy Hour or one of our popup dance parties 
- Ignited your playful state with our ring toss game, Heads of State

- Ignite your artful state by making a flag to illustrate the state you're in or immersing yourself in the lights and sounds of the Point of Interest
- Ignite your wakeful state with mimosas, coffee or espresso martinis while getting bad advice
- Ignite Your ready to party state at one of our popup dance parties or at Fireball Friday happy hour
- Ignite your State of Awe as you watch aerial performances
- Ignited your playful state with our ring toss game, Heads of State

- What State are You In? Make your own flag!
- Join in on our music video! Sing I Get By With A Little Help From My friends in or outside of our recording studio!
- Need some bad advice? Served up with Morning Mimosas with the Elders Cats or Afternoon Coffee with the Not So Elder Cats!
- Wednesday Wine Tasting with Wild Owl! 
- Fireball Friday combines with Birthday Girl's Birthday Party!
- Play the Scrotisserie any time of day!

CATWORLD:  Whether you wish to play with one of our human-sized cat toys, lounge in a box, or dance the night away to the best music on playa, CATWORLD humbly offers a wide range of cage-free entertainment to break up the monotony of the burn.  Please join us Wednesday night for our camp party -  Hair Ball 4.0 and on the last Sunday Roaring Funday for the OctoPussy 2.0 Block Party and DPW Booze Drive, where we will do the victory dance for an amazing week, and collect surplus alcohol for donation to the unsung heroes of DPW that do so much for so many. And if you're in need of some (bad) parental advice and a mimosa, join the Elder Cats Café most mornings during Burn Week.

Enter CATWORLD, adult playground for cats, humans, and prey animals of all kinds.  Whether you wish to play with one of our human-sized cat toys, lounge in a box, strut your gorgeous self down our catwalk, join any of our daytime feline fitness activities, have a drink under the UV lights in the RAWR Bar or dance the night away to the best music on playa, CATWORLD humbly offers a wide range of cage-free entertainment to break up the monotony of the burn.  Please join us Wednesday night for our camp party -  Hair Ball - and on the last Sunday Roaring Funday for the OctoPussy Block Party and DPW Booze Drive, where we will do the victory dance for an amazing week, and collect surplus alcohol for donation to the unsung heroes of DPW that do so much for so many.

Enter CATWORLD, adult playground for cats, humans, and prey animals of all kinds.  Whether you wish to play with one of our human-sized cat toys, lounge in a box, or have a drink under the UV lights in the RAWR Bar and dance all night away to the best music on playa, CATWORLD humbly offers a wide range of cage-free entertainment to break up the monotony of the burn.  Had enough?  Got a problem posturing and hissing can't solve?  Come to our camp party for a DANCE BATTLE, or don one of our padded cat suits and sign up for CAT FIGHTS!

Ignited States welcomes one and all to refresh their creative selves!
Bring out your inner Mona Lisa, play our Leonardo games, drink a shot, or just hang out and chill.
We offer comfort and shade, inside the Ignite Your State Workshop & Lounge or outside on our Front Porch.

Ignited States Ski Patrol welcomes all Black Rock City Suckers.... er, Citizens... to come on by!  Try your luck at the Ski Patrol Fun n Games Center, relax with us on our Front Porch, or stop by for a drink at the Ignite Your States Ski Lodge!
While cooling down fellow burners with delicious soft serve ice cream,  and ice cold drinks. Silver City will be supplying the beats that will have peoples feet stomping and body swaying.

Welcome to Silver City!  A step back in time but with modern luxuries.  Have you had frozen yogurt on the Playa yet?  No...you are missing out!  Come visit out friendly camp for some cold beer, the finest box wine and guaranteed laughs and friendship!  Come relax under our shade structure and many comfy couches.  Don't forget to stop by for our live entertainment.  During the day, come take a spin on the mechanical bull, Brooks...see what record you can make!
Come enjoy a piece of the old west at Burning Man.  Entertainment includes an open bar, mechanical bull, live entertainment, large dance floor, giant rocking horses and games!

Silver City an old west themed camp that will be providing live music, open mic, swing dancing, line dancing, interactive games such as lassoing, Tin Cup, corn hole (bean bag toss), a bar providing beer, non alcoholic beverages, and slushies (great for when it is hot). Come by and ride our life size rocking horses, take your picture on the gallows, or just come by and say howdy and cool off in our covered bar.
Black Rock Silver City

Every city has a roller skating rink. The Black Rock Roller Disco is the roller skating rink for Blac Rock City. We ae a full service roller rink.  We have the skates, the funky music and we're always a funky good time every time.

Every city has a roller skating rink. The Black Rock Roller Disco is the roller skating rink for Blac Rock City. We ae a full service roller rink.  We have the skates, the funky music and we're always a funky good time every time.
Roller skating rink in the middle of the desert. Every city has a roller rink.  The Black Rock Roller Disco is the roller rink for Black Rock City.

Every city has a roller rink.  It's the same for Black Rock City. The Black Rock Roller Disco is the roller rink in the middle of the desert. Here you can put some wheels on your feet and have a funky good time skating the night away.  We're open 24 hours a day every day.  We have skates for you, people to help you and everything you need to share the Burning Man experience at a roller skating rink.

A Roller Disco in the middle of the desert? Yes, it's true!!!  Every city has a roller rink. Black Rock City has one as well!!! If you're looking for one of Burning Man's most fun, exciting, interactive experiences, come on down to the Esplanade and go for a roll at the Black Rock Roller Disco!!! We have your skates, we have your size, all we need is you!!!
The Black Rock Roller Disco is open 24 7 like 7-11 !!! Any time you feel like getting your skate groove on, come on by!!!  We will be celebrating Michael Jackson's birthday on Wednesday night and the Black Rock Roller Girls will present a live roller derby game on Thursday evening!!!  
Come by the Black Rock Roller Disco!!!  In San Francisco we are the Church of 8 Wheels, but here we spread "Rolligion" on the playa!!!

A roller disco in the middle of the desert? Yes, there's a camp for that!!!  The Black Rock Roller Disco is your friendly neighborhood full service roller skating rink in BRC!!!  We bring the old school funk and roller disco magic to Burning Man!!! Come join D. Miles, the GodFather of Skate in San Francisco and the Holy Rollers from the Church of 8 Wheels and have a funky good time with us!!!
A roller disco in the middle of the desert?  That's exactly what we are!!!
Where people come to get their roller disco groove on @ BRC

What? A roller disco in the middle of the desert? Yes, that’s exactly what we are.  The Black Rock Roller Disco is the roller skating rink of Black Rock City!!!  We’re open 24/7 and have everything you need to experience playa life on skates.  We get funky with the old school funk and roller disco, but we also have DJ’s playing everything that makes you shake your booty on skates. Stop by and have a funky good time with us.
Got Skates?  Don’t worry about it. We got you covered. If you like to boogie with wheels on your feet, come by the Black Rock Roller Disco and get your skate groove on with us!!!

Just like cities in the default world, BRC has has a place where you can get your roller skate groove. The difference here is we roll 24/7 just like 7-11!!!  Come by and get your skate groove on at the Black Rock Roller Disco.  Don’t miss the Black Rock Rollergirls roller derby game Thursday evening and Soul Train night on Friday night.

There’s a place on the playa where the funk and disco beat will have you rollin’ nonstop!!!  Make tracks to the Black Rock Roller Disco where you can roller skate on the playa all day and all night.  The Black Rock Rollergirls will be slamin’ the competition with all girl roller derby Thursday, Sept 1 and the bar ia always open.  You can even show ohh your foosball skills!!!

No visit to the playa will be complete until you shake your booty and get your skate groove on at the Black Rock Roller Disco. We’ll be pumping the old school funk and roller disco beat ’til your wheels fall off.  The Black Rock Rollergirls will kick ass with roller derby action. Stop by and say hi

Come get your skate groove on at the Black Rock Roller Disco. We’re open 24/7 and will be pumpin’ up the jams with the old school funk and roller disco beat. This year DJ/s are linging up and the band, Soul Glow will be in the house.  Take a ride on the Soul Train or stop at the Soul Man Bar.

The Black Rock City’s roller rink will be in the house!!!  We have Black Rock Rollergirls are doing roller derby games and the band “Soul Glow” will be playing on Friday night. We’ll have a bigger rink, more skates and the old school funk and roller disco music will make you dance all night long.

The Black Rock Roller Disco comes to the desert each year as an extention of the fantastic skating scene you will find in San Francisco’s Golden Gate Park, New York’s Central Park and and the skate spot in Venice Beach. Ca. We love to skate and we want to share the joy of skating with everyone at Burning Man. We will be rollin’ 24/7 to the old school funk and roller disco beat. We’ll have over 100 pairs of skates, skate instructors, performances AND all girl roller derby. Bring your skates and plan to boogie with the Black Rock Rollers.
The Black Rock Roller Disco is back on the Playa in 2006.  Come and get your skate groove on with us as we continue to build on the ultimate interactive Burning Man exoerience ON WHEELS!!!!!

Once again the Black Rock Rollers will be in the house at Burning Man 2005. It will be our great pleasure to present to you the Black Rock Roller Disco. Come get your skate groove on as we bring the Golden Gate Park skate scene to the playa in 2005. D. Miles, the "GodFather of Skating" will be playing the old school funk and roller disco beats 24/7 with the Naked Skate on Friday night. This year we will have a wedding on the rink as two of our burner skaters will do the permanant hook up thang. We’ll have skates, but if you have some, BRING THEM!!!!!!!

AmaZONE Camp is inspired by the power of the largest river in the world. We started out as a Brazilian camp and, in that way, we honor our South American heritage. We see each of the 10 principles of Burning Man reflected and encapsulated in every water molecule: inclusive, self-reliant, participative, immediate... Like water, like life. We are a hub of people who get together to reinforce our beliefs and share our studies.We like to provide experiences so people can contemplate water and the natural forces that rule existence. We are a tool for awakening. We bring up practices to heal our body and soul and by doing that we heal the whole. Be water, my friend.

AmaZONE Camp is a place for those who love science, spirituality, shamanism and diverse themes that surround the universe of self awakening and consciousness development. We have two complementary art installations based on Water. One in the Camp and another on Playa. Come connect pieces of our universe's puzzle. Our Camp is a place to lean and to teach, a place to feel and share experiences and understanding about the phenomenons that rules our existence.

AmaZONE camp is a community of Brazilian artists and dream builders. We are an international family creating inspirational and positive experiences.
This year we continue our mission of providing interaction to the city and bring our honoraria art project "The Altar of Intentions". It aims to capture the energy of the Burning Man, thanks to the help of the Masaru Emoto Institute.  The Altar collects intentions of thousands of people and proves that the "reality" is a state of mind.
Brazilian Burners Camp !!! If you want to join our international caravan wich is providing Art for Black Rock CIty this camp is for you!

Celestial Alchemy, the practice of inner transformation and parallels with the cosmic realms, a diverse camp that celebrates the love and connection of a transcendent humanity.  Join us for 10 Principle themed heartfelt yoga and conscious breathwork to revitalize your Burn spirit. Our celestial moon art piece is visible during dusk and early nighttime, accompanied by soft beats and easeful smiles. We look forward to morning movement and moonlit kisses with you.

Serpent Moon is a diverse camp that celebrates the love and connection of all of humanity. Join us for 10 Principle themed heartfelt yoga and conscious breathwork to revitalize your Burn spirit. Our Serpent Moon art piece is visible during dusk and early nighttime, accompanied by soft beats and easeful smiles. We look forward to early morning movement exploration and moonlit kisses with you.

Serpent Moon is a diverse camp that celebrates the love and connection of humanity.  Join us for 10 Principle themed yoga and breathwork to revitalize your Burn spirit.  Our Serpent Moon art piece is visible during dusk and early nighttime, accompanied by soft beats and easeful smiles.  We look forward to early morning exploration and moonlit kisses with you.

Serpent Moon is a well rounded camp with diverse membership across many cultural backgrounds - we love Radical Inclusion, Diversity & Equity!  While our history of lovin' the wild time proceeds us, we also lean into wellness and spirituality.  Come see us for a fun cocktail or yoga.  You want your butt moving to cool tunes or your mind blown with breathwork, come see us.  We host a tea house and wellness space for the more calm in you and a cute bar with no-dupstep for when the groove in you needs to cut the dust.  Our Serpent Moon will call you powerful into alignment or giddily to our bar, you decide!

A well rounded camp offering a range of participation from your favorite spiritual yogic experience, a welcoming tea house, nighttime exploration, to the wildest interactive game on earth, the Pig Man Show (you don't want to miss). ...and of course, the mysterious toasted bread, your guess is as good as ours.  Looking forward to seeing you at any of our events or just stop by for a good chat and cup of tea.  Honoring the weird... weirding the honor.  Newbies get special attention and extra hug time.

Camp Anita Cocktail: Hailing from 16+ countries around the globe, we contain traces of Australians, Kiwis, Chileans, Saudis, Turks, Nuyoricans, LA-LA Landers, New Yorkers, and other nutty products from afar. Serious reactions may occur. Activities abound all week in our chill space, craft cocktail bar, tea house, spiritual center and cuddle puddle tower. Our cups runneth over with welcome. Let's get down and boogie together!

Harnessing the winds over Black Rock City since 1999, Burning Sky brings you colorful aerial performances and nighttime pyro in the sky. Not content to watch us from the playa? Come win a ride in our plane! You’ll have a kickass view of skydivers exiting the aircraft over the city. What a rush! Congratulations, you have now become an elite member of the Firefly order.

Skydivers go to the sky to explore passion and the perfect freedom of human flight and we invite you along to fill your senses with a burning perspective that cannot happen on earth. We give away rides in our airplane from Thurs to Sun  find our camp and fly with us! Burningsky.org

Visitors are invited to Burning Sky to share the skydiver’s perspective of Black Rock City. Aerial video and stills will be on display and citizens can enter our lottery for a chance to win a ride in our jump plane!

Join us on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday afternoon for kom"boot"cha - we'll have a rotation of refreshing flavors. 21+ burners can turn their kombucha into an alcoholic cocktail, if desired. 

For our creative cats, while you sip kombucha you can also decorate your dusty boots and hats and get your cat nametag (we'll provide DIY supplies). On Wednesday, we honor all boobs in a Boobs & Cats kombucha party, aka "Titty Takeover" with pastie decorating.

Missing your cat or furry friend at home? Write them a message and we'll mail it after the burn!

Join us for afternoon kom"boot"cha and dance yourself clean on our life-size cat play house, Catopia. You won't want to miss this view! 

For our creative cats, decorate your boots and make pasties (we'll provide DIY supplies). On Wednesday, we honor all boobs in a Boobs & Cats kombucha party, aka "Titty Takeover".

Missing your cat or furry friend at home? Write them a message and we'll mail it after the burn!

Join us for afternoon kom"boot"cha and dance yourself clean on our life size cat play house, Catopia. You won't want to miss this view!

Daily events for our creative cats: boot decoration, pasties decorating, temporary tattoos. We'll provide DIY supplies.

Join us for afternoon kom"boot"cha or catch a sunset and dance yourself clean on our life size cat play house, Catopia. You won't want to miss this view!

Dancing around on the playa got your boots down and dirty? Come decorate and repair them under our shade. We'll provide ribbons, accessories, shoelaces, duct tape, and more.

Join us for afternoon kom"boot"cha or catch a sunset and dance yourself clean on our life size cat play house, Catopia. You won't want to miss this view!

Dancing around on the playa got your boots dirty and broken? Come repair them under our shade. We'll provide DIY shoelace materials, zippers, duct tape, and more.

Share with us your love for music. Leave a note about how music has enriched your life on a shrine in our geodesic dome. Notes will be placed in the Temple.
Catch a sunset and dance yourself clean on our lifesize cat play house, Catopia. Boots broken? Repair them under the shade in Bootopia.
Boots & Cats - your one stop shop for boot repairs, drinks, sunset parties, and people who don't like cats.

According to urban dictionary, the phrase "boots and cats" is used to describe the baseline in beat boxing. We've adopted this phrase and chant it during good house songs, usually while at a show, and more predominantly after 2am.
Come hang out with adults, who need an adult. Play childish games, with childish adults. Release your inner child and we'll teach it bad words.
Come relax, have a drink and enjoy our gift to the city.

A camp that's been around for over a decade, Camp I Need An Adult never takes itself too seriously. Stop by our bar for a drink, listen to one of our DJ's on our custom-built sound system, play some Dinko (Dildo Plinko), or lounge in our enormous hammocks and act like you never grew up. RADIATOR!

We are the camp you stop at to grab a drink and a laugh to start your night, come back for a round and games later that night, and finish your night or after party at. We are full of relaxation during the day; then dancing and meeting new people at night. Everyone is always welcome just the way you are. RADIATOR!!!!
Two story, LED lit bar that is open from noon to midnight with a dance floor hosting talented Djs. We have a one of a kind built black light bar top, and a custom engineered sound system.
Join us for our nightly exhibition of good-natured tussles. Remember, if you don't participate, there is no show. Bring your own partner. When the sign is lit, we're open. Usually around 9 PM.
Join us for our nightly exhibition of good-natured tussles. Remember, if you don't participate, there is no show. Bring your own partner. When the sign is lit, we're open. Usually around 9 PM.

Bring your mask (and, preferably, vaccinated and boosted) ass on over to the dome for our nightly shenanigans.
No advance signups.
Show starts when the sign lights up, so head on over when you see it light.
Bring your own partner.
Underwear REQUIRED. You must WEAR IT. Over your genitals.

Death Guild Thunderdome brings a very special method of relationship counseling to our 21st year on playa.
Monday-Friday
Fights start at around 9 and end when we're done.
Bring your own partner.
We are always right.
Death Guild Thunderdome's 20th year. Bring good, sealed whiskey.
Join us at Death Guild Thunderdome for fighting Tuesday-Saturday. Diva goes on at 9.
The dark beating heart of the playa since 1999.

Burning Man’s dark and undead heart since 1999.Tuesday-Saturday, come on over when the sign lights turn on. No advance sign-ups, no shirt-cocking, bring your own partner.Tuesday night = friends and family.Wednesday-Friday = standard nights.Saturday = after the man burn.

1) When the sign lights turn on, come over for fights.2) If you have the urge to ask us when fights start, please see #1.3) We don’t take advance sign-ups.4) We do take bribes. Scotch is good.5) Bring your own partner.Let us help you with that “fertility” problem.

Death Guild Thunderdome, a glorious arena of foam-covered carnage, wherein the smallest of grudge matches are settled by a combination of bungees, elevation and foam-covered weapons in front of teeming hordes who crave spectacle. Battle to the grinding strains of industrial music and to the cheers of black clad amazons aroused by bloodlust.

Come taste anything real or imagined at the Yum Cart! Playfully-mindful camp uniting burners through laughter, curiosity, and consciousness. Daily experiments in vulnerability, intimacy, self-discovery, and storytelling.

Home of the playa-famous YUM Cart, a yummy, otherworldly experience offering a taste of literally anything in the universe you desire (as long as it's real or imaginary!). Also home of our brand new Kava Lounge, an intentional space for imbibing the sacred ceremonial root beverage in traditional or cocktail form. Come give us a taste!

Firelight Film and Lemonade Retreat: Escape, recharge and commune. Join us at our oasis for cold lemonade and warm interaction. Our retreat is designed for you to pause, reflect, and converse. Participate in an interactive racial redlining discussion with Dr. Rich. Join us for fun, funny, and entertaining video shorts at the Ring of Chill Fire.

PowerHouse is the on-Playa home of the Sunbelt Rental Power and Heavy Equipment service teams for Burning Man DPW and dozens of Theme Camps.

If you're on the hunt for a warm bite to eat, a drink, and a chill spot to groove to some kick-ass beats, your quest ends here! Report to the food & Dance Administration and make new friends at our daily themed Beats and Eats events. Back for a 4th year of valuing self-expression, openness, and an infectious vibe of fun, we guarantee genuine connections, thought-provoking ideas, and unique themed parties.

Swing by our electric orchard under the big white circus tent and make new friends at our daily themed Beats and Eats events. Back for a 4th year of valuing self-expression, openness, and an infectious vibe of fun, we guarantee genuine connections, thought-provoking ideas, and unique themed parties. Check us out online at www.campexclamationmark.com or email us at campexclamation@gmail.com.

Camp Exclamation Mark! at Burning Man welcomes high-energy, exciting participants and visitors from the "Immediate Here" to everywhere. We strongly value self-expression, are open (in mind and connection), and infectious (in vibe and fun). Our events are about genuine connections, thought-provoking and self-help thoughts, and we love hosting unique themed parties!

Join Our Camp – One of our strengths is our diversity in camp-mates
Expecting 100 members for 2023
Global – mostly USA (California, Las Vegas, Arizona, Colorado, New England, Texas, Atlanta), Canada, Europe, Australia
Age Inclusive: 21 – 60 welcome (we are mostly in 30's)

If you're looking for a 3rd year camp that you can grow with from the beginning, message us!

URL: https://campexclamationmark.com Contact: campexclamation@gmail.com

Shwashbucklers, Pirate Loners, and Social Captains, we RADICALLY salute and invite you all to visit our friendly camp! Whether you came to Burning Man alone, or want to meet new people outside of your camp, our space is one that is open, comfortable, and encouraging of new interactions and connections.  Set sail with Friend SHIP on a journey of new friendships, Pirate Slur (ARRRRRR!), live DJs (not just house music), a bar, and interactive events.
La Ville Bohème is a haven for the artistically inclined, seeker of depth, eccentric soul. Calling all musicians and lovers of music to come play, dance in the Bohemian living room.
La Ville Bohème is a haven for the artistically inclined, seeker of depth, eccentric soul. Calling all musicians and lovers of music to come play, dance, and bask in the medicine of sound.

Cirque Du Sol Riser is a fire, flow, and movement arts camp bringing high-energy performances, absurd competitions, and interactive workshops to Black Rock City. From the sultry "Sex on a Slackline" showdown to the "Butt Cheek Olympics," we invite you to play, perform, and push your limits. Our fire jams and "Heckle & Flow Show" nights challenge performers to spin their props while enduring comedic roasts from the crowd. Whether you're here to dance, heckle, or simply bask in the spectacle, we welcome all playful souls to join the fun!

GOOD JOB! You made it to Burning Man. Now come playfully question existence with us at STEEP?. Explore you inner child with games, heckling, random acts of wonder, authenticity, connection, and... DRINKS. We love them. With alcohol, without alcohol, and often featuring plant extracts and ALWAYS made with love. Come Drink in the Love at camp STEEP? ya weirdos.

GOOD JOB! You made it to Burning Man. Now come on down and get STOOPid with us. Explore you inner child with games, heckling, random acts of wonder and befuddling art, clowning, gooning, and general mayhem. We also have refreshing tea, a lounge, hammocks, and shade if you don't like having fun.

Camp STEEP! is a chill space where you can come and enjoy a custom made cup of tea from our massive apothecary of over 50 different teas and herbs. Come have a seat and let some of the stimulation of the playa roll away as you Drink in the Love!

STEEP! Is a place of refuge and home within home. We offer herbal tea and chinese tea ceremonies. Our space is generally quiet and peaceful with space for doing art, receiving a healing or intuitive reading or listening to live music. Come rest and recharge with a delicious cup of tea brewed just for you from over 50 different herbs. Drink in the love!

On the surface we are a gloriously over the top tea and herbal apothecary camp. We have over 50 herbs and teas. On a deeper level we create a conscious space for expansion, connection and love to renew all burners who join us for tea and transformation.

Transformational Tea and Conversation. We are a space for rejuvenation, replenishment and self discovery. Join Camp STEEP! for a delicious cup of herbal tea. With more than 50 herbs at our tea bar, we have a custom tea blend to sort you out, lift you up and leave you ready for more dusty adventures. Drink in the Love!

Stop by Camp STEEP for a fresh cup of hot, iced, creamed or straight herbal and traditional loose leaf teas. Over 40 herbs and teas mixed by hand in front of your eyes! Dreams interpreted, conversations to be had, pillows to be lounged upon - come Drink in the Love!

At STEEP we value immersion into love, laughter, and the sacredness of living life to its fullest. Join us for a cup, a workshop, conversation, and creating something beautiful to remember your burn or gift to a loved one.

Attention all personnel! Come visit the MASH 4207th - best care anywhere! Relax during the day for ice cold PBRs and the best martinis on the Playa. Enjoy the shade of our vintage tents and the company. Return at night for a break from the chaos of the burn with nightly showings of MASH TV episodes.

20+ years of this, and we're still not Doctors.

Looking for a rich full day? Come to the least disciplined military unit on the playa.

Since 1999, your bastion of Democracy in a sea of fifth column communist/socialist/lawless infiltrators and barbarian mutants! Daytime martinis, PBR, Mocktails, and maybe even grape Nehi at Rosie's Bar.

Random security Checkpoints will occur. Terrorists & Loyal Citizens will be labeled. Propaganda & commentary provided for the prevention of communism. Nightly viewings of old episodes & movies from the show, this year featuring films from the series. Signpost project open to all.

Life, liberty, and the pursuit of Happy Hour.

“Best Care Anywhere” The least disciplined but the most hospitable military unit in Black Rock City, M*A*S*H 4207th is the bastion of democracy in the sea of communist infiltrators known as Terminal City. Support your military troops by keeping the commies at bay!

The least disciplined but most hospitable military unit in Black Rock City, M*A*S*H 4207th has been on the playa since 1999, and a registered theme camp since 2000. Feeling unwell? The doctors & nurses of our unit will prescribe inebriation therapy till you can’t walk, then throw you on the stretcher & haul you from post-op to your home camp or where we decide to dump you. Our well-trained alchoholics will gladly eliminate any surplus liquor you may have. Who else on the playa will hand out military spec toilet paper rations at 3 AM when the JoTS have run out? If we like you, you may get invited to the 38th Parallel Medical Society poker game. If we don’t like you, that won’t stop us from giving you shelter from the heat & dust. While the USO seems to be avoiding us, that has never stopped music & comedy from occuring at random in the mess hall. Travel with caution near our camp at night; The CO & others are avid playa fishermen. From draglines to driftnets to simple fishing in front of camp, no tripper wanting that free glow stick is safe from our master anglers. Carry your BRC issued ID near this camp: random security checkpoints at all hours. Raids & blockades of other camps will occur when least expected.

Ocean Beach is a sun-soaked fever dream of surf shacks, sea creatures, and boardwalk absurdity. Join our salty circus for lobster pizza rituals, smoothie shamans, sunset cocktail ceremonies, and the infamous ode to JB's cheeseburger in paradise. Stretch your soul with yoga, tantra, and sound healing. Play boardwalk games, ride silly rides, and lounge like a sea god. We're a 100% green camp and compost collection site riding the tide toward a stranger, better world. New beach bums always welcome — come get weird by the waves.

Drop anchor at one of the playa's exquisite beachfront properties and nurture body and soul with our beach yoga, beach games, and beach bar (M-F, 9a-6p). Come try our signature lobster pizza on Wednesday or sing/eat along with 'cheeseburger in paradise' on Thursday. We are a group of beach lovers operating a 100% green camp. If this all sounds like you, let us know. We accept newbies and are willing to help them adjust to the playa.

Drop anchor at one of the playa's exquisite beachfront properties and nurture body and soul with our beach yoga, beach games, and beach bar (M-F, 9a-6p). Come try our signature lobster pizza during our Wednesday late afternoon Pizza Palooza. We are a group of beach lovers operating a 100% green camp. If this all sounds like you, let us know. We accept newbies and are willing to help them adjust to the playa.

Drop anchor at one of the Playa's exquisite beach front properties and enjoy the sounds and lights of the ocean along with catch-of-the-day cocktails in our Beach Shack. Try our signature lobster pizza. Also, explore our green camp infrastructure and learn how to build a solar-powered grid, evapotrons, and other essential green camp elements. Extra props if you bring your boat.

Everybody wants to be a CORNSTAR!  That means YOU!!!  Stop by for a delicious cocktail during our Bar Hours (M/W/F:  2-4PM; Tu/Th 6-8PM; Sa: 11:00AM-1:00PM)!!  We would love to see you!!  Every day, we have Cornshoots, where we can take your picture with an instant film camera.  And, we have plenty of corny outfits and props for you to include in your Cornshoots!!  If you need a picture for this year's Christmas card, we are the camp for you!!!  And, keep an eye out for our BILF (Bar I'd Like to Find) in the deep Playa!  You never know where we might show up!!!

Everybody wants to be a CORNSTAR!  That means YOU!!!  Stop by for some boozy cereal during our morning breakfast bar (7:30 - 9:00 AM) or a delicious cocktail during our afternoon bar (3:00 - 6:00 PM)!!  We would love to see you!!  Every day, we have Cornshoots, where we can take your picture with an instant film camera.  And, we have plenty of corny outfits and props for you to include in your Cornshoots!!  If you need a picture for this year's Christmas card, we are the camp for you!!!  And, keep an eye out for our BILF (Bar I'd Like to Find) in the deep Playa!  You never know where we might show up!!!

Cornstars IS THE BAR YOU'D LIKE TO FIND (B.I.L.F.)!  Please join us at Cornstars! Our bar, the Silo, offers some of the best drinks you'll experience on the Playa! Our lead bartender, Dr. Phil, don't serve no swill! Stop by! Say hello! Pull up a bar stool! Stay a spell! Relax! We can't wait to get corny with you!  Every day is a new day at Cornstars!  Every day has a different, interactive theme!  We're also looking for the next Cornstar!  Come by and put on some corny attire and have your picture taken!  We'd love to see all your corny bits!

Please join us at Cornstars!  Our bar, the Silo, offers some of the best drinks you'll experience on the Playa!  Dr. Phil (our lead bartender) don't serve no swill!  Stop by!  Say hello!  Pull up a bar stool! Stay a spell!  Relax!  We can't wait to get corny with you!

Are you corny all the time?  Guess what?  So are we!  Come to Cornstars.  Have a drink at the Silo Bar.  Stuff your cornhole.  Make your own "corn shoot" or "corn film."  Show us your cob, your silk, or whatever kernels you have hiding in your husks!  We're looking for the next Cornstar, and we're set up to feed your corn addiction!  Get corny with us!

Home of the Potty Project a group of volunteers helping teach LNT at the potties and make the potties fun! We offer volunteer shifts M-F of the event so stop in to sign-up!
Home of the Potty Project a group of volunteers helping teach proper potty usage and make the potties fun! We offer volunteer shifts M-F of the event so stop in to sign-up!

We are the Potty Project, a group helping make your number 2 number 1. Come visit us for a coffee (it helps you poop), view our potty themed art gallery, or come volunteer to evangelize proper potty usage at Burning man.

Founded in 2019, fruitPOP is a LGBTQ-centered theme camp dedicated to radical self-expression, inclusivity, and pure, unfiltered queer joy. We create a vibrant, consent-driven space where playful absurdity meets delightful connection. Whether you're a longtime fruity member or a first-time guest, you're part of our ever-evolving, radically welcoming community. Join us, participate, and let's make magic together on the playa!

fruitPOP is a queer-centered Burning Man theme camp (est. 2019). With events ranging from ridiculous to titillating, we build a safe, judgment-free, consent-driven space throughout the burn. fruitPOP values creative expression and participation from our fruity members and on-playa guests.

Step into SoulSound, where rhythm meets intention and every visitor becomes part of the magic. Let the music guide you—through sound journeys, dance jams, and moments that move something deep within. Whether you're flowing with the beat or sharing meaningful exchanges, every note and connection is designed to touch your soul. Come curious, leave transformed.

Here at Camp Come Find Us (CCFU) we are a camp that is about finding yourself and exploring who you are at Burning Man.  Every journey is individual and unique.  Come flow with us and find your journey!  We will create a laid-back and spontaneous atmosphere, and our offerings will be inspiring and fulfilling. We endeavor to create a strong community among our fellow Burners. Come find us and find yourself!

Best way to describe our camp address would be as if you were describing someone who has never been to San Francisco.  Look for the San Francisco Bridge.  Except at Burning Man our camp is best described by a 60 ft long, 26 ft tall replica of the San Francisco Golden Gate parked at our camp.    When the Golden Gate is not parked at camp, our camp main entrance driveway is marked on each side by 15 ft tall wooden, painted in international orange,  replicas of the Golden Gate bridge's metal towers

We are the Golden Gate Bridge.  From our camp we will post our schedules for you to come be apart of our infamous art tours.  Or ride along as a commuter to meet and greet everyone,as they get on and off the bus during our daily public transportation shifts.

1001 Nights is a desert sanctuary where anyone who enters our dome is immediately welcomed, acknowledge and heard. We offer Makateeb where you can enjoy an Arabic coffee/tea while writing out your story for our treasure chest.  Once done, you can reach in and read a story left behind. In our main dome we will have DJs, musical acts, spoken word nights, movies under the stars, etc. The dome is decked out with foam flooring, mattresses, cushions, pillows, blankets and low top tables.  So one minute it can be our dancefloor and the next minute our lounge. Whatever the offering, we want people to feel like 1001 nights gives rest to weary souls desperate to recharge.  It should feel like you would want to stay with us for at least 1001 actual nights.

At 1001 Nights, we believe in togetherness and generosity, and our core values revolve around sociability and creating strong connections with each others.

Our purpose is to create a haven for nomadic burners under our Dome who reprensents our Sanctuary. Such in a tales, each year our camp comes alive by magic. During one week, the time of a story we invite everyone to be a part of this enchanting experience by joining us and partaking in the traditional offerings we provide under our Dome, creating a space where all come together to celebrate life and create unforgettable memories.

Our stories represent the memories of our Community and are written each year by all the Nighters at our camp, reflecting the constant evolution of our Community.

1001 nights is a haven to nomadic folk who journey from all lengths of the world.

Togetherness is our purpose. Our intentions are to bring part of middle eastern heritage and culture to the playa. Generosity and sociability  are the beauty of this culture and we invite whoever to be part of it, indulge as royalty and enjoy traditional offerings to share lovely connections under our dome. We welcome all as if inviting visitors into our homes and our hearts.

Our stories represent us and our project, Makateeb, is our flagship. Makateeb stems from the Arabic word "Makatoob" which means "written". Through it, we provide an immersive and warm environment capturing some middle eastern hospitality of communing and sharing experiences with each other through hand-written letters.

1001 Nights is a warmly inviting, casually laid-back, heavily oriental-influenced lounge space. Our variety of community Dome offerings are here to please the masses from starting the day with yoga, sharing love through our unique Makateeb experience, releasing into a delicate cranial sacral massages, transforming your look with a personalized braiding session, withdrawing from the playa commotion for an afternoon Tea laying in comfortable Majlis seating, to dancing the night away under the stars.  We are confident you will enjoy paying us a visit. Artists from all horizons are welcome to flow into the Dome and jam their tunes and share their talents.

1001 Nights is a warmly inviting, casually laid-back, heavily oriental-influenced lounge space. Our variety of community Dome offerings are here to please the masses: from nurturing and sharing love through our unique Makateeb experience while having delicate cranial massages, to withdrawing from the playa commotion for an afternoon Tea laying in comfortable Majlis seating, we are confident you will enjoy paying us a visit. Artists from all horizons are welcome to flow into the Dome and jam their tunes along our now world renowned hoopers.

1001 Nights is a camp that offers a day oriental lounge to collect love and support MaKaTeeB (Arabic for letters) from burners reaching 1001 MakToob (singular for MaKaTeeB) in the 7 nights of the burning man experience. Spreading the MaKaTeeB nurturing the energy that connects us and spreading love and support: important pillars to the survival of our community. 

The camp also offers a "Majlis" experience with Arabic coffee and sweets served during the day. The lounge will have suspended fabric for shade, floor carpet and seating, playa furniture, in addition to suspended chair hammocks.. The space is open at night for public use with the starry and dreamy lights.

Flow artists are welcome to flow in our space for jams on our flow tunes along with world renowned hoopers.

1001 nights is a camp that offers a social setting every night to collect stories from burners reaching 1001 stories in the 7 nights of the burning man experience. the camp also collects stories every morning offering cheese and zaatar manakeesh (dough based pastries with cheese and Thyme) along with refreshing shots. 

Flow artists are welcome to flow in our space with hoops and pois for workshops or to jam on our flow tunes along with world renowned hoopers.

punch will be made every night.. music will playing for jams and every night for the social setting..

Welcome to the Cockpit. On the one hand, we will spirit burners away to the golden age of air travel where they can stop by, relax and recuperate in our airport lounge with an espresso or green juice by day, or a cocktail by night, before taking flight again back to the playa.

Your Space Oddity! Come celebrate the stars, the myths, the lessons and your own unique weirdness.

We are Space Oddity.  We are here to sooth our fellow wearied space travelers with the following:

-To ward off the sickness of having lingered so far from our home star, come bask under our One Square Meter Of Sun lounge, equipped with a fire ceiling built as the ancient Egyptians to fill your pores with flames, who we all know came from space (Hours of operation: 2 hours ending around midnight)

-Fly around in our psychedelic Anti-Gravity Gyroscope, and ready yourself for travel beyond planets (Climb aboard anytime with supervision)

-Rest and relax in the Cosmic Lounge filled with levitating carpets (hammocks), chill Martian beats mixed from our spaceship (always open, music 2 hours daily, dusk)

-Prepare for harsh enviros of new planets with our Steam Chamber and accustom yourself to life without your suit (open 2 hrs in the evening)

-Climb atop our space deck and view the space you have past traveled, peer at the stars and chart your way towards your next frontier (always open)

Dancing or Putt Putt not your thing? Try out one of the many games we have to offer such as large yard games and our very own Slithery Snark Game. Hail and well met, traveler! Prophecy has foretold of this Once and Future Burn... where wanderers, artists, rogues, and nobles alike test their might and honor in hopes to find themselves most deserving of the city's reverence.  Visit our camp of merry players for revelry, stories, and all-around companionship of the grooviest nature as you try your hand in drawing the fabled sword from stone.  So quest our way and discover if you are worthy to be crowned the leader of tomorrow... today!
Serving southern hospitality and high desert camp since 2022. Stop by for one of our famous drag brunches and our Dolly Parton tribute party!
Serving southern hospitality and high desert camp since 2022. Come join the breast party in the desert, featuring Dolly-themed coffee parties, discos, drag shows, and more!

Baby, we're burnin'! We're a Seattle-based camp with East Tennessee roots. Join us for the breast party in the desert including "Pour Yourself a Cup of Ambition" morning coffee and Dolly tunes, amateur drag shows (starring YOU!), an opportunity to win a date in our "Fleeced to Meet You" dating game show, and more. Missed an event? Trot by our camp anytime for the opportunity to take a photo with our "Boobs in a Hole" cutout (face in a hole is SO yesterday). We abide by Queen Dolly's words herself: "I think everybody has the right to be who they are" - so bring your most radically-expressed self over for some rootin' tootin' llama fun!
Bringing southern charm, hospitality, and wit to the playa since 2022. Y'all come back now, ya hear?

Horny Camp is an arts & crafts camp with a cheeky, sexy twist. Our crafts can be appropriate for everybody, from children to the childish (but pervy) at heart. Our main craft is horn making; we teach our guests to mold polymer clay to create little horns to wear on their heads. We also offer bar night events, and have an art gallery called the Gallery of Cocks that honors all things chicken, as well as other art. Visit the camp at hornycamp.com for activities list and photos of prior year's activities.

A ragtag group of international babes who all appreciate the elegant screeching and sophisticated whine of the bagpipe. Currently seeking a bagpipe player! 
Our camp was founded in 2014 when most of us (being virgin burners) stranded on the playa at the same place, same time. We all woke up to the beautiful sound of the bagpipe. Every since we have been warming wandering souls on the Playa. Stop by for a drink, a hug, and a belly laugh. Sparkles, y'all!

Yellow Balloon is a clean and sober camp at Burning Man, offering a space for fun, connection, and wellness without the influence of substances. We host daily recovery meetings, wellness events like yoga and breathwork, and interactive art experiences designed to uplift and engage. Our camp is a vibrant community of burners who love to have a great time while staying sober throughout the burn. We welcome all who are committed to sobriety and those curious to explore a sober experience, providing a supportive, inclusive space to thrive. Join us for a unique blend of fun, recovery, and creativity!
Clean and Sober camp

Welcome to the Champagne Lounge! Amidst Black Rock City's hustle, our oasis offers luxurious relaxation. Step into our elegantly adorned shade, sip champagne poured by less than knowledgeable bartenders, and recline on plush playa-tech or mingle with fellow Burners. As the sun sets, enjoy twinkling lights and ambient music for a magical atmosphere. Cheers to the extraordinary!

HellVetica is a Burning Man camp that celebrates the power and potential of propane. Members of HellVetica are all passionate about engineering and design, and come from a wide range of backgrounds and experiences.

HellVetica, burning bright
With the energy, of propane ignite
Entropy may rise, but enthalpy's the key
To keep the flames burning, for all to see
Purveyor of alpine fire and ice experiences in the black rock desert.
The Swiss Chalet is a camp for Swiss, expats and admirers of Swiss engineering precision to come together, share a drink and watch the enthalpy of propane produce marvelous wonders.
A Swiss Chalet for travelers from Switzerland and expatriates.

Step right up to the Yellowstone Burner's Playacebo Experience! We have collected artisanal water from our home area around Yellowstone National Park, infused with the natural powers of this geothermal wonderland. Your Lifetender will guide you through the process of selecting the specific water elements that are meant just for you, creating a customized elixir guaranteed - and backed by research - to give you exactly what you need.

Step right up to the Yellowstone Burner's Playacebo Experience! We have collected artisanal water from our home area around Yellowstone National Park, infused with the natural powers of this geothermal wonderland. Your Lifetender will guide you through the process of selecting the specific water elements that are meant just for you, creating a customized elixir guaranteed - and backed by research - to give you exactly what you need.

Are you seeking to gain something during your time on playa or maybe hoping to let something go? We invite you to come by for a Playacebo Experience where we harness the healing powers of the Greater Yellowstone Ecosystem. Our Life-Tenders will be your guide to creating the perfect Playacebo to heal what ails you using waters infused under the nocturnal power of the moon, just outside of Yellowstone National Park. As a bonus, we'll top off your water bottle before we send you on your way.

Come explore the Healing Power of Ritual and Placebo at our apothecary lounge, Playacebo. Our Life-Tenders will guide you through a healing ritual based on what you're seeking out of life in the moment. As a bonus, we'll also top off your water bottle before we send you on your way. You'll leave rejuvenated, hydrated, and ready to go explore, connect, and play.

The Yellowstone Burners are excited to invite you onto the upper deck of the old west styled Watering Hole Saloon where we provide shade, cozy seating, beautiful views, and delicious hydration drinks. Don't let the heat of the day get you down! You can even play cards and other games from the interior of our bus and we always have a misting bottle or two on hand. Come on by to enjoy this unique experience of old west hospitality. We're officially open 9ish to noonish, Monday through Friday but we're happy to let you climb on board and have some refreshment any time we're around camp. Please come by and say hello!

Created by the Yellowstone Burners, Saddle Up! is a mutant vehicle based on a school bus, designed to look like a 30 foot tall saddle. The upper deck features The Watering Hole saloon where we will serve electrolyte drinks, teas, and good 'ol plain water. Join us for a unique western experience and get re-hydrated before moving on to your next adventure. We can't wait to Saddle Up! with our fellow Black Rock Citizens.

The Yellowstone Burners come from Northwest Wyoming and specifically Park County which is home to 90% of Yellowstone National Park. Our base is in Cody, Wyoming where we gather to build the Saddle Up! art car. Stop by our camp, when we're not out prowling the playa on our giant saddle, and join us at our campfire for s'mores, drinks, and stories.
Om Skillet - serving the playa Gourmet Grilled Cheese  lunches Monday through Thursday and hosting the Short Stack TuTu Tuesday dance party at 2:22pm on Tuesday since 2011.
Om Skillet - serving the playa Gourmet Grilled Cheese  lunches Monday through Thursday and hosting the Short Stack TuTu Tuesday dance party at 2:22pm on Tuesday since 2011.

Om Skillet is back for its 11th year in a row, and we are grateful to be returning with our Gourmet Grilled Cheese Restaurant to serve the citizens of BRC lunches from Monday through Thursday! Stay on Tuesday for Tutu Tuesday Dance Party starting at 2:22pm!

Om Skillet is back for its tenth burn and we're excited to bring our Gourmet Grilled Cheese restaurant back to BRC for the tenth time! Come Monday -Thursday  Lunches 12-3pm.  Stay longer on Tuesday for Tutu Tuesday dance party.

Short Stack & Om Skillet bring you a chill park vibe and gourmet grilled cheese in the desert. Join us on Monday and Tuesday at lunchtime for full sandwich service and some groovy tunes. Tuesday afternoon is the Tutu Tuesday dance party, and Friday sunset is stand-up comedy!

Short Stack & Om Skillet bring you a chill park vibe and gourmet grilled cheese in the desert. Join us at 1pm on Tuesday and Thursday for full sandwich service and some groovy tunes. Tuesday afternoon is the Tutu Tuesday dance party!

Short Stack & Om Skillet bring you a chill park vibe and gourmet grilled cheese in the desert. Join us at 1pm from Tuesday thru Thursday to lounge on our lawn with sandwich service and some groovy tunes. Tuesday afternoon is the Tutu Tuesday dance party!

Ever wonder where your missing socks go? Well this is your chance! The Missing Sock Monster comes back to the playa once a year! Curious at where your "missing sock" has gone? Please join us for fun sock activities!
Welcome to Bisous. We are an experiential theme camp and non-profit co-created by a team with backgrounds in experience design, community building, and history building theme camps on playa.

KISS (Keep It Simple Sexy) is an experiential theme camp and non-profit co-created by a leadership team with backgrounds in experience design, community building and decades combined building theme camps on playa. We look forward to sustainable, organized, and artistic year together in 2024.
KISS is a platform for immersive exploration, featuring tea lounges, sound healings, yoga, and the occasional dance party.

Our aesthetic and interactivity seek to explore the human experience as we awaken, inviting each citizen of BRC to spend time inside what we call the Bizarre Bazaar. We will bring this vision into every aspect of our design including the built infrastructure, decor, lighting, culture, and programming.

Loveland culture means leading with love in all aspects of life on and off of the playa.
We are in community 365 days a year and pride ourselves on being accepting of new faces while still holding our firm boundaries to ensure that everyone feels seen and heard in a safe container of love. Our ethos celebrates owning our enthusiastic "yes" and our firm "no." We are constantly striving for positive radical self-improvement and use this platform to manage internal community conflicts. This is how we lead with love.  Loveland is a heartfelt container that invites everyone to step up into his or her higher self and shine. We also have a lot of fun doing it!  We  hold community fundraisers and seasonal parties that keep us connected in our culture and promote consent culture. 

https://www.facebook.com/loveland.brc/
https://www.facebook.com/loveland.brc/

Love Land: We welcome and inspire people taking part in the Burning Man Experience. Featuring daily activities,  the 4th annual "Steely Dan Happy Hour", the 2nd annual"David Bowie Happy Hour" and our 5th or 6th Annual Pastie Workshop: bling out your boobs in our cozy beehive dome! Get crafty and create your own sexy pasties, adorn yourself with body paint, enjoy a cocktail, or shake your booty to our honey-licious Dj's + More!

At the Body Shop, we believe bodies require regular maintenance. Our shop is a whimsical place where the worn down burner can relax their mind, refresh their body, and enjoy themselves for a bit before continuing on their journey. In the style of an auto-body repair shop, we are staffed with friendly mechanics ready to appraise, repair, and certify all of the bodies on the playa. Guests will enjoy a full gamut of traditional tune-ups reimagined for the human body: buffing, lubrication, oil change, painting, fueling, and waxing. We look forward to servicing you!

Set in a giant rural postbox, the Black Rock City 3:00 Post Office (BRC3PO) provides postal services up to 16 hours per day. We offer authentic, one-on-one, creative interactions that range from the side-splittingly silly to the supremely sublime. We also provide an array of curated Burning Man postcards and postage to send those postcards anywhere in the world - as our gift to the citizens of Black Rock City.. Imagine the intersection of immersive improvisational theater, spontaneous talent show, soulful conversation, and stifling yet corrupt bureaucracy. You never know what will happen next at BRC3PO -- YOU could be what will happen next at BRC3PO, if you pay us a visit!

The Black Rock City 3:00 Post Office (BRC3PO) provides postal services and so much more. Set in a giant rural post box, open up to 24 hours per day, BRC3PO is a destination camp for real one-on-one interaction that can range from the supremely silly to the sublime. Our "customers" often become performers in an ongoing, spontaneous cabaret. You never know what will happen next at BRC3PO. YOU could be what will happen next at BRC3PO, if you pay us a visit! 

Our excuse for interaction is postcards, which you can send to your friends in BRC or anywhere in the world. You come with your imagination and your willingness to play. We provide the postcards.

"Gong" is both a universal cognate (the same word in virtually every language), and an onomatopoeia (a word that sounds the same as what it describes). It's also a highly under-appreciated musical instrument, as it's typically played loudly, but poorly!

Join us at Gong Wrong for sound meditations with gongs and sound bowls to explore deeper states of consciousness. Reveal your deepest self in ecstatic dance or by playing one of our many drums or gongs. Catch us at our Wednesday night camp party with DJ sets and live percussionists, or meet us on the playa as we share the same energy serendipitously!

Come visit our Glorious Paint Hole. Yes paint! There will be music and games here, and we will end our week with some Caturday shenanigans. Our lemonade bar is open during our events. Come get crafty on Friday because we will be getting ready for Caturday and designing some fun cat ears to take home.

Come visit our Glorious Paint Hole. Yes paint! There will be music and games here, and we will end our week with some good ole acroyoga. Our bar is open and will be serving non-alcoholic and alcoholic drinks. Come get crafty on Friday because we will be getting ready for Caturday and designing some fun cat ears to take home.

Someplace Cozy offers a restorative sanctuary to the citizens of Black Rock City.  Join us for iced tea, then wander into our cozy space for mindful relaxation, mental and physical recovery, chill beats, and deep conversations.  Our air conditioned tent offers a range of daytime programming, including somatic movement mediations, mindset workshops, yoga, breathwork, and supple soul stretching.  Come by at night for an ambient lounge to relax in.

Welcome to ZaZen!  Come by and relax in our shade, race our slalom course, leave your sins behind in our Cosmic Confessional and grab a cup of Elvis Espresso every morning.  We are a open and welcoming camp excited to meet new and old burners and share the magic of Black Rock together!

Camp ZaZen is your home away from home on the Playa.  
Home to the Cosmic Confessional.  Leave what weighs you down behind and start anew at The ZaZen Cosmic Confessional.  
Not feeling weighed down? Instead need a boost UP? Join us in the Mornings for our Famed "ELVIS ESPRESSO" daily Italian coffee and grapa.
Or play a few games in our yard game room while having a cold beverage from our bar.  
Looking for Zen? That is in our name and our Om Dome is home to wellness activities or just a hammock for a nap.  Come say Hi, we don't bite... hard :)

ZAZEN is your home away from home on the Playa.  Come have a drink with us, enjoy some shade, take a nap, learn how to burn from some real vets, play some games, make a confession in our confessional, get dressed up in our Playa Prom Photobooth.   If you are looking for good souls and good connection come by and see us!

Camp ZaZen is your peaceful home away from home on the playa.  Come visit us for a hot coffee in the morning, a yoga or mediation class mid day, and a drink in the afternoon and evenings.  

Come to us with a question and we will help you find the answer.  We are open and welcoming to all curious souls looking for wisdom and joy on the playa.
Camp ZaZen the place to find peace on the playa and home to Elvis Espresso, come get your morning cup of JO!
Home to the weird the wild and the interesting.  ZaZen is your welcoming family of hug givers and guides for your time on the playa.
We know the playa can be overwhelming so let us be your sanctuary. Come "Zen" out in our Om Dome or Chill in Siddhartha's Lounge. Your sure to see a friendly face around Camp ZaZen
We know the playa can be overwhelming, so let us be your sanctuary. Come "Zen" out in our Om Dome or Chill in Siddhartha's Lounge. Your sure to see a friendly face around Camp ZaZen.

Last year we did IRIS photography and had so much fun!! The only change we are making is added a few more members to help us get to more IRIS PHOTOS!!! Come on down and make some crafts while you wait for your turn to get an image of your IRIS! (SOMETIMES we even add something special into the PUPIL!)

Last year we did EYE EXAMS as CAMP PLEYEA and had so much fun!! This year we decided to switch it up our camp a little and we will be providing IRIS photography!! Come on down and make some crafts while you wait for your turn making a button from an image of your IRIS!

The Doctor is in!
If you have any eye issues or questions about eye diseases stop by our camp weekdays from 1-4 for your exam and sun protection!

Salty sea Sirens will lure you into our Pirate lair serving soothing libations and delightful delicacies. Are you and your crew brave buccaneers at heart? Then you can spin our ship's helm "Wheel of Dustiny" to determine your fates! Fates may include singing sea shanties, treasure hunting, raiding, walking the plank, and much more! Mon-Fri 3-5pm

A magical mad science themed camp hosting a nightly Mad Science Tea Party of various teas, coffee and fresh pastries in a surreal tearoom lounge filled with magical science and wonder. We also have afternoon iced coffee/tea and cocktail tastings with light snacks, and it's been rumored that our famous ramen service will be back for one night (perhaps Thursday if the rumors are true), so come visit early in the week to find out for sure!

A magical mad science soup lab with a daily menu Monday through Friday evenings
Before venturing out on your nightly playa prowling, our mad science soup masters will get you powered up with a cup of hot soup and other goodies, but first you must prove yourself by completing a mad science challenge. 
Can you survive the Electrotron or tame the ravenous playadon?
The menu changes daily, and only by trying every soup and meeting every challenge can you hope to attain the level of mad science soup wizard.
Bring your cup to slurp some science soup, your courage to climb the tower of outer perception, your concentration to meditate in the pyramid of inner contemplation, your wits to warm up at the barrel of bygone Burns, and your charm to chill out in the luscious lab of lounging.

Labracadabratory brings you our fifth year of Dusty Gaijin Ramen with seriously mad science ramen therapy Monday through Friday nights.
Come have some ramen, climb the tower, warm up at our burn barrel and chill out in our lounge.

Labracadabratory brings you our fourth year of Dusty Gaijin Ramen! 
Serious ramen cooking on Monday, Wednesday and Friday nights.
Labracadabratory (formerly Geisha House) brings you the Dusty Gaijin Ramen for the third year!

We invite you to the world of photography - from enrichment of visual experience to technical support and guidance: we do it all! Our camp is home for everyone - with or without cameras, photographers and just artists.  

As a service, we offer professional photography for everything, from playa weddings to personal sessions and public events - just ask!  We have a walk-in photobooth and plan various photo-related workshops.

Is an invitation to the world of photography: from in reaching visual experience to technical support and guidance. Our camp is HOME for all people with camera or without and Videographers
We offer experienced professional photographers for playa weddings or any other public events. Just ASK!  We have various workshop as well as camera cleaning station

Servers provide tea and empathy and comfortable spaces for rest, hydration and quiet conversation 24 hours a day. Orphan Endorphin:  a  camp for tomorrow.  Gone are the days of today.  Our camp sits somewhere in between what we were and what we will be tomorrow.  Its like a memory or a dream  a nightmare,  for some if you will,  but dystopia for all.
Orphan Endorphin is the camp for the burgin looking to  learn how to burn.  The camp is filled with burners from around the world and we travel to regionals just to be together.

We BUILD better Burners

Our camps create the interactivity that is critical to the Burning Man experience.
Additionally we provide a well organized and comfortable camp to call home.
We are NOT a Plug & Play camp!

All of our campers are expected to PARTICIPATE in making the magic that is Black Rock City. If you're looking for a P&P or tunkey camp, do us all a favor and go to Coachella or EDC……..

This camp in all of Black Rock City packs so MUCH interactivity or diversity in one place. We believe in INTERACTIVITY for ALL.  Orphan Endorphin is bringing the games and activities to keep your days filled with trivia, rockets, and bowling with unmentionables.

Orphan Endorphin camp is a nexus of activity for robots and endorphins alike. This is the soul of the machine for cold libations, exotic cigars and games such as Lil Rocket Man.  Do you have what it takes to defeat Lil Rocket Man, come see us and find out.

Orphan Endorphin camp will feature the Orphanage Brewery & Bar, Daddy Warbuck's Cigar Lounge, Captain Ron's Fishing Shack & Hoist, Vodka Infusione Booth, the Condom Dispensary, Swinging Dicks, and more craziness we haven't thought of yet!

We are the heart of the Renaissance, and the social NEXUS of the Orphanage camps. Orphan/Endorphin camp is where the "medici" reside and it's craftsmen build a haven of relaxation and entertainment. Our THEME camp will feature OVER (200) feet of street front interactivity for the citizens of Black Rock City to partake in.

The Orphanage welcomes you to stop by and enjoy some home crafted cold brews at the Pub while watching your fellow burners bleed in the Carnival Death Race and Hippie Hunger Games, or partake in a fine smoke from our Daddy Warbuck’s Cigar lounge. Extra Curricular activities include: Endorphins by Night, U TRAMP!, Hippie Fishing Hoist,  Al Pachinko’s Time Zone Arcade, 24/7condoms and cuddles will fill you with fantasy and wonder.
