A large 30' x 20' wide Moroccan-style tent with keyhole openings that houses a chill space, 24/7 cold water and lemonade and jewelry making.
A large 30' x 20' wide Moroccan-style tent with keyhole openings that houses a chill space, 24/7 cold water and lemonade and jewelry making.

An oasis for unleashing your creativity as you craft your own custom-designed pendants with branded leather, charms, beads and more. It's also a welcoming oasis at all other times with cold drinks and warm greetings.

"At the Oasis" is an established Maker Camp, providing materials for Burning Man attendees to create personalized jewelry.  Monday afternoon you can get your Burn on by dropping by our Pop-Up Boutique and picking out an outfit or Branding your leatherwear or wood pieces.  Tuesday through Friday afternoon during the week we will offer Jewelry-Making and the ability to brand the Burning Man symbol on leather or wood items.  Thursday evening we will celebrate our time together on the Playa with a Rockin' Moroccan Disco Party, open to all.

We have long-time and Burgin Burners in our camp, and welcome all to join us in our 24/7 chill lounge.

For many years, "At the Oasis" has been a Maker Camp.  We provide the materials for Burning Man attendees to create personalized jewelry using the many materials on hand.  Four times during the week we will offer Jewelry-Making, the ability to brand the Burning Man symbol on leather items, a Rockin' Moroccan Photo Booth, and on Thursday, a Rockin' Moroccan Disco Party open to all.

We have long-time and Burgin Burners in our camp, and we welcome all to our 24/7 chill lounge.
Robot Art at the Oasis offers robots and humans an oasis from a weary, mechanized world with jewelry making and a bar available, as well as a plush, welcoming space at all times.

Create a talisman for your own ritual at Talisman at the Oasis Tuesday, Wednesday or Thursday from 2-5. Metal, leather, wood, beads and more with tools and adornments as well as a celebratory cocktail all provided

Visit our Renaissance Salón and expand your knowledge of yourself and the world by checking out a human from our library M/W 5-7pm or volunteer yourself as a library acquisition; and/or channel your inner orator/actor by participating in Literoke Tues. 5-7pm. Wine will be served during all scheduled activities.
Is life an illusion and happiness a mirage? Come find out at Mirage at the Oasis.
Jurassic Playark promises a prehistoric party experience like no other. So grab your dino-gear and let's make this desert adventure legendary before we all go extinct!!
Jurassic Playark promises a prehistoric party experience like no other. So grab your dino-gear and let's make this desert adventure legendary before we all go extinct!!

A unique camp blending current and mesozoic era with a range of activities designed to encourage group interaction. Swing by early in the week for brontosaurus bingo or try some downward dinosaurs at our morning yoga sessions!

A community of dinosaurs and humans coming together to provide an interactive experience for the residents of BRC, pulling from the best of the cretaceous, jurassic, mesozoic and modern eras to create a truly one of a kind camp experience.

A pioneer, convener, and incubator exploring unlimited possibilities of personal, spiritual, and social transformation. In the long term we aim to incubate various of communities experimenting with authentic relating, psychological support, and co-living space with its members. We will explore & incubate sustainable living powered by technologies, and experiments future lifestyles. We eagerly participate in building a more compassionate, inclusive, connected, and sustainable world.

Since 2008, Shamandome Camp has introduced the citizens of Black Rock City to Core Shamanism as described by Michael Harner and offered shamanic healing, reawakening burners to their rightful spiritual relationship with all nature. The sound of a single drum beating at 185 bpm puts you into an Altered State of Consciousness (ASC), allowing you to journey to the Lower World, where you can meet your Power Animal, get answers, and heal yourself. You can do this because you're human. It is your connection to Mother Earth.

Since 2008, Shamandome Camp has taught Core Shamanism as described by Michael Harner, and offered shamanic healing in Black Rock City, reawakening burners to their shamanic relationship to nature and helping them connect with their true animal essence as a child of Mother Earth. The real deal. The sound of a single drum, beating at 185 bpm puts you into an Altered State of Consciousness (ASC), allowing you to journey to the Lower World, where you can meet your power animal. You can do it, because you're human. This the ultimate Hero's Journey.

Shamandome is a service camp, offering workshops in shamanic journeying, healing, and more.

Meet Your Power Animal
Tue-Sat at 11am, we lead shamanic journeys, using drumming and intention to alter consciousness; 1-on-1 Healings; Extractions/Soul Retrievals/Right Relations… serving 1000-plus burners each year.

Shaman's Death and Rebirth Ritual
Near the temple, one evening at dusk, a few hundred burners will ritualistically die and be reborn from the dust. 

First-time burners often recognize the potential for deep self-discovery in BRC. We teach people to heal themselves through their original connection with spirit, their truest nature. "Shamanista" is our belief that the shamanic healer is in everyone.

If you're a shamanic practitioner, Shamandome will welcome you as a guest healer. Contact us!

Shamandome Camp is a service/healing camp. We provide workshops in Shaman Healing Techniques and Journey-ing; Spiritual access To
Source, 1-1 Healings for Extractions/Soul Retrievals/Right Relations...for 1000+ burners each year.

The Shaman Death ceremony is very popular - at the temple at dusk we perform a ceremony where you ritualistically die & be reborn from the dust. Very transformative 
The shaman journeys we provide are with simple drumming and chanting, and a quite place to relax from the noise and experience of the Burn.

burners realize they came to burning man, because they are on a SPIRITUAL JOURNEY. SHAMANDOME HELPS BURNERS HEAL THEMSELVES; spiritually, through journeying, connecting with spirit animals...
SHAMANISTA is our belief that we can WAKE UP THE SHAMAN HEALER IN US ALL

Shamandome Camp guides you to FIND YOUR POWER ANIMAL. and healer
shamanistas move you to the first day of the rest of your life,
reconnection, transformation.
Shamandome Camp guides you to FIND YOUR POWER ANIMAL.  Healer shamanistas move you to the first day of the rest of your life, reconnection, transformation. Wake up the Shaman in You.

SHAMANDOME CAMP birthed out of Heebeegeebee Healers Camp in 2006.  40 workshops, healing 1200 burners by core shamanism drumming journies. Our Find Your Power Animal workshop twice daily across the week  trances to DIRECT ACCESS TO SOURCE. and Wake Up the Shaman in You. We address sustainability, individual crises, harem management, soulretrival, extraction of neg energies, by CHANGING YOUR DREAM. Need to get away from the party and chill out? Come by our 24/7 interactive art gallery to enjoy the vibes, paint and check out artwork created by your fellow Burners.

Our gallery guides will be in from 11:00am until about 2pm daily to help you discover YOUR fursona and bring you closer to your inner animal. Refreshing beverages will be served.

PET DOGS, create art and chill out!  Check out our events in the WhatWhereWhen guide. Don't miss our gallery opening party on Thursday from 2pm-5pm to celebrate the artwork that people have created throughout the week!

Need to get away from the party and chill out?  Come by our 24/7 interactive art gallery to enjoy the vibes, paint and check out artwork created by your fellow Burners.

Our gallery guides will be in from 11:00am-2pm daily to help you discover YOUR fursona and bring you closer to your inner animal. Refreshing beverages will be served.

PET DOGS, create art and chill out!  Check out our events in the WhatWhereWhen guide. Be sure not to miss our gallery opening party on Thursday from 2pm-5pm to celebrate the artwork that people have created throughout the week!

An interactive art gallery; come discover your fursona & share your dreams

Come by in the late morning to early afternoon and let our gallery guides help you find your fursona, or just come and paint in the gallery!  Need help to determine what to add to our walls?  Let our prompts guide you on how to share your dreams.

Join us for our gallery opening party on Thursday from 6pm-9pm to celebrate the artwork that you and your fellow burners have created.
Leave your mark on our evolving art gallery. Fursonas given daily! Open most afternoons. Gala Thursday at dusk.

Come get coffee from an undisclosed appendage of the Nose Fish itself Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday mornings and stay for the music! This year we’re giving away cookies!
Bike repair clinics are happening Monday, Tuesday mornings 10:30-12:30 and Thursday afternoon 2-4:30
Hella Halo-Halo Thursday 2-4:30 during bike repair - come get a refreshing Filipino shave ice treat! Don’t forget your cup or bowl!
Electronics Repair M-F 2:00 - 4:30 personal lighting repair/tutoring
Sewing repair service M, T, Th, & F 2:00 - 4:30: come darn your dazzling duds with our resident seamster/seamstress at our super sewing service!

Come get coffee from the Nose Fish itself (or this year maybe something even curiouser!) Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, and Friday mornings and stay for the music! Also, back by popular demand, we're giving away panties!

Bike repair clinics are happening Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, and Friday afternoons, as well as personal lighting repair/tutoring, and darning your dazzling duds with our resident seamster/seamstress at our super sewing service!

Come get coffee from the Nose Fish itself M-F mornings and stay for the music! For Change-Your-Underwear Thursday we'll host the Playa Panty Project (PPP)!

M-F afternoons you can participate in bike repair clinics, personal lighting repair tutoring, and fix your ripped costumes at our sewing service!

Mornings, come by and get our alien to secrete you a cup of fresh coffee. 

Afternoons, come by Repair Cafe to  *Get your costumes altered and your rips mended , *Fix your bike, * Fix your defective electronics (EL Wire/LED/???) repaired. 

Evenings enjoy the MEZ interactive video screen and dance the night away.

Are you a fixer or sewist?  Come by and fix stuff with the Nose Fish Fixit Folks.

Is it metamorphosis, alchemy, or simply becoming?
- Mornings, come by "Alchemy Cafe" and announce your own transformation and track your progress. Stimulate our transformation entity to release a fresh cup of coffee.  
- Afternoons, come by for hands-on Bicycle and Electronic (EL Wire/LED/???) repair. 
- Evenings enjoy the MEZ interactive video screen and dance the night away.

Mornings, come by "Cafe Data" for a delicious cup of freshly brewed coffee and see how much our big data already knows about you, then in the afternoon come by for hands-on Bicycle and Electronic (EL Wire/LED/Robot) repair.  Evenings enjoy the MEZ interactive video screen and dance the night away.

Come to Caffè Ritualistico for a delicious cup of freshly brewed coffee and participate in the changing daily morning rituals.  Afternoons we feature Bicycle and Electronic (EL Wire and LED) Repair with hands-on teaching.  Evenings enjoy the MEZ interactive video screen and dance the night away.

Come to Caffè Leonardo for a delicious cup of freshly brewed coffee in the mornings.  Afternoons will feature Leonardo's Workshop for Electronic (EL Wire and LED) and Bicycle Repair with hands-on teaching.  Evenings enjoy the MEZ interactive video screen and dance the night away.

Welcome to Nose Fish. Carpe Diem at the Un-Hammer Cafe. Get creative making Playa currency to exchange for your coffee. Don't forget your cup.Take a moment to meet the folks standing near you.  Start/end times vary.  

Stop by in the afternoon for a juggling class, EL wire electronic repair, a bike repair class. Check our schedule board for the activity of the day. 

Come back at night to dance before the MEZ interactive Video Mirror.

Drop by Nose Fish for a cup of coffee, In the late afternoon, we’ll help you get your EL wire components working. Return at night, to experience our MEZ interactive Video Mirror. Technical advice provided on a variety of topics.
Nose Fish is back with daily EL Wire Repair Service, The MEZ at night, and a playa art piece called Beat Frequency Muffin all day and all night.
We will be serving fresh-brewed Coffee and Cookies in the mornings, provide EL Wire Repair in the afternoons, and the interactive MEZ Screen in the evenings.
Nosefish returns in 2011 with Quesadillas and the MEZ Video screen at night, and our EL Wire Repair service during the day.

Camp Nose Fish returns in 2010 to support the Ein Hammer project and to present our “Un Hammer Coffee Shop,” serving coffee and cookies every morning to help the citizens of our metropolis get “Un Hammered.”  Also returning in 2010 is our MEZ Interactive Video Screen!

Camp Nose Fish returns in 2009 to present two new theme-related interactive projects: Tree of Life and Superhero Evolution.  We’ll help you evolve into the superhero you are by helping you create your own costume, and at night you control a 15 foot tree of light with your fingers.

Nose Fish returns in 2008 to present “American Dreamsicle,” a human-powered vehicle we’ll use to distribute thousands of popsicles, and the “Americana Lounge,” a 50s era chill space featuring the art project “Garbage on TV.”  At night the MEZ interactive video screen will return with new effects.

Camp Nose Fish returns in 2007 to present the Biscotheque, a 2v dome where participants may receive biscotti when they visit nearby Espresso Camp in the mornings, and relax in a quiet space for light conversation and music. Well have our new "Biscodeck" (a deck on top of the Biscotheque dome where you can relax and look out over the city) and in the evenings we’ll have the interactive MEZ video screen.

Camp Nose Fish returns in 2006 with visual delights and mind-expandingexperiences including the MEZ Interactive Video Screen, the Visual Hope Dome with its huge, blacklight-lit ball-in-maze puzzle, voting for hopes that resonate, and an interactive “Flying Spaghetti Monster” art exhibit.

Camp Nose Fish presents "Head Games," a delightful collection of large scale games, puzzles, art and more to make adults feel like kids again! We’ll also have the MEZ dynamic video exhibit, the Great Unhot (our impressive people cooler), and as usual we’ll be directly interacting with "watchers" to entice them to come in, have fun and participate!

Camp Nose Fish hosts and operates the Desert Nose, a gesodesic replica of Buckminster Fuller’s nose that contains the Great Un-Hot: a wind/spray cooler capable of inducing a coolgasm in some people and levitating others. We also operate the Fishmobile which contains an interactive experience in personal transformation guided by many blacklight-lit sea creatures.

Cherish the uncertain, challenge fear, welcome the odd, and seek thyself!  The Argonauts bring a unique and infectious spirit which we share across the playa and in conjunction with reenergizing camp activities including our high-noon ArgoDogs and ArgoShine-enhanced induction ceremonies.  Besides our Argonaut spirit and noontime hot dogs, our gifts include Argonaut dust, sun & fashion bandanas, temporary Argonaut tattoos, and spiritually-assigned individual Quests for each newly inducted Argonaut for the coming year.

Let us make a body cast, butt cast, face cast… when it’s time, burn the shell! Set you sould free!

Wayne Gretzky said, "You miss 100% of the shots you don't take." 

At No ReGretzkys we want to make sure you take all the HOCKEY shots. We're a camp that wants to show you how to handle your stick and play with our balls. Our goal is to get you in our hole, the six-hole! 

We serve hockey shenanigans, Tim Whoretons coffee, donut hoes, and face, face, face during Drag Queens on Ice!
We're a slice of Canadiana. Just like Americana but nicer, more apologetic, and with better healthcare. 
Don't have any ReGretzkys, come and join the Canadian shenanigans!

We don't just play with balls, we throw drag balls!! Grab your tucking panties!  In the words of RuPaul, show us your CUNT (charisma, uniqueness, nerve & talent).

Come "check" us out!! No ReGretzkys is hosting hockey themed activities!! 
We aren't only looking for Canadian visitors, we want everyone to play with our balls! Our 60' rink will host skills sessions, scrimmages, the 2nd Annual Larry Harvey Memorial Cup, yoga AND NEW EVENTS: Butt hockey, Curling and a post-tournament dance party!!  When we're not tending the nets, you can still grab our shafts (hockey equipment), as  the rink is always open! Don't want to slip one past our goalie? Come relax in our shaded area! Hang out, enjoy music, take a slapshot-ski, or immortalize yourself in our hockey photobooth. Want intensive conversation? Step into our penalty (advice) box, and let Father Canada provide a safe space for your issues. Don't sit on the bench!  Drop your gloves and come and get it!

Not into slipping one past our goalie? Come hang out with our scantily clad referees in our large shaded area with awesome music and lots of cozy things to lounge in.  Don't sit on the bench! Drop your gloves and come and get it!

We’re slinging No.1 (Yellow) and No.2 (Brown) slushies from the Center Camp Bar—fiber-spiked for flow and/or booze-spiked for fun. While you’re there, earn your “I Pooped Today” badge and snag a map for the Great Booty Hunt, our quest to find the playa’s most fabulously decorated porta-potties.
Join us in the Center Camp Oculus for traditional coconut oil wrestling—thumbs welcome, dignity optional, hilarity guaranteed.

Welcome to Cosmic Giggle! We are burners spanning from NYC to the Bay and crossing continents to London and Beirut. Our name is inspired by an experimental documentary that explores the expansive energy field that we, together, create...and one thing is for sure, it can get pretty random! Here's what we have in store for you this year:
 
We've got a gym! Who said being Playa meant missing out on your pump up?
We've got classes! We work out your externals, navigate your internals, and will get you giggling!
We've got a bar! Rehydrate with electrolytes. Dehydrate with booze. Though beware: we may make you work for it!
Looking to keep your heart rate mellow? We've got cosmic croquet and an oasis lounge.
OH, and meet Freddy, our resident GODZILLA!

 So come on: Enter our cosmic chaos. Have a Giggle!

Have a seasoned burner guide you on your way through our labyrinth of personal improvement.  Whether you require physical, mental or other-worldly guidance, or you just want to pump some iron, you’ll find it at Cosmic Giggle.

Cosmic Giggle is home to the “Get Your Shit Together Here” and “Work Your Shit” gardens, providing a workout circle for crazy people plus daily offerings for physical pre-burn enhancements, a Muscle Tea workout observation porch, and MOOP Collector Distribution and Decoration Station.
Cosmic Giggle is a fun-oriented bunch of burners from San Francisco and beyond, seeking and recognizing all magical moments and elements to add to the serendipitous stew.

Cosmic Giggle presents: Muscle Tea. Come get your burn on at our Muscle Tea crossfit gym. Participate in the workout of the day or cheer others on while enjoying tea at our Muscle Tea lounge. Feel the Burn!

Palinka Lounge offers a welcoming respite for Burners new and old around the globe, we offer a comfortable environment for Burners to take a moment to relax, have a drink, introduce themselves, and learn about what it means to be a burner (or learn about Hungarian burners) gaining from our camp-members Burning Man knowledge. We do this not only through sharing a drink, but also by engaging in activities together such as arts/craft, games or trampoline.

Deep Ohm is a place for centered connection, friendship, and fun. We build large art, burn larger fires, and enjoy spending time in our cozy home on the playa. We are a mutant vehicle support camp for Burnie the Bonfire and we are focused on creating a safe space for anyone who is interested in learning design, engineering, and fabrication. Mistakes are celebrated because they are opportunities to grow. We also serve s'mores and jams around the campfire all night.

Rabble Rousers is home to the legendary Shenanigan Wagon, a two-level mutant vehicle that roams the playa bringing music, community, and unforgettable vibes. We're here to create joy through ice cream socials, interactive bar events, unique DJ performances, and welcoming spaces for lounging, dancing, and connecting. 

Come find us, join our adventures, and stay in touch.

Welcome to the Rabble Rousers camp, home of the Shenanigan Wagon ! Our art car is the ultimate mode of transportation for anyone who wants to experience the playa in style. Join us for unforgettable art tours that will take you on a journey through some of the most stunning and innovative art installations at Burning Man. 

But thats not all, our camp is also known for its delicious Jerky and soft served ice cream served fresh off the wagon. Whether youre looking for a sweet treat or savory snack weve got you covered.

Camp Synthesis embodies the melding of three things: Synthesizers, Sake, and Sushi. Here's the concept: People who like producing music with synths, midi instruments, drum machines, etc., hanging out, jamming, teaching others to make music, performing live sets, share Japanese food, and sharing a drink (日本酒).  Daytime event include interactive synthesizer jams in our domesynths, drum machines, samplers, vocoders, and sequncers.  Following learning something, we will host a synth jam circle, where anyone can show up and jam with us or use the synths we've got.  We'll have a small sound system and will host some live performances for anyone who wants to come to "Open Synth" hour.   Following the Sushi Bar nights, we will host DJ sets from guest SF based DJs.

Camp Synthesis embodies the three things we love the most: Sushi, Sake, and Synths.  Come join us daily from M-Sat for a collection of hands on synthesizer events where you learn and perform, followed by two evenings of sushi bar (M,W), Sake Bar (T,W,F), Udon Bar (F), and DJ sets nightly.  We also will be hosting self care events.  Check the book for our schedule.   Pick up our amber gift amulets when you stop by.

Camp Synthesis bring together a few of our favorite things: Synths, Sake, and Sushi.  We will be hosting three nights of Sushi Bar, 3 nights of Sake bar, and daily synth classes and jam sessions.  We hope to bring together people who like producing music with synths, midi instruments, drum machines, etc., hanging out, jamming, teaching others to make music, performing live sets, breaking bread (sushi), and sharing a drink.  Come bring your synths and jam with us, enjoy the bar and DJ in the evening, and everyone is welcome to hang out with us each night to go out to check out music on the Playa.  We will also host 3 virgin focused events to introduce new burners to The Playa.

EZ Tiger's Time Drop is an immersive art experience that uses water, audio, lighting, sculpture and mirrors to create an expansive environment that will bend your perception of time and space. Raindrops and eagle tears pour from the ceiling into a vast garden. With a turn of the control knob, the music slows and stretches, and the water begins to fall in slow motion. Real water drops, sparkling as they fall, slow and then hover in mid-air, each drop contorting before your eyes. If you find yourself stunned by the experience and would like to see it again, no worries -- you can reverse time by turning the knob the other direction, lift the water back into the sky, watch as it absorbs back into the eagles eyes, and then see the same drops fall again.

EZ Tiger is a watering hole with music. Yes, there are libations - please wrangle one from the bartender and nurse it slow. There's sound art here, too. It's loud enough to feel. But we're NOT set up for a sea of zombie ravers throbbing in front of a DJ pulpit and an endless row of speakers. This is a place to explore sound and space on your own terms. There's plenty of shade and comfortable seating - you can find a place to relax or conversate. And of course there's room to dance, if you please.

We blend the invigorating spirit of Burning Man with the universal love for coffee. Each day, we serve up an eclectic mix of fun, innovative coffee creations that awaken the senses and fuel the soul. From espresso-infused adventures to creamy concoctions that defy the ordinary, our camp is a haven for coffee enthusiasts and curious souls alike. Join us for a cup of joy, connection, and creativity as we celebrate the magic of Burning Man one sip at a time.

Ever catch yourself daydreaming about playing table tennis, diving into a ball pit, belly-flopping onto a trampoline packed with giant plushies, casually shredding on the drums, hunting for acorns like it's a competitive sport, napping like a zen jedi, dropping beats as DJ Nuts, and sipping pink cocktails at a squirrel themed tiki bar- all the while absolutely everything around you is unapologetically pink? Yeah, we thought so. Welcome to The Pink Squirrel, where you can finally do ALL the things and leave that boring, blinking world behind. Kid friendly, squirrel approved.

Come celebrate the motherly figure in your life, whoever that may be! We provide stationary, stamps, and polaroid pictures to help you write a letter home to Mom, which we then mail from the BRC post office. We serve Mom's apple pie from our cozy living room to snack on while you write. Or, if writing isn't your thing, stop by for a bit of motherly advice or even just a shoulder to cry (or celebrate) on. We love moms and motherly figures of all types!

In the year 1050 BCE, an idea began to grow. An idea so revolutionary that it would need to ruminate, morph, and gestate to perfection. For thousands of years, it floated in space. In 2007 CE, a group of non-talented, uneducated, uninspired individuals merely sat in a room unable to speak. This group was actually unimportant. Yet, beside them in the room, a motivated, frolicking, bubbling team found themselves smacked in the face with an idea. Bumblepuss was born.

Bumblepuss is a group of service minded and community building burners.  We are the organizing camp of Nectar Village and provide many infrastructure related services as well as offering performance art and healing service.

And don't forget to join us Thursday at cocktail hour for our Lavender Garage Giveaway and Pop-up Boutique! Find your perfect Playa gear and outfits; stylists will be standing by! BYOB.

We are a friendly camp that provides a relaxing hand wash and massage. Lotion and conversation are also provided. We are open from 11:00 to 5:00 Monday through Friday and Saturday 11:00 to 1:00. Join us also for our Thursday night Purple Rain party at 6:00.

We are a friendly and inclusive group who wants to contribute to the joy of attending Burning Man. During lavender hand wash we will pamper you and give you the attention you deserve. We love to have the community join us at our Friday night party or any time in our community area so we can get to know you. All are welcome and we strive for your comfort and enjoyment.  The layout of our camp is welcoming to all.  We provide shade structures, misters and relaxing seating for our Burner guests.

Plays Well With Others: Provides lavender hand washing and hand pampering Tuesday through Saturday from 11:00AM to 5:00PM.
We will be having a Dance Party USA on Friday night from 6:00 to ?

Plays Well With Others is happy to offer Burners Lavender Hand Wash, Wedding Services, Regression Therapy, and Jewelry. Our services will be available Tuesday-Saturday Noon-4:00. We also will host a cocktail party Friday night honoring the Carnival of Mirrors.

The friendliest camp on the playa famous for our front porch. Drop by for a visit and a cold drink. Join us at sundown for a Shot of the Day or Thursday from 2:00 to 4:00pm for our Pineapple Upside Down Cake Thursday event. We are well known for our fine cuisine and repartee.

The friendliest camp on the playa famous for our front porch. Drop by for a visit and a cold drink. Join us at sundown for a Shot of the Day or Thursday from 2:00 to 4:00pm for our Pineapple Upside Down Cake Thursday event. We are well known for our fine cuisine and repartee.

Burners Under the Influence – one of the friendliest camps on the playa. Camp BUI was started in 2006 and over the years have added friends as well as numerous Burners who happened to camp near us and asked to join. We are known for our excellent cuisine, our Shot of the Day, and our Pineapple Upside Down Cake Thursday event, and our spacious common area where visitors can enjoy a sit in the shade and a cold drink of water. Camp BUI takes citizenship of Black Rock City seriously and we heartily embrace the 10 Principles. Visit us at campbui.org.

Metal Mimi, the curious little creature who is our namesake, dwells at the Bay Area Metal Shop where Art Destined for the Playa is Born.

Metal Mimi is Witness to Art made Manifest and she is the Keeper of our Magical Dreams.

Metal Mimi Camp was created in honor of the Metal Workers, Welders, and Artists who work to bring their Art to the Dust.

We are here to help them.
Metal Sculpture and Flame Garden

Slutplatz is a vibrant, inclusive camp where fun, laughter, and a little bit of naughty energy are always on the menu. Proudly rooted in the LGBT community, with members from San Francisco, Reno, and Boston, we offer a space where everyone is welcome to be themselves. Whether you're in the mood to grab a cold beer at our beer garden, unwind on our comfy bench, play some corn hole, or just vibe to the music, Slutplatz is the place to be for good times and great company. We're goofy, a little slutty, and always ready to celebrate life together!

We support the Mutant Vehicle Blue Bull — a glowing tribute to Maria Prymachenko's iconic 1947 artwork. This powerful, star-covered beast roams Black Rock City, crowned, bearded, and illuminated with vibrant spirit. Made in Ukraine, the Bull brings art, light, and soul to the dust. Our camp stands behind the vision, the crew, and the journey.

We are a Dance Theme Camp located in the Tokyo sector playing the best Progressive & Melodic Techno. Come help build magical chaos with our new interactive art!
LET'S DANCE in the Dust Together!!

We are a Dance Theme Camp located in the Tokyo sector. Our DJs spin the best of the 80s, 90's Hip Hop, House and More!! 
New this year - guided meditation and self discovery workshops using music.
LET'S DANCE in the Dust Together!!

We are a Dance Theme Camp and the Playa's only personalized Song Delivery Service. Our DJs spin the best of the 80s, 90's Hip Hop, Progressive House, Trance and More!! Come visit our Mixtape Lounge to dance in the dust or to learn how music can enhance a Vision Walk Experience!

PLAYA 54 - An Afternoon Delight - We spin the best of the 70's, 80's and SO much more. We have a Lounge Ole' to comfort you, and other amazing events to dazzle you. And, we can sit down and chat too. Remember to stay dusty and dance!! )'(
PLAYA 54 - An Afternoon Delight!! Playing the best music from the 70's, 80's and today, including hip hop, Motown and house!!
PLAYA 54 - An Afternoon Delight
PLAYA 54, An Afternoon Delight, spins the best of the 60s, 70s, 80s, House and so much more! COME DANCE!!

PLAYA 54 – An Afternoon Delight!! Los Angeles based DJs spin the Best of the 80’s, Disco, House, and More – Check the What/Where/When for our playa famous “BLOODY” Themed Party – Come by, Grab a Drink and LETS DANCE!!
PLAYA 54 – a happy little groove in the afternoon!! L.A. DJs spin the best of the 80’s, disco, house, and more – Come By and DANCE!!

Come explore & express yourself at Off the Dome! Formerly known as Freestyle Palace, Off the Dome is back in the playa Wonderland for its second decade as the original musical imagination sanctuary: the Playa Talent Incubator. Our namesake DIY Jam Dome is powered by the talent and creativity Black Rock City's citizens. Our stage, mics & instruments are available for singing, rapping and making impromptu music.  Off the Dome hosts the hip hop visionaries:  Black City All-Stars and Black Rock City Regional Air Guitar Championships - now in its 11th year, as well as the Galactivators. We are all about the magical love of performance! Come play & perform with other performers and creators at our innovative haven. At Off the Dome, do it live at Home in BRC.

FreeStyle Palace 2023: Playa Talent Incubator.  Now in its second decade, a DIY music dome and performance stages featuring open jams, hip hop, nightly DJ sets and live performances  from sunset to about 2:00 am. Our stage and our microphones are open to all comers. Part alchemy and part black magic, FreeStyle Palace is an amalgam of sophisticated and authentic Urban Underground music and culture forged by the heat of the Black Rock Desert and polished by the collective talent of the Burning Man Community

We create novel burner technology and use it to bring new experiences to Black Rock City. This includes shave ice machines invented by camp members, HVAC/refrigeration adaptations for our new installation "The Tundra," and geodesic dome design by one of the Burning Man old school masters.

ate novel burner technology and use it to bring new experiences to Black Rock City. This includes pizza ovens of our own design, shave ice machines, and HVAC/refrigeration adaptations for our new installation "The Tundra." We also bring Live Karaoke and Daytime Talks to the playa.

Habitat for Insanity creates and uses novel burner technology. We produce hand-tossed, wood fired pizza in an oven of our own design. We run Live Karaoke, make new and classic drinks on shave-ice form and run daytime talks.
Habitat for Insanity embraces the creation of novel burner technology and events. We're a do-ocracy, meaning that although we do not assign tasks, we manage to accomplish a lot!

We’re a camp of self-starters creating novel burner technology. Always looking for fellow creative minds.
We explore novel uses of technology to bring great food, art, clothing, and experiences to Black Rock City. We welcome anyone that embraces the do-ocracy ethic!

We connect you with the world, we are the original way to get USPS mail to the playa, as we have been for decades.  We do: USPS to the Playa, Playa to any (international) address with a unique artistic postmark!  (US postage encouraged/required), and friendly (and not-so-friendly) posties: stand in line, and fill out your form... in triplicate... with crayon.

Come by and enjoy our homemade Pickle Back Juice at our Pickle Back Bar. Come through our Saloon Doors in Space, mosey on up to bar, throw down a Pickle Back! Then, for the daring, jump on Gherkin our famous Bucking Pickle for the buck of your life!

We serve the Universe Famous Home Made PickleBacks! Our bar is open daily Monday - Saturday from Noon-Sunset. Come by and replenish yourself with our Pickle juice and to top it off take a spin on our Bucking Pickle. Look for our Saloon Doors in space and come on in.
PickleBack Mountain is the place you should go if you want to buck a pickle, have the most amazing picklejuice on the planet, meet decent people, and did we say buck a pickle!

The Legendary Playground of the Gods is a place for learning, authentic connection, and celebrating life. This is a place to remember that we are all Divine, Infinite & Immortal beings simply wearing the disguise of being human. Come and find an oasis from the desert, find rest in the shade, get frozen treats and feast on a week of inspired offerings in workshops, classes, music, and entertainment designed to feed your soul. Welcome Home.

Our Cinema runs from Sunset to Sunrise, Tuesday through Friday. Family-friendly content 8pm-10pm. Silent Films 10pm-12am. A cornucopia of the delightful and absurd from 12am-6am. A different theme every night!

New for 2025 - Welcome Home House Party!  Champagne cocktails and mocktails!  House music (the good kind, not the boring kind)!  Cinematic visuals!  Monday night 10pm-4am.

Since 1997 Camp Cul-de-Sac has been the playa home to a diverse group from all over the country. We offer an open-air all night cinema, as well as an acoustic/electric jam dome in the afternoons.
Est. 1997, Camp Cul-de-Sac provides an open-air cinema with a wide selection of crazy clips plus a video art experience and open jam.  Also, we have candy.

Titanic's End is going west this year! We will be accessible to the public and will have live music with a saloon and a mechanical polar bear. We will have events through out the week and invite you to swing by.

The Titanic's End camp is located in Bao Village and supports the Titanic's End mutant vehicle. When we are not on the playa, we are helping to raise awareness about climate change and creating interactive art.

A vibrant community celebrating creativity & self-expression. The Nebula Skateboard, a cosmic vessel spreading positivity, has been captured by Valtari and Soric a powerful two-headed desert snake. The Cosmic Wolfs Pack, brave Burners, embark on a quest to rescue the Nebula Skateboard, harnessing creativity, music & skateboarding for an epic showdown at Center Camp.

We will run  a Mongolia Camp. We will provide the triditional Chinese food and Mongolia food. We will  have 2 Mongolia tent on the site. A lot of perticipants and many volunteers will be there. You must have fun at our camp

Billowing white fabric surrounds our waterless pillow pools where the tired burner can take an afternoon nap. Learn new skills at one of our daytime workshops or groove to some tunes. My hand is holding your hand, but we're such Super Friends, you feel my hand on your heart...or in your brain.

We invite all burners to chill at the Flying Saucer Lounge with special cocktails during the day, and hot or cold sake or premium Tequila at the Dragon Lounge during the evening. You can enjoy acrobatic, fire dancing performance and workshops at scheduled times, and a place to practice and spin fire with us.  If you want to join our kitties for morning yoga or a afternoon tandem running race, bring your mat to stretch and pose with us You can chill on our chairs and watch people pass by while sipping our special drinks. You can learn to be a puppet master and perform at our Improv Puppet Theatre. You can challenge yourself to walk the plank, or play the game of Giant Jenga, or play poker at our game table while enjoying your sake. Yes, we also invite your for our theme dance parties!

We invite all burners to enjoy the night sky with our Star Gazing Pad and experience changing perception with our Box of Perception. Or, you can just chill with us during day and night. Astro Cats is a camp for relaxation ,learning about the stars in the night sky, and public talks on astronomical topics in the evenings.
RADICALOHA is a camp of Aloha! We bring the Hawaiian Culture to Black Rock City. We offer hula, workshops, DJ music and authentic shave ice.
RADICALOHA is a camp of Aloha! We bring the Hawaiian Culture to Black Rock City. We offer hula, workshops, DJ music and authentic shave ice.

A place of authentic aloha! We bring Hawaii to you! Our authentic Hawaiian workshop of chanting, educational history forums and meditation healing sessions will sooth your soul! Live DJ sets so you can dance and be yourself and yes, Hawaiian Shave Ice to cool you down and savor the tropical flavors of Hawaii! Step into the realm of Hawaiian culture and experience true ALOHA!  We welcome EVERYONE to feel at home and enjoy a happy place!

Dumpling Trap (brought to you by Midnight Moon Market) is an old-school Chinatown lounge that serves dumplings and engages guests to have deeper conversations with the hosts and with each other. Our purpose is to create an intimate, delightful experience for the people coming to our camp.

Dear Mom is a camp centered on celebrating the women & role models in your life. We provide a relaxing and inclusive space on playa to have a cup of tea, reflect on those who helped make you who you are, and write a letter on custom Goddess stationary to the important figures in your life.

M-F 10am-12 & 8-10pm

We are a small Burning Man camp focused on creating community and connection both on and off Playa. We maintain a camp size of around 25 members, mostly based in the San Francisco/Bay Area.

This year, we are bringing a two-part gift: Veg Out and The Brothel. Veg Out is our daytime gift, where we will be serving cool, fresh vegetables to overheated Burners. And at night, our Brothel will serve hot, steamy broth to people who want a cozy place to hang out and warm up.

Holon Village is building an interactive, multi-module sensory experience for Burning Man. We believe in creating systems that empower radical self-reliance while taking advantage of the utility of communal effort. We are a mix of veteran and new Burners, all of whom share an excitement to build an amazing experience for ourselves, each other, and other Burners.

Camp Kühloff is the shaded oasis of Black Rock City and home to the ice cold lavender towels. We are a socially and environmentally conscious theme camp that celebrates the principles of Burning Man. On the playa, our purpose is to provide fellow burners with space to 'cool off', re-hydrate, and feel welcome during the hottest part of the day. We provide an environment where EVERYONE is welcome and encouraged to hang. Please visit us at: campkuhloff.org.

Our camp is dedicated to creating the ultimate playa living shelter based off the rarely used rhombicuboctahedron dome geometry. Our dones are constructed of reusable and sustainable panels held together only with zip ties. They can be built nearly as fast as a tent yet these domes have the strength and feel of a cabin. Stop by to see and learn about our latest iterations, share some ideas and learn how to live in the dust in comfort

We create dwellings that are artistic, comfortable and able to survive the most extreme weather effortlessly. We achieve this by using a rare but incredibly versatile dome geometry that is based off an Archimedian solid. With this geometry we can build metal, cloth or foam panel domes that are infinitely reusable. Some of our domes have had 9 years of playa use and are as solid as the day we made them. Stop by and see our latest iterations

Enchanted Booty Forest is a Burning Man Legacy Camp that has evolved out of the fires of a decade of burns to represent a potent breeding ground of DEEP -- BOOTY -- INFORMED prestige party dust tradition. We are a dedicated troop of misaligned and adequately distorted tail gunner visionaries that host workshops, parties, and art projects, in concert with our sister camp YES, and cleave to the principal that all booty is good booty for booty's sake.
The Enchanted Booty Forest delivers exactly what it promises: enchantment, relaxing shade, and gloriously heavenly booty.

"Awake" emerges from the collective imagination of a group of inspired individuals, bound by creativity and a shared vision. 
Our mission? To awaken hearts to the power of love and elevate consciousness. It represents the bridge between our human existence and our transcendent realm, showing that love is the ultimate answer and urging a collective transcendence beyond ego. In a world craving for healing, "Awake" stands as a symbol of hope, offering a pathway towards enlightenment and unity.
This Theme Camp is more than art; it's a catalyst for change.
We invite everyone to let down the ego, open your heart and join this journey. Stand with us in spreading love and light. Together, we can forge a new path for our world, one filled with love, peace and collective well-being. We are AWAKE!

We invite you to enjoy Summer Camp as an adult while also letting your inner-child play! Be transported to our cozy forest where our talented Camp Counselors are here to provide fun activities like: Black Rock Nature Walk, Yoga, earning merit badges, the Ring Toss Drinking Game, arts and crafts, painting on our art wall, Thirst Aid Bar, performing in our annual Talent Show, dancing the night away at our Sexy Fancy Dancy Party, making out with that special camper, campfire stories, or if you just want to chill, we have hammocks, a comfy couch and a cuddly pillow fort, all for you to have the best Summer Camp of your life!

Sunrise or Sunset, we're your place for a respite. We aim to inspire your higher self with an hour long lecture borne of wisdom by those who delve into the heart, soul, and intellect of humanity. Sit, listen, relax, then discuss what we've heard and take that gift with you out to the playa.

Be transported to our cozy forest where our talented Camp Counselors are here to provide fun activities like: the Ring Toss Drinking Game, 8-Bit scavenger hunt adventure, climbing up our two story Thirst Aid Tree House Bar, dream interpretation, painting on our art wall, playing spin the giant bottle, yoga, meditation, improv jam, poetry, performing in our annual Talent Show, dancing the night away at our Sexy Fancy Dancy Party, making out with that special camper, campfire stories, giant marshmallow S’Mores, or if you just want to chill, we have hammocks, hand misters, a comfy couch and a pillow tent, all for you to have the best Summer Camp of your life!

The oldest Alice themed bar on the playa is back, but much less Alice-themed than you'd expect!

Known for intricate cocktails and zany decor, this year the bar returns with an extra small bar, an extremely obvious speakeasy. 
We offer our classic chill lounge with Tarot readings open every afternoon (relaxing space open always). 
In the evenings our drink and drive through becomes a community firepit and fire dancing space, come have conversations with your neighbours.

But careful, you might get trapped in a net if you don't pass our arbitrary DUI checks.

Our camp supports the Wings of Resonance art installation—an immersive, large-scale sculpture exploring sound, frequency, and connection. We're the behind-the-scenes crew: artists, builders, and collaborators who maintain and activate the piece throughout the week. The camp serves as our base for coordination, creativity, and community as we bring this interactive experience to life on the playa.
Camp Religious As Fuck provides decomodified and non-judgy Christian spiritual practice and hospitality.
Camp Religious As Fuck provides decomodified and non-judgy Christian spiritual practice and hospitality.
Camp Religious As Fuck provides decomodified and non-judgy Christian spiritual practice and hospitality.

We are a bunch of people that speak openly about our relationship with God. Some of whom simply have found Christianity as well as other faiths to be helpful in our own spiritual journeys. When we interact with people at Religious AF, we are there to welcome them, serve them and answer their questions.  We aren't recruiting them, or asking them to join anything. We practice Radical Inclusion, conversation, prayer, and ritual to all who seek it: gay, trans, straight, high, sober, clothed, naked, polyamorous, monogamous, celibate, gracious, and grumpy alike. We have welcomed people in all of those categories and more because we also identify as those folks. We want to participate and co-create experiences that open hearts and connect us with the Divine.

The world now is too dangerous and beautiful for anything but love.  Religious as Fuck is a place for prayer, blessing, conversation and spiritual healing.  We will offer morning prayer and daily time for spiritual conversation. We will offer worship services and blessings at the temple. 
At Religious As Fuck you we will have open dialogue about what religion, spirituality, and God mean to people, or quite honestly, what they don't mean to them as well. 
Www.Religiousafcamp.com

A Boeing 747 transformed into the largest moving art car. Step into an alternative reality, where dreams come alive in an interactive art experience.

The sky's the limit, and welcome about the "747 Experience". entering the 747 aircraft, the largest moving art car ever to grace Burning Man, each visitor will be checked onto the plane, and through the Insecurity Checkpoint where they can receive hugs and praise from our crew members and volunteers. Proceeding further into the 747 fuselage, they will be asked to fill out an Emotional Baggage Tag, to let go of anything holding them back.  Once completed, they hang the tag on the wall of baggage handles. Next, a flight attendant asks them for their destination (where they are going on their journey through life), which will be shared on a Boarding Pass.  This pass is hung onto the Destination wall. Once completed, the traveler is given a pair of airplane wings. 
Come and be inspired, and dream of what is possible, while letting go of the things that hold you back in life.

New York Dangerous (www.NYD.nyc) is a merry band of adventurers from New York City and around the world. We see ourselves as an extended family that loves to have fun together.

On playa, we gift whimsical "what your mom warned you about" daytime events including: Strangers with Candy, Running with Scissors Relay Race, Put-Your-Eye-Out Shooting Gallery, Playing with Fire, and more.

Off-playa and year-round in NYC, we host and participate in shenanigans involving adventure, art, music, exploration, Altruism, and Radical Self-Expression. We love to have fun and strive to recreate the wide-eyed wonder and whimsy of the playa in everything we do - plus we founded the House of Good Deeds, one of the largest Burners Without Borders and fully volunteer-run organizations in all of New York City!

On playa, we gift whimsical "what your mom warned you about" events to fellow Burners including: Strangers with Candy, Running with Scissors Relay Race, Put-Your-Eye-Out Shooting Gallery, Playing with Fire, and more.

New York Dangerous features the all-day interactivity your mother warned you about: Running with Scissors (relay race passing scissors, winners get ice cream), Playing with Fire (using sun's rays and magnifying glasses to burn balsa wood necklaces we gift on a leather string), Talking to Strangers (daily 75 min conversation on a different topic led by a NYD camper; these have ranged from blockchain to polyamory to lucid dreaming to krunking), Strangers with Candy (our 24-hour free hard candy vending machine, "You'll Put Your Eye Out!" shooting gallery (plastic bows and foam arrows shot downrange to hit hanging targets), plus Bad Idea Bingo where the first 50 people who successfully complete 5 tasks in a line before Temple Burn are gifted a special "Master of Bad Ideas" leather necklace.

Your mother warned you not to run with scissors, right? Or play with fire?  You weren't allowed to talk to strangers, take candy from people you didn't know, or do anything else fun.

Your mom's not here, but we are - so come do all those things with us every day! Check our schedule for events like:

• Running With Scissors Relay Race (winners get ice cream!)
• "You'll Put Your Eye Out!" Shooting Gallery - win necklaces and prizes with your archery prowess!
• Daily Talking to Strangers discussion groups - different topic each day!
• Playing With Fire - use our magnifying glasses to burn and keep your own necklaces!
• Strangers With Candy - a 24/7 free vending machine for hard chewy candies, get your sugar fix anytime, day or night!

...and more!  (We won't tell your mother if you won't.)

New York Dangerous - the camp your mother warned you about. Try Running With Scissors, Playing With Fire, Talking to Strangers, "You'll Put Your Eye Out!" Shooting Gallery, and more - plus NY-style pizza and calzones! ...and of course, come by 24/7 for free candy.

New York Dangerous (the camp your mother warned you about!) hosting the playa's best interactive events: Running With Scissors, Talking to Strangers, Playing With Fire, Put Your Eye Out shooting gallery, and of course our 24/7 Strangers with Candy machine.

Our camp specializes in things of which your mother would not approve!

Talking To Strangers - Daily "TED Talk"-style lectures from 12-2 every day in our communal space.
Strangers With Candy - a free 24-hour unwrapped hard candy vending machine for passersby.
Playing With Fire - use our magnifying glasses and the sun's rays to burn designs onto balsa-wood necklace pendants.
"You'll Put Your Eye Out!" Shooting Gallery - plastic bows and foam arrows allow participants to shoot hanging targets and win NYD leather necklaces!
Running With Scissors - our annual huge team relay race on Wed at 3pm, exactly what it sounds like. Winners get ice cream!
Dangerous Liaisons - an oversized cuddle yurt filled with pillows, stuffed animals, air mattresses, and a power charging station, open 24/7 as a chill space, a retreat from the noise and the dust, and maybe some frisky business.  Whatever happens in the DL, stays on the DL.

Well, you can't say your mother didn't warn you!  Join New York Dangerous for our annual Running With Scissors race 3pm Wed, plus our Strangers With Candy snack machine, Put Your Eye Out Shooting Gallery, Talking To Strangers discussion series, Playing With Fire medallion burning station, and Dangerous Liaisons social yurt.

We’re the New York Dangerous, offering BRC all sorts of awesome danger: indulge your sweet tooth on Strangers with Candy, compete in our Running With Scissors relay race at 3pm Wed, and meet new people in our social Talking to Strangers yurt. More dangerous than playing real-life Frogger on Broadway during rush hour.

Roll up for a hub of spectacular sidetracks and childlike wonder! Give it your all to set a record for "Most Clothespins Pinned to the Face in One Minute", "Speed Kissing", or "Most Leapfrogs in 30 Seconds". With renowned carnival games and attractions in our Chamber of Wonders, including the soul-searching experience of Burning Man's Darkest Room, the mesmerizing optical illusions and sensory delights within the Hall of Oddities, and a whimsical Give-One-Take-One Gift Shop, there's something for everyone at Roadside Distraction.

Come and join us on the mystical shores of the exotic Lake Titicaca and enjoy our mountain hospitality.
Come and join us on the mystical shores of the exotic Lake Titicaca and enjoy our Andean hospitality.
Ah, Titicaca.  This high altitude mountain lake is the symbol for our camp.  Unusual, striking, beautiful, and refreshing.  Come by for a friendly chat.
Meet us on the shores of this remote, high mountain lake for some delicious treats and fun!
Meet us on the shores of this remote, high mountain lake for some delicious treats and fun!

We took our name from a high Andean lake, but it has so many meanings, and is so fun to say that we just love to say it and hear it!   Stop by for a cocktail, some badminton, and some interaction and see if you don't start enjoying the sound of the word Titicaca as well.
The winds howl across this high Andean lake, blowing in strangers from mysterious far away lands.
Mysterious, exotic, remote...like the great Andean lake, this is Titicaca!
Ah... delightful Lake Titicaca, high in the Andes Mountains, and with such an interesting name with so many meanings.  Come frolic!
Join these high mountain dwellers in their desert caravan.  Sit a spell in our open shade and enjoy the Middle Eastern Bazaar environment.
Happy people exploring the high altitude lake in the Andes mountains of South America…and some art cars…and some ice cream…and some frosty beverages!
Marshmallows, Chocolate, and Bacon.  Oh My!
On the shores there is light.  High in the Andes mountains, Lake Titicaca stirs our primal energy, which creates a beautiful dance around our ceremonial fire.
Imagine camping on the desolate shores of a lake high in the Andes mountains.  Smell the campfire with foil wrapped potatoes and steaks grilling…mmmmm…and butter!
Sunset over a high mountain Peruvian lake.  The scent of roasted chestnuts wafting on a fall breeze.  The dead leaves lie huddled and still, no longer blown hither and tither…
Roasted potatoes on the shores of a high altitude Peruvian lake.
Burn Scouts are the OG rad scouts, sometimes audacious, always fun, lovable and welcoming.  Scouts honor!

Welcome to the Burn Scouts of America camp, where we take pride in scouting out the best ways to make Burning Man a fun and inclusive experience for everyone. Our camp is a place where you can earn badges for living Burning Man's 10 Principles while munching on our homemade scout cookies, and helping out your fellow Burners. We believe in the spirit of adventure, preparedness, and community, just like the scouts of old and only with consensual fondling. So come join us and let's create some unforgettable memories together!

ROLLLL CALLLL! Everyone likes to be recognized for their accomplishments, and the Burn Scouts are here to make sure you feel freakin' great about yourself. We want give you some flair for your Scout sash or a badge of honor in your field book! Did you successfully MOOP while out on your journey today? BADGE OF HONOR! Did you practice radical self-expression and make your own outfit? YOU GET A PATCH! Did you make out with someone at Distrikt? Sure, why the heck not – YOU GET A PATCH TOO! We're here to honor your every Playa move and give a place of reprieve where you can eat Burn Scout cookies and sit around our campfire and share stories of Burning Mans past.

Creation Nation BRC is a radical survival camp where all of our campers provide for their own needs. As a camp, we provide interactivity with Black Rock City citizens through giving many hands-on art projects as well as informational talks. We also provide a few 24/7 interactivity items on the frontage which gets us involved in discussions and socializing with our fellow burners for photos and the like.

Welcome to the one and only BLACK ROCK SHOE REPAIR!!

Are you tired of wandering the Playa feeling like you are losing your sole? Dusty wasteland wearing holes right through you? You're in luck! BLACK ROCK SHOE REPAIR is here to comfort your worries as well as save your desperate and hopeless soles. With our 24/7 drop off, anytime is the right time to seek rehabilitation. Think your soles are beyond repair? Browse our Ghost Lovers Sparkle BOOT-ique and see if your sole-mate is waiting for you. You know what they say, "If the shoe fits".

Welcome to The Lost Penguin Cafe! We are one of the oldest continuously-returning theme camps at Burning Man, and we are back this year to bring our freezing daytime cold snow cones and sizzling hot entertainment to the playa.Take shelter from the hot sun in our welcoming 40' x 80' shaded lounge, relax on our comfy couches, and strike up a conversation with someone new. Sit out a dust storm, or simply watch the world go by as you enjoy casual live performances from noon until the wee morning hours. Ask for Penguin Pee or another refreshing drink (non-alcoholic available) or our traditional evening chocolate, handed out by our cafe hosts. We can't wait to welcome you to our waddle.

Welcome to The Lost Penguin Cafe! We are one of the oldest continuously-returning theme camps at Burning Man, and we are back in 2023 to bring our freezing cold treats and sizzling hot entertainment to the playa!

Come take shelter from the hot sun in our 40 x 80 shaded, adult-only lounge and comfy couches! Here, you can enjoy live performances from noon until the wee morning hours, along with a refreshing drink or piece of chocolate from our bar.

Between noon and sunset, we serve snow cones in our all-ages area so anyone on playa can beat the heat!

Come join our waddle for an unforgettable afternoon or evening. Straight from the icebergs of Antarctica to you!

A Hospitality Camp that provides the Black Rock Community a place to relax, enjoy good music and conversation.  We graciously offer cold sno-cones, lemonade and chocolates during the day.  At night we provide entertainment in the form of music by a variety of performers, bands and our own in-house produced Lunacy Cabaret.  Stop in to sing, dance, chat, relax and marvel at the beauty of the Playa with friends new and old :)

We graciously offer cold snow cones, lemonade and chocolates during the day. The Lost Penguins have proudly been a theme camp since 2001.  Our founders dream was to establish a hospitality camp where all burners are welcome and made to feel at home.  We have expanded on that dream and are proud to welcome Burners into our Cafe in 2018. 

Our cafe as a place for burners to chill on our couches and seating and listen to music.  We emphasis hospitality and greeting burners into our cafe and serving wine and chocolate and snow cones and penguin pee (vodka and lemonade drink).   To go with this year's theme, we have our space ship and the Penguin oracle to answer all of burner questions.  We are a camp that provides space for musicians, poets and others at Open Mic times, and welcome burners who want to participate in an informal open mic and music experience.   We have music equipment set up or bring your own.  Burners who are musicians can check in with our Entertainment lead and schedule time to perform.    And music is scheduled throughout the day and night.

Day or night, get up on stage for asshole theatre, watch some bands, dance to DJs or take a workshop. Join us as we navigate surprises all week!  Or just sit and we will engage you in conversation as you watch the playa float by.

What could be more lost in the desert than a Penguin?  You aren’t lost though, you’ve just found the place you are looking for. Drop in and enjoy our shade, couches, rugs, wine, chocolate, friendly people and good times. It’s the seventh year that we’ve been entertaining Black Rock City with our blend of music, comedy, classes and open mic a-hole theater. Night and day there is always someone or something interesting at The Lost Penguin Cafe.
That’s right…there are penguins in the desert. We’ve marched long and hard from the far corners of the globe to converge on our old home for the sixth year.
We love. We give. We waddle. We squawk.

The Viking Longboat was a potent symbol of life, livelihood, one's journey through life, the afterlife, and was used by the Norse for transport, in trade, in warfare, and as a burial vessel for centuries.
Fjorgyn is a personification of earth in Norse mythology, and the mother of the thunder god Thor, the son of Odin.

At our camp will be the Nudeaoke (Nude Karaoke) stage, we're not just about pushing boundaries; we're about breaking them down entirely. Imagine a space where participants confront not just one, but two of the most common fears: public speaking/singing and nudity, all in one transformative experience.
In the face of such bravery and liberation, what else on the playa could possibly hold fear?

Check your Emotional Baggage with us. Spend Time Today to create a Better Tommorow for yourself! By writing down your emotional baggage you don't have to carry it with you; use that freed up emotional headspace to cultivate and connect with your future! We'll turn your emotional baggage into ashes and celebrate your newfound self-actualization at the temple burn.

Stop by any time of the day or night, get a drink of water, treat yourself to our pamper station, get out of the sun, or join a dance party in progress.

Also, join us for movie nights (Mon, Wed, and Fri), our foot poll where you vote with your feet, our Christmas crawl, and our workshop on personal presence.

If you have baggage you’re carrying around, like bitterness over unrequitted love, or Catholic guilt, come check it in with us and we’ll take care of it for you.  All baggage collected will be burned at the temple burn.

Fear of commitment? Catholic guilt? Bitterness over unrequited love?  Come check that baggage with us so that you can experience Burning Man baggage free!  Sunday night all unclaimed baggage will be burned in the temple burn.

Got some baggage you’d like to get rid of?  Fear of commitment?  Bitterness over unrequited love? Check your baggage with us and discover what it’s like to be baggage free!  Unclaimed baggage will be burned Sunday night at the temple burn!  We handle emotional baggage only!  Baggage Free since 2005!

Do you have some baggage you’d like to get rid of? Perhaps a fear of committment? Or close-mindedness to new ideas? Don’t carry it around all week. Come check it in with us and we’ll take care of it for you. Bitter over an unrequitted love? No problem, check that baggage in with us and feel light and free! Who knows, you might even forget to pick up that baggage when you leave! Warning, unclaimed baggage will be burned Sunday night (see us for details on when and where). Open 24 hours a day!

At Joie de Vivre, we're all about bringing the joy — even when the dust is thick and the tacos are hotter than the weather. 

Swing by in the morning for a rotating mix of movement, writing, or a card reading. Stick around for Taco Tuesday (yes, it's real), and spin the Wheel of Feels — our 24/7 interactive art piece — for a little unexpected magic.

At Joie de Vivre camp, we're all about spreading joie (that's French for "joy")! Come step into our oasis of Radical Self-Expression, where style meets magic, spirits rejuvenate, and creativity soars. 

Revive Your Radical Self with one of our mindful morning activities, then stop by the Joie Shoppe for an afternoon reset that will leave you feeling renewed and inspired.

Our name and our ethos are one in the same: Joie de Vivre!

An international group of Joiers (as we affectionately like to call ourselves), we join you from all over the world: France, Sweden, Belgium, Germany, Ukraine, Canada, Norway, Korea, the United Kingdom, Australia, the good ole' USA, and more!

This year, we invite you to join us for sustainability workshops each afternoon. At our camp, we'll be offering a plastic waste upcycling solution that will turn waste into clean plastic flakes that can be upcycled to create useful products for campers. The interactive workshops will showcase how useful products can be created from plastic waste and take the notion of "Leave No Trace" to the next level!

Joie!

Our name and our ethos are one in the same: Joie de Vivre!
 
An international group of Joiers (as we affectionately like to call ourselves), we join you from all over the world: France, Sweden, Belgium, Germany, Ukraine, Canada, Norway, Korea, the United Kingdom, Australia and the good ole' USA.

Our interactivity focus this year will be two Joie Pétanque pitches for fellow burners to join us in this fun French 'lawn' game with two tournaments during the week in addition to everyday play. Come enjoy a cup of rosé while learning something new and meeting like minded interesting people!

The Swedish lawn game of Kubb will also be on offer for anyone to play and we will have a midweek tournament including a midsummer themed sunset happy hour!

Joie de Vivre, the ageless French expression, reflects our cheerful zest for life as well as our core camp philosophy, and our global group of Joiers welcome you into our camp anytime of the day or night! 

Come and find the brightly colored neon sign and flags atop our Joie de Vivre Arch, step inside and fuel up on a Cup of Joie coffee or relax with a chilled Rose-ayyy! We will also be offering yoga and beauty sessions throughout the burn in addition to our good old fashioned Joieful tunes and vibes!

Welcome to The G Spot; you've finally found it! At The Gong Spot, we believe sound, movement, and play have a profound ability to ground and connect individuals. TGS's mission is to contrast the Burn's high-intensity energy. We offer chill spaces (3 individual lounges) for weary travelers to rest, get out of the sun, or even take a smoke break. Our scheduled sound baths (we like Gongs) and vibey spaces offer respite, grounding, or a quick nap for many weary travelers.

Our air-conditioned sound bath tent doubles as an (almost) 24/7 cuddle puddle lounge and hosts a variety of movement-based interactivity (both whimsical and sensual) and talks throughout the week. Join us, and then tell your friends you've finally found The G-Spot!

Welcome to The G Spot; you've finally found it! At The Gong Spot, we believe sound, movement, and play have a profound ability to heal, energize, and connect individuals. TGS's mission is to contrast the Burn's high-intensity energy. We offer chill spaces (3 individual lounges) for weary travelers to rest, get out of the sun, or, in last year's case, shelter from the storm. Our scheduled sound baths (we like Gongs) and vibey spaces offer respite, grounding, or a quick nap for hundreds of Burners.

Our air-conditioned sound bath tent doubles as an (almost) 24/7 cuddle puddle lounge and hosts a variety of movement-based interactivity (both whimsical and sensual) throughout the week. Join us, and then tell your friends you've finally found The G-Spot!

Welcome to The Gong Spot; you've finally found it! 

At night, you'll be greeted by synchronized, multi-colored lights and be lured in by the gravity of the gongs. That'll be the first sign you're close to hitting the right spot.

The belle-mahal (our centerpiece) will be receptive and pulsing, inviting the curious to come inside for giggles, conversation, and cuddles every evening. You'll find no pretense and no expectation in our space. We find the gong to be grounding and connective, sometimes playful and sometimes serious, and we want to share that with you.

If sound baths and cuddles aren't your thing, stop by during the day to visit Smoke Break, where our apothecary-style lounge will open up your lungs and heart to new possibilities.

Dark Sparkle is the potent mix of the mysterious and the dangerous that makes something irresistibly attractive.  It's what causes people to push their limits to the point of insanity, what spurs exploration of territories both physical and metaphysical,, that unexplainable quality which arouses curiosity in the dark side. Some days, Dark Sparkle is your alter-ego; other days it is your most natural feeling form. Dark Sparkle is Mona Lisa's smile, tarot cards at prom, mother's milk, the apocalypse. Dark Sparkle is an adventurous way of life--audacious and bold as BRC itself.

Make your official 2025 Solar Shrink-Art necklaces, earrings, keychains, bike tags & hat swag using our solar ovens. All art supplies and ovens will be provided. You COLOR it. You watch it SHRINK. You WEAR it! Walk away with some cool, commemorative, self-made swag, along with a greater understanding of the wonderful world of solar cooking. 

Also, try our Tabletop Tug Challenge. You’ve always wanted to do it at a wedding. Practice here first. Try your luck at successfully pulling a tablecloth out from under a full table setting.

Make Shrink-Art Jewelry (necklaces/pendants, earrings, keychains, bike tags, etc.) using our solar ovens. Tuesday-Saturday, Noon-2PM. All art supplies and solar ovens will be provided. Walk away with some cool, self-made swag, along with a greater understanding of the wonderful world of solar cooking. Come bake with us!!

Come make Shrink Art Jewelry (necklaces, earrings, keychains, bike tags, etc.) using our solar ovens.  Tuesday thru Saturday, noon - 2pm.  All art supplies and solar ovens will be provided.  Walk away with cool, self-made swag, along with a greater understanding of the wonderful world of solar cooking.

Black Rock City residents are encouraged to join us Tuesday through Saturday from noon - 2pm to create solar oven jewelry. All art supplies and solar ovens are provided by our camp. We also encourage fellow campers to cook their own food using our solar ovens and to join us in our lounge area to relax, to visit and to play boardgames.

Camp Baked: it's all about the ovens, solar ovens that is! Come join us daily as our beautiful star reaches its zenith (11am - 3pm) to learn how to use our solar ovens. You can bake your own food for your own camp using one of our ovens or you can tap into your artistic self while creating a solar oven ankle bracelet medallion or necklace medallion to take with you as a gift from the residents of Camp Baked. While waiting for your creations to bake we invite you to kick back in the shade of our "cool" Lepidoptera Lounge named in homage to this year's Burning Man Theme, Metamorphosis.

Snarky performance art by day,dusty rug cutting by night. Stop by Disco Lips to enjoy chugging beats, flowing beverages, nonstop wisecracks, and even some random playground equipment thrown in for good measure!

Snarky performance art by day, raging dance parties by night. Stop by Disco Lips to enjoy chugging beats, flowing beverages, nonstop wisecracks, and even some random playground equipment thrown in for good measure!

If Sunrise gatherings, early AM dance partys, lovely adult beverages (hot or cold) swinging furniture, rowdy, fun loving, warm huggin, ball bustin, disco fist pumping, rump shaking and new friend making burners is your kinda a party then say no more, Disco Lipps has you covered!

A rowdy saloon setting where you are able to belly up to the bar for some swigs, cut a rug in the dust, or lounge around on our signature swings. Swig-N-Swing Bar/Craft Cocktails/DJs opens for "F Your Last Call" from W-F 4-8:00 AM. "You don't have to go home, but you can come here"

A rowdy saloon setting where you are able to belly up to the bar for some swigs, cut a rug in the dust, or lounge around on our signature swings. Happy hour craft cocktails daily from 4-6:00 PM featuring a variety of non electronic music but swinging into full gear with banging underground music 6-10:00 PM

Come for a Swig or a Swing but not a swap if thats your thing.

For everything bad, Mezcal, for everything that is good as well, and if it still does not help, one and a half liters. We are a diverse solar powered camp made up of members from all over the world all sharing a love of Mezcal. Come join us for a delicious sunset Margie.

A solar powered camp of misfits from around the world with a hankering for a Mezcal Margarita.

Crash land yourselves in SS Armstrong's Crusty Cantina Bar, a space for exploration and adventure with zero gravity frolicking. Come party with us in the space hubble bubble on Monday night at 8pm, BYO space-suit!

Rubber Armstrong's iconic feature, the illuminated Skull, sits upon their tribe's apocalyptic temple and shrine, transforming their elevated spirits through ritual and dance. The Tent of Sacrificial stuffed animals, is a space for performances, workshops, talks, games and events throughout the week. Desert dwellers who encounter the skull, will seek synergy and oneness with the skull. 

Monks of Modification are on standby to PIMP YOUR BIKE. Questions 3 we shall ask thee, and pimping of thy bike will commence.

Riddles and rituals will get you access to the After Life bar, guests are ushered through drapes into the plush Egyptian den. Embalmed with various rituals of well being with drinkers and bar tenders in Egyptian animal masks and successful rounds of Connect 4 are the way to exit, collect your new bike and continue on your dusty adventure.

Pimp my pushie bike decoration service; providing unique individual designs to your naked bikes. Decoration workshop is housed inside our resident spaceman "RubberArmstrong" who crashlanded at BRC hundreds of years ago and has all but been consumed by the dust.

What can you expect from our camp? Good Question!

Stop by our shady oasis to deepen your connection with your friends and loved ones, or meet a new friend entirely in a cozy, intimate atmosphere. You'll leave feeling more connected to others, and having formed a deeper connection with yourself.

Come by in the afternoon when we will be serving tea, Dosas (Indian breakfast like a crepe) and batch tea cocktails, or stop by late at night to warm yourself by the fire. Additionally, we will be hosting 24/7 self guided deeper connection activities in our cozy frontage. 

There are no wrong answers, only Good Questions!

What can you expect from our camp? Good Question?!
We feature a gameshow inspired by 90's TV!. Two teams compete against each other in an epic battle of wits and creativity.
Looking for something a little more intentional? This year we are offering "Good Questions for Connections". Make a new friend, get to know someone you already know better, but come out feeling more connected, ideally to someone you wouldn't otherwise meet!
For those looking for less action, relax in our hammocks with misters, play some bar games, and enjoy a refreshing drink from our question bar.

The Love Apothecary: A Place of Healing & Connection
Our camp's public offering will be a mystical, whimsical apothecary—a sanctuary nestled on the Playa that combines elements of a healing space with the warmth and intimacy of a home. The ambiance will invite people to slow down, connect, and be present.

Please enjoy our apothecary counter where members of our camp will prepare and serve the Love Potion. The Love Potion is an herbal aphrodisiac, and stress reliever, paired with a ritual focused on connection, love, and open hearts. 

Interactive "Love Notes" Wall:
Our camp will feature an interactive wall where people can write anonymous love notes or positive messages to strangers on the Playa.

If you've ever been crowned the international skee-ball champion of the entire universe two weeks in a row; If you've ever meant to ride off into the sunset on a hobby horse but got sidetracked fluffing pillows (Cajun Style) at a two-star hotel for decades during your search for your life's true destiny; If you've ever gotten so lost in a really good book that you forgot you can't read because you've been too busy calling all the shots; If you think you would like to know what it's like to fly through the air much the way a brick doesn't or even if you've said it before and you'll say it again before and you'll say it before and you'll say it again again... Stop it, Homegirl! You're trying to do too much. Come have a drink and dance with us instead. It's gonna be a Way Way SuperGood time

Ready Fully Send? Welcome to camp Full Send, and we're taking SENT to a multitude of levels. Stop by to enjoy our free standing "Wall-EE",  SEND a singing telegram to someone you love/hate on playa, or you can (try) to get higher than last night with one of our scenic sunrise tandem para-motor flights over the playa.

Ready to get vertical (or just chill out)?! Welcome to camp Full Send! We'll help you elevate your playa experience with our 28ft. climbing wall, "Wall-EE" or help you get higher than last night with one of our scenic sunrise tandem para-motor flights over the playa.
Wall-Eeee's back at camp Full Send! Bring the family and develop your skillz on our new and improved 21ft. climbing wall.
Come Climb inside Wall-Eeee!!!
