We are a comfortable neighborhood pub with a-rockin' attitude and groovin' tunes. In honor of His Noodly Goodness, the Friendly Fire Bar will administer ice-cold libations for your mind, body, and spirit. We will also provide unofficial and official playa weddings in His Noodly Goodness' Temple. Come learn about his Noodly Goodness, call almost anywhere in the world on "Talk to Mom" phone, or visit our giftorium. We also offer bad advice, favorable directions, and delicious conversations to invigorate and stimulate your mind. The Flying Spaghetti Monster welcomes all so stop by, be touched by His noodly appendage, stay awhile, and rest your dusty bum.

There are Wood Ships, there are Steel ships, but the best ships are FriendShips."
A bunch of hippie shipmates from all over the world bring their FriendSHIP to the desert for a week of debauchery! Dreamery is a camp to discover, share and experience dreams. It is an interactive space to read and write dreams and fantasies, happy or scary, random and crazy, sensual or sad.

What dream would you ask for if you could?
If you could go anywhere in a dream, where would it be?

At Dreamery, you might also meet someone special. You can see if you want to hang out for just a bit or maybe become lifelong soulmates.

Got any bad dreams you want to get rid of? Drop them to the Dreamery Alter to be ceremonially burned at The Temple Burn.

Have any happy dreams or exciting tales to tell? Jot them down in The Book of Dreams. Flip through the pages to discover stories and dreams from people from around the world, and you might even find new dreams to call your own.

It's a food bank AND a cinema! Pop by, tell us your tale of woe, and replace your lost food. Vegan and keto available while supplies last. Grab some popcorn and stay for a movie after the sun goes down. Bring us your extra supplies for redistribution.

It's a food bank AND a cinema! Pop by, tell us your tale of woe, and replace your lost food. Vegan and keto available while supplies last. Grab some popcorn and stay for a movie after the sun goes down. Ride the 4 speed creature. It trots, it gallops, it has a replaceable head. Spoken word project available, complete with striped tent.

A combination movie theater, bully pulpit and food bank. Did your cooler go over to the dark side? Just brought a bag of granola because you heard someone would feed you? Well, we may be able to help, as long supplies last. However, we may heckle you, or submit you to indoctrination into our Anti Now movement. Or perhaps you'd like to rant. We can help with that too. Find out what the Buddhist elites don't want you to know! Learn the art of Llap Goch! BE THERE THEN! BE THERE THEN!

Welcome to the Republic of Trashistan . . . featuring nightly CineTrash Theater (highly curated trash cinema), the famous RantoMatic, INFÜS black metal cocktail bar (music, cocktails & life advice) happening most afternoons, home of the Anti-Now movement (BE THERE THEN!) and our Wed Happy Hour to celebrate our 21st year on the playa.

Back for our 20th year on the playa, the Rantomatic returns, as does our cinema of lesser seen selections. Home of the Anti Now Movement, exposing what the Buddhist overlords don't want you to know! Anti Now Meditation every night tomorrow at sunset! Regret yesterday! Worry about tomorrow! BE THERE THEN!
Our heroes return. Our space will be available for fortune telling, ranting, cinema, games and shenanigans.
There will be heckling. And movies.

The Rant O Matic returns in its mobile glory, available to all city members who need to let off steam by ranting after those rough moments on and off the playa. We will also be host to the Anti Zen Movement, providing Anti Zen meditation daily, tomorrow at sunset. BE THERE THEN!
The Witch’s Hat returns, along with some special surprises. Pleasant or not? You be the judge.
The Rant O Matic returns for your ranting pleasure. Located within Dr. Carl’s Department of Collections.
This year, the Rant O Matic returns. The heckling never went away.
Home of the Black Rock City’s Next Top Assassin competition. We will also be offering heckling and surprise spiritual services.

The Republic of White Trashistan’s Lamarckian laboratory is open for business. Come and see if being heckled and/or pampered affects your future offspring’s temperament. Home of Indra’s Net mobile chill space.

We're the Art Support Camp that has brought in the past these art installations for the delight of our community: COQUÍ, Atabey's Treasure, MÚCARO and Got Framed.
We're the Support Art Camp that has brought in the past these art installations for the delight of our community. ATABEY's Treasure, MÚCARO and Got Framed.

ATABEY is an Art Support Camp. Come by and learn about our new art installation on the playa this year. We are also the Parliament Art Crew that created the giant golden picture frame "Got Framed" in 2015 and 2016, and the wise woody owl, "MÚCARO" in 2017.

We're the "La Escuelita" ("Small Classroom") team, a friendly and helpful group of burners from different backgrounds that strives to teach newcomers and old comers alike about how to implement the ten principles during your burn and beyond! 

In 2017, we brought MÚCARO, our wise, woody owl dedicated to teachers everywhere. Inspired by the incidents we witnessed at our installation and the vandalism we heard about from other artists, we realized we needed to be teachers ourselves.

Most of our programming will take place on buses or art cars. With a "learning is fun" mindset, we'll use quizzes, reenactments and songs to impart tips and tricks designed to embed the principles into your very soul.

We'll also be hosting the world famous Steely Dan Happy Hour for it's sixth year on the playa.

When owls gather, the group is called a "parliament" as they have long been considered to be of a wise disposition. We are the caretakers of MÚCARO (2017 Black Rock City Art Honoraria), the magnificent giant owl that surveys the playa with a 360º view...< slow blink>...don't miss when it burns.

Got Framed is an inviting, playful, highly interactive art piece that supports and promotes community participation by encouraging passersby to BE THE ART. To step up, climb on, take a photograph...to 'monkey around', change the image, and invite others to join in...to have fun interacting with large scale art and make a memory to take with them. To say out loud "I Am A Masterpiece!

Chivo Loco Camp is a vibrant Venezuelan community bringing flavor, music, and warmth to the Playa. We host a **picanha BBQ** and a traditional **arepa breakfast**, sharing our culture through food and connection. Our chill lounge offers a welcoming space with good vibes and great conversations. Everyone is invited to stop by, enjoy a meal, and experience our hospitality. Come as you are—leave as part of the Chivo Loco family!

No daddy issues? Come get some! We are a group of life-long friends, predominantly in Seattle, WA. We love rainbows, being playful, and a little bit of riff-raff, but we also invite everybody to come explore their deeper selves through our feelings corner. Join us for our annual Queer Pancakes Brunch (Weds at noon) and Dad Rock Happy Hour (Mon evening). At night you can come enjoy our light art installations, including a lit up rainbow 3 story climbing structure and a LED game and interactivity wall. We all have daddy issues, and from this we have become a group of light-hearted, playful, and introspective aliens.

Daddy Issues - it's a term often used to define "issues" related with self-image, insecurity, sexual "deviance", non-heteronormative behavior, etc… We invite all burners to embrace any and all daddy issues and wear them proudly in our camp - to dance and laugh and play and express themselves and all their daddy issues in any way they want.  We want to create a space where others feel at home exploring and being exactly who they are.

Immerse yourself in ZOOM!, an underwater-themed playground celebrating 20 years of creative chaos on the playa. Explore our giant swings, teeter totters, aerial Lyra, and sea-inspired art as you reconnect with your playful side. By night, our glowing kelp forest, fire spinning shows, and ambient lounge create a vibrant refuge under the stars. Join a flow workshop, catch a performance, or simply rest beneath a canopy of light and sound. ZOOM! is open to all and dedicated to radical inclusion, interactivity, and joy.
We are a camp of makers, fire spinners, and good time havers. !Zoom! provides unique events, on & off playa, that promote fire, friendship, & fun.

a Fire Circus under the sea.  Come for the fire stay for the playground.  Play a rousing game of Hungry Hungry Human Hippos.  Events and fire posted daily on chalk board out front and in the How What When Where guide.

Undersea Oasis of fire!  Join us for our daily fire spinning lessons and our nights of fire!  Firebase ball tuesday after dark and late wednesday for fire dodgeball.  Our playground equipment is open 24/7 but one new piece will be operated by zoomer direction only.  Of just chill in our bubble lounge or black light snail dome.
!Zoom! Undersea fire art camp.  Bring the fire ocean to the playa.  Join us for fire baseball, fire jumprope, our party Monday night, open spins, fire dancing lessons, and more.

!Zoom! is coming home again.  Come find us during the day for workshops on fire spinning or at night to spin fire.  The dancing & partying will be happening all the time as usual.  There will be nightly fire spinning, a night of fire baseball & a night of fire dodgeball.  Or just hang in the lounge watching the fire art and spinners.  As always the playground is fun for all ages.

As people continue to crowd into Earths vast metropolises, living congested lives and depleting Earths resources, the promise of a utopian life in a moon colony becomes more appealing every day. Visit the ZOOM Lunar Estates office to learn more about the wonders of lunar life!

Illumination Village is an eclectic gathering of camps, held together by history and shared resources. You will find within the village, much like the microcosm of Burning Man, art and interactivity everywhere. 
Showcasing our fire artists in the front, and then placing our interactivity within the village in our Town Square and internal roads. 

Each year it's a new experiment in radical collaboration to create a cohesive feel for the village, across our many diverse camps. We love the multifaceted variety of environments and believe that it makes Illumination Village a unique and delightful place to visit. 

Come take a steam during the day and make sure to visit our Fire Art Carnival in the evening. Our Fire pit will be lit up late into the night. 

All are welcome!

Illumination Village is an eclectic gathering of camps, held together by history and shared resources. We have our own process of placement within the village, much like the microcosm of Burning Man, showcasing our most talented artists in the front, and then placing others around our edges of our camp, and within the village in our Town Square and internal roads. 

Each year it's a new experiment in radical collaboration to create a cohesive feel for the village, across our many diverse camps. We love the multifaceted variety of environments and believe that it makes Illumination Village a unique and delightful place to visit. 

Come take a steam during the day and make sure to visit our Fire Art Carnival in the evening. Our Fire pit will be lit up late into the night. 

All are welcome!

Illumination Village is an eclectic gathering of camps, held together by history and shared resources. We don't require expensive dues to create a joint vision; instead, each camp is responsible for their own art and interactivity, and each is self funded. We have our own process of placement within the village, much like the microcosm of Burning Man, showcasing our most talented artists in the front, and then placing others around our edges of our camp, and within the village in our Town Square and internal roads. Each year it's a new experiment in radical collaboration to create a cohesive feel for the village, across our many diverse camps. We love the multifaceted variety of environments and believe that it makes Illumination Village a unique and delightful place to visit.

Illumination Village offers the most old school, beautifully chaotic and welcoming Burning Man experience on the Esplanade. We are one of the oldest villages at 20…some..thing…years? Do Covid years count? Anyway - flame on!

The Illumination Village is an eclectic gathering of camps and each year is a new experiment in radical collaboration to create the cohesive feel for the village. Our communal areas are welcoming and relaxed during the daytime: come enjoy our steambath, performance spaces, workshops, and day bars. We light up at night with the multitude of illuminated art projects created by our campers including interactive fire installations, LED displays, and spontaneous performances.

Illumination Village (now a 501(c)(3) offers the most old school, beautifully chaotic and welcoming Burning Man experience on the Esplanade. We are one of the oldest villages, celebrating 22 consecutive years of mayhem in 2018, which we plan to be our most spectacular ever.

Here at Suburbia, we are putting our efforts into bringing that same tacky suburban culture to Black Rock City. New and old burners will be able to see one of the most disgusting/ugly parts of society in the urban sprawl of the 'default world' displayed in a beautiful and enjoyable way. From the moment someone spots Suburbia, they will see a typical suburban neighborhood, but the with Burning Man principles close to heart. We hope that through this subverted lens, participants will appreciate Black Rock City for more than an escapism from their daily lives, but also an opportunity to encompass the Burning Man principles into their everyday lives when they return to the 'default world'

Hometown: Portland Oregon

A dry, diamond in the rough subdivision that is a beautiful, well thought out housing oasis in Block Rock City.

Located on Esplanade, eight unique homes are available for viewing 24 hours a day. Each home is beautifully landscaped with green manicured lawns, white picket fences, mailboxes, garages, sidewalks and street lamps for night tours.  
Not into games? Participants can always enjoy a comfortable chair on our lawn 24 hours a day as nothing is better than front row seats on inner Playa. Participants can also enjoy a drink at Harry's, our bar located within the clubhouse, or take a timeshare tour with our marketing and HOA president, Tangent.

Here at Suburbia, we are putting our efforts into bringing that same tacky suburban culture to Black Rock City. New and old burners will be able to see one of the most disgusting/ugly parts of society in the urban sprawl of the 'default world' displayed in a beautiful and enjoyable way. From the moment someone spots Suburbia, they will see a typical suburban neighborhood, but the with Burning Man principles close to heart. We hope that through this subverted lens, participants will appreciate Black Rock City for more than an escapism from their daily lives, but also an opportunity to encompass the Burning Man principles into their everyday lives when they return to the 'default world'

Many years ago, a snake oil salesman named Dr. LeTawdry traveled the swamps of Louisiana in search of fabled elixirs. Many of his potions were successful, but it was his mixture for lovesickness that backfired and lead to tragedy -- awkward hugs. 

Now, Dr. LeTawdry urges you to visit Awkward & Tawdry Lounge to find the cure! He offers many treatments:  moving pictures, sing-alongs, breakfast with cartoons, easy listening and lemonade, drinking and merriment.

Marys Little Lambs (MLL) is a Burning Man theme camp that embodies a vibrant, queer, and international community. The camp thrives on its welcoming atmosphere, where wit, fun, care, community, and duty intertwine seamlessly to elevate our collective experience before, during, and after the Burn. With an inclusive ethos, it embraces individuals from various backgrounds, making everyone feel like part of the flock. The camp exudes a sense of warmth akin to a lamb's gentle nature, fostering an environment where diversity and community flourish under the Black Rock sun and amidst the fiery essence of Burning Man.

Mary's Little Lambs is an inclusive, mostly queer camp made up of a core group of 12-15 people that has grown larger and stronger each year since our inception 4 years ago.  We celebrate our community, live out the 10 principles and bond as a family both on and off playa.

TomorrowLamb, formerly Mary's Little Lambs, like the previous years, we will stand for acceptance, shelter, diversity and self-expression and we are hoping to spread our wings in ways we haven't before.

Mary's Little Lambs is a camp within the BAAAHS Station Village.  MLL is a safe manger, offering maternal love, advice and energy to all the lambs and rams.  MLL campers travel from around the world including China, England, Belgium, Netherlands and US to be a part of the camp and the village.
Deoxidized is a global oasis on playa that hosts intentional gathering space, a soul series, and endless opportunities for diverse connections with people from around the world.
Deoxidized is a global oasis on playa that hosts intentional gathering space, a soul series, and endless opportunities for diverse connections with people from around the world.

Our camp was founded by a passionate member of the Entrepreneurs Organization (EO), whose faith in humanity was changed after being exposed to the Burning Man culture. Inspired to share this transformative view of community and participation, the camp grew through an initial network of global entrepreneurs, and has evolved into a heartfelt family of change markers, leaders, and creators focused on personal development, innovative business, social impact & community engagement.

Deoxidized is a global oasis on playa that hosts happy hours, a soul series, and endless opportunities for diverse connections with people from around the world.

dEOxidized Camp is about creating community no matter where you are – even on the far reaches of the playa. Our camp is comprised hard working, loving, global influencers. Together, we will co-create an unforgettable experience with our community of friends old and new. Come join us every day in the Deoxidized Oasis, our lounge-type chill space featuring a 60′ parachute shade structure, an open bar, live DJs, informative and vulnerable talks, breath work, yoga, and much more. We'll be hosting talks and classes in the mornings and daily happy hours from 4PM to sunset. Come meet our international crew from across the U.S. and more than a half dozen other countries. We are a diverse group of Burners with much to share and look forward to meeting you! "

Inflatable Wildlife is the premiere destination for all indigenous inflatables of the playa. With a menagerie of inflatable wildlife, steady stream of danceable beats and wild and wondrous interaction helping to magnify the natural syncopated basslines which undulate through us all, we will be serving signature cocktails during an array of events throughout the week, including a chance to meet your mate at our now renowned Not Awkward Speed Dating, Daily Spirits Tastings, Inflatable Goat Yoga, Playa Jewelry Making, our signature, 6th annual Sunrise Pre-Game Party and more.

At its heart, disco is not simply a musical style or an aesthetic: it was and is a cultural movement for outsiders, misfits, and lateral-thinkers, both inflatable and un-. We will be serving signature cocktails during an array of events throughout the week, including our renowned UnBirthday Party, a chance to meet your mate at Not Awkward Speed Dating, Inflatable Wildlife Whisky Safari where guests will get to try their hand guessing from many varied whiskies from around the world, All-Day Bocce and and Sunrise of the Machines Pre-Game Party.

Burning Sensation is a sensory immersion camp designed to disrupt routine perception and ignite presence through bold, interactive experiences. From fiery flavors to somatic rituals, we awaken participants to the immediacy of the moment. 

At Fire Bar, guests are invited to sample gourmet hot sauces that challenge their resolve, while washing the heat down with bracing fireball cocktails. Rooted in inclusivity, we center BIPOC and LGBTQIA+ voices and bodies at our bi-weekly Playa Vybz party - while creating a space where all are invited to feel, engage, and burn brightly. At night, our camp bridges ancestral practices and modern culture with rapé and sananga ceremonies. 

Come experience hearts, tongues and souls on fire at Burning Sensation!

We are a fun daytime camp, offering two main activities, 1. overhead water misters, accessible all week from dawn to dusk, assisted by a camp member, or self-service, and, 2. a DIY Essential Oil body spray activity daily from noon to 3 p.m. Monday to Saturday, or until our daily allocation of bottles runs out.  We have 26 different essential oils to choose from and will show you how to mix base, medium and top notes to create your own fragrance. Our oils are therapeutic grade.  Give your senses a spa treatment!

Misters & Sisters offers a custom-curated Blend-Your-Own Essential Oil body spray experience. Choose from a selection of 26 essential oil ingredients (all of which have holistic health benefits), and make your very own one-of-a-kind 2-ounce spray bottle.  Also, cool off under our overhead water misters, brand yourself with a temporary tattoo, put some ties and ribbons in your hair (or wherever), participate in camp games such as Corn Hole Toss and Twister, and enjoy our shade and refreshments.  We are an oasis to the wandering spirit.

Home of the world famous Orgy Dome – where couples & moresomes of all orientations are invited to come and play. We welcome the combination of love in all forms.

We're a sex-positive, inclusionary, and exploratory space that's been a place of fire, fun, and passion since 2003.

Everyone wishing to enter the Orgy Dome receives a detailed orientation covering Informed Enthusiastic Consent. Remember, anything other than an enthusiastic YES means NO!

Our (relatively) dust free and air conditioned space is designed for people to experience social sexuality in a safe and respectful way. We have a 'Just Us' and an 'Open to More' section – so monogamous & non-monogamous folks are all welcome.

Everyone wishing to enter the Orgy Dome receives a detailed orientation covering Informed Enthusiastic Consent. Remember, anything other than an enthusiastic YES means NO!

Our (relatively) dust free and air conditioned space is designed for people to experience social sexuality in a safe and respectful way. We have a 'Just Us' and an 'Open to More' section – so monogamous & non-monogamous folks are all welcome.

And check out our daily workshops on many different sex-positive topics.

ATTOL is a place to love and be loved, and we work together to provide the residents of Black Rock City our world famous, air conditioned Orgy Dome - a safe, consensual, sex-positive, inclusionary and exploratory environment where adult couples and moresomes can play and love. We celebrate life and love in all forms where straight, gay, lesbian, bi, polyamorous and monogamous are enthusiastically welcomed.

...and then there's only LOVE is a place to love and be loved.  Heating up the playa since 2003, we are the place where all couples and moresomes enjoy our air conditioned, dust controlled famous Orgy Dome for unadulterated love and play, meet and flirt in our new and improved Aphrodite's Garden, and attend a classes and workshops on enthusiastic consent, erotic massage and power exchange.  Cum and enjoy the camp where we celebrate love in all its forms.

Are you looking for a place to kick up your dusty boots or maybe somewhere to warm up during the cold night? At Mutant Ninja Burners when you cross our sewer rat picket fence you're one of us! Make a headband, dance and groove to some wubs. Warm yourself by the fire pits. You'll be rewarded with friendship, acceptance and a hot slice of pizza if you come by during one of our wubby, dubby pizza parties. Cowabunga!

Barbie Death Village is a delight to the eyes and the mind. Our camp features the Infamous Barbie Art - 1500 Barbies marching into a giant EZ-Bake Oven (Time set at 4:20, Temp on hi. Getting baked!). Barbie's street fronts are full of a range of interactivity! Swim up to our Barbie Swim Up Bar for a drink, enjoy our artistic Barbie-based silliness, stay for one of our many events which range from Pewter Casting, Liquid Light Show, Midnight Toast, Morning Mimosas (Sat), and so much more. Keep an eye out for and take a ride on our beloved Mutant Vehicle: The Barbie Whorehouse (It is not just a Whorehouse, it is a Whore Home.)

Keep an eye out for and take a ride on our beloved Mutant Vehicle: The Barbie Whorehouse (It is not just a Whorehouse, it is a Whore Home.)

Barbie Death Village is better than ever! Join us for some of the best events on the Playa: Midnight Toast, Pewter Casting, , the Naked Bike Ride & Pub Crawl, Critical Tits Body Painting, and much more!  Take a ride on Barbie's Whore House (It is not just a Whore House, It is a Whore Home)! Come and sit awhile in the shade of our main area and partake from our NEW Barbie Swim Up Bar! And, of course, where else on the Playa (or in the world) are you going to see 1,700+ dusty Barbies getting baked in a giant EZ Bake Oven?

2022 will be the 21st year for Barbie Death Village on the Playa! Join us for some of the best events on the Playa: Chili Cookoff, Taco Feed, the Naked Bike Ride & Pub Crawl, Critical Tits Body Painting, and much more! Hungary in the middle of the night? Join us for Midnight Lumpia! Come and sit awhile in the shade of our main area. And, of course, where else on the Playa are you going to see 1,600+ dusty Barbies marching to their deaths?

Now in their 20th year on the playa, Barbie Death Village (a wholly-owned subsidiary of Barbie Death Camp & Wine Bistro) makes another return.  Join the sickest bastards on the playa for wine, our piano bar, Fizzball, body painting, pewter necklace making, and all-around debauchery.  Enjoy a cheap glass of Barbie Barbera, join in the Naked Bike Ride & Pub Crawl, or get your torso painted for Critical Tits.  A splendid time is guaranteed for all.  Warning:  if weirdness or nudity offends you, please stay away.

Now in their 19th year, the sickest bastards on the playa are again making their presence felt.  Yes, the demented denizens of Barbie Death Village--complete with piano bar and wine bistro--are back to amaze and offend even the most jaded of burners.  Join us for a glass of Barbie burgundy, relax in the shade, or step up to the plate for Fizzball.  At Barbie Death Village, we know how to make you party.  And don't miss our exciting sub-camps, including (but not limited to): Black Rock City Body & Paint, Barbie Day Spa, Barbie Death Camp & Wine Bistro, Hookers & Makers, 13th Barbie, Clan O'Crash, Pizza Cats, and Rocket Pad.

Come by and meet up once again with the sickest bastards on the playa: yes the demented denizens of Barbie Death Village--complete with piano bar and wine bistro--are back for our 18th year to amaze and offend even the most jaded of burners.  Join us for a glass of Barbie burgundy, relax in the shade, or step up to the plate for fizzball.  At Barbie Death Village, we know how to make you party.
www.barbiedeathcamp.com

Barbie Death Village is back for its fifth year on the playa with its subcamps of BDC&WB,  Barbie Day Spa, Dye With Dignity, Cantina Vida, Meercats, and Dread Pirate Barbie all ready and willing to offend even the most seasoned burner.  Drop by for a glass of Barbie barbera or an Otter Pop and see what the buzz is all about; no doubt, the Barbiebarians are the sickest bastards on the playa and we love them for it!

Back again for another triumphant year on the playa, Barbie Death Village and it’s subcamps (Barbie Death Camp & Wine Bistro, Barbie Day Spa, Barbie Boutique, Dye With Dignity, Dread Pirate Barbie, Black Rock City Body & Paint, Clan O’Crash, Meercats, Ohio Boyz, and Loose Nutz) will be there to welcome all burners.  Feel free to drop on by for a nice glass of wine or Otter Pop and get a load of the sickest bastards on the playa.

Now in our glorious fifth year on the playa, Barbie Death Village with its infamous sub-camps Barbie Death Camp & Wine Bistro, Barbie’s Day Spa, Eden, BRC Body & Paint, Loose Nutz, Dye With Dignity, Dred Pirate Barbie, The Ohio Boyz, and Clan O’Crash welcome you to the best damn Village on the playa.  Come by and enjoy a nice glass of cabernet sauvignon or Otter Pop while being entertained by the Barbiebarians, the sickest bastards on the playa.

Now in our fourth year on the playa, Barbie Death Village with it’s subcamps Barbie Death Camp & Wine Bistro, Eden, BRC Body & Paint, Loose Nutz, Boosh: The Canadian Splinter Squad, Clan O’Crash, AntiM’s Home For Wayward Art, and Dye With Dignity welcome you to the best damn village on the playa.   Come by and enjoy a nice glass of cabernet savuignon or Otter Pop while being entertained by the Barbiebarians, the sickest bastards on the playa.

Now in our third year on the playa, Barbie Death Village, with it’s well-known subcamps Barbie Death Camp & Wine Bistro, Eden, Black Rock City Body & Paint, Loose Nutz, Preserved In Time, Boosh: The Canadian Splinteer Squad, and Clan O’Crash welcome you to the best damn village on the playa.  Come by and enjoy a nice glass of cabernet sauvignon, an Otter Pop, or nice cocktail while being entertained by the Barbiebarians, the sickest bastards on the playa.

After absorbing Wheee!Ville, Barbie Death Village is back for it’s second year on the playa complete with it’s 8 camps, wine bistros, and international flavor.  Always one of the most popular villages in Black Rock City, come by and be offended by the Barbiebarians, the sickest bastards on the playa.

Barbie Death Village springs forth after absorbing Wheee!Ville and our mission is: Today the playa, tomorrow the world.  Come visit our camps: Barbie’s Death Camp, Barbie’s Wine Bistro, Eden, Preserved In Time, BRC Body & Paint, and Boosh Camp: Canadian Splinter Squad. You may never be able to leave.

The Magic Lantern is a wandering inn, located at the end of all worlds. Sumptuously-appointed with antiques, curiosities, games, and mysterious old books, we are a space created for deeper human connection, and a warm and inviting sanctuary for the weary and curious traveller.

Our centerpiece is our unique Trading Booth, where stories and secrets are the only accepted currency. Anyone can step up to don our shopkeeper's hat—we believe in erasing the boundaries between host and traveller.

Naked Heart is devoted to the full embodiment of the divine feminine. We offer amazing experiential and experimental workshops that allow you to feel your feminine heart, your radiance, your inner goddess. This work requires the masculine as well; Everyone is welcome. 

At Naked Heart we recognize the need to embrace both the light and the dark in our journeys. When we pursue the light we use movement, the senses, sensuality, sexuality and connection. This beckons us in and brings the light of awareness back into the bodies we have vacated. To go there fully requires confronting our shadows. We embrace those as well as we dive into shame, fear, anger, unsavory memories from this life and past lives, and disempowering images of our bodies. Welcome home.

We offer the vibe of belly laughs all day, everyday. Inside our vibrant dome, you'll find a welcoming bar offering boozy cocktails or one of our chilled non-alcoholic options with a boogie music theme. Dome interior games include Yard Yahtzee, Pin the Man on the Ass, Truth or Jenga, Cards Against Humanity, Monolopy, etc. Venture through tunnels connecting smaller domes to our main dome for added adventure. Our playground features an array of interactive games sure to entertain all, from large-scale Connect 4 to Rubber Ring Toss Your Cookies and Shut Your Cornhole. LED Tetherball and hydraulic teeter-totters in What Goes Up Must Come Down add to the carnival-like atmosphere. Laughter is the universal love language of friends.

Dusty Mule Saloon and Playground - Mules, Mimosas, iced tea, playground games, shade and a space for whatever -ation you may have. Come shake you dusty booty with jackasses each day.
Voted Best Beer on the playa 7 years running! Maybe some seltzer as well. Shade. Carpet. Seating. Conversation. Scheduled opening M, W, F 11AM-3PM. Other days hours vary.
Voted Best Beer on the playa 6 years running! Maybe some seltzer or kombucha as well. Shade. Carpet. Seating. Conversation. Scheduled opening M, W, F 11AM-3PM. Other days hours vary.
Just your neighborhood craft beer dive bar. 400 sq. ft of shade and carpet. Four taps of Ice-cold beer of all styles, usually something light, something hoppy, something dark, and something strong.
Do you like beer?  Well, you found the right place!  4 taps of ice cold beer all week, with fun and games.  Stop by and hang out, or fill up to go.
Get ready to Deep Eat with delicious food & pizza and feast your eyes on the Cosmic Bean, while enjoying loungey in-house music.
Get ready to Deep Eat with delicious pizza, complemented with a custom lighting structure and loungey in-house music.

Land of Monkey is a multicultural, international LGBTQ+ camp that welcomes diversity and that promotes human evolution through body (Aguas Frescas, coffee), mind (deep talks on important subjects) and soul (yoga, breath work & meditation). We also have a chill space, our Jungle with pillows and hammocks where citizens of Black Rock City can escape from the sun and relax, listening to uplifting tunes by our resident DJs
At Land of Monkey we believe that we are not yet fully human and must evolve. Learning to listen, to be patient, to understand, to forgive and to be more merciful: these are among the skills we practice in becoming more human.
We evolve by being the best version of ourselves.

Land of Monkey is a multicultural, international LGBTQ+ camp that welcomes diversity and that promotes human evolution through body (ice-cold lemonade, coffee & cocoa), mind (deep talks on important subjects) and soul (yoga, breath work & meditation). 
At Land of Monkey we believe that we are not yet fully human and must evolve. Humanity is a process of becoming, which we all practice throughout our lives. Learning to listen, to be patient, to understand, to forgive and to be more merciful: these are among the skills we practice in becoming more human.
We also evolve through events we share with our fellow Burners. We evolve through openness and arms held wide open to the friends we have not yet met. 
We evolve by being the best version of ourselves.

At Land of Monkey, our ethos is that we are not yet fully human, and must evolve. We invite others to accompany us in this process of becoming, via a series of interactive experiences that empower us to become more human. Every day we serve the best artisanal iced lemonade and chai lattes in BRC - come for the ice drinks, and stay for the deep talks, good company, fun workshops, and yoga sessions. We are a multicultural, international, straight-friendly LGBTQ+ camp that welcomes all who join us in the dust. Swing by for a visit!

We call ourselves monkeys not only to identify members of the camp, but to highlight that we are not yet fully human. Humanity is a process of becoming, one that we all practice throughout our lives. Learning to listen, to be patient, to understand, to forgive and to be more merciful: these are among the skills we practice in becoming more human. 

In 2022, we will be inviting others to join us in this practice through a series of interactive experiences that explore ourselves, our connection to each other, and how the 10 Principles help guide that discovery. By sharing these experiences with the Black Rock Community, we hope it will help all of the monkeys of this city to fulfill their ontological vocation of becoming more fully human.

RAAAWWWWWRRR: We are the Land Of Monkey (formerly Sun Guardians) featuring our temple to Hanuman fostering strength and connection through yoga and meditation practice and more. Join us for our unique experiences! Try our fabulous teas! And enjoy our temple space at your leisure.

Monkey Bar in the Land of Monkey was inspired from music. We offer an amazing tea bar serving boba and milk teas daily! We have fun activities and participation games. This year we come with an art car called: Monkey Car.
We are Sun Guardians; a Hindu themed temple honoring Kali offering yoga, mediation and the best Boba Tea anywhere!!!!

A psuedo Hindu temple honoring Ganesh and Hanuman. Come get your spiritual groove on with Vinyasa, Hatha and amazing Rootist Temple style yoga sessions. Our meditation classes are centering and lifting unlike anything you experienced before. Come and enjoy the shade anytime. This is a Safe Place if you need to escape the sun, the crazy lights or just need a place to collect yourself.
A spiritual temple honoring Hanuman: "House of Tea and Yoga" taking you on a journey of your past, present and future. Your soul is timeless and our space is awesome.

Camp SnoHo is designed to be an inviting sanctuary in the desert. We offer two air conditioned public cooling tents. One for interactivities and one just for cooling off. Serving 12pm - 5pm Monday through Saturday. We also have a self service bike repair station operating Monday through Saturday.
Rainbow Oasis: a calming, relaxing, refreshing Oasis where Burners of every sexual proclivity can pause to connect with one another through karaoke, conversation, and connection workshops

A calming, relaxing, refreshing Oasis where Burners of every sexual proclivity can enjoy a cold drink, a snack, and a deep conversation stoked by intrusive (yet illuminating!) personal question cards.

A calming, relaxing, refreshing Oasis, where Burners of every sexual proclivity can enjoy a cold drink, a snack, and a deep conversation stoked by intrusive (yet illuminating!) personal question cards. Come every afternoon for our daily events, come every morning for stretching and iced coffee!

Hometown: San Francisco

A calming, relaxing, refreshing Oasis, where Burners of every sexual proclivity can enjoy a cold drink, a snack, and a deep conversation stoked by intrusive (yet illuminating!) personal question cards. Come every afternoon for our daily events!
Every shade of the rainbow is welcome to relax at the Rainbow Oasis
RAINBOW OASIS: where every color of the rainbow comes to relax, rewind, and refresh!  Come straight, come gay, we don't care just come thirsty!
RAINBOW OASIS is the outpost of gay culture you've been dreaming of! Come straight, come gay, we don't care just come thirsty!

Art support camp for Honorarium project "Kiosk," an installation using symbols, architecture and energy as a bridge to the future. What we create today will echo in the stories of tomorrow. What will you leave behind? How will your power, wisdom and magic carry on after you are gone?

Are you tired of being gross? We have your important answers, adventurous quests, and can offer the comfort of a gently used mullet. BE LESS GROSS with us. We will conjure supernatural, psychomagical experiences individually designed for you.

We have your important answers, adventurous quests, and can determine your spirit animal. Wear a gently used mullet, ask a wildlife biologist, or spin the alluring action wheel. Most importantly, we are the only camp on playa powered by the spirit of Patrick Swayze who will conjure supernatural, psychomagical experiences individually designed for you.

By day, we provide fun, games, and interactive adventures.
By night, we're a supernatural megachurch conjuring the spirit of Patrick Swayze.

By day, we provide adventures & games in our Fun Booth. 
By night, we're Black Rock City's only theme camp haunted by the ghost of Patrick Swayze.

By day, we provide the fun in our interactive kiosk, The Fun Booth. 
By night, we're Black Rock City's only solar-lit Patrick Swayze Memorial Altar and Life Celebration site.
We're Black Rock City's only solar-lit Patrick Swayze Memorial Altar & Life Celebration site. Don't worry, we have mullets.

By day, we provide the fun in our interactive kiosk, The Fun Booth. 
By night, we’re Black Rock City’s only solar-lit Patrick Swayze Memorial Alter and Life Celebration site.

Ganesh Camp is a lush retreat for dusty desert denizens. Tue-Fri, 1-5, celebrate and beat the heat in the bar (NA offered too) in a large, cool desert tent from India or sit by the hypnotic burn barrel at night! We have discussion groups (e.g. Stoic philosophy) before the bar opens. We have incarnated this small camp since 2003, so we have figured out some infrastructure stuff, including green infrastructure, and are happy to share our knowledge.

Ganesh Camp is a lush retreat for dusty desert denizens. Tue-Fri, 1-5, celebrate and beat the heat in the bar in a large, cool desert tent from India or sit by the hypnotic burn barrel at night! Or play volleyball during the day. We have discussion groups (e.g. Stoic philosophy) before the bar opens. We have incarnated this small camp (30 people) since 2003, so we have figured out some infrastructure stuff, including green infrastructure, and are happy to share our knowledge.

Ganesh Camp is a lush retreat for dusty desert denizens. Tue-Fri, 1-5, celebrate and beat the heat in the bar in a large, cool desert tent from India or sit by the hypnotic burn barrel at night! Or play volleyball during the day. We have discussion groups (e.g. Stoic philosophy, the importance of kindness) or storytelling hour before the bar opens.  We have incarnated this small camp (30 people) since 2003, so we have figured out some infrastructure stuff and are happy to share our knowledge.

Pickled Beats is where sick beats meet salty treats! Join us for two epic 4-hour Pickle Parties, featuring international DJs and signature pickle-based cocktails. 

Grab a chilled pickle from our stand, hit the bar and dance floor, or dive into Human pickle fishing and Pickle blessings. 

Whether you're here to party or pledge your devotion to the pickle, come get pickled!

We are not worthy of the great pickle! We bow down to its immense power and beg for its great healing. WE ARE NOT WORTHY! 

But you can be. Come one, come all, and let the wondrous power of the pickle quench your thirst and ignite your savage soul!

Pickle rejuvenation & sermon service: Mon-Tues & Thurs-Fri from 3-5pm.

An old school vintage tiki and pirate bar.  Deadly tiki potions. A retro future Spaceport. High octane drinks.  Our 2025 Surrealist art expo.  Trippy art. Speakers and more!

In the palms at the end of the runway is a sandbagged hideaway run by misfits stocked with Shanghaied liquor and torpedo juice.   Come visit the best damn tiki lounge you'll ever find on or off playa.  Beware of cannibals!

Step into a mysterious lost world at the Shipwreck Tiki Lounge! Enjoy alluring music while sipping exotic libations. But beware of cannibals!

While working passage on a Norwegian steamer we picked up a castaway from the water, he'd been drifting for weeks way west of Sumatra, a thousand miles outside the shipping lanes his ship had run aground on on a uncharted island hidden in deep fog.  They said there's nothing out there but back then there were many blank spaces on the map, a place thought only to exist in myth until now...

Hidden in the palms behind the ack ack gun at the end of the runway is a sandbagged hideaway run by misfits, stocked with shanghaied liquor and torpedo juice. Air raids and shore patrol be damned, we're still alive so tonight we're gonna party like its 1945. Merry Christmas Tulagi 1945!

The scattered remains of a vintage sailboat beached upon the rocks of a forbidden isle. Join the castaways for afternoon grog, flaming rum drinks, and the spectacle of classic tiki culture at their exotic driftwood bar of handmade idols, gods, and flaming totems. Beware of cannibals!

Welcome to Never Never Camp - a magical land of sunset weddings, disco laser caves, and bottom-shelf drinks with top-shelf entertainment. Find our Second Bar to the Right for daily happy hours (ask about our exclusive Birgin special!), come see the view of the playa from our rooftop platform, get married at sunset in our wedding chapel, or dance the night away in our laser-filled disco cave. None of this sounds appealing? Come by anyway, hijack our sound system or bar, and make it your own - we're always ready to get weird.

The place between sleep and awake. Home of the Second Bar to the Right and Wedding Chapel. Interested in getting married at Burning Man? Visit nevernevercamp.com and submit an application to have us help marry you at Black Rock City.

""You know that place between sleep and awake, that place where you still remember dreaming? That's where I'll always love you, Peter Pan. That's where I'll be waiting."

Never Never Camp is a radically inclusive, radically irreverent, and joyously unabashed group of misfits and discards who just wanted a place to fit in. A place they can call home. A place where for once in their goddamn lives feel like they didn't miss the party.
Remember the place between sleep and awake, that place where you still remember dreaming? That's where we'll Never Never Camp.

Caught red-handed by your bodily functions? We've got your back! Stop by our elegant Victorian period lounge for period-themed drinks, and precious period supplies while enjoying fun live events. Got dust in curious places? We'll help you freshen up sustainably. Need extra care? Our cozy Red(handed) Tent offers specialized support when you're bleeding or just having a tough day. Oh, and we've got pee funnels — because nothing feels quite as empowering as peeing standing up like a boss. Come sip, vent, and refresh with us at Redhanded!

We have precious supplies that will help with your period and personal hygiene before and after playtime. We have funnels that will make your dream of peeing in a porto without opening the lid come true. Come to Redhanded if you're caught red-handed by your bodily functions!

You can visit us at sunset for our scheduled activities or swing by at any other time to make our stage yours.

We are dedicated to the betterment of the greater community through interpersonal interactions, compassionate education, and supportive patience while embracing and uplifting creativity, authenticity, and diversity. We strive to provide a safe, supporting, and caring environment for rejuvenation and connection to encourage self care, self-expression, and community support.

We plan on bringing out our best "Mom-itudes" to be some of the most delightful caretakers around. We know how non-stop the party can be in the staff camps, and how much a little time away can make a big difference. We strive to offer a relaxing retreat for staff, volunteers, theme camp and art project leads and workers to get a little time away to clear their heads and center themselves. Haven't had a decent meal or are sick of commissary? We just might happen to have a pot of soup going for our upcoming meal which we're more than happy to share, or one of our Moms might be in the mood to whip up a grilled cheese just for you! Need some body-work after a long day or a bedtime story to help you settle into the night, we've got a Mom for that!
A Playa Home Companion is the place you didn't know you've been looking for.  Rest your boots, share a story, come back sometime!

A Playa Home Companion camp is a welcoming camp, full of burners from all over California. We are focused on being informative and educational about the Burning Man Principles, and emphasize the importance of volunteerism. Our camp provides a small stage in a shaded, lounge like atmosphere to host live talks and trainings on playa, karoke, live comedy, and even podcast recordings! We also provide a bar for those suffering from stage fright. Stop by for some learning and a lot of laughs!

A Playa Home Companion's mission is to offer the weary burner a chance to go back to a simpler time, and enjoy the subtle sounds of radio shows long forgotten, all while sipping on an old fashioned, and cozying up with a classic novel.

Stay for the vibes, vines, and vivacious community!

A sanctuary where the spirit of community, self-expression, and well-being converge. Our vibrant, shaded oasis offers a diverse array of experiences, from drum circles under starlit skies to sunrise yoga sessions, fireside mezcal nights and even late night volleyball (it's lit)!  With a dedication to Radical Inclusion, we welcome all seekers to our haven of pillows, rugs, and couches, where connections are forged, creativity flourishes, and transformative journeys unfold.

Come join us on the MESA! We offer a diverse range of events that promote self-expression, creativity, and community. Whether you're into yoga, drum circles, meditation or Oaxaca's finest Mezcals, we have something for everyone. Our welcoming and inclusive atmosphere is the perfect place to connect with others and explore all that Burning Man has to offer. So come on over, hang out with us, and let's make some unforgettable memories together!

Climb up the steps of MESA to sit atop and see the world beyond.  Our space is designed to enable a journey of self discovery and inner enlightenment.  Bring your tribe and join us for a drum circle or meditation circle, either way the mezcal and laughs abound.  If you're looking to dive in deep, we will also be hosting temazcal ceremonies in our yurt.

Get ready to share your ideas and sculpt the future. Arx is an ancient Latin word for the Citadel in Rome. At the new and improved Arx, we believe everyone's voice matters, and we'd like to hear what you have to say about things that are important to you. Whether that's global warming or what you had for breakfast, Arx is your forum to share big ideas. Join us for a drink or two at our Spirited Discussions!

Fort U is an adventure! U never know what you might learn. Come conversate with philosophers and scholars from around the world while learning valuable lessons from our experienced staff and hell, maybe teach them a lesson or two because after all, without U, we're just a stupid fort.

RhythmWave brings Conscious Dance to the Playa, along with yoga and other movement practices. 5Rhythms, Open Floor, Soul Motion and others. We offer a space to figure out what is going on inside you and to move through it. Not just a place to show off your latest dance moves. Our offerings are made on a sprung bamboo wood floor beneath a shade structure, and are offered several times daily.

RhythmWave brings conscious dance and dance meditation to the Playa. Inspired by the teachings of the late Gabrielle Roth and the 5Rhythms movement meditation practice, our camp offers meaningful, inclusive, and ecstatic experience of individual bodies moving within community. Our offerings are made on a sprung beautiful bamboo wood floor beneath a shade structure, and are offered several times daily.

RhythmWave is tremendously grateful to return to Black Rock City in 2019, for our 13th consecutive year at Burning Man!

Facilitators from around the world offer multiple daily sessions of Conscious Dance, movement, and meditation on our fully shaded and easily-accessible 2,500 sq.ft. bamboo dance floor. With no experience necessary and no "steps" to learn, Conscious Dance offers a pathl the destination is the discovery of ourselves and a return to our center.

ALL are welcome and invited to join us. Come bless the bamboo at RhythmWave!

Art Car Camp is a celebration of Art Cars founded in 1994 by Harrod Blank.  In addition to art cars parked in front, there is a  photo exhibit of the history and with the DMV located nearby it helps to demonstrate the difference between art cars and mutant vehicles.  Come see for yourself.

Art Car Camp at Burning Man was started in 1994 by art car creator, documentarian and promoter, Harrod Blank. As the Burning Man Festival has grown, art vehicles have become more elaborate and fantastical (now known as "Mutant Vehicles"). Many of the original "art cars" that once roamed the playa freely can no longer get licensed by the Black Rock DMV. Art Car Camp celebrates these street legal, permanently altered "daily drivers".  Come and see the origin point of Art Cars at Black Rock City!

Art Car Camp is where “Daily Driver” licensed and insured full time art cars are displayed. These are vehicles that work their magic all year round, in the communities they hail from. Come see the M-Used Car Lot and meet the artists! Also showing films.

2014 is Art Car Camp’s 20th year and we’ll be celebrating this milestone with a funky used car lot display. We’ll be exhibiting both daily drivers (permanently altered, street legal vehicles) and mutants. Art Car Camp is where “Daily Driver” licensed and insured full time art cars are displayed. These are vehicles that work their magic back in the communities from where they hail from all year round. Come see the collection and meet the artists!  Also showing films.

Art Car Camp features “Daily Driver” Art Cars that are street legal, insured, and registered vehicles that work their magic beyond Burning Man wherever they go. Come see some of the vehicles that first inspired the proliferation of Mutant Vehicles at Burning Man!Hometown: Douglas, AZ

This is a camp that features bonafide Art Cars that are licensed and insured and function outside of Burning Man in every day society.  This year the Telephone Car by Howard Davis will be heading the camp making its first appearance in the history of Burning Man.
A camp for “Daily Driver” art cars, which are street legal and licensed – considered on the fringe in the real world but celebrated, almost worshipped at Burning Man.

A line up of awesome art cars from all across the country in a parking lot line up Burning Man style. Deemed weird and wacky at home, but celebrated here, these art cars are modified permanently and are driven on a daily basis in the communities from which they hail.

We are an artsy international dive bar of friendly folks and stiff drinks under the circus bigtop of cascading parachutes. You can jump on trampolines under the stars or sun, paint, stroll through art work, belly up to the bar, listen to canned music from show tunes to punk, watch live original music and varied performances, or climb the intellectual ladder of conversation.  Just depends on the night, and the people participating, but always a dependably great time.

Come drink at our circular bar! Bounce on the finest trampolines in the history of humanity! Campoline is more fun than a barrel full of monkeys on a roller coaster. We has music! If you can walk, you can dance, so get in here! No? How about art? Everybody loves art! Come into the art tent and get creative. Come one, come all, and get radically Campolined!

One of the unsung wonders of the world! Come drink at our circular bar! Bounce on the finest trampolines in history! We have music, too. You, you there! You can dance! If you can walk, you can dance. No? How about art? Everybody loves art! Come into the art tent and get creative. We has paints of all colors! Oil, tempera, watercolors! Pastels, mattes, shiny things! We have surfaces of all shapes and sizes, all makes and models. Even a graffiti bus! Weary of walking? Come rest in the shady comfort of our seven-ring tent! Come one, come all! Enjoy Campoline!

An eclectic mix of tasteful music delights your ears and shakes your booty as you enjoy one of our special, highly caffeinated cocktails. Try the Liquid Crack! Youll be glad you did. And then go bounce on the trampoline! Or sample our games of skill and chance. Hey! I know! Have another drink! With bacon! Youre welcome.

A sultry crowd from 3 continents!

* Get your hair braided with colorful extensions at the start of the week.
* Enjoy a sultry breakfast mid-week.
* Jewelry making facilities.
* Everybody's Birthday Party. It's for you – after all, you are born someday too!

And every night: A stunning Interactive UV-active Art exhibition.
Come for the art and enjoy the sultry company!

Enter our sanctuary and escape the scorching midday sun!

During the first half of the week allow us to untangle your tresses and braid them into intricate patterns that will turn heads. Feast on a delicious breakfast. And while you are here, relish the playful art of plastic jewelry-making.
Pass by later in the week for Everybody's Birthday Party. It's for you – after all, you are born someday too!
Leave feeling refreshed, empowered, and tantalized, intrigued by the possibilities that await you...

And when the sun sets - return. Join the Sultry Lodge on a journey into the realms of unbridled sensuality, where you can lose yourself in a world of seductive pleasures and uninhibited desire.
A community of wanderers, dreamers, healers, artists and storytellers around the world. sharing friendship as the only currency.

Maxa Village 

Where the Wixárika Legend of the Blue Deer---he who leads the chosen on visionary pathways to tuning their gifts & gaining unique knowledge-- comes to life in the dust of the Black Rock desert. A space where burners are welcomed to come immerse themselves in the camps that bring our village to life dedicated to Sustainability, Tech & Art, Gastronomy, Healing & Transformation and of course Music!

Maxa Camp is centered on the promotion of unity and recognition of past cultures and ancestral heritage. Our camp will be a representation of the deeply rooted, ancient beliefs of the Mexican and Huichol communities combined with the contemporary views of a community of our own.

Maxa Camp is centered on the promotion of unity and recognition of past cultures and ancestral heritage. Our camp will be a representation of the deeply rooted, ancient beliefs of the Mexican and Huichol communities combined with the contemporary views of a community of our own.

Maxa Camp was formed by using elements and beliefs of the Huichol Culture and complementing them with contemporary views and grooves (& Mezcal). We promote spreading good vibes and the main objective of our mystical mutant vehicle, the Blue Deer, will be to guide you to fun and new experiences, as the Huichol Maxa guides it’s followers to new and higher perspectives.
CLASSY 5 star no frills lounge experience with bowling, if the bar doesn't get burnt. We do SAKE

Luxury estates for your mannequin children. We have plenty to drink. Come participate and try your hand at animal husbandry while spectating our fish friendly taxidermy and bowling.

Come enjoy live music and a cold Sake all day everyday! From 11am-sunset, and Thursday and Friday night as well!
Looking for the coldest, most refreshing sake on the playa? Well, look no further than Sakenoma, Black Rock City’s original sake bar!  Adults only, please.  Kanpai!

Sakenoma: Bringing new meaning to the oldest adult beverage on Earth. Serving cold sake during the hottest part of the day. Please come visit our sake-bar and enjoy this ancient beverage with us. Our camp offers a safe and inclusive environment for individuals wishing to participate in naturism. The space is fully enclosed, shielding participants from cell phones, cameras, and onlookers in the city. Inside, you will find a communal gathering area, with games, music, and a daily cocktail hour. We provide a friendly, non-sexualized setting for anyone wishing to experience nude recreation.

Equilibrium has been established as a destination to represent the pinnacle for the collective first world culture in which we live: vacation. Adhering to a strict belief that our shared time together should be one of joy and relaxation, we seek to strike the all too difficult balance of hard work and play.
It is here that we have constructed a series of spaces and activities to ensure that all who step through our threshold experience the relaxation, camaraderie, and playfulness that we all deserve outside the hectic worlds of which we live the other 51 weeks of the year. "Because it's vacation for fucks sake."

The Center for Corn Bong Equilibrium, a Wuice Co-Op...Yeah Baby (EQ for short), represents the pinnacle in Radical Ritual for the collective first world culture in which we live: vacation. Adhering to a strict belief that our shared time together should be one of joy and relaxation, we seek to strike the all too difficult balance of hard work and play. We are an established camp designed around the confluence of radical inactivity and community support, of which we've coined as "the camp that does nothing, but has everything." It is in this space of in-between action and inaction we are expressing our confidence in the rituals we have set up to ensure that our camp and the community at large experiences the place of relaxation that we all deserve in this place outside the hectic worlds of which we live the other 51 weeks of the year.

All week Camp Equilibrium invites you to come over, hangout, play some cornhole, throw some bones, and just chillax. Ask Matt to help you setup your tent.
Join us Sunday morning 9/3 @ 10 am for our Annual Sunday Funday Mimosa MOOP March.. yup, it's mimosas and MOOPing while treking out to the remnants of the Man
A collective of creators on a mission to realize conceptual visual art and cultivate energy around it. Our passion is to create bold, interactive, innovative, and novel experiences.

Strange Design is a collective and art support camp formed to provide a platform for creators to realize conceptual visual art and cultivate sonic energy around it. The team coalesced while creating The Man's Army in 2019. Our goal is to continue to create bold, interactive, innovative, and strange experiences.

Over are the days of having to haul your ass all the way out to the trash fence to enjoy the deep open playa! Now for the first time ever experience the joys and wonders of deep playa from the comfort of the city!

We operate one of the few "you call 'em, free-pour" entertainment venues on the playa: The Rubber Spur.  Contact us to hold an event, teach a workshop, learn how to run a theme camp, a world-class playa camp kitchen, learn how to operate an art car project!    Rancho Sparkle Pony is your home away from home at Playa BRC!

Find your stage at our venue, The Rubber Spur.  Contact us to hold an event, teach a workshop, learn how to run a theme camp, a world-class playa camp kitchen, learn how to operate an art car project!    Rancho Sparkle Pony is your home away from home at Playa BRC!

Rancho Sparkle Pony, your home away from home away from home, while you are home. Come belly up to The Rubber Spur for hilarious drinks and strong characters, or get vain and prance on the Mane Stage to the tunes coming from the Buddha Lounge. Take a flow class, or learn to blow glass. Just don't blow ass on our property, save that for the Portos.
10 Years in!  The best honky-tonk on the Rainbow Family Side of BRC.  Come join us and discover your gift to the playa.

Come venerate your Sparkle Pony-ass with us!  Stop by for shade, suds, and some sounds; learn a thing or two from three or four of our incredible performers!  The Rubber Spur will be open most of the time--it's a high dive bar where we have no rubbers and no spurs--Our bartenders aren't snarky, they are just honest.  Lithic Alters and their "Mary Affair" will offer daily morning sermons accompanied with Bloody Marys.  New for 2019, the revamped Buddha Lounge will maximize your relaxation and invigorate your inspiration.  This is also a green room for performance artists to prepare their act before going on the Main Stage.

Rancho Sparkle Pony and the world-famous Buddha Lounge return to serve and protect the errant sparkle ponies of the playa.  A bevy of true grit interactivity, we are bigger and better than we have ever been.  Stop by to fill your cup, shake your ass, and kick-start our robot.  We love you Burning Man!

Rancho Sparkle Pony and the Buddha Lounge are a sanctuary for the care of the all so vulnerable and so often exploited sparkle ponies of the world.  At RSP wranglers and ponies alike engage in numerous healthy and fulfilling activities with a focus on improving confidence, esteem and self-reliance.

The Spirit and Mission of the Wranglers at Rancho Sparkle Pony has been to redeem the vulnerable Sparkle Pony by celebrating her (or his) Beauty and Grace.  At the end of the day, there is a little sparkle pony in us all;  we encourage people to tap into that inner-beauty and discover how to make it shine on the outside.

Rancho Sparkle Pony: Rodeo of Fire.  A place to celebrate your inner Sparkle Pony.  We don't care how hard you've worked today, just come and be beautiful!  We've got refreshments, a cool place to take a break, and good music to keep you from sitting on your ass too long.  Check out our art cars, when they're in the chute.  And learn a thing or two from our wranglers and fire performers.

Total white trash movie nights; complete with our best white sheet hanging for a screen. BYOLC (Bring Your Own Lawn Chair) or blanket. What will be showing? WHO KNOWS? Maybe it's a musical night? Maybe it's a black and white version of Creature from the Black Lagoon? Maybe its cartoons! We make no promises. All we promise is that it's an outdoor community movie screening at its best! If the alcohol kicks in, we may even pass around a microphone and do a BMST3K! Come join us!

Hostel offers a safe place for consenting couples to have intimate relations for up to one hour(ish), as long as they don't mind the other couples on the other beds, (it's an open floor plan)
Hostel offers a safe place for consenting couples to have intimate relations for up to one hour(ish), as long as they don't mind the other couples on the other beds.

Like a Hostel; we offer multiple beds in an open floor plan.
Unlike a Hostel; these beds are free and NOT for sleeping. 
 They are for your use, for one hour, for you and a consenting partner to show intimacy towards each other.  (As long as you don't mind the couples on the other beds)

Come in to the lobby for check-in.  After approval for entry is granted, you'll enter Hostel through a rotating tube (darkroom door).   Exit the same way you came in when you're done.

Open 6pm-2am-ish  (Although after-hours might work too)

Note:  Hostel is for participants only.  Respect for the other participants is a must.  No single voyeurs allowed inside.

Morning community dance followed by small, intimate heart-share pods? Incredible afternoon expansive workshops? Sunset rituals? Fire art? Fire DANCE?!? Nightly temple celebrations of intimacy and joy? Yes, yes, yes, yes, yes. 

Start with our Cafe on the Edge, where you can look forward into the mystery and consider what you're going to leave behind. Take the leap into our Dark Temple, where you can plug into the void and remember what all-is-love really feels and looks like and how to bring that heaven to the heart of the playa - you!

We facilitate full integration of the dark and light, feminine and masculine, upper and lower chakras through a physical and energetic temple that we build on playa.  We offer rituals, programs and events from the temple that support and celebrate that integration.  Our focus is to create an impeccable, inclusive, and diverse energetic camp container that supports doing these things in a sacred manner using shamanic and tantric practices led by accomplished practitioners.
Get pampered at Barbie Day Spa: Fingernail painting, foot soaks, foot massage, body wash, erotic massage, cold drinks.

Come to the SPA!  Fingernail painting, vinegar foot baths, body wash, massage, refreshing drinks, and relaxing chill space.  Get pampered on the playa.

Get PAMPERED on the Playa.  We offer fingernail polish, vinegar foot soaks, foot massage, and sponge body washes.  Have a glass of wine while you relax under our shade.  Spin the wheel to get a sexy, naughty challenge.

This will be our 10th year of pampering on the playa.  Stop by to relax, meet some new friends, enjoy a glass of wine, soak your feet in cool vinegar water, paint your nails, and maybe get a wonderful body wash or massage.  The fingernail painting and foot wash stations are open 24/7.  Main spa is typically open 10am-4pm daily.  Located within Barbie Death Village.
Barbie Day Spa...pampering on the playa since 2010.  Fingernail painting, foot wash, foot massage, full body massage, body wash, and wine.  Part of Barbie Death Village.

Barbie Day Spa:  Get pampered at the best Day Spa on the playa; now in our fourth year!!  Fingernail painting, foot washing, foot or full body massage, body washes, wine, and friendly conversation.  Next door to Barbie Death Camp.

Have angst against another fellow robot? Come duke it out at the one and only Black Rock Em' Sock Em'!

From the academy-award winning studio and imagineers renowned for bringing participants TEN YEARS of well-known adventures like GIRAFFIC PARK, GIRAFFIC WORLD, AER JIRAFFA, ROYAL GIRAFFIC CRUISELINES and the astounding trilogy of UNION GIRAFFIC RAILWAYS PART(s) I & II comes an all-new cinematic masterpiece: GIRAFFELOT.

This dusty time-bending magical adventure promises to be the best renaissance-fair-dungeons-and-dragons-arthurian-legend-themed-camp-adventure of the summer.

Who says trainwrecks are inherently bad? Come to Union Giraffic 2: Train Wreck and experience the finest waterholes a crash site can offer. Take in panoramic views of the playa from our climbable gym, sue a friend (on an enemy) at our in our Westward courtrooms and enjoy a dusty dance party at our favorite watering hole the Long Neck Saloon. Anyone with boots and a thick layer of dust welcome. Union Giraffic Railways keeps 'em rolling!

Venture into the wild unknown with Union Giraffic Railways, the finest in the stationary dust to dust transportation. Open a can of beans over our cozy fire, get your daily dose of TENSION in our high noon standoffs, or squint into the sunset + plan your next move across the playa from our Sky High Lookout. Anyone with boots and a thick layer of dust welcome. Union Giraffic Railways keeps 'em rolling!

Come set sail with Giraffic Cruiselines. Sample from our fine craft beers in the afternoon or keep warm by our roaring fire at night. Enjoy mimosas while watching sunrise or sunset from our large communal crow's nest high over the playa, or just stop by to say hi. Don't worry, we don't bite.

Come by Aer Jiraffa and play on our 20' climbing gym day and night, with tree house suspended 15' in the air, some swings on the bottom--an amazing place to catch the sunrise or sunset. Come by and grab a drink at our craft beer bar or sit by the fire at night, or just come hang out; we're pretty nice.

Come by Giraffic World and play on our 20' steel cube day and night, with tree house suspended 15' in the air, some swings on the bottom--an amazing place to catch the sunrise or sunset. Come by and grab a drink at our craft beer bar or sit by the fire at night, or just come hang out; we're pretty nice.

On an island unbeknownst to the world of man.....GIRAFFIC PARK. lounge 15ft in the air suspended in the midst of our Giraffic Gym, or swing and frolic in the shade. Who knows what lurks behind the next bend, but assuage your fears while sipping a craft beer. Warm yourself at our fire and keep the shadows at bay giiiiiraaaaafffiiiic paaaaaaark!!!! (21 and up at the bar)

Giraffe Family is back this year with our Savannah Gym, a 20' steel cube for free climbing day and night, a cuddle puddle net suspended 15' in the air, and a misting system beneath it to cool off. Come by and grab a drink at our craft beer watering hole to quench your thirst in the loftiest way possible.

Welcome to The Virgin Barry's.  We are camp founded by a community that met through fitness.  We are delighted to bring the gift of fitness to The Playa.  Come join us to get your fitness on at Burning Man.
Say YES to MORE! More love, more dancing, more awkward interactions. We're here for a good time, not a long time. Come say YES to being MORE in the moment.

A space to be weird, a place to be uniquely yourself. Our merry band of misfits hopes you'll come tear up our dusty afternoon dance floor with us.

Give your butt rash a break or hop off that art car for a change in melody and come join our oasis in the desert. At Between a Rock and a Weird Place we have a daytime lounge and beverage counter open daily for all the lushes that wander by! Please bring your ID and enjoy great jams, drinks, scaffolding, and scantily clad sparkle ponies.

BetWeeN A RocK aNd a WeiRd PlaCe is exactly were you'll find yourself when you come to rest your dusty souls at our home.  Enjoy our entertaining residence, tasty bar treats, comfy lounge area, delectable tunes, and daily activities when you visit us!

We are an immersive cafe experience where each cup of coffee or tea is lovingly made. Take a break from the playa and enjoy the ritual of sipping coffee or tea from a handmade cup under our airy shade structure. Stroll around to check out our art, play board games, or socialize and make new friends. We happily serve cold brew and French press as well as a wide array of teas from around the world including classic and herbal varieties, not to mention hand-crafted sodas.

At Birthday Camp, every day is a reason to celebrate. We throw daily birthday parties open to all, complete with cake, party hats, games, and surprise presents. Whether it's your actual birthday or you just want to feel seen and appreciated, you're invited to join the fun. Our camp is a playful, welcoming space designed to spark joy, connection, and a sense of belonging. Come celebrate yourself and others—because on the playa, everyone deserves a birthday party.
Is your birthday during the event? Come celebrate in Birthday Camp!

We're a community of creatives and applied technologists who are harnessing the power of solar energy to fuel our festivities. SOLARPUNKS is an exploration into what society could look like if humanity learns to wield technology to live equitably with our environment and with each other. 

We're here to offer a renewable energy alternative to Hell Station called SOLAR STATION, which will provide free clean electrons to BRC citizens. This is a utility-scale offering that we hope can inspire and meaningfully contribute to decarbonization efforts both on and off playa.

We're a community of creatives and applied technologists who are harnessing the power of renewable energy to fuel our festivities. SOLARPUNKS is an exploration into what society will look like when humanity learns to wield technology to create in harmony with nature—rather than destroy it. 

We're constructing a decentralized grid of batteries and inverters to be supplied by solar PV arrays to power our camp functions. With renewable energy surpassing the cost efficiencies of fossil fuel, we're excited to energize systems-level solutions to and for fellow burners.

Inspired by our many years of participation in Burning Man, we're here to prototype and prove the viability of renewable-energy based solutions that can be expediently deployed at scale, to contribute to 2030 Sustainability Goals.

We are all inclusive Camp that provides the Citizens of Black Rock City with a fun and interesting place to stop by for a Drink at our No Drama Bar.  We host many daily events under our large shade structure. Nightly DJ's play music for those stopping by on their way around the Playa.  Enjoy our fun oversized Bar Games, while you sip some of the best drinks to be found.  There is always something happening that you don't want to miss at No Drama Camp and Bar.

Our theme camp's purpose is to serve the citizens of Black Rock City with libations, frolic, and friendship in the No Drama Bar. No one likes Drama, and our Bar is the place for No Drama. Under our large shade structure, we host a variety of events and celebrations.  Stop by for a drink and stay for the fun and friendship. Our campers come from near and far away places. We are part of Silicon Village which is made of 8 theme camps. Our Village provides power to all our camps.  Our campers enjoy a Camp Kitchen, Camp Showers, Porto's and many other shared infrastructure items.

No Drama Camp & Bar:  Our pleasure to bring daily events to Black Rock City under our large shade structure. During the day we hold events like Yoga & Mindfulness classes & get more serious with talks about Intersectional Feminism, Gender, and Sexualities.  We move onto light hearted and fun events like our Moonbeams Wine & Body Paint event, where we invite the residents of Black Rock City to join as Artist or human Canvas's.  We also schedule food events sometime during the week hosted by our international campers. Evenings we open our Bar with party style atmosphere & guest DJs, all music genres - 4pm-12am. Our camp is a destination for everyone to enjoy & participate.  We encourage anyone stopping by to have a good time & remember "If they bring any Drama they will earn the Karma".

You Bring the Drama, You Earn the Karma! Come enjoy our good vibes, creative libations, music (in-camp DJ) & activities! Nightly Happy Hours from 4-8pm; bar also open late night! Mon. night celebrate Silicon Village's Quinceanera with Horchata & Churros! Spin the Wheel of Karma for a Fluff & Buff, Hot Wax, Chakra Shine or The Works and get your Karma cleansed in our very own hippie-tastic Karma Wash! For hungry burners we've got Bloody Mary & Bacon Breakfast and Nutella Snacks in the afternoon! Find your balance on our 30ft Slack Line! Get creative at Moonbeam's Wine & Body Paint Spectacular (Tues 10-2PM) We provide the body paint, brushes, stencils & bar will be open! Come to paint others or be painted! Stop by to check out our calendar of events and be sure to join us for Octoberfest!
