The Black Rock Travel Agency is a gang of pilots, aviation enthusiasts, and adventurers who come together every year to serve the airport village and its visitors located at the end of Point5. Yes, there is an airport! BRTA makes it just like you imagine a Burning Man Airport would be. A massive Starport pyramid structure with entertainment and bar underneath with 30 foot viewing platform above? Yes! A super yummy galley serving pancake breakfast and bbq? Yes! Facilitating scenic airplane flights for Burners? Of course! The Agents at the Black Rock Travel Agency are committed to burners having an experience only to be found at the best airport in the world. Start, continue or end your journey with us.

Serving the Airport Community Since 1998

BRTA is a theme camp located at the Black Rock City Municipal Airport (located near point 5) since 1998. It provides a home for wayward pilot, airport volunteers, and those seeking a place to escape from the craziness and crowds of Black Rock City. 

For others, it's a stopping point on a journey that may not take them where they want to go... but hopefully where they need to go.

BRTA's physical presence includes the Starport shade structure and observation deck, the Galley,  We host new and returning art installations.

BRTA also hosts events throughout the week.

Black Rock Travel Agency (BRTA) is located at the Municipal Airport at the VERY end of the 5 o'clock road. Our mission is to get you where you need to go, even if you don't know where that is!  BRTA invites pilots, passengers, airport volunteers and all citizens of BRC to join us for pancakes Thursday early morning and  to the Annual BLOWOUT Airport Cocktail Party Saturday 2-6pm.
waiting for input

The Black Rock Travel Agency's Theme Camp ( established 1999) is the heart and soul of the Black Rock City Municipal Airport, providing a home for wayward pilots, airport volunteers and visitors.

BRTA hosts events throughout the week, such as the Thursday morning Pancake Breakfast and the Saturday Afternoon Airport Cocktail Party.  Come by and get a birds eye view of the airport atop the Starport crows nest.
Located at 5:00 and the Trash Fence.

The Black Rock Travel Agency's Theme Camp ( established 1999) is the heart and soul of the Airport, offering events such as the Thursday morning pancake breakfast and the Saturday Afternoon Airport Cocktail Party.
We are united in our desire to serve you - not drag you!

The Black Rock Travel Agency exists to serve the pilots, passengers, volunteers and visitors of the Black Rock City Municipal Airport. We are not directly involved in flight operations nor the gifting of flights, rather we facilitate travel experiences on other planes of existence. We provide respite, solace and guidance to travelers of all sorts, some of which may be relied upon to enhance ones journey. Our solemn and singular goal is that, having interacted with the agency, travelers will depart with the distinct feeling, " Now *that* was a trip!

We have Occupied the BRC Municipal Airport since 1999. We believe in government-funded contraception. There is a rumor that Newt Gingrich and Calista will be flying to Burning Man this year after losing the nomination. You get to first dibs on giving Newt a TSA-style full body search while Calista and I trade shots of Southern Comfort and Watermelon Pucker.

Instead of a pithy comment this year, let’s have H.L. Mencken say a few words:“For it is mutual trust even more than mutual interest that hold human associations together-our friends seldom profit us but they make us feel safe.”“Every normal man must be tempted at times to spit on his hands, hoist the black flag, and begin to slit throats.”
We are a full-service hospitality agency, an FBO, and a legend in our own minds. Come fly with us.

The Black Rock Travel Agency has been serving and supporting The Airport at Port of Entry Village since 1999. BRTA is one of the oldest theme camps that are still talking to one another. Est. in 1996 with 3 members, it has grown to over 50 travel agents. We’ll help you get where you need to go!

Once again, hospitality. All love, all groin. This year, in line with the new “American” theme, we will be lovin’ babies pretty much 24/7. Oh, and mothers too. All love, all the time. Mothers and babies. BRTA, since ’37.

It was 1996. The Black Rock Travel Agency (BRTA)-sensing the birth of a radical city of artists, born in the backseat of a Chevy Monte Carlo-pitched a golden spike along the outskirts of that city, on the troubled road to Rave Camp. A Travel Agency Was Born. BRTA and Hospitality-no two words could have closer meaning.

The Black Rock Travel Agency (BRTA) has been serving its playa customers in the most untoward ways since 1937. BRTA is one of the oldest institutions at BRC (since 1991) and was instrumental in keeping Helco at bay in 1996 (though some of the details of these black ops have never been–and will never be–revealed). We will tell you about the old days, if you have the time. Otherwise, we will just take you on an airplane trip and try not to give you too much of a thrill. If you catch our drift.

Allah Akbar!After wresting control of the disputed “Airport Gate” region from the dread Banned Rogue Terrorist Association last year, the hyperpatriots of the Black Rock Travel Agency continue their mission in 2005:

The Black Rock Travel Agency has been making love to the world for so long it no longer knows what love is, or what is is; and we find ourselves in a quandry, wondering how love will flourish in a post-Bushian world. But this much is true: if you are good and true, if your vision creates love and beauty, it has the automatic Black Rock Travel Agency seal of approval, so come show us what you have that is truthful, beautiful, and full of love.

Our camp is a welcoming place for emotional exploration at Burning Man. We offer compassion therapy for deep emotional connections and healing. Our Listening Camp provides a space to share and feel validated. We use complaint forms for constructive feedback and themed days to explore psychedelic insights. Tarot readings offer mystical guidance. All activities aim to foster self-discovery and connection in an inclusive environment.

Camp "Turbaza Chayka" is all about spreading love for Burning Man , inclusive culture, joy, happiness with the side of vodka and good music. Come chill with us in the heat of the day and we will warm you up in the cold of the night!

Catering to a whole spectrum of playa experiences and mental states, Slushious offers uplifting themed parties and a  chillout space. We believe that by working together, and inviting all passing dusty desert travelers to join us, we become more than the sum of our parts. Whether you're looking for fun, sympathy, commiseration, R&R, or simply shade, refreshment and a place to meet our welcoming campmates, Slushious offers it all. Fun for all ages, ALL PEOPLE.

Slushious offers afternoon dance parties with cold drinks and world class DJ's under a shaded dance floor and lounge.  Join us for an afternoon of legal revelry, shake your tail feathers at our animal-themed dance party, find your inner zen at our yoga sessions, or come celebrate leaving something unwanted behind at our divorce party. Whatever your mood, Slushious has something to offer. After the party ends head to our on-site Whinery Dome for a wind-down glass of wine and to share your frustrations - we're here to listen and commiserate!

Slushious is the spot for the weary traveler, home of Black Rock City's most famous boozy (and non boozy) slushies. Come cool off with us, dance under our always poppin' shaded dance floor, relax in our "Henna Lounge," meet other Burners in our "Hammock Parlour."  Everyone is welcome at Slushious.  Daily afternoon slushie parties with rotating DJs from across the globe, the "Wheel of Revelry" where you may be gifted something very special and a fun place to meet other fun people and just have a fun time.

Cool refreshing boozy slushies, shaded dance floor and lounge, DJ's from across the globe and confessional.  Let it all out at Slushious!

https://www.facebook.com/letsgetslushie/
We herald from all corners of our wonderful globe.  As with voltron when our powers combine we becomes greater than the sum of it's parts.  Enter Slushious an oasis for the weary travelers!
Sian Kamp is a Black Rock City oasis with beautiful downtempo and deep house accompanied by tea. We want you to start the day the right way with us ;)
Sian Tea Party is a place to chill out with a cuppa in the afternoons to some nice tunes, surrounded by a friendly awesome bunch. We want to share the best teas we have ever tried with you!
It's whatever you want it to be!
It's whatever you want it to be!
It is whatever you want it to be
It is what you want it to be
A creative space with surreal fixtures where visitors can sip on freshly brewed teas and participate in collective doodles and poetry writing on the walls and furniture.
Come in and inform, perform, astound or lounge. Everybody wins and all must have prizes. So, drink this or it’s of with your head at High Tea with Alice and the Hatter at the Hole.

Welcome to our otherworldly circus camp, where creativity meets the cosmos! Join us for aerial spectacles, enchanting performances, spontaneous play, workshops and carnival festivities that foster community and connection.
Dance, jump, climb, or perform in our playground, but you may be abducted by an alien cult

Crystal Groove is a mobile sound stage fueled by unconditional love and bumping high vibration house music.  Look for a cluster of glowing crystals in the distance and feel your way to your highest state of bliss.

Lose yourself in a reverie of music. An intimate sound camp for people who like good, unique music to jam out to. 

Feel like taking a break? Come watch forgotten films from the VHS era on a large format screen with high quality sound.  Or take a seat, have a drink, and discuss the day's explorations in our shaded bar and lounge.

Lose yourself in a reverie of music. An intimate sound camp for people who like good, unique music to jam out to. 

Feel like taking a break? Come watch forgotten films from the VHS era on a large format screen with high quality sound. Or kick back in our furry, air-conditioned VR lounge and explore some crafted spaces. Or take a seat, have a drink, and discuss the day's explorations in our shaded bar and lounge.

Sonic Dream is a place where people come together to visualize sound and listen to dreams. Don't take our word for it... hear it yourself. 

Feel like taking a break? Come watch our nightly movies on a large format screen with high quality sound.

https://www.sonicdream.org/
info@sonicdream.org

At Helioz, we worship the Sun god. To honor our god, we roast delicious animals and share them with all guests. Come by in the late afternoon and evening for some tasty treats, and drink a sun-god libation.

At Helioz, we worship the Sun god. To honor our god, we roast delicious animals and share them with all guests. Come by in the late afternoon and evening for some tasty treats, and drink a sun-god libation.

Arachne stalks the Playa at night. Watch out! But not all nighttime prowlers are malevolent: keep a lookout for our mobile fountain-of-youth tea cart too.

At Helioz, we worship the Sun god. To honor our god, we roast delicious animals and share them with all guests. Come by in the late afternoon and evening for some tasty treats, and drink a sun-god libation. 

Cruise on our Roman Galley--the first dry-land rowing cruise line. We'll toast the gods as we row the Playa from shore to shore. Take a turn at the oar to become a Patrician and enjoy the finer things. 

Arachne stalks the Playa at night. Watch out! But not all nighttime prowlers are malevolent: keep a lookout for our mobile fountain-of-youth tea cart too. 

Late-night, watch us destroy an effigy of the Sun god's mortal enemy--the hated Moon!

We worship Helioz, the Sun god. Come eat fantastic beasts, fight as a gladiator in our Arena, drink mightily at the Tavern of Helioz, survey the Playa from atop the Altar of Helioz, and fire a laser at the Moon!
Running our light painting wall every night.  Come by, bring lights, and use your lights to paint.  How can one paint using only lights?  It's a secret magic.
Helioz.  Have your mind blown in the Soundnasium, a participatory synaesthetic audiovisual experience.  Come into our dome and experience this moment as you create it along with your friends.

Come to test your skill and your courage in the gladiatorial arena where you will battle friend and foe alike!  Stay for bocce ball, a dance in our giant inverted disco ball, and delicious drinks mixed and served by our very own analog, hand-crank robotic bartender!
The British Empire’s primary outpost in Black Rock City.  Come for the clocktower, stay for the tea.

We worship the Sun god, that atomic dance floor where the ecstasy of fusion explodes in glorious light, the dub of electromagnetic waves rolling out from it and animating all living things with its cosmic beat. Come by and make your burnt offering to the Sun god using our reflective parabolic dish, which gathers up the Sun’s energy and focuses it to a single point, making that point super hot, like the Sun itself.
Boom Boom Womb is your feminine, funky, soulful, childlike home away from home on the playa.

Boom Boom Womb is a chosen family of burners who elevate the feminine and funky and celebrate child-like wonder.

We are a chosen family of Burners who elevate the feminine and funky and celebrate childlike wonder. Visit us to feel the comfort and love of the Womb and participate in our fun events.

Collective celebration and rebirth with an elevated dash of the soulful, feminine and funky.

Camp Boom Boom Womb is the new incarnation of the camp formerly known as Camp New Year. We're still about collective celebration and rebirth, now with an elevated dash of the soulful, feminine and funky.
An international camp hosting DJs, yoga, workshops, theme parties, a bar for the thirsty, cozy lounging, bar games and flogging/kink dungeon. Specializing in dubious advice and questionable antics.
An international camp hosting DJs, daily theme parties, a bar for the thirsty, cozy lounging, bar games and flogging/kink dungeon. Specializing in dubious advice and questionable antics.
A diverse, international camp featuring a bar and lounge open 24 hours a day. We host DJs, theme parties and play fun bar games.
[The Camp With No Name] is a diverse, international camp featuring a bar and lounge open 24 hours a day. We host DJs, theme parties and play fun bar games.

TCWNN] is a suburban camp and a dive bar at heart. The bar is open 24 hours a day and is a true art bar experience. The camp has a focus on interactivity and art projects from burners from around the world.

[TCWNN] is a suburban camp and an artistic dive bar at heart.  [The Bar With No Name] is open 24 hours a day and is a true international art-bar experience, with superb craft beers and ciders. The camp has a focus on interactivity and art projects from burners from around the world. We welcome virgin and orphan burners.  We are a camp of approximately 50 burners.

[The Camp With No Name]. is a suburban, highly interactive and artistic camp, based in the suburbs of Burning Man.  We have multiple arts projects, a fire barrel, and one of the most successful daytime bars in the suburbs.  The bar will serve high-quality craft brews, infused vodkas, and soft drinks -  all day and night if required (or until we run out of booze - it's never happened yet!  See you on the playa.  Dusty hugs x

Come burn off that hangover and create a new one, you sparkly little donkey, and let's pretend we're ageless. Rock the day away on our life-size donkey, test your balance on two or four hooves on the balance beams, and take a spin on the pole.  The best place on the playa to be a real ass, and bring a friend to play with you!

Alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages served in the afternoon during our donkey shenanigans. 

Hoof it over and horse around or, in this case, come donkey around with our crew.

Come burn off that hangover and create a new one, you sparkly little donkey, and let's pretend we're ageless. Rock the day away on our life-size donkey, climb up a story to see the playa night lights, test your balance on two or four hooves on the balance beams, swing your cares away on the swing set, take a spin on the pole and teeter your totter yourself back to the dust.  The best place on the playa to be a real ass, and bring a friend to play with you!

Alcoholic Beverages served in the afternoon during our donkey shenanigans.

Our fake greenhouse offers a temporary refuge from the harsher elements of the playa. Come take a break in our cool space, have some tea, and practice your creativity by making origami playa gifts. We'll hang leftover origami pieces throughout the week as if our greenhouse is "growing" in the desert! At night, look for our 11' LED sign, colorful up lights, silhouetted plants, and occasional fire spinning!

Welcome to the Department of Radical Self-Projection — a future-bureaucratic agency temporarily stationed in Black Rock City to credential citizens for the world of Tomorrow, Today. At our futuristic field office, participants are interviewed, pose for a quantum mugshot, and receive their laminated Playa SurReal ID: a license for the soul they’re becoming. Get certified by our Licensing Specialists by day, and return at night to witness the Orb of Source Identity — a luminous, timeline-jumping relic. The Department of Radical Self-Projection proudly recognizes radical self-expression across all dimensions, timelines, and realities.

Are you as nuts about Squirrels as we are?! If these mischievous charmers and their playful antics bring you joy, then scurry over to Acorn Oasis! Explore our 24-hour one-of-a-kind Squirrel Museum, a hilarious tribute to the most renowned and significant squirrels throughout history. Dash over to our daily Squirrell Soirees to enjoy a glass of Bushy Tail Brew and immerse yourself in our playful Squirrel Playground, teeming with games that will test your agility and wit. At Acorn Oasis, we're all about celebrating the playful spirit of squirrels, so come and get squirrely with us!
Cool Cat Cafe is all meow all the time.  We are a small family owned and operated theme camp dedicated to serving quality nom noms.  We are here to make your burn meowy af!!
Cool Cat Cafe is all meow all the time.  We are a small family owned and operated theme camp dedicated to serving quality nom noms.  We are here to make your burn meowy af!!

Come on all fours and enter a magical purr-fest 
Meet up with fellow Cat-holics and spin a yarn or listen to a tail.
You gonna be feline purr-ty good when you vibe along to our meow-mix, and pounce on of our hiss-terical events and claw-some workshops!

Have a mice day!

Cool Cat Cafe - We are all meow all the time, 24/7 meow. It's not just a word, it's a way of life. Stop by during the day for refreshing drinks and events or stop by at night to visit our bar. We look forward to meowing with you.

Cool Cat Cafe is all meow all the time, 24/7 meow meow.  Its not just a word, its a way of life!  Stop by for cool hydrating drinks and cute cat videos.  Nighttime will be playing our special playlist our "Meow Mix".   During the day executive chef Jedi Kitty will be offering up an array of delights from our Michelin Starred kitchen  (we dont really have any Michelin Stars tho shhhh).  Find us on the web https://www.facebook.com/groups/254451454733197/

Making Art at the Mad Tea Party.name: Making Art at the Mad Tea Party

history.description: Please drop by our camp and contribute to our collective art projects, using sharpies, pencil crayons or paints (supplied). We want you to spend 5 minutes expressing yourselves on our practical and fantastical themes, creating multi artist works of art. And please stay until 5 pm and join us for our daily afternoon Mad Hatter iced tea party, complete with regalia.

Salon Soleil is a salon on the Enlightenment model, a forum for the exchange of creative ideas. Our inspiration is sunlight: We burn bright and clean. The one trace we leave is good karma. 

Come recharge your devices with our solar array. Check out our eclectic array of events and recharge yourself. Our magic is connecting with Burners as unique individuals whether that's through sharing ideas, catalyzing healthy emotional and somatic release, or shaking up default-world assumptions through playful hijinks. Audition for silent-movie stardom, try on a new look at our atelier, feast with us on vulvular waffles or sacramental cheese. Be transformed by our life-changing Healing Faire. Or just relax in our welcoming Do-Me Domes—a lush and safe space in which to decompress and meet new humans.

Salon Soleil is a salon on the Enlightenment model—a forum for the exchange of creative ideas. We seek inspiration in sunlight by burning bright and clean. The one trace we leave is good karma. We invite the BRC community to visit our plush and welcoming Do-Me Domes, audition for silent-movie stardom, be transformed by our life-changing Healing Faire, engage in interactive workshops, try on a new look at our atelier, or feast with us on vulvular waffles or sacramental cheese. We offer a safe space to decompress, meet new humans, and reconnect with yourself. We also welcome power-hungry devices and depleted batteries that can be filled at our solar charging station!

Salon Soleil is a welcoming space for personal exploration, self-expression, wacky antics, and profound interaction with other beings. We invite the Black Rock City community to visit our plush and welcoming Do-Me Domes, shake your body at our Tuesday night funk dance party, audition for silent-movie stardom, be transformed by our life-changing Healing Faire, engage in interactive workshops, try on a new look, or gather around our burn barrel on a cold night and make new friends We offer a safe space to decompress, meet new humans, and reconnect with yourself. We also welcome power hungry devices and depleted batteries that can be filled at our solar charging station!

We also welcome power hungry devices and depleted batteries that can be filled at our solar charging station!

Come feed your power hungry devices and fill depleted batteries at our solar charging station!

Come feed your power hungry devices and fill depleted batteries at our solar charging station!

Also, come feed your power hungry devices and fill depleted batteries at our solar charging station!

Also, come feed your power hungry devices and fill depleted batteries at our solar charging station!

Also, come feed your power hungry devices and fill depleted batteries at our solar charging station!

Salon Soleil is a welcoming space for personal exploration, self-expression, and interaction with other beings. We invite the Burning Man community to visit our quiet, reflective quadruple Do-Me Dome for one of our healing fairs offering massage, readings, or relationship counseling.

Salon Soleil provides a welcoming space for personal exploration and self-expression through mental, physical, emotional and spiritual interaction with other beings.  We invite the Burning Man community to join us in our quest to find the true meaning of the American Dream.

Salon Soleil is a welcoming space for personal exploration, self-expression, and interaction with other beings. We invite the Burning Man community to join us in our quiet, reflective quadruple Do-Me Dome to philosophize about the Burning Man experience, or for one of our therapeutic fairs offering massage, readings, and healing treatments. Or add to your list of escapades by coming to our third annual fire opera, performed by our crew of talented fire spinners.

Salon Soleil provides a welcoming space for personal exploration and self-expression through mental (air), physical (earth), emotional (water) and spiritual (fire) interaction with other beings. Conjuring the four elements through the medium of human experience, we invite the Burning Man community to join us in our quiet, reflective triple Do-Me Dome to explore the emotional and mental underside of your previous night’s playa play.    Ponder your possible futures with one of our clairvoyant soothsayers or discuss the mysteries of the universe with other philosophically-oriented burners. Add to your list of escapades by coming to our second annual fire opera — Burning Hope/Naked Fear — performed within our mirrored poi spinning circle. Also look for the debut of Salon Soleil on wheels with this year’s new Buddhavehicle, bringing you a special delivery of enlightenment. Whether your mind is most alert by day or by night, whether you prefer the intimate company of a single confidant or crave some heavy inter-groupulation, Salon Soleil offers a space to enhance your Burning Man experience.

Salon Soleil provides a welcoming space for personal exploration and self-expression through mental (air), physical (earth), emotional (water) and spiritual (fire) interaction with other beings.  Conjuring the four elements through the medium of human experience, we invite the Burning Man community to join with us in digging (metaphorically) below the surface of the playa in search of the buried treasures of the psyche.  After a night of physical bliss and spiritual be-wonderment, come to the quiet, reflective twin domes of Salon Soleil and explore the emotional and mental underside of your experience. Process your playa adventures with one of our un-certified, non-licensed psych-e-therapists. Discuss the mysteries of the universe and the meaning of the Man with other philosophically-oriented burners at one of our scheduled salon-style discussions. Or, continue the sensual path towards enlightenment with our quack-certified reflexologist.  Bring your renewed psyche to our mirrored poi spinning circle for a different approach to self-reflection through practice and transformational performance. Learn new techniques of mind and body manipulation from our poi masters in residence. Or simply absorb the flamboyant manifestations of fellow self-expressionists.  Whether your mind is most alert by day or by night, whether you prefer the intimate company of a single confidant or crave some heavy inter-groupulation, Salon Soleil offers a space to enhance your creative impulses.

Salon Soleil aims to catch curious wanderers, dreamers, philosophers, prophets, activists and artists in our gravitational field.  Orbit the fiery central core of the Infinite Oasis village with us and engage in Salon-style explorations of how community, creativity, and sensuality can influence our lives within and beyond Black Rock City.  Contribute to evolutionary art projects, participate in musical and dramatic performances, and register to vote.

We have been buzzing the playa for more than 20 years now, and we are ready for more, indeed moving BeeYond: 

We rely on serious energy, creativity, love, and silly shenanigans to keep our love flowing.

We seek to inspire, connect, and celebrate life by spreading our love and care for our fair Black Rock City. 

This shows in our efforts to be a clean green camp, in the way we BUZZ people (imagine a buzzing vibrating swarm!) in the way we welcome all passersby into our NectarSector to escape the sun or onto our Mutant Vehicle the BoomBa and most of all how we love each other and all we meet!

We have been buzzing the playa for more than 20 years now, and we are ready for more, indeed moving BeeYond: Bees! This year we will host our Pink Playaella Party at camp and invite everyone to enjoy paella, fresh carved jamon and sangria. 

We rely on serious energy, creativity, love, and silly shenanigans to keep our love flowing.

We seek to inspire, proselytize, and lead by spreading our love and care for our fair Black Rock City. This shows in our efforts to be a clean green camp, in the way we BUZZ people (imagine a buzzing vibrating swarm!) in the way we welcome all passersby into our NectarSector to escape the sun or onto our Mutant Vehicles the Red Hot Beverly and the Apis, and most of all how we love each other and all we meet!

BeeYond: We have been buzzing the playa for more than 20 years now, and we are ready for more, indeed moving BeeYond Bees! We will still have our Bee-Swarm pub crawl on Friday, but no big party this year, in favor of smaller interactions.

We rely on serious energy, creativity, love, and silly shenanigans to keep our love flowing.

BeeCharge! We have been buzzing the playa for more than 20 years now, and we are ready for more! We are Bees. We take care of Beesness and rock out every year at Black Rock City in our yellow and black. We rely on serious energy, creativity, love, and silly shenanigans to keep our love flowing.

We seek to inspire, proselytize, and lead by spreading our love and care for our fair Black Rock City. This shows in our efforts to be a clean green camp, in our now eight years annual LiBeeito Bee's Knees Wednesday Afternoon Party, in the way we BUZZ people (imagine a buzzing vibrating swarm!) in the way we welcome all passersby into our NectarSector to escape the sun or onto our newest Mutant Vehicle the Red Hot Beverly, and most of all how we love each other and all we meet!

WeCharge! is the next evolution of the camp formerly known as bEEcHARGE!!! and before that rEcHARGE!!!.  We have been buzzing the playa for more than 20 years now, and we are ready for more! 

This year please come by to sing your lungs out with Live Band Karaoke, or to hop on to a Playa Adventure Tour (guided shenanigans), or to visit the Moonshine Bar with the Golden Guy cluster, or to hop on one of our two art cars:  the Apis Inlusio and the Red Hot Beverly.

Bottom line, stop by and visit!  We welcome all, especially newbees and travelers from afar!

Come chill and get your bearings at Playa Bears! Where we're always bruin' up good times and kodiak moments. Our forebears believed in dancing, strong drinks, delicious food, and koality time with friends. We're serving up all of the above in our Playa Bear Den! Do you need a place to get away from the pandemonium of the playa? Fur the love of the man, honey! Come join us at one of our events or stop by anytime for a cocktail and a bear hug.

Witness our wild, weird, and wonderful Variety Show in the style of a classic Vaudeville and the spirit of Cacophony. Step through the red windmill into the red velvet paradise that is our classic cabaret theater, and see comedy, tragedy, mime, dance, live music, and some stuff that have you feeling like you're in a Fever Dream. Nightly performances of SOMETHING at 10pm Monday through Saturday.

Our pro performers host classes and workshops during the day if you want to learn how to radically express yourself.

Step through the red windmill into the red velvet paradise that is our classic cabaret theater, and see comedy, tragedy, mime, dance, live music, and some stuff that will feel like you're having a Fever Dream. Want to participate? Sign up to perform at our "Auditions" Party on Monday. Just want to experience the immediacy of live entertainment? Come to a nightly performance of SOMETHING at 10pm Monday through Saturday.

Our pro performers host classes and workshops during the day if you want to learn how to radically express yourself. Our resident DJs also host dance parties during the day so you can simply move your body in the shady oasis of our red velvet paradise.

Don't turn the page, we have a stage! A seductive home to a troupe of vaudeville and cabaret acts, bringing live entertainment to the Playa nightly. Have a talent or act you'd like to share with the city? Our stage is open and welcome to performers seeking the spotlight. Come see performances great and small, planned and spontaneous, sexy and hilarious. The greatest thing you'll ever learn is to laugh and be laughed at in return!
Welcoming home our trans, non-binary, BIPOC, and gender non-conforming community on Playa!
Welcoming home our trans, non-binary, and gender non-conforming community on Playa!

Gender Blender is committed to creating safe, awesome, fun, creative spaces for trans, gender queer,  variant, nonconforming, queens, kings, & those of us that are shape shifting the gender binary. We serve to educate & give space to those that have always wanted to explore gender but have never before. We run workshops, play parties, events, make smoothies in the desert, & have existed on playa since 2009. We welcome new people & new volunteers. All genders welcome all ways & always. In these dire times of ant-trans, anti-drag, and anti-gender exploration and expression in we are needed more then ever! We are here for justice. We are here to have fun! We are here to give our community a chance to be creative, wild, free, & dusty.

Gender Blender is a home for for trans, genderqueer, enby, gender variant, nonconforming, queens, kings, cross-dressers, and anyone shape shifting the gender paradigm. We welcome all genders always and we focus on creativity, fun, consent, and liberation education. We make smoothies in the desert, dance, celebrate our lives, and do epic performance art.

Are you tired of gender labels? Are you over being told you need to look, be, or behave a certain way? Are you ready to smash the bonds of gender oppression and metamorphosize into gender liberation?! Do you believe in creating safe spaces for trans, non-binary, genderqueer, non-conforming, bending, and blending folks than Gender Blender the place for you!

Gender Blender is fun, interactive, educational, and a space to explore your gender identity. We are a safe space community of trans, non-binary, genderqueer, and gender out-laws and radicals. We support each other, heal the wounds of gender oppression, run workshops, play parties, and create magic. We welcome all genders all-ways.
Check us out at www.genderblenders.org

The journey to Burning Man involves leaving behind the familiar and embarking on a journey towards the unknown. This shared experience resonates deeply with the journey of immigrants, refugees, and boat people, who leave behind everything they know to navigate unfamiliar territory in search of a sense of home in an unlikely place. Black Rock City Refugee Camp celebrates the strength, resilience, ingenuity, and compassion of these remarkable communities.

With open hearts, we welcome all who seek solace, camaraderie, and belonging. Join our journey of resilience and celebration, as we create a space where the enduring spirit of immigrants, refugees, and boat people shines brightly in the heart of Black Rock City.

Members of the Entheos Community organize one of the larger and most diverse theme camps placed at the annual Burning Man event in the Black Rock Desert of Nevada. Friends and members of the Entheos Community come from over 43 countries to contribute their effort, skills, and resources to the creation of Entheos @ Burning Man. The camp creates extensive 24/7 interactivity for all ages as a gift to the citizens of Black Rock City, functions as a pilgrimage home for its members, and serves as a nexus to meaningfully connect people from around the world across national, religious, and ideological lines. As part of Entheos' commitment to radical inclusion, diversity, and equity, we hold a significant portion of our camp capacity open each year to welcome people who are new to Entheos.

Members of the Entheos Community organize one of the larger and most diverse theme camps placed at the annual Burning Man event in the Black Rock Desert of Nevada. Friends and members of the Entheos Community come from over 43 countries to contribute their effort, skills, and resources to the creation of Entheos @ Burning Man. Members of Entheos Community Village (ECV) organize a highly diverse camp that is placed at the annual Burning Man event. Friends and members of ECV come from more than 43 countries to contribute their effort, skills, and resources to the creation of Entheos and Combat Zone theme camps, the Cuddlepillar mutant vehicle, and the Empyrean Gate art installation. The village creates 24/7 interactivity for all ages as a gift to the citizens of Black Rock City, functions as a pilgrimage home for its members, and serves as a nexus to meaningfully connect people from around the world across national, religious, and ideological lines. As part of our commitment to Radical Inclusion, Diversity, and Equity (RIDE), we hold a percentage of camp open each year to welcome people who are new to Burning Man.

Members of the Entheos Community currently organize the largest, and arguably the most diverse, theme camp placed at the annual Burning Man event in the Black Rock Desert of Nevada. Friends and members of the Entheos Community come from over forty countries to contribute their labor, skills, and resources to the creation of Entheos @ Burning Man. The camp provides extensive 24/7 interactivity for all ages as a gift to the citizens of Black Rock City, functions as a pilgrimage home for its members, and serves as a nexus to meaningfully connect people from around the world across national, religious, and ideological lines. As part of Entheos' commitment to radical inclusion, diversity, and equity, we hold a third of our camp capacity open each year to welcome people who are new to Entheos.

Entheos is an active, global community of makers, healers, artists, thinkers, organizers and leaders from all walks of life.  We have gathered around our common interest in the exploration of healing trauma, raising consciousness and manifesting creativity to sculpt a new way of living in the world. Many of us actively participate in shamanic healing communities, work in medical and psychological research, facilitate intimate experience with sacred medicine and are active leaders in exploring the evolution of consciousness.

Entheos draws together shamans, scientists, artists, builders, instructors and activists from around the globe who are exploring the healing benefits, and consciousness raising capacity, of the natural entheogenic medicines traditionally used throughout world history. Entheos points to the creative, collaborative spark within each of us, and the divine fire we can ignite when we gather to play and learn together.
Cultivating the scientific study, psychological education and spiritual use of entheogens.

At Camp Truth or Dare!? our mission is to inspire joy, mischief, courage, curiosity and connection through the game of "Truth or Dare," foster Burning Man's 10 Principles + consent, and promote the Radical Inclusivity, Diversity and Equity initiative.

Our mission is to inspire and facilitate radical curiosity and connection. We are here to get curious about our fellow Burners, about the 10 Principles, and about Black Rock City as a phenomenon. Come get curious with us!

At Dusty Dreamers (formerly Dusty Frogz), we believe Burning Man is a dream in which we get for a week the opportunity to be completely free, to let our imagination go wild, to try new things and make new friends and that's why we are building the Home of the Dreamers at BRC. Our core theme is Celebration and Liberation. We are also a European camp, with our burners coming primarily from France, Sweden, Latvia and Spain. We are very easy to find, just look out for our 28ft tall Eiffel Tower, et voila!

At Dusty Frogz, we believe burning man is a dream in which we get for a week the opportunity to be completely free, to let our imagination go wild, to try new things and make new friends. After 10 years in BRC, we are evolving into a sex-positive camp that will provide a safe space for people to get out of their comfort zone and embrace liberation and celebration of the body, the mind, the emotions, and the soul, as part of a growth journey.
We offer morning workshops and evening kinky parties during the week. We are also a European camp, with our burners coming primarily from France, Sweden, Germany and Spain. We are very easy to find, just look out for our 28ft tall Eiffel Tower, et voila!

Welcome to the Dusty Frogz camp! We've built a French guinguette in traditional Parisian style where we provide daily entertainment and typical French beverages. Think about Champagne, Cognac and our famous Ricard. On top of this, we have two petanque courts available 24/7 and a great selection of music played by our DJs. You can easily find us on the playa, just look out for the 25 feet Eiffel Tower and get inside its legs to experience a 360° cooling mist.

SERENDIPITEA, a place where you can expect terrific teas, transformative workshops, titanic parties and tons of absurdity. Come by any time and enjoy a refreshing iced tea cocktail infusion, under the shade in our desert oasis. For your recovery mornings, help yourself to a cup of tea and recharge at our crystal alter. We exist to cultivate experiences full of intimate bonds, insightful breakthroughs, incredible beats, irreverent banter and intoxicating brews. Tues (Day) and Thurs (Night) we host our big parties! Let us dream of evanescence, and linger in the beautiful foolishness of things.

TO UNEXPECTED ADVENTURES AND TEA, IN OUR DUSTY PARADISE.
We focus on surprise, and spontaneity with live performance artists mixed in with a range of carefully curated dj's to provide a camp that is filled with mystery, excitement and even some delightfully unexpected snacks and drinks. Let us linger in the beautiful foolishness of things, and revel in our ignorance.

SERENDIPITEA, meanwhile let's have a sip of Tea. 

SERENDIPITEA focuses on the communal aspects of tea rituals around the globe. Tea is something close to our hearts in the UK, but is also a significant to many different cultures; whether it is a tall iced glass of sweet tea in the southern US, or a steaming cup of mint tea served from a silvery teapot in Morocco- all are symbols of hospitality and friendship bringing us closer as a whole. We took a lot of inspiration from the Book of Tea written in 1906 by Okakura Kakuzō of Japan in English, he addressed the growing concern of clash between the east and west cultures. The struggle he speaks of resonates with the modern cultural issues facing society, the very issues that Burning Man explores.
SERENDIPITEA, meanwhile let’s have a sip of Tea.
Helios is a symbol of rebirth after hard times.  It is a celebration of humanity and an invitation for us all to stand together in the challenging times ahead.

Cozy up in our 24/7 library lounge filled with pillows, blankets, books and art. Write, doodle, or read the journals lying all around, filled with the stories of visitors from past burns. Eat a pancake at our morning disco party. Pilgrimage with us to deep playa at sunrise for tea and tunes. Get some deep rest in our meditative sound bath or simply lounge and connect with fellow travelers < 3

Come cozy up in our 24/7 Library Lounge, filled with pillows, blankets, books and art. Write in, doodle on, or read any number of the journals we put up dangling from the sky, filled with the stories, art and reflections from this year's and previous burns. Sip tea with us at the sunrise in Deep Playa, lounge with us and fellow travelers and take part in our sound bath ceremony. We hope to get the chance to share the special gift and experience of Burning Man soon < 3

Come cozy up in our 24/7 Library lounge, filled with books and art. Write or doodle in any number of open journals, filled with the stories of visitors from past burns. Dance with us to morning disco or sip tea alongside afternoon tunes. Eat a pancake portrait of yourself! Take part in our sound bath or simply lounge and connect with fellow travelers.

We are writers, journalers, diary-keepers. We seek out moments to create and consume art with those around us, from reading to writing to storytelling to doodling to dancing. We promote Art as Interactivity and invite our guests to express themselves within our den. Come visit our Library, where you can read and write, share stories, and lounge together. Eat a pancake portrait of yourself! Dance with us to morning disco or sip tea alongside afternoon tunes.

Started in 2007 with Larry Harvey's blessing and support, FTA has fed tens of thousands of artists, musicians, dancers, builders, makers, dabblers, and generally curious wandering travelers. FTA actively models the concept of creating community through the sharing of delicious meals at BRC and all over the world. We are striving to elevate food to an art form, serving as a primary resource for playa food safety, kitchen design, and unforgettable cooking. You never know what we'll be cooking up next - and, whatever it may be, you are invited to prepare it with us and share a meal of some of the finest food ever gifted on the playa!

Questionable Behavior? is a crew of principal-oriented burners who unite around creating immersive experiences that inspire participation and inquiry. We share art in the forms of interactive installations, dance parties, and sometimes a bar! Check out the weird and find a different view than the one you came with.  We are all a bit Questionable.

Questionable Behavior PyroTex is a combination crew of principal-oriented burners who unite around creating immersive experiences that inspire participation and inquiry. We share art in the forms of interactive installations, dance parties, workshops, and fire! Check out the weird and find a different view than the one you came with.

We're back, better, and more Questionable than ever. Hailing from Austin, Illinois, and Mexico, we will be bringing you the sunset drive-in theater, the best scaffold tower around, and new for this year, the Questionable Maze of Questionableness. Come get lost, come get weird, come any time, we're open 24/7. Look for the yellow scaffold!

Questionable Behavior? returns again from Austin, Texas, with our soon to be famous Questionable Drive-in Theater.  Come kick back in one of our rides, take a load off, check out an amazing double feature, then swing by later to get your wild thing on at our first annual Wild Rumpus where the wildest of all the wild things will take home the crown...
Questionable Behavior?

The Avant Yard Village is a motley collection of passionate burners from across the globe. We made our first trek to Black Rock City in 2008, and have acted as ambassadors for the culture of Burning Man to thousands of people, both on the playa and off!

The Avant Yard has been a theme camp since 2008 but our founders first tasted dust in 2006. We are affiliated with the Arts Diaspora, an international network of artists, healers and do-gooders who meet once a year at Burning Man to produce art, connect with new Gnomies (members of our community) and find new ways to empower each other to do wonderful things.

We are a family of artists, dreamers, poets and gnomes. Join us in discovering and exploring the story of human connection and potential and bring your heart onto the stage.

Step into the realm of sensual allure: Swing by to EIPS (Erotic Inclination Photo Studio) to create one of a kind photo memory of yourself and your loved one with the help of our resident photo artist. Singles, couples or groups are welcome at our studio located in the outskirts of Black Rock City where the good ol' Razorback Mountain is sitting and waiting to provide a natural backdrop for the art you're about to create using nothing else, but your body and the unique light of the high desert. We will provide a discrete environment to have your intimate photos taken in our photo tent or you can choose a photo session outside in the walk-in camping area catching the light of the golden hour of the late afternoon. All walk-ins are welcome! Hours: Mon – Fri, 9:30 – 5.

Step into the realm of sensual allure: Swing by Erotic Inclination Photo Studio for a private session with our resident photo artist. Singles, couples and groups are invited to experiment in the art of seduction and erotic inclination using nothing but your bodies, imagination and desires. Capture intimate, artistic one-of-a-kind photo memories in our discrete photo tent, or outside by walk-in camping, using the natural backdrop of Ol’ Razorback Mountain and the magical golden-hour sunlight of the high desert afternoon. To ensure your Erotic Inclination photo shoot, schedule an appointment here https://calendar.app.google/x65rqCLmL1Knn9na8 (recommended), or surprise us, show up unannounced, and we’ll see if we can fit you in. Hours: Mon - Fri, 9:30 - 5. All are welcome.

Come and visit the Lost Art of Conversation Cafe! We at Lost Art celebrate opportunities to create deep connections with friends old and new. At our Conversation Cafe you will be welcomed and supported in exploring avenues of conversation that encourage depth with the goal of learning something new about others and maybe even yourself. We want you to come and settle for a while and get lost in conversation. To keep you nourished we have tea in the mornings and street foods from around the world in the evenings. 

We are a small collaboration and connection driven community from across the US who love taking on ambitious projects, connecting with other awesome communities, and seeking growth and meaning in all that we do. Come on by, we'd love to get to know you.

We are a highly community based and collaborative camp and our goal is to foster meaningful connections and lasting bonds both within our camp mates and in the interactivity we bring.

Lost Art is a camp devoted to bringing forgotten arts to the playa. In this age of zoom calls, twitters, and tik toks, we bring the forgotten art of IRL conversation and connection shared over a dusty meal.
We send people on journeys.

Camp EAT ME is EXCITEMENT ACTION TEAM MAGICAL ENCAMPMENT. We are a tight-knit group of weirdos united around making life more playful. Our skills, interests, and attitudes vary wildly, but the one thing we all have in common is that we almost always say yes to your silly idea and encourage everyone to play with us.

Camp EAT Me's Awful House - All the Burning Man things you love, just a little worse.
We're Camp EAT Me! A collective of goofballs hailing originally from San Francisco, but now all over the country. We're here to serve you the awfulest waffles you've ever had on the playa in 2022!

Camp EAT ME is part of the Excitement Action Team (EAT), started in San Francisco as a group centered around a simple theme: family style dinners coupled with games and a playful attitude. We've grown a community centered around the family meal, as nourishment, as ritual, and as a way to call friend-family home. We attend Burning Man as a Magical Encampment (ME).

- Eat Me Family Potluck and Funishments Bar -

Come join us each evening, shortly before sundown, for a full-on family potluck. A potluck of food, ideas, games, love, life, shenanigans, and whatever else you beautiful people bring to the table.

Bring something to share and leave nourished, both in body and in soul.


Or, of course, stop by anytime for snacks and drinks at our Funishments Bar. Just come prepared.
Home of the Disco Space Shuttle art car and camp. Board with us at 10pm and take a ride around the Universe and Beyond
Home of the Disco Space Shuttle art car and camp. Board with us at ~10pm and take a ride around the Universe and Beyond until ~3am or whenever we run out of gas.
Home of the art car Disco Space Shuttle and camp.

The Disco Space Shuttle (DSS) LaunchPad will assist camps and art projects that need extra hands/support to realize their vision.

The LaunchPad space will be a place for our camp to play matchmaker; matching people who need build support with people who can volunteer to help them realize their dreams. It will also act as the home base and meeting point for our DSS team of volunteers, a minimum of 10 daily, that are dedicating service hours to help other camps and art projects to launch! The LaunchPad will include a LaunchPad Book to write help requests or sign up as a volunteer with availability to help support others.

Would you like to make jewelry from the playa dust? Grab a pair of welding goggles and harness the energy of the sun to melt the playa into glass. We provide the instructions, tools, and supplies, you cast your artistic aspirations into glass.

The flipside of radical self expression is radical listening and receiving. Come join a playful, experiential workshop that might just transform how you experience the burn and your life! We will use our physical bodies, imaginations, and conversations to explore how we can more deeply receive one another. Radical listening is a gift to yourself and others that guides us all towards radical transformations.

At Playa Glass we harness the energy of the sun to make glass out of playa dust. We provide the Fresnel lens and materials, you bring your creativity, and the noontime sun brings the heat.

At night we will have several micro-projectors along our street frontage. These will project enticing images on the ground in front of our camp and will invite passersby to stop and discover other hidden images projected in ways not visible from the street.
At Playa Glass we show you how to use the noontime sun to melt playa dust into glass. You can make jewelry out of your glass creation at our well stocked craft tables.

Visit Playa Glass where we teach you how to harness your arch nemeses (playa dust and the sun) and turn them into lovely one-of- a-kind beads of glass, and then provide everything you need to set them in pendants to remember your Burn by.   M, W, F: 10-12 (weather permitting)  7:15 & D  Hometowns: LA, NY, Boston, London & Berlin

Ever wonder what's in playa dust?  The special formula is just right for some solar glass making.  Grab a pair of our welding goggles, and we'll set you up at a Fresnel lens station where you'll raise the temperature of the dust to over 1000F and melt it in to black glass.  Turn it in to a wearable pendant at the craft table, and you'll have an easier-than-a-bag-of-dust way to take the playa back to the default world.

Sinners!
After 22 years of welcoming friends and sheltering strangers, 7 Sins Lounge will take its final bow!
So if you've loved one of BurningMan's oldest theme camps and the "friendliest slice of Hell on the Playa", come visit us "for the first time" one last time! 

Come share a memory, sign the book, have a final Flaming Blue Phuck and share some 7 Sins swag!
Because we're not fading quietly into the night- we're going to "party like it's 1999!" (Our 1st year!!)

Come Embrace the Heat as the Playa's "Friendliest Little Slice of Hell" returns for the 20th straight year! 

Daytime brings what Sinners need - shade, chill music, friendly conversation and slushy drinks. 

But NIGHT brings what Sinners WANT - Flaming Libations and the ever popular WHEEL of SINS! Spin this brightly painted carnival wheel to expose your Sins again and again! (will it be Greed? or LUST?) 

Our highly skilled and dedicated staff will happily deliver absolution & encouragement with a FIRM hand, sending you dancing forth to SIN ANEW! 

So come earn your "Get Out of HELL Free" card and remember: 
Start your SINS at 7!

We are a Mutant Vehicle Support Camp bringing live Bluegrass music to Black Rock City.

Word Play Cafe is the space at Burning Man dedicated entirely to word games for people to gather, play and learn together. Visitors to Word Play Cafe can play favorite daily games, classic word games, and custom games like our Burning Man themed crossword, and other new word games we created just for Burning Man in our 30 ft dome. We also serve cold brew coffee daily from a cute vintage trailer just beside the dome. Additionally, we have daily events such as panel discussions featuring game developers, facilitated group games and friendly competitions.
This is the home of the itinerant Burning Band, here to provide you with an earful of music. Well, two earfuls, really...
Burning Band Camp! This is the home of the itinerant Burning Band, here to provide you with an earful of music. Well, two earfuls, really...
Burning Band Marching Band
The Burning Band, the playa's first silly marching band.
The Burning Band! We’re here to play for you.
Bring your isntrument and uniform (what ever that is!) and join our spontanious band. Get ready for the major parade event of your life!

Serving ice cold quality craft beer and non-alcoholic options from our Viking themed bar since 2017.  Come grab a pint or three and make yourself at home while you escape the sun, play our array of games with your new friends and vibe to some good tunes.

Serving Ice Cold craft beer from the Pacific Northwest since 2017.  Don't miss our two craft beer bottle share events this year!  Bring your favorite local beer to share with other craft beer enthusiasts!
Vikings (wannabe's), well crafted ales, drinking games, and great conversation!  Quenching burning thirsts since 2015!

Stop by for a drink, stay because you like it.

Experience the essence of Finnish sauna culture amidst the Playa's embrace. Our camp offers invigorating sauna sessions, traditional löyly rituals, and the chance to encounter real life sauna elves! Join us for communal relaxation, deep connection, and the transcendent warmth of the Northern spirit.

Join us for communal relaxation, deep connection, and the transcendent warmth of the Northern spirit.

Experience traditional Finnish sauna magic, heavenly steam and perfect sweat guided by authentic sauna elves. Tranquility, haven of relaxation and purification of body&mind&soul. Clothing optional, no showers. Bring your own towel and body

Steam of Life is a place for tranquility and contemplation. It's a process of rejuvenation by the elements of Finnish nature and wisdom, taking one from birth to death and after. It offers a calm heaven to be in peace, or in heat.  In this shared steam and space one can find healing or joyful experiences.

Welcome to our wild and whimsical dancefloor, where the vibes are as sexy as they are hilarious! Picture a vibrant space filled with young, adventurous souls ready to unleash their inner party animal. PLOP is a playground of creativity, featuring DJs spinning the hottest house & techno beats that will keep you dancing until the sun goes down.

Costumes are a must here—think playful, provocative, and downright outrageous! Whether you're rocking pasties, neon tutus, or something kinkier, you'll fit right in. Join us for one of our daytime dance parties or evening happyhours filled with laughter, freedom, and a sprinkle of mischief. This is the place to let loose, connect with like-minded individuals, and make memories you won't remember.
We share our love of sailing by offering instruction, and use of our fleet of wind-powered rigs
BRYC is a gathering and performance space for Aeolian celebrants.  We share our fleet of wind-powered rigs, and provide instruction in the art of land sailing.
A gathering place for Aeolian Celebrants: land sailing, kiting, sunset frisbee meditation. Breaking wind on the playa since 2004.
Black Rock Yacht Club is an arena for aeolian celebrants. We teach sailing on our our custom-built windsurfers-on-wheels.
Black Rock Yacht Club - a camp for aeolian celebrants.
Black Rock Yacht Club - a camp for land sailors and aeolian celebrants.

Snacklandia is a whimsical camp serving up surprise snack and drink pairings through our interactive Spinning Wheel.
Each spin brings a random delight—salty, sweet, spicy, or maybe a group hug. New this year is our Nail Art Station, where Burners can express their favorite Burning Man principles through creative, glitter-filled nail art. With daily tastings, playful workshops, and spontaneous fun, Snacklandia invites you to come curious and leave deliciously surprised.

A Butt Bounce? Or a bag of Zapp's New Orleans Kettle Style Voodoo Chips? Step into Snacklandia, where every spin yields a surprise and every bite sparks an adventure. Embark on a journey through wild flavors, engaging workshops, and a vibrant community that revels in the extraordinary. Here, taste knows no boundaries, and Burning Man transforms into a playground for the curious and the epicurean. We're crafting two giant spinning wheels brimming with wild and unexpected flavors, elevating the Snacklandia experience to new heights of surprise and delight. Our menu, ever-evolving, draws inspiration from the diverse cultural backgrounds of our campmates each year. Get ready for a taste adventure that changes daily and annually, reflecting the rich tapestry of our community's culinary heritage!
The Firehouse bar at Do More Now is the best little hangout in the neighborhood.  We have parties, events, workshops, and performances happening every day. Come and introduce yourself!
The Firehouse bar at Do More Now is the best little hangout in the neighborhood.  We have parties, events, workshops, and performances happening every day. Come and introduce yourself!
The Firehouse bar at Do More Now is the best little hangout in the neighborhood.  We have parties, events, workshops, and performances happening every day. Come and introduce yourself!

Do-More-Now is a setting in which art can flourish. We assist the camps that make up our village to bring various artworks each year: static, interactive, performance. We also create studio & maker spaces in which art can be created: glass-blowing, painting, crafting. Our iconic Firehouse incorporates 250 ft of wall space on which we encourage people to paint using the many pots of paint and brushes we provide. We view art as intrinsically collaborative – the playa allows us to collaborate directly with residents of BRC.
The 5 story Firehouse bar is the most recognizable symbol of Do-More-Now. Visible from the Man it is a perpetual draw for the curious, and for old friends and sector mates. Our intention is to create a space where folks gather before adventures, and decompress afterwards.

Drop in anytime and share our great views, Mimosa bar, themed parties, art and chill space or just warm up by the fire and watch the fire spinners & pyros go to work.
 http://do-more-now.com/

Drop in anytime and share our great views, Mimosa bar, themed parties, art and chill space or just warm up by the fire and watch the fire spinners & pyros go to work.
http://do-more-now.com/

Each year camp Do-More-Now brings to Burning Man the Firehouse, a five story building providing a relaxing hangout, one of the best views on the playa, a bar, and a space and materials for people to create awesome art. In addition we host bands, fire dancers and hold themed parties most evenings and award winning morning Mimosa bar.
We are "Do-More-Now": a loose community of Burners committed to art and partying. On the playa we build the famous Firehouse and encourage drive-by art: we bring the paint, you bring the talent.

Stop by the five story Firehouse for 24 hour painting, Cool your jets in our second story chill out lounge (with some of the coolest day time temps on the playa) or catch a glass blowing show from our in house studio.

24 hour U-Paint gallery with upstairs Lounge and observation deck. You can paint a mastepeice in the gallery or warm your bones around our burn barrel at night. You can also check out our dancing, DJ’s and live performances.

Welcome to the UnConventional Center where you can paint in our Gallery, relax in the Hammock Bar, climb into a snazzy Snooze Pod or take in the sights by day or the starry skies by night on the Observation Deck… lounge in our CuddleP uddle under the shade, get your nails painted or become a Universal Citizen: it’s all here!You are invited to our annual 50’s Housewife Party, Wednesday 1-4pm.

Enjoy cool beverages, impeccably timed snacks, gut laughs and hearty camaraderie through comedy and karaoke with your friends, the Space Cats!  We do it for the love. You know you're curious…stop by for open karaoke, or earn a spot to make us laugh with your comedy tight five.

Enjoy cool beverages, impeccably timed snacks, hearty camaraderie, and the best karaoke system on the playa (we checked) with your friends the Space Cats! Find us in camp or on the move with our mobile karaoke unit, spreading music and song through BRC. We do it for the love. You know you're curious…
Come make good decisions at Pour Decisions Winery while listening to mediocre music.
Come make good decisions at Pour Decisions Winery while listening to mediocre music.
Come make good decisions at Pour Decisions Winery while listening to mediocre music.
Pour Decisions Winery is a place where people come and make good decisions on wine. Stop by and we will pour you delicious wines from across the lands and play mediocre music.

We're the GDI's (Gawd Damn Independents), and we're working for the Man - We are Gerlach-ians, Reno-ites, plus one gawd damn Canuck -  all with "Playa MacGyver" skill sets. Drop in late afternoon or late at night as you might catch us enjoying a hot coffee or cold one...after work. Pull up; dust off a chair and share your best "There was this one time at Burning Man" story around our fire-pit. We might trade a trinket, a laugh, or one of our stories for your effort. We have Burned forever, and we long the days of Cacophonic attitudes; however - if speed past our camp on a 'lectric bike - that'll be us - yelling at you -  "SLOW the F*** down...". Dusty hugs and squinty eyed smiles back at yah; "In Dust - We can Trust".  Peace, Love & Hugs - the GDI's. (insert smiley emoji "here").

We're the Gawd Damn Independents - and we're workin' for the Man - perhaps you are too. Stop by and say hello after your long dusty day; if your bike needs a bit of TLC - we'll try to MacGyver something for you. If it's hot - we'll crack a cold drink and you can tell us a story about your work under our shade - while you share your best -  "there was this one time at Burning Man..." story.

We're BM Workers - and you might be too. Maybe you just need to take time to watch the street activity roll by, with a cold beer in your hand and a snacks on a dusty table after a busy time at work. This little camp is a Sit+Chill - where we'll talk about our past BM stories; like there was this one time at Burning Man... and complain about the latest crop of Birgins and the sound camp two doors down. We'll be up early for sunrise - so don't bother dropping in until I get back at 9am or we are off shift at 4pm.
Cult BYUS
Byus does Retirement in 2019! We will fix your bike with a smile & a side of heckling! Come jump our jump, enjoy our shade, music & events all week! Retirement living has never been this good!
A place to park your bike and chill while meeting new friends, listening to great music, and maybe finding all the answers to questions you didn't even know you had!

Whether you seek magic or inspiration, join us at Camp Amulet.  At our Amulet table, you'll be gifted a brass dog tag; pre-stamped with the Burning Man symbol. Our highly skilled Amulet Counselors will guide and inspire you to make your mark, and answer the great pressing questions of your life as you customize your Amulet. Using metal stamping tools you can add names, numbers, symbols, astrological signs, and Viking runes.  After you have all the answers, we'll put your Amulet on a necklace, keychain or bracelet for you when you're finished.

Bring out your inner Animalia as you enter our dome with your favorite animal call, bird song or howl at Camp Amulet! Welcome to Amulet- Where a highly skilled team of Amulet Counselors will guide you in crafting a stunning brass token which will certainly bring you fortune, fame and additional amazingness.  When you enter our shady dome, you are gifted a brass dog tag upon which the Burning Man symbol is stamped.  You then join a table of other would-be artisans using hammers and metal stamps to customize each of your own Amulet into a meaningful token of your burn.  When you're finished, we attach your Amulet onto a necklace or keychain for you.

Join us at Amulet where our highly trained Amulet Counselors will guide you in the use of metal stamping tools to create your own amulet, memento, or talisman made from a brass dog tag blank.  When you're finished,  share your creation with amazing new friends at the Amulet table and let us tie a necklace cord or put it on a chain for you.

ROBOTS AND HUMANS all are welcome to craft a brass Amulet- recording your experience, your mark, or a symbol that represents your burn.  Our Amulet counselors will guide you in creating a personal token on a brass dog tag with metal stamped words, numbers & symbols.

An amulet goes with you, and draws you back toward a radical ritual; reminding you of your own participation, your impact, and your amazing decisions- bridging intention and manifestation.  Welcome to Amulet;  let our counselors guide you to craft a record of your rite of passage in brass.

Amulet- An ornament or small piece of jewelry thought to give protection against evil, anger or disease, power for stirring creative juices for new ideas, and bringing love and hope to a dreary life.  It is said that Da Vinci possessed an unusual amulet that he always kept close to him.  We wish to empower participants with similar protection and positive energy.  

Entering our dome, our guests are invited to emboss letters, numbers, and symbols onto a brass plate (aka dog tag) or a brass disc; creating an Amulet to carry with them around their neck, or perhaps to gift to another.

We bring the hotdog, we are the hotdog. We relish every opportunity to ketchup with old friends or meat new ones. Hot weiners, cold drinks, cool tunes, what else do you need? We are here to help you find the true condiment of your soul. Stop by the Triple D Diner for the coffee and grilled cheese, but stay for the good ol fashioned camaraderie. What'll ya have, hun?

hotdog? HotDog! HOTDOG! Come by for a hot meat tube and a cold beverage. We are hotdog and so can you!

Red.it.be is a techno camp at Burning Man that channels the Berlin club scene with the best techno music and a giant dark cube dance floor. During the day, it's a chill-out space, and at night, the party continues with high-quality techno music. The camp is open to everyone and encourages self-expression.

Need a respite from the heat of the playa? Camp "&" invites you to come enjoy our shave ice, spam musubi and more at our Hawaii themed afternoon events.

Need a respite from the heat of the playa? Camp "&" invites you to come enjoy our family-friendly face painting, shaved ice, spam musubi and more at our tiki themed afternoon events. And more? Yes, and more - come with your curious and curiouser spirit and you shall be rewarded with an even chillier treat.

Camp & will be hosting boozy snowcones in the afternoon and karaoke nights in the evening. Come by in the afternoon and cool off in our shaded space and make some new friends. Then come back in the evening with your favorite tune and sing your heart out. If you need a break from EDM, and just want some Britney bitch, this will be your spot!

participants who visit.

Join us for rest, ease, and libations in the Tazii Moroccan Tent chill lounge 24 hours a day! Our bar is filled with pillows and rugs to get cozy with new and old friends. Swamp-cooled during the day for the perfect nap, themed cocktails in the evening to inspire a great night, and good times all the time.

​​Lustre Village provides a bouquet of burner pleasures from nighttime film exhibitions in the Moolandia Outdoor Mooovie Theater, to immersive theatrical experiences at the Fever Dream Theater. Join us for rest, ease, and libations in the Tazii Moroccan Tent chill lounge 24 hours a day!

Lustre Village provides a bouquet of burner pleasures!  If you've ever had a secret desire to sing onstage with a band, Moolandia Live Band Karaoke will unleash your inner rockstar and make it happen!  Then, step through the windmill into the red velvet Fever Dream Theater. Our classic cabaret theater performs comedy, tragedy, mime, dance, live music, and some stuff that will feel like you're having a Fever Dream.   Witness our wild, weird, and wonderful Vaudeville Variety Show or audition for a role!  Afterwards, or any time, join us for rest, ease, and libations in the Tazii Moroccan chill lounge 24 hours a day every day!  Replete with authentic, lush furnishings from the souks of Marrakesh, warm lighting, and the octagonal Tazii bar, from which we serve top-shelf cocktails.

Lustre Village provides a bouquet of burner pleasures from daytime glittering in the Glitterbox, to immersive theatrical experiences at the Fever Dream Theater.  Join us for rest, ease, and libations in the Tazii tent chill lounge 24 hours a day.

Lustre Village provides a bouquet of burner pleasures from daytime glittering, in the Glitterbox, to night time movies at the Moolandia Movie Theatre.  Join us for rest, ease, and libations in the Tazii tent chill lounge 24 hours a day, or enjoy the evening tones of our David Bowie/Talking Heads cover band.

Lustre Village provides a bouquet of burner pleasures from daytime glittering, in the Glitterbox, to night time movies at the Drive-by Theatre.  Join us for rest, ease, and libations in the Tazii tent chill lounge 24 hours a day, or enjoy the evening tones of our David Bowie/Talking Heads cover band.

Tazii will provide Moroccan chill space and top-shelf bar.  Glittercamp will make the masses shiny and glittery, as nature intended, with our special glitter-slather concoction. The Pulsefield returns with nighttime interactive video fun, and our house band returns to perform Talking Heads!

Lustre Village returns!  Tazii will provide Moroccan chill space and top-shelf bar.  Glittercamp will make the masses shiny and glittery, as nature intended, with our special glitter-slather concoction.  New this year will be live music, including our house David Bowie cover band!
Providing that Ali Baba chill vibe since 2001.

Tazii is a chill space that welcomes folks to wander into an authentic Moroccan tent filled with flowers, candles, tapestries and ambient music each night into dawn. The tent rises from the playa floor to soar over 40’ in the air; the inside of the tent beckons with hand-sewn silk inlaid gold-colored panels that provide an ambience of romance and respite…Tazii provides a refuge for the body as well as the spirit.

As part of Sanctuary Village, Tazii is a chill space that welcomes folks to wander into our authentic Moroccan tent filled with flowers, candles, tapestries and ambient music each night. During the day Tazii hosts yoga and reiki and impromptu music jam sessions.

Tazii is a camp within the Village Sanctuary. Tazii theme campe is a Moroccan tent structure that provides a stunning background for impromptu musical jam sessions during the day. At night, the tent is transformed into a romantic, candle-lit luxurious space with a “chill” atmosphere with music mixed by playa DJs.
Come relax in luxurious Moroccan splendor at Tazii! Yoga, music jams, general chill… in our beautiful festival tents, di-rect from Marrakesh…

Welcome to I Forgot.  We are an art / human support camp supporting several playa art pieces.  In camp we have the Playa Mart with all the items you forgot like sun glasses, tooth paste, etc. and shade lounge for relaxation  and free Wifi.  Open from 12 noon to 5:00 pm and more...  Refresh with a cold water, a chance to cool off in the mist and check email with loved ones who could not make the Playa.  You can also meet Burning Man artists that camp with us and you can volunteer to help with their art.  We have an art garden in camp as well as art support vehicles to support our Playa art.

Welcome to Water Wifi and Whiskey.  We are an art / human support camp supporting several playa art pieces (including Ignus by Jordie Laidlaw) and the people of Burning Man by providing in-camp art like "The Crow's Nest".  This is a new art piece to the playa created by artist Rob Garett.  It is a  24' tall by 50' wide spiral stair art structure and shade area / misting system, relaxation  and the lounging area that will have free Wifi.  Open from 12 noon to 5:00 pm and more...  Refresh with a cold water, a chance to cool off in the mist and check email with loved ones who could not make the Playa.  You can also meet 6 Burning Man artists that camp with us and you can volunteer to help with their art.  We have an art garden in camp as well as art support vehicles to support our Playa art.
Come learn photography, dust proof your camera or come learn Body painting!  All is offered at Over Exposed.

Over Exposed - a place for models (or "want-to-be" models) photographers and videographers to gather learn and collaborate.  We offer dust proofing supplies for cameras, formal photography and video classes, photography field trips, rides on our art car, and so much more.  Drop by in the evening for our photo happy hour or stay later as we hold classes on how to photograph fire performers.  We are a camp within a village full of performers, musicians and artists.  If you are looking for someone to shoot, or if you want creative images of yourself or your fiends, please come by!

Are you a photographer/videographer... or want to be?  We have 15 professional or semi-photographers/videographers, two or three professional models, a bus driver (for photography field trips in his DMV approved vehicle) and others who will/have serve(d) black rock city that want to teach you or talk with you about photographing Burning Man.  We teach "how to" photography classes, we lead photography/videography tours, we embrace the ethics of shooting media at Burning Man, etc.    From the very basics of how to take a "camera off auto" and "how to shoot great photos on your smart phone" to advanced stuff like shooting fire breathers and fire dancers at night, you can catch one of several classes each day. Or, You can drop by and ask what is wrong with this piece of shit camera.

Come by and see our schedule of events!

Also, we will have a solar charging station for camera batteries, camera protection and cleaning supplies and a place (out of the dust) where people can change lenses.

Come sit by our fire, enjoy a cup of tea, and a side of Burning Man that is connective, simple, and grounding. 
Sunset-sunrise tea service. Cozy fire pit. Daily workshops.

The Sweet Spot is an enchanting, safe, and sacred space to explore our vulnerability and humanity through movement practices, spirituality, explorations of human relationships, and play. 

We aim to nurture the body, mind, and spirit of all beings by offering spaces, events, and offerings to meet everybody exactly where they are. 

Enjoy our Self-Care Tent, Come drink some herbal delights at our Elixir Bar, Melt into the Honey Pot Tea House, Play, Be Entertained, and Groove on Our Boogie Floor & Carefully Crafted Food Party Events, OH MY! 

Oh and the fire pit, every night come by and warm your face and heart. 

See you here.
