Welcome to The Sweet Spot

We aim to nurture the body, mind, and spirit of all beings by offering spaces, events, and offerings to meet everybody exactly where they are.

We deeply value the nourishment of genuine connection, rest, ritual, good ass food, and play.

We cater to all human beings,
 both shadow and light,
 both high highs and low lows, 
with needs for rest and introversion and needs for being seen and extroversion, and so many shades in between. 
That is the sweet spot.
 Being right where we are in any given moment, and having the space, tools, community, and nourishment to hold us along the way!
We offer a variety of Workshops like:
-Daily Practices
-Dance & Community Circles
-Cacao, Heartfelt Rituals, Communication Spaces
-Exciting Food events + Rejuvenating Non-Alcoholic Beverages & more!

Welcome to Camp Endstation, your intimate oasis at Burning Man. Dive into deep human connections in our cozy space adorned with cushions and rugs, all set to the backdrop of soothing lounge music. Receive a crafted ticket to explore scheduled and spontaneous activities, and engage in meaningful conversations sparked by our unique 'Who Cards'. Each morning, our pavilion transforms into a coffee bar with massages, promoting reflection and connection. Embrace the tranquility of our communal area, designed with an enchanting oriental atmosphere for relaxation and nightly festivities. Our camp is a sanctuary for shared stories and experiences, inviting you to rediscover yourself and connect deeply with fellow burners.

Welcome dusty traveler, to Lucid Paradise - a universe born from our collective vision to awaken wonder within the hearts of all who enter. 

As the sun dips below the horizon and the stars ignite the sky, surrender yourself to the magic of our dreamlike wonderland. Behold the illuminated flower garden and a floating blossoming Lantern Wall that casts a spellbinding glow.

Afternoons, come savor our ice-cold che dessert with fruits and jellies, and evenings, come try our late night snacks -- spank musubis, dirty sausages, and more. 

Experience a full sensorial immersion that will leave you breathless and yearning for more.

Welcome dusty traveler, to Lucid Paradise - a universe born from our collective vision to awaken wonder within the hearts of all who enter. 

As the sun dips below the horizon and the stars ignite the sky, surrender yourself to the magic of our dreamlike wonderland. Behold the illuminated flower garden and a floating blossoming Lantern Wall that casts a spellbinding glow.

Afternoons, come savor our ice-cold che dessert with fruits and jellies, and evenings, come try our late night snacks -- spank musubis, dirty sausages, and more.

Camp Goat Energy helps you align with your highest self. Through rituals, games, and connection-based experiences like "Messages from the Universe" and radical self-expression activities, we create a vibrant, empowered, and sustainable playa home.

Our camp offers a vibrant, interactive space dedicated to community connection and fun. We provide free Mexican coffee, chocolate, and sweets, along with chill areas and casual activities for everyone to enjoy. We encourage creativity, inclusivity, and exploration, inviting all Burners to experience a warm and welcoming atmosphere where everyone can feel at home. Join us for a unique experience where sharing, laughter, and new friendships are at the heart of everything we do.
We are a dynamic camp, open to meeting you and welcoming you with a big hug, a smile and inviting you to spend a pleasant time with us.

Our provides a guided I-Ching oracle experience. Come in for a reading a check in with yourself to see how well you are balanced with your life and the universe. Readings take nearly an hour. Pedicab rides will be available contingent upon the driver arriving upon the Playa.
"Ride, I-Ching, Ride" theme camp will offer I-Ching readings  at camp and pedicab rides from out on the Playa.

Founded by Montanan's on a mission to bring good will, great drinks, funk and house. Our crew is ever expanding but the mission remains the same.

For 8 years, the Astropups have been known for providing a cool and furry oasis on the playa where countless queers have crossed paths and met new friends. The Astropups camp has always been a hub of daytime and nighttime activity, our events are always a good time for all.
This will be Astropups 8th year of fabulous fun on the playa. We’ll be returning with our own brand of frisky frivolity that Burners have come to know and love.
Astropups are back for our 7th year, proud to be part of Avalon Village!We’ll be providing the usual amount of fun and merriment Astropups have been famous for since the dawn of this century.
Art Support Camp for PATCHES.  Come kick up your feet, chill out, and learn about the building of our art project in our Museum tent.

A cat cafe in reverse!  We cats pamper, play with, and offer treats and enrichment activities to you humans- with an aim to nurture, delight, and heal your inner child. 
Ever been to a cat cafe? That place where folks can go to hang out with and give affection and attention to cats? With all the treats, games, coos, and chin scritches you may have asked yourself, "how can I get a life like THIS?" Well, have we got the thing for you.  What if the roles were  reversed and the cats fed, played with, and soothed you? Wanna give it a try? Come on down to Secret Passage Human Cat Cafe. We have treats! Who knows, maybe you'll even get adopted. 
We have 24- hour iced coffee, tea, lemonade.
ICED CHAI PawsittiviTEA, Live cat karaoke singalongs, and other nonsense 11am to 3pm.

FLUFFY'S SECRET: 
A surrealist, cloud-scape CAFE of your waking dreams, with:
24 hour self-serve iced coffee, tea, and lemonade,
Plus DAILY SPECIALS of fluffy treats: either edible, visual, audio, or performance

Did you know that in another dimension, right now, a group of cats on a feline-dominated planet are ALSO going to Burning Man...er Burning Cat?  Thanks to these felines' superior interstellar technology they have constructed a wormhole that - for one week in August only- will end directly at SECRET PASSAGE CAMP.  Don't worry, they come in peace(ish).  They just want to convert you into one of them! They'll do this by inviting you through their wormhole and into their space shuttle to undergo a metamorphic HUMAN TO SPACE CAT SOUND BATH. After your conversion to space cat, delicious Thai Iced Tea and treats will be served at the SPACE CAT CAFE. Although I suspect that once you finish your tea they will knock your glass off the table with their paw while looking you directly in the eye.

Go from analogue to digital at SECRET PASSAGE AUDIO BAR. Bathe in sounds, listen to tales of robots, and dance with spacecats.  You may enter as a hellacious hippie, but you'll leave as a radical robot!
Come find the SECRET PASSAGE INTERACTIVE SPEAKEASY!  Have a drink, play a parlor game, do some time-traveling.  A traditional speakeasy, except sometimes with space cats.
A small camp dedicated to the secrets we all carry within us, helping share ourselves with each other, with the help of a bit of booze, a place to hangout, a photobooth, and more.

Camp Hot Cheeks is a theme camp focused on having fun, engaging with BRC community, inviting people to enjoy our lounge and nonsense. We host an annual event the Sunday after the man burns called Sake Bomb Sunday. Sake Bomb Sunday is an end of burn tradition at Camp Hot Cheeks. It is a day of celebration and camaraderie. Burners from all walks of life come together to enjoy sake bombs and celebrate the end of the burn.

Explore, Engage, Evolve: Transformation Amidst the Magic of Burning Man.

Discover a world where transformative experiences and interactive art merge to create a sanctuary of healing, reflection, and communal celebration. Dive into classes or workshops during the day, sign up for 1-1 healings, and co-create collective narratives that envision a future of interconnectedness and environmental consciousness. Join us to embrace a journey of self-discovery, connection, and personal growth, set against a backdrop of music, meditation, and the magic of shared experiences!

You Look Amazing is not just a camp name, but a state of mind. We LOVE each and everyone of you and want to get to know you better. 

Our camp is an oasis of wellness at Burning Man. Where mind, body, and spirit converge in a harmonious dance of rejuvenation and exploration. Nestled amidst the pulsating energy of the playa, our camp offers a sanctuary unlike any other—a haven where participants can immerse themselves in a holistic journey of self-discovery and transformation.

Join us for yoga, mindfulness, workshops, dancing and the best crepes you've ever had, we promise. They're better than sex. 

So come, weary travelers, and let us wrap you in dusty hugs and smiles. Tell us your stories and we'll tell you ours.

If you're an accomplished or aspiring artist, cartoonist, singer, comic, improv maven, writer, or game enthusiast, on-stage model, dancer, or dramatic reader, Pepperland has much for you plus some radical rituals on-Playa. Want a massage or a snack?Our campers can serve you, plus with Laughter Yoga and Longevity Stick exercises to get your Xi flowing like the Playa wind blows. It's our 10th year at BRC, the spirit of the Fab Four still inspires us. 3-D art is yours; we've got the glasses for it, and the views to go with 'em. Our week includes 200-plus hours of interactive, inventive entertainment.  Need a home at home?  We are it.

If you're an accomplished or aspiring artist, cartoonist, singer, comic, improv maven, or game enthusiast, on-stage model, dancer, or dramatic reader, Pepperland has much for you in Leonardo's Workshop on the Playa.  If you need/want a massage or something to drink or eat, our renaissance men and women are here to serve you, and with Laughter Yoga plus Longevity Stick exercises to get your Xi flowing like the Playa wind blows - - and so much more.  It's our ninth year on Playa, and with our new name.  Formerly "Cartoon Commune," we felt inspired by DaVinci's inventiveness to blend his genius with that of the Fab Four.  No kidding!  You'll see our "hill" where you can be a fool on it; maybe even a periscope for peering out at octopuses and who knows what else at BRC.  The third dimension is yours; we've got the glasses for it - and the views to go with 'em.  Our week will include over 50 hours of interactive, inventive entertainment.  Need a home at home?  Check us out.

If you're an aspiring cartoonist, artist, singer, comic, or game enthusiast, on-stage model, dancer, reader, or goth rocker, there is much for you at Cartoon Commune in the Carnival of Mirrors. If you need a massage or something to drink, we're here to serve your preference, and with Laughter Yoga as of yore, plus revered Longevity Stick exercises to get your Xi flowing like the Playa wind blows — and so much more, in our 9th year on Playa.

Come eat the best crepes in ze world!
Real French Crepes, made by a real French crew!
Choose to have your French crepe flambée with Rum, or one of our non alcoholic option.

Come eat the best crepes in ze world!
Real French Crêpes, made by a real French crew, vegan or not, flambées or not, with a large choice of toppings, served along with Fresh Coffee

The hangout for quasi-legal alien beatniks, mutant cyborg gear heads, trans-solar scooter gangs, radical anarchist raypunks, neuroatypical geeks, freaked-out psychonauts, and caffeine fiends of every stripe.

Roll on by our camp for friendly bike repairs! Whether it's a flat, a squeaky chain, or some Playa mystery, we've got your bike covered so you can keep cruising without a hitch. We're here to get your ride back in action so you can keep the fun going.

But it's not just about repairs—we've created a super chill space to relax, swap stories, and soak up the good vibes. Whether you need a quick fix, a break from the dust, or just want to hang out with fellow Burners, we've got great company and a laid-back atmosphere waiting for you.

And if you can't make it to us, don't worry! We actively cruise around the Playa looking for bikes in need of some TLC. Flag us down, and we'll get you back on track! Plus, if you're extra comfy, we can even make house calls!

Ever get a flat tire in Deep Playa and feel like you'll never get back to camp? We're here to help! Our camp "Chain Reaction" has daily mobile bicycle repair teams with our logo and motte: "Break 'N Fix!" With some serendipity your Playa miracle awaits you!

If you would like to get involved, no experience is necessary as we go by the DIY model of "see one, do one, teach one." Come by our camp to meet us. 

Happy (dusty) trails!

Ever get a flat tire in the the Deep Playa and feel like you'll never get back to camp? We're here to help! Our camp "Chain Reaction" has daily (and nightly) mobile bike repair teams with our logo and motto: "Brake 'N Fix!" With some serendipity your Playa Miracle awaits you!

If you would like to get involved, no experience or tools necessary as we go by the DIY model of "see one, do one, teach one". Come on by our camp to meet us or reach out to us if you are in the San Francisco Bay Area or Montreal, Canada.

Happy (Dusty) Trails!

- Camp Chain Reaction

Bubblegasm is a mutant vehicle built to spread the joy of bubbles and lights with all those who ride on her or dance and play around her. Bubbles are a metaphor for life, fleeting and fragile and are a reminder about how precious our time is while we are here, and to make the most of each moment. And like each bubble, each person and their life is beautiful and unique. Bubbles are also temporary and once they pop they become part of the universe, just as we do when we die. When people encounter bubbles it is a like a rare moment of magic. They symbolize our childhood innocence, reminding us of a time when life was simple and carefree. When we see these glass-like orbs dancing in the air they remind us to live in the moment, let go, dance with a stranger, be silly - have a bubblegasm!

Our music always meets the vibe and raises it up a notch! Come celebrate Black Rock City in Valhalla!

Valhalla On The Playa, a Norse idea of heaven, we will be a place to take off the armor of life and begin to slip into the beginnings of afterlife. Our drinks will be cold, our men and woman lithe and cheerful, as we are all guided to our final resting place in our shady comfortable lounge.

Welcome to Juicy Rootz, where the fruit is juicy, the vibes are juicier. Swing by and meet us, the delightfully playful, slightly unhinged, and always heart-centered Juicies! We're serving up two workshops/parties where you can get your hands sticky making wearable art out of dried, resin-soaked citrus. That's right—your new accessory is made of fruit. 
Come for the fruit, stay for the unfiltered joy, the spontaneous dance-offs, and when you're dehydrated from all that wiggling, we've got you covered with non-alcoholic electrolyte drinks at our "Juice Bar".

Juicy Rootz is offering Juicy Frootz (that you can wear!). Stop by and meet us— the playful, welcoming and heart-centered Juicies. We'll be offering two workshops/parties wherein you'll get to make a piece of wearable art out of dried and resonated citrus fruit to help commemorate your week on the playa forever. We'll also be standing by with refreshing non-alcoholic electrolyte drinks at our "Juice Bar." Come for the Froot, stay for the wiggles, connecting and joyful vibes.

As the bass fades and the creaking of your bike becomes audible once again, you turn onto tan unfamiliar street.  Appearing as the breeze sweeps the dust from the ground is a warmly lit wooden cottage, beckoning with firelight and the soft sound of mandolin and laughter.

Catawampus is ramshackle and sincere, just like our group of members, relationships and structures built with love and found materials. We spread the mantra of "magically imperfect", both in our on playa offerings and in our compassion for all people. We tap into the old wisdom, of the land and ancestors, worn but still worthy, to bring comfort and connection to all who venture to our porch. We are askew, perfect in our irregularity, having found a place that only we fit. You will fit too.

SlöMóth is the birth of night striving toward the light — a space where all participants become moths, both visually and philosophically. Inspired by post-modernist ideas, our camp blends curiosity, playfulness, and the irresistible pull toward brightness.

Spot our mischievous moths by their Fluffy Pink Coats, Wiggling Antennae or at least The Moustache. If we're not in camp, we're flocking toward distant lights or performing a ritual at our beloved installation — The Moth.

Camp Synaesthesia is a dreamworld where movement, sound, and light unite. Come play on our 26' tower, dance to live music and DJ sets, enjoy a refreshing NA beverage, and vibe with our signature bass floor installation.
Visit our synaesthetic dreamworld where movement/light/sound unite!

Camp Synaesthesia is a synaesthetic dreamworld where movement, light, and sound unite, empowering groups to create and experience multisensory, collaborative performances. Interact with our immersive spatially mapped light and sound installation or come jam with us. We will be hosting a variety of workshops and collaborative performances of all kinds!

Contact us if you'd like to collaborate!

A synesthetic dreamworld where movement, light, and sound unite, empowering groups to create multisensory, collaborative performances. Pulling on levers, traversing a slackline, jumping on buttons, strumming a guitar, beating a drum will cause corresponding light and sound patterns to ripple through the area.  Bring your own instrument and we'll mic it! Explore the powerful, multi-user, spatially integrated interface that enables complex live-looping musical and visual production. The week long session is recorded for posterity, and may be re-lived post-burn. Visit http://synaesthesia.camp for happenings, video demos, and perhaps to book the space for a special event you would like to host in the space (i.e. synaesthetic sound healing, choreographed dance/light/sound performance, etc.)

Synaesthesia bids you to join us in The Temple of Ebbing Reality. Through the powerful and ancient rituals of music and dance, we invite you to worship at the altar of your consciousness in our psychedelic, underwater temple. Amid magickal mermaids, otherworldly fish, holy shrines, esoteric relics and spellcrafting music, all fellow seekers, shaman djs, ecstatic dancers and others are welcome to conjure deities and divine consciousness in our sacred, subaqueous realm.

Carrot Tribe is a self-care sanctuary where you can unwind, refresh, and glow with carrot-infused treatments. From soothing carrot seed oil massages to hydrating face masks, we'll pamper you from root to tip. Sip on a carrot juice mimosa and let your stress veg out in our cozy, shaded oasis!
A groovy sound camp for all things carrot! Come disco with us while we serve you carrot ginger cocktails. Some days we'll even serve you carrot cake or carrot ginger soup with grilled cheese.
Carrot Tribe is a sound camp bringing only the best vibes via house, techno, positivity, and booze. And of course carrots.

Edna's Oasis, where the elephants instinctively flock like the bassheads of capastrano. Feel the rumble of every step.

Meow What!  Come by and meet Edna, climb on the Pagoda, and dance to the bass.
Camp Meow or Never!  Come check out the star pagoda.  It is a refuge, and a place where all kinds of things happen.
Support camp for the Playa Blacksmith Shop.

The DECO FISH ART CARS ARE exotic creatures of the deep. Bright rainbows of glorious PSYCHEDELIC illumination, with powerful FIRE effects and rockin' sound systems laced up with intricate ART DECO styling throughout.  Come and say HI! And we'll give you a ride you won't forget.

The Deco Fish Twins Art Cars were built in 2016 in West Oakland, California. These nautical wonders were designed and fabricated by a dedicated team of artists and craftsfolk that continue to maintain and improve upon them each year.  Owners Andy Tannehill & Kimberly Medici worked with the founder of their former collaborative Burning Man Camp, Star Star Roadhouse, to creatively direct how the Deco Fish would best allow groups of people with bikes to enjoying amazing sound you can feel in your heart while still being able to chat and dance freely on a gorgeous platform with bright psychedelic kaleidoscopic lighting.

Welcome to The Prawn Shop at Burning Man, your one-stop shop for underwater misadventures! Dive into our Deep Sea Dive Bar if you dare, and try not to spill your Bloody Mary while losing at Prawn Shop Blackjack. Find refuge (or maybe just more chaos) in Trader's Cove dome. Our Bloody Marys are as infamous as our hospitality is questionable. Brace yourself for late-night shenanigans, sea-themed absurdity, and questionable dance moves under the stars. Forget the treasure; the real prize is surviving the fun!

If you're lucky enough to go to Burning Man, you're lucky enough! Come see us at Apocalypse WOW, the place to be for all the things you love about the apocalypse (and don't): chaos, nonsensical games and logic, warm beer and putting on your best face even when it's hard… We're here to quash those vibes of impending world doom and give you a chance to prove you're not a narc while doing a naked handstand. We love you already, we look forward to giving you a high five, dancing with you into the wee hours and shaving your eyebrows.

American by birth; Black Rock City Citizen by the grace of the gods! Come see us at Apocalypse WOW, the place to be for all the things you love about the Apocalypse (and don't): Vietnamese iced coffee,  jousting in patriotic spandex, non sensical awards, cold beer and the famous spaghetti burrito…  We're here to quash those vibes of impending world doom and give you a chance to prove you're not a Narc while doing a naked handstand. We love you already, we look forward to giving you a high five and shaving your eyebrows.

We love you already, we look forward to giving you a high five and shaving your eyebrows.

American by birth; Black Right City Citizen by the grace of the gods! Come see us at Apocalypse WOW, the place to be for all the things you love about America (and don't): hot dogs, Vietnamese iced coffee, and jousting in patriotic spandex. We're here to quash those vibes of impending world doom and give you a chance to prove you're not a Narc while doing a naked handstand. We love you already.
Trade up! Go AWOL (or commando) at Apocalypse Wow. We're here to fulfill you need for cold beers, dusty beats and daily shenanigans. All comrades welcome!
You gotta bone to pick, soldier? Trade your warm beers for cold ones at our Cold Beer Exchange Bar! Go MIA or commando in our Officers' lounge!

Listen, soldier, if you like surfing, helicopters, sensationalized combat, or creepy jungle flute music, come to Apocalypse Wow. Or if you want immediate cold beverages "on command," any day of the week.

CAMPWWIT is place to ask yourself the question, "Wait, What's In This?" We explore the playa experience through snarky reflection, encouraging internal monologue and external dialogue through games, drinks, and music. With everything going on during the burn, we hope you can reflect on what's going on inside you with others to help bring these playa lessons out into the default world!

Camp Wait, What's in This? Come explore and share the depths of your experience as we beckon you to question yourself Wait, What's in this?

Step right up! Step Right up! to the CAMPWWIT Bar of Wonderment! Doors are open M-F
between 12-4 and during our daily events! We've got plenty of tantalizing activities for those that
dare dive into the unknown and ask of life the most important question, "Wait, what's in this?!"

Wait, What's In This? Wacky wanderers whirl the Wonderous WWIT Wheel of Wastedness for a surprise shot. Striving sommeliers puzzle their palates against our array of infused imbibements. Talented touchers test your tactile senses identifying objects in our mystery boxes. The boldest of the bunch brave enough to draw from the Flaming Bag of WWIT will receive a truth or dare type task.
Wander on over and we'll make you wonder "Wait, What's In This?"

"Oh Bee-Hive, Oh Bee-Hive, Where for art thou Bee-Hive?" Yes, that common call you've heard whispering across the playa on those cool blustery sand swirling days. Come fly to our magical sauna honeycomb where like-minded bees come to experience the buzz of meditation, relaxation, & rejuvenation. Our dry sauna honeycomb will wipe away the dust, sooth the skin, leaving you buzzing like never before. As you slip into your soothing honeypot the Queen Bee herself will offer up her delectable honey delights to recharge those exhausted wings.
We know the answer to the ultimate question. If you know it, come and tell us to claim your yummy prize.

Welcome shredders! BRCSC is the home of the first (and only) ski slope on the Playa! Come get outfitted for boots and skis or a board in our Rental Shop, then ascend the slope to rip down our 60-foot long, multi-tiered dry ski hill! Don't ski or snowboard, no problem! We'll have saucers aplenty for shredders of all ages to come and fly down the slope! Also hosting nightly Après Ski parties with phenomenal DJs, performers, and more! ❄)'(❄

Welcome shredders! BRCSC is the home of the first (and only) ski slope on the Playa! Come ski, snowboard, or sled down our 60-foot long, multi-tiered hill and enjoy refreshment at our bar! New for 2024: Disco Sledding!

Come join BRCSC and celebrate your love of all things snow with us!  Enjoy a refreshing, ice cold drink at our Après Ski bar and dance to the funky beats of our DJs!  Oh, and did we mention that we have the FIRST EVER SKI SLOPE ON PLAYA?!  Check the WhatWhereWhen for more details!

Come join BRCSC and celebrate your love of all things snow with us!  Enjoy an interactive drink at our Aprés Ski bar while our DJs provide tunes for your aural pleasure, or hurl snowballs at your friends in a classic game of Yukigassen!  You're always welcome to join us around our fire pit to swap stories and make new friends!  And ask us about our 5-year vision for the camp!  We promise you'll be as excited for it as we are!
Haggard? Wrecked? Us too! Stop into Last Camp Standing for refuge, games, workshops and more!
Lost at sea? On a boat without a paddle? Us too! Join Broken Compass for golden milk, workshops and more!
Lost at sea? On a boat without a paddle? Us too! Join Broken Compass for golden milk, workshops and more!

Broken Compass is a collection of travelers from a far away world, and we have built this forum to share with you all that we have seen, heard, and learned during our travels. Our world is comprised of 5 continents, each with its own unique story, culture, climate, and aesthetic. Over the next 5 years, we will be investigating each of these strange lands, then reconvening back here to tell of our adventures.

While our travels instilled in us a breadth of knowledge, the catharsis of adventure has left us with a desire to share our experiences with the world. Through workshops, lectures, performances, and merry making, our mission is to educate you in the ways of these 5 mysterious and foreign lands.  In addition to daily and nightly events, we will also be serving food and drink which we have discovered along the way.  And what of your travels?  Do you have stories to share with us?  Read through our story books, then add your own tales to be incorporated into our ever growing lore.

Glorious Chairman Meow provides customizable LED bicycle flags to the grateful citizens of Black Rock City during our LED bicycle flag creation stations. We seek to end the barbaric practice of bikicide: carelessly abandoning one's innocent bike to wither and die on the playa.

Do you know how much beer can fit inside a frisbee? Join us to find out, play ultimate frisbee, and other fun competitions with fellow burners!

Ultimate Frisbee is an inclusive, spirited community based around a self-officiated "sport", with events primarily organized by players themselves and gifting each other silly things. Sure feels a lot like Burning Man to us.

We're here to share ultimate frisbee with Burners, and also maybe drink those 54 ounces of beer.

We are a throng of dome-dwelling miscreants, hooligans, bloviators, simps, warlocks, horse girls, diggerfish, and charlatans. As one of the aforementioned groups, your birthright compels you to complete the pilgrimage to the fabled land of Neodebauchery. A melange of tomfoolery new and old, Neodebauchery provides a welcoming space for weirdos of all creeds, colors, and degree of crustiness. Come gyrate to the soothing, yet somehow also abrasive melodies of our human-DJ chimeras, witness visual distortion unlike you have seen (since your last burn) with our procedurally generated Digital Domeflesh, and participate in our daily sinful activities.

Your favorite wookiees are back! Swing by the legendary Wookiee Bodega, open daily from 12–5PM. Modeled after a classic NYC corner store, it's stocked with playa essentials (sunscreen, tampons, reusable water bottles) and completely unnecessary treasures (bedazzled jewelry, candy bars, knick-knacks galore). This year we've expanded the magic with Wardrobi, our free-playa costume closet where you can dress to express. Come for the goods, stay for the pop-up surprises, and return at night to gather 'round our public fire pit—a cozy, low-key hang spot for stories, laughs, and maybe a snack if you catch us at the right time.

Your favorite wookiees are back! Stop by our legendary Wookiee Bodega, open daily from 12-5PM. Modeled after a beloved NYC community bodega, it is a little convenience "store" for trinkets ranging from playa-essential (sunscreen, tampons, reusable water bottles)  to ostentatious indulgences (bedazzled jewelry, candy bars, decorative knick-knacks).
Come hang with the Wookiees of KashyyyK! Stop by our bodega any afternoon for all of your forgotten playa needs, and while your here, stay for a relaxing swing (or nap) in one of our many hammocks!

Welcome to the Wookiee Planet of KashyyyK, known for great music, dancing, big furry hugs, & Wookiee Juice! Beware of meteor showers...

Wookie Juice, Wookie Hugs, Wookie Art & Wookies dancing like... 
Well... like Wookies.
The Wookies are coming back from the jungle to bring you beats, booze, and KAVA!! Come lounge with us!
Welcome to the Jungle Planet of KashyyyK, home of the infamous Wookies of The Playa. Make sure to stop by for a Wookie Bear Hug or to sample our native libation, Wookie Juice!!

Welcome to the jungle planet of KashyyyK, home of the Wroshyr Trees. Come dance, play, and frolic in the shade around our tree trunks, wander through our Bottle Cap Flower Garden, and sample our native libation, Wookie Juice!

Experience the Wild Wild West at Dusty Dillas, a Western themed bar and a quesadilla saloon. Here you'll find comfort in assless chaps, refreshing libations, and some cheesy goodness. Come on down for a dusty good time and a chance to spin the wheel to determine your luck in the dust, lasso some bulls, or have a high noon duel.

Welcome to Wok Paper Scissors! Here in Sizzle City you battle for your stir fry. Come one, come all to Wok Paper Scissors, serving stir fry on the playa daily. To get your hands on a bowl of our delicious delights, you must first win a game of rock-paper-scissors! Do you have what it takes when noodles are at stake?

Feeling thirsty? We're bringing playful mischief back to the playa with a game that will have your mouth feeling drier than the playa. But don't worry, at our lush oasis we'll quench your thirst with ice-cold drinks and whimsical vibes.

Join us at Kostume Kult for daytime costume gifting, transformations, and costume runway shows (M-F 12:00-5:00), with evening events and dance parties. Born in NYC and baptized in BRC, we gift truckloads of costumes to those eager to strut down our runway with encouragement of our Emcees and DJ's, out onto Esplanade and out into your new Playa life. Also featuring a crafting tent, variety shows, fire performances, and random absurdities. Don't miss our annual Block Party on Wednesday night.

Kostume Kult is a costume art, theme event and street-theater club that has HUGE fun! Based in New York City with members internationally, our "kult" is an open one inviting all to pursue costumed creativity year-around and on playa.

Come to Kostume Kult for daytime costume transformations and runway shows (M-F, Noon-5pm) with evening events and dance parties. Born in NYC and baptized in BRC, we gift a truckload of costumes but you have to "wear it to own it" and dance down our runway with the encouragement of our DJs and Emcees -- out onto the Esplanade and into your new life. Also featuring ongoing dance music (intimate dance floor/ lower sound volumes) variety shows, random absurdities and a rich brew of playa magic including our annual Brooklyn Block Party on Wednesday evening.

Kostume Kult returns with a grand celebration of interactive costuming and creativity, against the backdrop of New York City.
Kostume Kult presents: Da Vinci's Kloset! A celebration of interactive costuming and creativity, against the backdrop of New York City as a modern day renaissance city: a center of art and commerce!

Kostume Kult presents: UNDERGROUND NYC
From under the dusty pavement, the ultimate NYC Carnival Emerges... Urban Legends rise from the kkatacombs, dark figures lurk, steam pulses, things slither and growl. At Burning Man 2015 Kostume Kult's ongoing FreaKKshow is emerging from the sub-urban depths… Strutting down our runway onto Esplanade Frontage!

Kostume Kult recreates the glory days of NYC in the 70’s and 80’s by transporting you to the seedy throwback replica of “Times Square BRC”, the crossroads of the world! The Empire State Building and King Kong loom above the NYC skyline while a runway show that blows fashion week out of the dust goes on. The playa provides the grit, we supply the glamour so hop the K Train to costume transformations and a non stop runway show.

Kostume Kult is back with the “Kult of Kong”, featuring a large, multi-story cityscape playspace with music, interactive art, and of course, the costume giveaway experience that we all look forward to year after year. Come by to dance in the shadow of Kong, walk the runway in your transformed and costumed state, and spend a pleasant afternoon in the crafting dome making booty shorts, tutus and other spectacular projects.

Kostume Kult is back presenting “The Island of Dr. More-Oh!”, with a twisted take on fertility, cross-breeding and animal experimentation. In Nyrvana Village, KK offers free costumery, personal transformations & runway shows every afternoon Tues-Fri along with day & evening dancing at the Garden of Heathen’s Rainbow Lounge. Come by to channel your inner beast or to recycle your old costumery in our Kostume Dome.

Kostume Kult offers daytime costuming makeovers and a celebration of YOU – emerging from the Kostume Dome, through the Nyrvana Arch and down the runway where MCs/DJs propel you onto the playa and into your new life.  For 2011, we present “Rites of Kultage” celebrating all cults and their unique rituals. Featuring Witchdokktor Magamboo O’Boogie, a Mayan Dance Temple, the Church of Coulrophilia hookah bar, the Passage of Enlightenment video tunnel and a Horned Voodoo Ball on Wednesday Night.

In NYrvana Village, visit our Mutation Station kostume dome.  Transformations by day, absurdity around the clock. Video, performances & evolutionary art. Costume recycling with your help (on playa or email us.).  Costuming the naked since 2001…

In NYrvana Village, we present “KKoney Island” in a fantastical reimagining of this legendary Brooklyn neighborhood. Come by for transformations in our daytime costume dome & round-the-clock absurdity.  To recycle costume supplies please contact us. *Costuming the Naked -with your help- Since 2000*

As part of Konsortium Village, this year Kostume Kult returns to present the “Dark Side of Oz”. In our Emerald City, we twist inspiration from Oz with other fantastical films, Pink Floyd psychedelia and a dark aesthetic. Flirt with the munchkins, dance down the green astroturf road or nap amongst the glowing poppies. As always, Kostume Kult offers transformations through costuming, body paints and makeup (wednesday through saturday afternoons) but, in this green year, we encourage theatrical participation over consumption and recycling whenever possible. Consult the crystal balls, visit the Witchdoctor of Oz, cuddle in the Munchkinland Lounge, partake in a farcical fashion show or shadow dance at The Flying Monkey pub… As darkness falls, the camp glows green peaking at our annual Thursday Midnight party where we fuse the Wizard of Oz with Dark Side of the Moon and the random insanity that is Burning Man. There’s no place like home, indeed.To recycle/donate costume supplies, please stop by on-playa or contact us online…

Bubbling up from the NYC underground, Kostume Kult is an artistic party crew like none other.  Inside the costume dome we offer up costuming and body art while sweet DJ’s massage the vibe in our chill lounge/performance area.  Early in the week we seek to trade but, by the burn, everything must go! During the days, our dome is open to all and, by night, the Kostume Kultists parade the playa in style! Themed “Carousel”, this year we embrace hope, ascension and a sci-future aesthetic.  Our Thursday/midnight costume party is always insane and there will be fashion shows, hooping lessons and random theatrics going on all week.  Please stop by if you love costuming and comfortable vibes.  You are one of us 🙂

Bubbling up from the NYC underground, Kostume Kult is an artistic party crew like none other. Inside the Kostume dome, an unruly gang of faeries, gnomes and artists offer up costumes, accessories and body painting to all who participate. A theme camp since 2002, early in the week we seek to trade but, by the burn, everything must go! By day, our dome is open to all and, by night, the Kostume Kultists make a most colorful spectacle as we do the playa right! With some "Groove Hoopers and the SF-based "Hex", we also offer hooping lessons and other random shenanigans on a 24-hour basis. Please stop by or email us if you are an enthusiastic costumer-participant. You are one of us 🙂

*Kostume Kult*, located on the Esplanade in Asylum Village (7:15), offers costuming supplies and fashion advice for the aspiring fabulous. Donations gladly recycled, our costume fairies and gnomes will help you participate in style.

Inside the Kostume Dome, haberdashery, fabric, paints and accessories will be offered to all, by the benevolent Goddess. An unruly gang of artists, gnomes, fairies and elves are on hand to inspire your costume transformation.
Bow to the Goddess of Kostuming and prepare for your elevation. Creative assistance and costume supplies may be offered to those who show the proper deference.

We're the home of BAAAHS: the Big-Ass Amazingly Awesome Homosexual Sheep. You might know us as the 40-foot long rolling disco whose entrance, naturally, is through the pulsing pink sphincter in the rear. Day and night, we graze on the playa — laser eyeballs shining, beloved DJs spinning, dancy people flocking.
BAAAHS Station is our central depot where everyone is welcome to kick up your hooves. Come for our daily dance parties, get a view from our four-story watchtower, enjoy a lovely beverage from our friendly bartenders, and meet a homo or two.
We're builders, artists, and techies at heart. Our DJ line-up combines world-famous names with up-and-cumming performers, with a focus on featuring queer artists. Our mission? Shear queer bliss.

BAAAHS Station a nexus of activity to help facilitate queer art and participation on Playa. Our mission is to get queers out of the 'gay ghetto' and to drag any and all Black Rock City denizens into the our hood to mix things up.

BAAAHS Station is the central depot and homo-licious home on the range to BAAAHS, the Big-Ass Amazingly Awesome Homosexual Sheep - part mutant vehicle, part penetrable sculpture and part rolling disco. Weary travelers come sit for a spell, kick up your hooves and dance, or begin a new journey as you slide through a pulsing pink sphincter into the luscious cocoon of his polyphonic peritoneum. The village itself also offers a "petting zoo", public lounge spaces, art installations, and more.

Camp Not a Cult provides an alcohol-free, sobriety-supportive space for new and experienced burners which is light-hearted, sarcastically and not culty. We believe that by removing alcohol from our lives we have unlocked a way to live more authentically, feel better, and have more FUN every single day. And that doesn't make us boring. You still find us howling at the moon, wild-eyed and sometimes naked, dancing around the fire. Rather than daily recovery meetings, we offer a variety of yoga and meditation classes and workshops, a cacao ceremony & ecstatic dance, a fire-spinning workshop for beginners, Ayurvedic wisdom, 1-2 sober/sober-curious meetups, and other events. All these events will be open to the community.

Camp Not a Cult provides an alcohol-free, sobriety-supportive space for new and experienced burners with a light-hearted, silly vibe. We believe that by removing alcohol from our lives we have unlocked a way to live more authentically, feel better, and have more FUN every single day. Rather than daily recovery meetings, we offer a variety of yoga and meditation classes and workshops, a cacao ceremony & ecstatic dance, a fire-spinning workshop for beginners, Ayurvedic wisdom, and 1-2 sober/sober-curious meetups. All these events will be open to the community.

We are an art support camp that brings together Ukrainian artists and helps with installations. We organize various events featuring electronic music, traditional cuisine, and performances. We welcome everyone who is interested and can contribute to improving the project or enhancing our experience and joy at Burning Man.

Turn your world upside down at Vitruvian Lounge. Enjoy good gyrations by taking a spin on our Human Sized Gyroscope, and stay to enjoy good vibrations in our lounge with great music, ice cold craft cocktails, and nightly hot tea service. Explore the edges of your mind and body with regularly scheduled sound baths, meditations, and workshops hosted by our campers. Head into the K-Box for Korean-style private room karaoke to sing the night away together from 9pm to sunrise.

Vitruvian Lounge serves up good vibrations and good gyrations with our Human Sized Gyroscope. Come spin on our gyroscope, spin music during our open tables, and enjoy craft cocktails and cool shade in our lounge.

The Vitruvian Lounge (formally Pongo Lounge) serves up good gyrations with our LED Human Gyroscope, great music, great craft cocktails, and a chill lounge. Every day from 10am to 10pm, burners are invited to step into our 15' Human Gyroscope, assume the position of da Vinci's famous sketch of human ideals, and turn their world, quite literally, upside down.

Pongo Lounge is a psychedelic chill space dedicated to interactive games, luscious libations, and soulful deep house.  We throw two evening parties (Tues/Thur) and are two daytime game days (Mon/Wed).

The Pongo Lounge is a casual posse of peeps dedicated to a low drama, stunningly psychedelic couch lounge complemented by visually appealing games, including some custom designed ping pong tables. Come for the comfy, come for the shade, come for the company, come for the gaming, come for the evening parties.

Campers: designers, architects, and engineers in the built Environment.

Focus on the development of low-carbon infrastructure and living in Black Rock City. Give back to the community by sharing knowledge from yearly experimentation and iterations.

Step into a snowstorm of silliness at Acid on Ice! We're a frosty oasis serving chilled vibes, mulled wines, and warm welcomes. Join us at our snow-themed lounge and bar for mist-cooled hangouts, icy karaoke, and popsicle mischief. Whether you're escaping the heat or diving into connection, our camp is your winter wonderland in the dust.

Spice N Vice offers Bedouin hospitality every day from 10am-6 p.m. Visit us for some hot or cold chai tea. Or join us for one of our workshops. Our comfortable oasis is also the perfect place to take a break from the sun and talk to one of our travel sages for stories about life abroad and travel advice.

Visit our shaded daytime tent oasis to enjoy middle and far east treats and cold and hot beverages.  Our ‘Desert 2 Desert’ Tent is hosted by Burners from Asia, Middle East, India, United States and beyond.  Share your Travel Stories with us.

Placement HQ is the official location of the Placement office on playa. We are at Esplanade & 5:45 - stop by to get in touch with your placers, to check in for a PEERS shift, or just to say hi!

Wrongtown is an international family reunion gathering year round at events around the globe including Burning Man which is the main event! We have members on almost every Continent and from all walks of life.

Our goal is to create a community space for our friends and family to experience the playa to its fullest. The camp works together to provide everything needed to survive on the playa including an amazing chill space, equipped kitchen, covered tent city and camp showers. While Wrongtown provides the infrastructure, everyone is expected and counted on to work, to build, strike and keep things running during the event including internal camp operations as well as running interactivity.

Providing everything to survive allows our campmates to focus on amazing projects and epic performances

We accept virgins and veterans alike.  Some of our crew have been burning since 97'.  And we love to watch the virgins as minds get blown by all the new experiences.
Wrongtown is a reunion of international travelers and festival-goers that takes place at Black Rock City every year.
Wrongtown is an international reunion. Our primary landmark is a 40' tower that supports an LED beacon and sail shade structure, which serves as our living area and daytime public chill space.

Old school ravers, festival kids, and burners from the U.S., Canada, Australia, Germany and Japan. The most seasoned of our crew have been to almost every burn since 1999. Wrongtown is back and supporting "Dream Machine Guild" from Japan at the base of the man.

A diverse group united in creating large-scale art through efficient and sustainable designs, inspiring individuals and other camps to burn stronger. Our efficiency-driven approach allows us to contribute more to the community. We modify and use Burning Man–centric shipping containers for our camp activities, including the B&B BBQ and our 35-foot hammock Nest tower. We operate two large art cars: Sparky (Hot Sauce) and Eden. We also provide logistical and power support for various playa art projects.

Burgers every day 1-3 pm. Hookah lounge open 24/7 (even in rain), & Sparky goes out for a DJ spin every night with its 16,000 sound system.

Camp EPIC promotes the notion of sharing unique Moments with fellow burners.  We go above and beyond what is called for and we push limits. Our goal is to share the joy of gifting and self expression, to party hard, to facilitate and help others with having fun, and to treat everyone with respect. Come visit us in one of our community events.... “Give EPIC a chance”

Come visit what is easily the 3rd best Bar/Lounge and Photo Booth on the playa. Returning this year is Weir(d) Wednesday, when we'll be serving up a hero dose of the Grateful Dead all afternoon. Also returning this year is our twin-tip, reverse camber Shot-Ski (for those playa face shots), the Elaine Benes Dance Experience (dance classes for dance-introverts) – and of course the photo booth, photo art, and photo gifts. New this year is Atomic Yoga on Thursday mid-morning, led by our certified instructors. Noon-6pm M-T-W-F and late night on Thursday. Lounge space is 24 hrs.

Come hang at our daytime Bar/Lounge and Photo Booth. We serve the Best iRobot Drinks on the Playa, good vibes, and Boogie. Photo art, photo soul, photo gifts. Cold drinks and chill boogie. Serving/photographing M/W/F noon to 6pm (or whenever we're around). People are strange, but no one is a stranger.

This dedicated group of goofy, veteran Burners want you to come to our photo studio to get your portrait done or to come to our lounge for a shot (fireballs and tequila). We will fall all over ourselves to "Welcome You Home".

Cold Yogis exist to awaken terrestrial spirit, creative life force and ancestral resiliency by wilfully disrupting the status quo and immersing into the true self! 

We offer workshops for breathwork, cold exposures, brain over body techniques, verbal liberation, yoga and tantra to increase health, self awareness, and consciousness. We host playa's most epic Ecstatic Dances.
We are an international camp that shares space with DECENTRAL, Naked Heart and others.

We offer workshops for breathwork, cold exposures, brain over body techniques, rocket yoga and animal flow to increase health, self control, and consciousness. We are an international camp that shares space with Camp Contact, DECENTRAL and others.

This year, we will bring the Temple of Mokosh to the Playa.

We are alive when we are connected. We are a camp that celebrates connections. Every day we offer puppet shows, tea, boozy cotton candy, live pianos and sparkly lights to look at past bedtime.

We'll build an entire theater experience! The style is the "creepy carnival" and the "actors" are actually puppets that will use popular philosophical theme to interact with the participants (imagine a puppet that realize there's a new reality outside the stage, and try to interact with the people watching the show to understand how these reality works). During the morning the camp mates will build and coach on how to build puppets.

The "Wall of Frames" will make the night time highly interactive without the need to any camp mates to do anything. A fully "self service" experience that is available at night at any time.

And bring us your broken electronics during repair hours, we'll try our best to get them working.

GlamCocks is a global family that was started at Burning Man, and is dedicated to creating extraordinary experiences that celebrate and encourage burner principles, GlamCockery, bringing people together to find inspiration and creativity, and to express their fabulous, authentic selves. We believe that creativity, authenticity, and love for yourself and others are critical to having meaningful connections that make life fulfilling.

We are a global gay family, driven by our boundless love for each other, our passion to create and give to others, and our celebration of life with a spirit of GLAM!

We are a global family of gays, driven by our boundless love, our passion to create and share, and our celebration of life with a spirit of GLAM! Join us for amazing music, sexy dance parties, delicious drinks, fantastic drag, interactive art, entertaining performances, hands-on workshops, cuddle puddles, and more!

GLAMCOCKS are an all-gay, always glamorous group of boys from all across the world. We are dedicated to creating a loving, open-minded, body-positive environment, and as always – fantabulous sunset parties.

Come by for the fire pit community in the wee hours. Work through your dilemmas with us using the Ten Principles and refill your electrolytes. Sing with us. We're healers, nurses, and artists, queer and straight from around the world, with open arms and all ears.

Comfy Cozy Community College & VooDoo Lounge is a place for gathering, learning and hijinx. Come take one of our classes, have your palm read, or take a class in dildo fencing. Learning is its own type of VooDoo.

Come stick it to the voodoo man! Pin your pains, sorrows, grudges and your vendettas to our 6' tall voodoo man! Brin friends with you and join in a traditional absinth serving while having your tarot cards read. We're inviting you to join for a blacklight voodoo dance party Wednesday night! Don't have a voodoo outfit? We've got body paint to get you covered.

The Comfy Cozy VooDoo Lounge is a place that is playful, cathartic, connecting, silly restful and beautiful. 
The centerpiece of our camp is a 6' tall voodoo man inside our voodoo lounge with an eternally burning flame in his head - made in likeness of the man.

Come stick it to the voodoo man!  Pin your pains, sorrows, grudges and your vendettas to our 6' tall voodoo man!  Bring 5 friends with you and join in a traditional absinth serving while having your tarot cards read.  We're gifting 100's of voodoo dolls around BRC and inviting you to bring them home for a blacklight voodoo dance party Tuesday night!  Don't have a voodoo outfit?  We've got body paint to get you covered.

Located inside the Black Rock French Quarter, we serve both as a living room to the village - and a launching pad for our magical schemes that unfold in the streets of Black Rock City and throughout the playa.  Come place a voodoo pin in our 50" tall voodoo doll!  Surrender your pains and scheme for your future pleasures!  Lounge in our pillow filled Comfy Cozy Voodoo Lounge as you contemplate the gaze of the pin filled doll and join us in our magical moments deep inside the Black Rock French Quarter.  Come poke around - we're waiting for you with open arms!

I Miss My Dog Cafe is a community cafe uniting people over our love of all animals.

A colorful dog installation welcomes our guests, who are invited to relax in the intimate ambiance of dog-themed decor. Our on-duty dog-tor (human therapy dog) will enthusiastically greet you and dexterously serve whatever drool-worthy refreshments the house is cooking that day. Sit and stay for dog-themed events or to share stories (AND PICS) of your furry friends.

We host hot dog parties, serving traditional and vegan options. Our day starts bright and early with a sunrise coffee, tea, and kibble cereal bar. Stop by to send your pup (or kitty) a postcard from playa or leave a message for passed four-legged friend and we'll memorialize them. Laugh, cry, and all the feels in between – we're here for it.

I Miss My Dog Cafe is a community cafe uniting people over our love of all animals.

A colorful dog installation welcomes our guests, who are invited to relax in the intimate ambiance of dog-themed decor. Our on-duty dog-tor (human therapy dog) will enthusiastically greet you and dexterously serve whatever drool-worthy refreshments the house is cooking that day. Sit and stay for dog-themed events.

Staying true to our food-gifting roots, we host hot dog parties and grilled cheese lunches, serving traditional and vegan options. Our day starts bright and early with a sunrise coffee, tea, and kibble cereal bar. Stop by to send your pup (or kitty) a postcard from playa.

There's no better way to celebrate Animalia than by honoring our furry best friends. Camp Calico's I Miss My Dog Cafe is a community cafe uniting people over our love of all animals.

Our on-duty dog-tor (human therapy dog) will enthusiastically greet you and dexterously serve whatever drool-worthy refreshments the house is cooking that day. Sit and stay for dog-themed events.

Staying true to our food-gifting roots, we host hot dog parties, serving traditional and vegan options for lunch. Our day starts bright and early with a sunrise coffee, tea, and kibble cereal bar. Nama-stay for our up-dog morning yoga or stop by for the occasional hair-of-the-dog cocktail.

Sit and stay at the I Miss My Dog Café! If you have a furry friend at home, you understand how much we miss them while we're out on playa – their unconditional love, the warm greeting when you walk through the door, the cuddle sessions on the couch. Get the therapeutic comforts of having your pup around even when you're on playa. 

Our on-duty DOG-tor (human therapy dog) will be available sunrise to sunset to listen to your stories intently, comfort you when you're down, and dexterously serve you coffee, tea, and food that the house is cooking up that day. As a food & flow camp, you'll also find yoga, meditations, flow jams, and workshops. Plus, we have playa-dog-ified twists on the cafe events you love (trivia night, open mics, etc.)! Lunch served daily from 11–1pm.
Camp Calico brings burners together with delicious comfort food,  great wine, and amazing, open-hearted people.
We bring wine, Bloody Marys, and comfort food to the playa
Calico brings Burners together for good times with food, drinks, entertainment and wonderful people.
Camp Calico offers, yoga, tap dance and "Mindful" wine tasting. Come join us in these 3 great engaging art forms.
Calico brings traditional tap and jazz dancing to the playa. Come join us for instruction and rock out sessions!
Legendary breakfast tacos & cold brew coffee service with a side of cheesemé

Welcome back to In Queso Emergency! We love adventuring, cuddling, and dancing, and also we like eating tacos. So, come join us for a breakfast taco and cold brew coffee from 2-4pm Monday-Wednesday, and don't miss our Brisket party from 7-11pm on Friday. Hang out in our cafe area 24-7 and enjoy our custom LED light display from our cuddle puddle.

In Queso Emergency (formerly Interstellar Business Cafe) is bringing back our famous breakfast tacos and iced coffee from 2-4pm Monday through Friday with an "In Queso Leftovers" service from 2-4pm on Temple Burn Sunday. Visit us around the clock to hang out and jam to great music in our expanded, fully shaded cafe area which features plenty of seating, an upright piano, a dance floor, and an air-conditioned cuddle tent. It's gonna Brie an Edam Gouda time!

The Interstellar Business Cafe is an extremely serious place to handle your pressing interstellar business over vegetarian breakfast tacos and iced coffee from 2-4pm Monday through Friday. Don't forget your briefcase and any important documents! Also visit us around the clock for an intimate cafe environment featuring plenty of shaded seating and an air-conditioned cuddle tent!
Interstellar Business Cafe welcomes business travelers from all dimensions and galaxies for breakfast tacos and iced coffee every day from noon to 2pm. Spaceships in approved parking spots only.

The International Business Cafe is an extremely serious place to handle your pressing international business over a continental breakfast taco and glass of iced coffee from 1-3pm Tuesday through Friday - don't forget your briefcase and any important documents. Please enjoy our photobooth and look out for Angry Dani's Taxi Service cruising the Esplanade.

Step out of the sun-scorched wonderland into our cool haven. It's an icy oasis, an ice cream paradise, and a sanctuary for all. Come play with us, sit down and watch some drag/burlesque, dance with a stranger or simply relax on bean bags surrounded by refreshing mist.

This year we’re not only bringing back our massively popular French Toast Brunch and Friday/Saturday night parties, but also new events like Deflower A Virgin (what?!), Feed the Virgin Camp, and Calcutta Bitch’s Barber Shop and Beauty Salon — and that’s just the beginning, so come play with us!

Camp Mystopia offers many mysts: the Magical Mystery Vans and Mobile Mystery Science Theater will rove the playa sharing gifts, popcorn and film, while our camp itself will host a Mystery Fruit Stand, a Cooling Myst Tent, and of course the 2010 Mystery Masqued Ball.  Come visit our MYSTerious utOPIA!

The Bay Area-based Entropy crew proposes the Pancake Playhouse as a highly interactive contribution to Burning Man’s center camp. The camp is centered on a ‘pure play’ theme that celebrates the age of the child. All of the installations contained within the camp will build on this concept of continuous play. We have weekly meetings in SF and SJ. Call for more details: (415) NOVELTY (668-3589)

Theme camps come together here to form a community of artists, servants, and performers.  Get your portrait taken, fix a bike, get dizzy in the black light tunnel, serve snacks & drinks, perform on stage, ride on the Candy Heart Car, taste amazing cupcakes (randomly!), tell your secrets and much more!

Ebb & Glow village is a play space all day and all night.  

We host camps that serve refreshments, repair bicycles, serve cupcakes, and take portraits.  Enter Magic Lantern Society to relax, interact, have some tea, hookah, & maybe watch belly dancers.  Climb our play structures any time for views of BRC.   Afternoons and evenings: our stage hosts lectures, dance lessons, neighborhood band jams, improvisation groups, performers, and occasional DJ's.   On open Playa, our Candy HeArt car transports Cupid to the masses, delivering snarky candies and  nearly adequate dating advice.

Don't be a stranger, but do strange remain!

EBB and Glow Village encompasses art, architecture, activities and assistance.  Situated around the bold Pavilion of DREAMS and its rooftop deck, you will encounter:  the Burning DREAMS Stage, a magnet for live music and performance; the amazing Magic Lantern tent, filled with curiosities, old books, conversation games and the unique Trading Booth; Cranky and Sons Bike Repair, providing instruction, tools and help as needed; the Photo Studio, shooting quality portraits of you in your dusty finery; the Glowwind Sculpture Garden, a quiet place to wander; and So So Cupid, the playa's most adequate dating service.

Milk + Honey is a multicultural camp with Jewish roots that remains guided by the principles of Jewish culture and tradition. Our guiding principles include: community building and support, the belief that food and the table are a place to nourish and gather, expression through dance and movement, intellectual introspection, loving our neighbors as ourselves, and more. We are a welcoming and inclusive tight-knit community of all types of people. Our camp is meant to be a home, not just a place to live, for our campers. We are stewards of the Burning Man principles and culture that provide engaging interactivity and a gathering place for citizens of Black Rock City at large. Our campers span a wide array of creative pursuits, skills, and passions.

Milk + Honey's mission is to draw on both secular and spiritual traditions to create experiences for people to grow, heal and express themselves creatively. We are excited to offer our fifteenth Playa Shabbat service and gathering, inclusive of vegan food and entertainment following the ceremony, which draws on secular and spiritual traditions for the creative expression and collective healing of individuals and communities. We nourish the hearts, spirits, and bodies of all who find themselves wandering in the desert! Come hang, eat, drink, dance, play, and perform with us throughout the week!

Calling all curious birds, wayward wings, and soulful squawkers—
If you've been flying solo or searching for your flock, Honkers Harbor might just be your next nest. We're a neighborhood sanctuary for all species of seekers, honkers, and high-flyers.

Perch beneath a canopy of fluttering fabrics and glowing lights. Sip on a hydrating refreshment or a snow cone while soaking in a soundscape that's equal parts mindful and eclectic. Let the breeze carry your thoughts, your laughter, your longing—for connection, for inspiration, for something more.

We're grateful to be a landing spot on your journey.

We're a multi-cultural, diverse camp that welcomes everyone, except for those who don't like to have fun. Our front porch and shaded dome are always welcoming. Our Sunset Sangria on the Porch event is the talk of the Playa, featuring refreshing beverages, tapas, and games. So come join us, embrace the Bad, and leave with memories that will last until next year.

WE SERVE AS YOUR HOME AWAY FROM HOME, A SANCTUARY FOR ALL ENCHANTING CREATURES. WITHIN OUR CASA, A COMMUNITY OF ARTISTS, MYSTICS, TEACHERS, AND DREAMERS COME ALIVE TO EMBRACE PROFOUND TRANSFORMATIONS. WELCOME HOME!

Welcome to the Kinsey Walhberg Field Lab. This groundbreaking camp, developed by the esteemed Lindsey Kinsey and Remy Walhberg, stands at the vanguard of art analysis, offering training for those interested in their unique and comprehensive framework that transcends conventional critique methodologies. Enter KWASI-3. KWASI-3 is not just an assessment tool; it is a revolution in understanding art. Our instrument delves deep into the realms of artistic creation, exploring various dimensions such as Dimensional Topology, Activation Shape, and Materiality. This multidisciplinary approach allows for a holistic understanding of art, enabling critics, artists, and enthusiasts to engage with artworks on a deeper, more meaningful level.

We are a rag tag group of (mostly) hairy queers from all over. We throw some filthy drag shows while serving up tasty drinks and tasty beats. We do beard massages throughout the week and gift homemade beard oil to the denizens of Black Rock City.

Do you feel like belting out a karaoke song or letting out your frustrations in our rage cage? Are you looking for a great spot to sit, grab some cold water, and watch the world go by while getting your nails painted, moisturizing your face, and enjoying a percussive massage? A Shack of Sit, where sit happens! For the last 20 years, A Shack of Sit has provided a respite  from the harsh elements by creating a shady, cool space and serving ice cold water for wayward Burners adventuring out on the playa, along with many fun activities, classes, and interactive gizmos. We are affiliated with the Mensa Burning Man Special Interest Group, and many of our members are Mensans. We are a part of Snowflake village. Come say hello and sit with us!

A place to sit and watch the world go by while playing games, getting pampered, cooling off, and meeting your friends.  We always have a warm welcome for everyone regardless of age, ethnicity, gender, mobility, or language, you will always be welcome at the Shack.  We also have free wi-fi from time to time.  So come on by and sit with us!  If you are looking for the Mensa camp on Playa you've found us. What are you waiting for?

A place where Sit Happens (formerly Gray Matter Gym) since 2004.  We have games, hair braiding, discussions, cool water and a place to chill out. We do karaoke, and we can Emibigginate you (think of the Wizard of Oz "pay no attention to the man behind the screen"). There is always something happening in the Shack, so come on over and sit with us, we promise you will have fun!

A Shack of Sit, where Sit happens!  At various times throughout the week you can come and get braided, painted, tattooed, Embigginated, projected, photographed, entertained, and relaxed. We are home to great conversation and fun activities. Please check the What When Where for scheduled activities! Your chair is always waiting!

SIT HAPPENS HERE 24×7. Shady chairs & lounges: refresh, rest, meet Burners. Enjoy iced water, healthy snax, lots of activities & WiFi.

Let Gravity do the work. Like love, gravity is one of the many unseen forces of the universe. It binds together our solar systems, keeps us firmly grounded, and rolls off the tongue like an avalanche.

With this in mind, Gravity Camp is the force that attracts and propels participants forward on the playa. 

Our camp's primary activities take place during the setting of the sun, when its gravity propels the earth through orbit and dazzles us with its majestic colorscapes. It is during this time, that we celebrate the success of a sun-filled day, and boldly continue our trajectory into the darkness of the night.

On the outskirts of the city, with no obstruction in sight, Gravity is the ideal location to celebrate the sun and wind-down before an evening of exploration.

Escape to Chez Mirage, where the untamed spirit of the jungle meets the serenity of the desert. Here, under our lush canopy, you're invited to unleash your wild side in an oasis designed for adventure, fun, and deep emotional connections.

Immerse yourself in our Survivor-themed game, where you'll test your limits, strategize with teammates, and experience the thrill of competition and camaraderie. Sing along to Nickelback  while sipping pickleback shots to unwind. As twilight descends, our retreat transforms into an escape from the chaos of Burning Man; gather around the warmth of a cozy campfire, where you'll enjoy the simple pleasure of s'mores and sakes under the stars.

At Chez Mirage, every encounter is designed to leave you with a smile. Join us where the wild play and the wise sway.

Chez Mirage is a whimsical jungle oasis in the desert. Featuring a lush jungle canopy and multiple open treehouses to climb into, our camp will help you unleash your inner animal. Come during the day to compete in wild Survivor-themed games and win prizes, or simply hydrate with fresh H2O of the coconut variety. Visit at night to escape the madness of Burning Man with warm tea and even warmer campfires.

At Sumanah, we welcome you into a soulful sanctuary where mornings begin with intention and evenings unfold in magic. Our beloved morning ritual café serves freshly brewed coffee, guiding citizens through engaging daily themes, wellness activations, journaling with our Sumanah Print Newspaper, and grounding practices that set the tone for the day ahead.

As the evening unfolds, we transform into a cozy lounge offering evening elixirs, storytelling, music, and ritual gatherings under soft lights and soulful soundscapes. Whether you're starting your day with presence or winding down into connection, Sumanah invites you to drop in, explore, and remember what it feels like to truly arrive.

At SUMANAH, we invite you to indulge in our unique morning-ritual café, where interactive mindfulness practices are centered around engaging daily themes. As we pour freshly brewed coffee for our cherished Burning Man community members, they can enjoy our exclusive Sumanah Print Newspaper, designed to chronicle their personal experiences on a daily basis. Each morning, SUMANAH offers a variety of guided rituals and techniques aimed at helping our guests feel grounded and complete while encouraging exploration and envisioning the potential impact of their Burning Man journey on their lives head.

At Cafetopia, we invite you to indulge in our unique morning-ritual café, where interactive mindfulness practices are centered around engaging daily themes. As we pour freshly brewed coffee for our cherished Burning Man community members, they can enjoy our exclusive Cafetopian Print Newspaper, designed to chronicle their personal experiences on a daily basis. Each morning, Cafetopia offers a variety of guided rituals and techniques aimed at helping our guests feel grounded and complete while encouraging exploration and envisioning the potential impact of their Burning Man journey on their lives head.

Cafetopia is a cafe which hosts a morning-ritual offering interactive experiences with mindfulness practices focusing on fun daily topics. While serving coffee to our Burning Man citizens, we'll be raffling off an experience only a handful will get to participate in: A restful night or day at our camp in our custom-built solar reflective A-frame structure.

Phasmantis,

Phantasmatis is a camp celebrating the uncanny in technology, the fascinating autonomy that mechanisms seem to take on,and their habit of playfully subverting  users' intentions.  Our camp features DIY, hacked devices that come alive in the hands of participants, and a interactive themed environment that gives Burners a glimpse of the fun machines would create if left to their own devices. Night time Rainbow "Laser" Tag engages humans and machines in a game of light. Players pursue each other with laser guns in a maze hung with prisms that cast rainbows on the fabric walls. Burners will emerge exhilarated from this excursion into the colorful dream world of machines while in the midst of amazing music!
Phasmantis is an eccentric combination of music, drinks, food, and fun. Boisterous yet reserved, Phasmantis may or may not be what you expected.

Hypothesis: Scientifically rigorous yet playful participation enhances your burn.

Intro: LOBE invites you to experiment with our placebo bar, sci-art and brain-inspired activities. 

Specific Aims:

Aim 1) Are you drunk!? Our speakeasy The Double-Blind Pig serves placebo-controlled refreshments. While you sip, ask the local (inebriated?) scientists all your burning questions (results may vary)
Aim 2) Can we tickle your brain!? Play with our interactive neurotech, mind-stretching games, and discover the neuroscience of your favorite drugs!
Aim 3) Ready to blow your mind!? We're not just nerds, we're artists too! Study our scientifically inspired pieces co-created by neuroscientists and friends. 

In summary, WE WANT YOUR BRAINS to test our innovative approach to nerdy fun on the playa!

Hypothesis: Scientifically rigorous yet playful activities enhance your burn.

Intro: Our science-themed camp, Campus Callosum, is hosting interactive demos, games, workshops, science art, and Q&As… and we want YOUR BRAIN!

Specific Aims:

AIM 1) Founded by neuroscientists and friends, we have a ton of brainy events! Check out our interactive neurotech, operant conditioning games, and expert-led chats on the neuroscience of drugs, the mind and more.

AIM 2) Our speakeasy 'The Double-Blind Pig' is serving placebo-controlled refreshments. Drop in for "Ask a Drunk Scientist" to help us answer the all the questions that emerge from the dust and test your own ability to discern your sobriety.

Don't forget to have a look at our scientifically-inspired art projects on your way out!
Come form new [neural] connections at Campus Callosum. Bring your most nagging questions or share your own scientific knowledge, and if you don't leave the camp smarter at least you'll leave drunker.

Welcome to Water Temple—a sanctuary of serenity, connection, and renewal in the heart of the playa. We're a theme camp dedicated to holding space for hydration, healing, and human connection through elemental experiences and desert hospitality.

This collective of predominantly NYC with a few West Coast artists, designers, DJs and creative spirits returns to Black Rock City. Our camp provides art, music, culture and social events in an interactive space designed for spiritual refueling.  We range from 88 years old to late 20's, a family we have chosen over many years and continue to share.

Mirage Garage welcomes you to our theme camp!  We have a large inviting main tent with comfortable hang-out refuge space open 24 hours @ day to anyone; 24 hours water bar; alcohol bar with set cocktail and post-dinner hours; a great speaker series (last year's speaker series topics: Women Goddesses, Women in Business, Art in the Age of Cyborgs, and Poverty in a Time of Plenty); Metamorphosis in the Woods in the art tent; and viewing platform with seting atop our containers.    Get your body Washed and Lubed by our comely and scantily clad crew of guys.  Learn Tango and Body Painting! Come see, participate in a q&a about, and get photographed with mr. fusion, valyrian steel, and flux capacitor, our three stainless steel works of art car and come to our greasy get down thursday night party!

At Mirage Garage we are excited to offer programming that entertains and stimulates, while simultaneously offering a refuge where the community can come together to rehydrate, reconnect and rejuvenate! Come play with our kinetic sculptures on wheels, get stimulated by our daily speaker series, get washed, lubed, and henna tatooed, get bathed in sound in our Gamelatron tent, dance to our dj's nightly, our desert oasis overflows with iced water 24 hrs/day, and we live to serve you.

Mirage Garage is an interactive, futuristic mechanic's den looming up out of a vision in the desert. Discover the secrets of invention and reinvention in an imaginative cabinet of curiosities.

DISORIENT is an open creative platform powered by love. We are Pornj-wearing glamorous technologists. With members from around the world, we collaborate on a range of projects as diverse as our community. These include light art, sculpture, DISORIENT music, sound, experimental architecture, immersive spaces, performances, workshops, and much more.

DISORIENT is an international art collective returning for its 18th consecutive year on playa. DISORIENT is our never-ending pursuit to gift experiences to our worldwide Burner family and Black Rock City.

To celebrate Disorient’s tenth year on the Playa we take the Art Car Wash, our GlamTech interactive art installation, to a whole new level. Drive through to get your mutant vehicle buffed, waxed and Pornj’d to the max. Park, connect to one of our Pods and together, let’s take it up to eleven!!

After a year deep in the city, Disorient returns to the Esplanade. Our Art Car Wash will buff your bumpers with a grooving daytime disco. Our main mutant vehicle, the Dex, evolves into a new type of glowing and loving beast. Come play, learn and grow with us.

After focusing on making the playa at-large happy for many years, Disorient is going to Deviate, turn the music down (slightly) and edge away from the public eye. The Drop is here, the Dome is back, get ready for new adventures on our magical Chariot of Bling! Welcome to DV8 (Disorient version 8)!

Welcome to Disorient! In 2007 Disorient adds a new member to its  fleet. The Rex is a 60 ft. long articulated, blinking monster complete with Dj booth, Pornj lounge and new sound system. Some call it the D- Rex. The Disorient Express (Dex + Rex) has been running on biodiesel since 2006 and is now, for the first time, long enough to carry the entire Disorient Sign on amazing deep Playa adventures. Get ready for new levels of GlamTech disorientation!Live green. Burn Pornj.

Disorient is a circular spaceship that uses mylar, 3D graphics, sequenced light, the sand of the playa and large scale video projections on domes and inflatable structures as means of transportation. Come to Disorient my child and relearn to navigate in our soothing liquid spaces.

Disorient is an immersive playground which uses devices such as mirrored mylar, large scale video projection, virtual reality, 3d graphics and sequenced light as means of transportation. Come on a tour of the Disorient as you relearn to navigate in our new and liquid spaces…

Devachan Lounge is a home for art and celebration on the Playa. We offer a beautiful lounge, stage, and performance space open to the public day and night. Come join the fun in our Participatory Dinner Theatre, add to a desert masterpiece in our Community Paint Project, or learn Playa essentials in one of our Cherry Poppers events for new Burners.

Resting place of the gods/goddesses, a comfortable shaded lounge and performance space with cushioned floor, lounge chairs, cushions, and cozy blankets. Come to relax with our daily spa service or cuddle puddle. Join our expansive workshops and Interactive Dinner Theater.
