Welcome, Traveler, to Devachan Lounge: Sanctuary of the Divine. Behind our gates lies a homeland where we love you fiercely, with open arms, unapologetically, through happiness and through hardship. Whether camp elder or neophyte, we couple Radical Self-Expression with a commitment to being a Generous Family. We embody our Best Selves through giving and receiving Love and Acceptance, and other Gifts like Play, Performance, Healing, and Art. Our conscious practice of the Ten Principles allows us to set ambitious intentions, pioneer new ways of being human on Playa, and transfer what we learn to our off-playa communities and cities.

Devachan Lounge is a sanctuary for authenticity. We live the 10 principles both on and off the playa and support an environment where everyone can bring their best selves to the community. We have gathered a revolving crew of passionate Burners, always at the ready to help new people acclimate to the Burning Man culture and the challenges of thriving in the Black Rock Desert. This is the true magic of Devachan Lounge. For anyone who finds themselves in our space, the Lounge is a peaceful, revitalizing, and reaffirming oasis. All are welcome.

Devachan Lounge is back again for our 11th consecutive year on the playa!  This year we will be serving made-to-order seltzer water and will be serving exotic teas, and we will have yoga and Acroyoga sessions in our main shade structure. Come by and enjoy a relaxing visit with old and new friends.

Playa Agora is a vibrant space of connection, curiosity, and community. We host a full week of interactive workshops, morning coffee, and afternoon gatherings designed to spark conversation, inspire creativity, and bring people together. Come learn, share, and laugh with us as we co-create something meaningful at Burning Man 2025.

Our camp is a wonderland of interactivity, offering a smorgasbord of workshops that'll ignite your curiosity and fuel your soul.
Join us as we craft an unforgettable experience at Burning Man 2024, where learning and laughter intertwine in a spectacular dance of community and creativity!
Can you solve enough puzzles to complete our mission to an alien planet?

Welcome to our Curiosity Shoppe filled with magical and scientific objects from beyond space, time and imagination. Vials of the Spice Melange from the planet Arrakis share shelves with Elvish Lembas bread and tufts of fur from the legendary luck dragon Falkor. Our Shoppe recognizes no dimensional bounds, but it does hold a mystery waiting to be solved by you, intrepid traveler. Should you unlock its secrets, you will be invited to join our Mystical Order.

Our order has discovered that the concentrated, transcendent creativity of Black Rock City has formed an energetic vortex, allowing contact with beings from another dimension. They appear to be dreaming our reality, and we can communicate with them through their dreams. Help us solve puzzles to unlock this mystery and make contact. If you are successful in this endeavor, you will be initiated as a member of our order.

Our mission at The Whynauts is to create a space of curiosity and discovery - encouraging everyone to say, "Why not?" 

Come explore with us with daily 3pm sensory workshops while being served quesadillas & piña coladas.
Embrace your child-like wonder and ask ¨why not¨and ¨what if¨. Come play around with us.
Our mission is to inspire child-like wonderment! Come visit your childhood living room and reconnect with your roots over games, food, naps and more.

Our mission is to inspire child-like wonderment. This year, we are bringing you Robot Jesus styled Alexa! Come ask it curious questions about the world over daytime tea and nighttime wine. Visit our confessional starring iJesus, share your troubles, sins, and worries with Him, complete your penitence, and get back to connecting with your sinless inner child!!

inspiring people to radically reimagine our world by connecting with a sense of child-like wonderment

dream. dream bigger. ignition. liftoff. whynaut?

Our mission is to inspire people to imagine what the world could be like by reconnecting with their sense of child-like wonderment. Venture out into deep playa to dance to the 10ft jukebox, have your feet dangle in our booths & if your timing is right, partake in our delicious diner food.

How legit? Totally legit. If you want iced coffee, this is the place. Proudly serving since 1964. Want to run in circles with a horse head on a stick? We've got that too.
Totally Legit Camp is a camp based in Brooklyn, NY. We host a Hobby Horse Competition as well as brew 15 gallons of New Orleans style cold brew coffee each day on the playa and serve it with love.

Welcome to Reared In Steel aka Weird Steel, a dynamic Burningman camp where steel artistry takes center stage. We are a collective of passionate artists and creators dedicated to pushing the boundaries of creativity through the medium of steel and steel-framed art installations. From Rhino Redemption, Medusa, and The Flower Tower, Brass Ring just to name a few. Our camp is a celebration of innovation, imagination, and the transformative power of art.

Step through our glowing portal into a queer wonderland of dayglo art, towering flags, immersive light, and interactive installations. Lounge in our cuddle space, sweat it out in the 24/7 Pink Gym, or dance until sunrise in Afterglow. Join us for workshops, rituals, drag performances, fresh fruit gifting, and signature events like AcCUMulation and the Consent Carnival. Whether you're here to play, rest, connect, or transform. There's always a place for you within Comfort & Joy.

Hey there, fellow BRC citizens! Are you ready to be dazzled and transformed by the queer dayglo wonderland? Step into the village of Comfort & Joy, where day and night blend into a kaleidoscope of colors and immersive art installations. Satisfy your appetite with hot soup and sweet marshmallows by the fire, peak into the future using divinations, or join one of our many programmed classes, dances, and parties during the day. For a more intense workout, our historic Pink Gym awaits you. Take a break, recharge in our air-conditioned cuddle dome, or explore your sexuality in our all-bodies, all-genders inclusive playspace, Afterglow. And if you need refreshment or conversation, come quench your thirst. Whoever you are, there's comfort and joy to be found at Comfort & Joy!

Comfort & Joy is a dazzling, dayglo fantasyland that welcomes all BRC citizens. Come at night to experience our spectacular psychedelic interactive courtyard art installations or for some hot soup and sweet marshmallows at the fire. During the day, check out any of our programmed classes, dances, parties, or other delightful happenings in the WWW, or simply indulge in a fierce workout sesh in our historic Pink Gym. Take a nap in our air conditioned cuddle dome; explore your authentic eroticism in our all-bodies, all-genders inclusive playspace, Afterglow, any time. If you're thirsty, come on by for some water and a chat. Whoever you are, there's comfort and joy to be found at Comfort & Joy!

A rag-tag bunch of geologists with a passion for sharing geology - including the geology of the Black Rock Desert! Join our geologists for rock talks, get creative with rock painting. Dig up your best rock puns and strike fools gold and other rockin' gifts!

A rag-tag bunch of geologists and crystal healers with a passion for sharing geology - including the geology of the Black Rock Desert! Join our geologists for rock talks, get creative with rock painting, walk our labyrinth to explore the geological timeline of the earth and discover our place in it. Get metaphysical with us - crystal meditations, movement, healing, hypnosis and more!  Dig up your best rock puns and strike  fools gold and other rockin' gifts!

Our camp is focused on health and happiness; health through fresh vegetables and fruits at the Black Rock Farmers Market in the mornings and happiness and festivities at the Carrot Club in the afternoons. Enjoy tasty, fresh produce to feed the body, refresh the spirit, and nourish the soul! One of the best parts of exploring any
city is checking out the farmer's market- and Black Rock City is no exception! Come try one of our wide array of fresh fruits
and veggies!
In the afternoons, join us for fresh and icy smoothies (boozy or not) as well as occasional fruit and vegetable-based cocktails at the Carrot Club.

More Carrot: Sure, you could live off protein bars and MREs all week if you really want to, but how about giving your dusty soul a treat? Come by the More Carrot Camp and get yourself something crunchy, cold and crisp; we gift fresh vegetables and fruit at the More Carrot Camp. Tues. - Fri., 9 - 11 am. We also open The Carrot Club and gift vegetable and fruit based cocktails and make your own alcohol infused smoothies from 10 am to 1 pm Tuesday through Friday. Most importantly, join us Thursday afternoon for the Countless Carrot March, where we march with the Div. of Animal Control to save The Man from the ravenous Bunny hordes!

Welcome to UniverseCity, the prestigious Black Rock City College of Arts and Sciences. Our accredited program issues diplomas on any subject matter, however imaginary. These range from the fictional and unlikely to major changes in life direction. Join us on campus and register at the Admissions Office to receive your Letter of Acceptance. Early in the week, attend New Student Orientation activities. Any day, come relax in our verdant Quad, take in lectures of questionable accuracy, gaze into our night time Planetarium. Later in the week we grant diplomas recognizing unique contributions to your field of study during a personalized graduation ceremony. We are a family-friendly camp, welcome all burners to our campus and encourage participation in launching your self-declared education.

IDEATE is dedicated to amplifying ideas born on playa - to solve our world's greatest problems and build a better tomorrow - as a global community of purpose-driven entrepreneurs, creatives & humans. On playa, we are helping green the burn, hosting idea-provoking talks, and creating magical artistic experiences. Off playa, we are a year round community spreading the Ten Principles, sharing experiences of wonder and joy, and making the rest of the world feel more like playa one day at a time. Come join us!

We are dedicated to amplifying solutions at the intersection of sustainability, community, and art - to solve our world's greatest problems and build a better tomorrow - as a global community of purpose-driven entrepreneurs, creatives & humans. On playa, we are helping green the burn, hosting interactive workshops, and creating magical artistic experience. Off playa, we are a year round community spreading the Ten Principles, sharing experiences of wonder and joy, and making the rest of the world feel more like playa one day at a time. Come join us!

We are dedicated to amplifying solutions at the intersection of sustainability, community, and art - to solve our world's greatest problems and build a better tomorrow - as a global community of purpose-driven entrepreneurs, creatives & humans. On playa, we are helping green the burn thru example and leadership, hosting interactive workshops on wellness, climate, and psychedelics, and creating magical art pieces and curating musical experiences. Off playa, we are a year round community spreading the Ten Principles, sharing experiences of wonder and joy, and making the rest of the world feel more like playa one day at atime. Come join us!
ANCIENT FUTURE: Embodying ancient wisdom to create a better tomorrow

IDEATE is a space for ideas, innovation, collaboration, and designing new paradigms to address the biggest challenges we face on spaceship earth - and bringing them to the world.  

We have something to delight and inspire everyone. We embody the Burning Man Principles and we live by the axiom, "Be the change you want to see in the world."

Forged from scavenged tech, glowing mesh, and post-industrial grit. This camp pulses with the creative chaos of a world on the edge. 
By day we're a collective of rogue artists, experience engineers, and anarcho-hackers. 
By night we anchor the Fire Zone, maintaining our iconic flame stage and collaborating with conclaves and performers that set the horizon alight. Inside our cyberpunk themed bar, the Tech Noir, dust weary wanderers trade stories and camaraderie over chilled concoctions in a haze of neon and nostalgia. Makers, fire spinners, and resilient nomads converge here to prove that even in collapse, creativity survives.
Wastelanders, the apocalyptic band of miscreants bringing drinks and entertainment during the evenings and peace and tranquility during the day.

Post Apocalyptic Bar, Stage and Theater specializing in events like "Mohawks & Mojitos" and "Rage Yoga". Fire performances and bellydancing to goth/industrial music. Bringing the apocalypse to the Playa!

Feel the warmth of our fires, see our lights when the sky is dark or filled with dust, and share our vintage spirits. But be warned, some things that can outlast an apocalypse, have mighty sharp teeth!  
We are an oasis of fire and rust, surrounded by a sea of neon, thumping tones and desert chaos. Learn not to fear the end of civilization, step into our world and learn alittle about yourself. 
All those that enter our lounge are welcome to become completely immersed in our world. Full attention to detail is everywhere, from the rusted fire sculptures to the burning bar. The stage is lit with fire and torches, while dancers spin hoops and metal.  Performers share the stage with our unusual blend of house music ranging from death metal to the 40s jazz of the Atomic Age.

When the world as we know it is gone, and survivors of the apocalypse wander the wastes, we are the last refuge of humanity in a chaotic world. Seek out the warm glow in the night, soak in the heat of our fires, take refuge from the sun and dust in our sheltered cove of rust and metal. Join our story tellers and share your tales, where wanderers are welcome.
A gathering of post-apocalyptic tribes and restless souls. We who wander this Wasteland, in search of our better selves.
A gathering of post-apocalyptic tribes and restless souls. We who wander this Wasteland, in search of our better selves.

Step right up to The Poppy Moon Saloon, a vibrant and welcoming haven for those looking to kick back or karaoke it up, enjoy some dance'n and sip on a drink or two. You can dive into some delightful crafting or enjoy a verity of fun games. Step into the key hole of light or ride the rocket ship of tomorrow today.

Step right up to The Poppy Moon Saloon, a vibrant and welcoming haven for those looking to kick back or karaoke it up, enjoy some dance'n and sip on a drink or two. You can dive into some delightful crafting or wonder over to the Nautilus (A Curiouser and curiouser Rabbit hole) art installation, enveloped in a large, spiraling silk fabric. This captivating structure invites participants to journey through its gracefully curving passageways.

The YoniVerse is a safe space for women to explore their eros and their unique feminine power. A camp by women for women. A space where we offer daily scheduled guided somatic experiences to support women to connect intimately with themselves and heal sisterhood wounds. A space held by men who want to hold a container that helps lift feminine energy, help women feel supported and cared for.

Nestled in the quiet city street, our cozy camp is a haven of relaxation and connection. At its center, a giant cuddle pit swing invites visitors to sink into plush cushions and gently sway under the open sky, offering a peaceful escape from the noise and hustle of the outer city. Nearby, an enchanting bar glows with soft, colorful lights, serving drinks and innovative food delights. The camp's serene atmosphere, combined with its playful elements, creates a perfect spot for relaxation, laughter, and meaningful connections.

Swing into the surreal on our suspended floating lotus trampoline or find solace at the Whiteout Teahouse & Tavern. Stop at our bar serving up libations and art from fellow burners. Prepare for unforgettable experiences with our lineup of events - guaranteed to leave you rehydrated, fed, and blessed with unforgettable memories. Ascend to new heights at our lotus pond rooftop lounge, where you can unwind on colorful cushions and behold breathtaking panoramic views of the playa & night sky. 
We provide a sanctuary, a safe space to unwind and connect with others at the heart of your bustling Burning Man adventure. Join us at Camp Fucking Magical and discover the true essence of playa-style adventure, community, and boundless possibility.

At our camp, we strive to create a home on the playa—a place where our campers feel just as excited to return after a long day as they are to dive into our interactive events. We keep it simple but meaningful: serving up PB&Js, letting our DJs set the vibe, and coming together each night for a family meal you won't want to miss. At the heart of our tradition, we invite visiting burners to write their wishes on paper cranes, which we bring to the Temple—a ritual that embodies the spirit of our community.

Come find refuge from the elements of the Playa. Have an ice-cold michelada or a homemade pickleback at our bar, "The Fold". Or enjoy a hot tea while you listen to some funky beats. Share a wish and write it in an origami crane, and we'll deliver it safely to the temple before the Sunday burn.

Look for our brightly-lit ✽ marquee!

Stranded in the Playa, you find an oasis, a court with decorative banners advertising for knights to come and test their courage within a jousting circle! Early morning refreshments will entice the night owls who need a nightcap before returning to their homesteads at sunrise. If you are looking for a more aesthetic experience, come to our art gala, where artists are welcome to come throughout the week to express themselves and show off their artistic talent.

Midway between a three-ring circus and a freak show, you’ll find us where we’ve always been, on a tight rope trying to be part of the BIG show. Guess what number we’re thinking and win a drink! Be a player (or get played) in our MaskCharade! Czech out a curious chimera of instrumental engenuity: the Bambufonomat!

Where loving people come together and flourish. Established in 2005, Love Puddle is a vibrant camp dedicated to celebrating life and fostering inclusivity. We create a welcoming environment where everyone feels valued and accepted. Our camp offers a comfy lounge, a bar, and games like strip rock paper scissors and conversational bingo. We prioritize meaningful connections, provide safe spaces and love to meet new folks. Join us at Love Puddle and experience all the magic we've got going on this year!

Love Puddle is a daytime bar with the friendliest bartenders around. We want to hear your stories and share a cold drink with anyone who wanders into our camp. We offer dildo jousting, strip Rock Paper Scissors, penis snatch, four square and more. Come check us out!

A neighborhood bar, playground and lounge open every afternoon that serves the most refreshing punch on the playa, to enjoy before or after playing foursquare or swinging on the swings. Ask nicely and we might give you a Love Puddle or whip out Dildo Jousting. We make sure passerby are assaulted with friendly invitations to join in the fun whenever we are open. Check out our events in the What Where When or just come by and look at our calendar to see when we're having Strip Rock Paper Scissors, Topless Mimosas, and other ridiculous fun!

Backstage is an experimental playground for light & sound where participants aren't just spectators to a performance - they're co-creators engaged in play. Backstage is not just a camp, but a living, breathing instrument and low-stakes stage where everyone has a hand in the creative process. 
We invite you to step backstage and engage with a series of collective, evolving compositions, participatory experiences, and experimental performances.

The Parlour Room is a classy-not-classy, heavily shady/shaded, industrial Victorian lounge space welcoming all BRC citizens to come relax under the shade with a cool beverage during the morning and afternoon or chat the night's adventures fantastic around our fire pit in the wee hours.

The Black Rock Boutique is your fashion headquarters at Burning Man since 1996. We empower Burners to creatively self-express with funky, freaky, furry, fabulous clothing. Come find a new outfit, donate your dusty old playawear, mutate your clothes into something new and weird, and strut your stuff on our runway! Open 12-5pm Monday-Saturday of Burn Week.

Don't go to Desperados, it's a terrible bar. The bartenders are all narcissists and they can't make a proper drink. They just dance on the bar, knocking shit over while your cup is empty. The place is a junk heap, absolutely falling apart. What a shitshow. Stay away.

A hitching post for forlorn outlaws and seductive renegades. Begun in 2011 with a dollar and a dream and a bunch of stuff we found at the dump, Desperados has blossomed / decayed into an opulent shantytown, a depraved palace full of freaky desert creatures. Come by, take a load off, have a drink, duel someone, exchange bodily fluids! Lie to yourself about who you are as a person, and make those lies come true!

Desperados offers the kind of haggard emotional support you'd expect from folks like your Uncle Larry. The one who taught you how to roll a cigarette and to never worry about growing up. Who never seemed to care if you had rips in your clothes and blood on your knees. He had the most worn and dusty couches and his bar was always open and magically stocked with whiskey. And who, of course, may have been a creative genius with a blubbery sensitive streak. Ask your Dad if you can hang at Uncle Larry's this weekend, if you can find him. Check over at that run down, old western Desperados dive bar down the road.

Welcome to Fix Yr Burn, your local neighborhood fix-it and MacGyver shop. Our mission is to lend a helping hand and mend whatever may need fixing. Our fix-it abilities include, but are not limited to, bike repair, electrical issues, portable generators, sewing repairs, first aid, forgotten personal care items, and general problem solving. Come hang out in our shaded living room, have a cup of medicinal tea, and listen to soothing live music. Is your problem not listed here? Bring it anyway and we'll do our best.

Wake up from the dead with Possible Muertos! Join us for morning movement classes (yoga, stretch, calisthenics), afternoon drinks with themes from around the world.  Our camp features a shaded lounge with daily country-themed frozen drinks, DJ booth with plenty of dance space, and a lounge area to kick back, relax and bond with kin spirits. Other camp features include live funerals, instant photos, a hydration station open during public events. Stop by daily between 10am-6pm.

We're a laid-back group, with a shaded bar area where you can come take some instant photos with us in the morning, and by afternoon enjoy our cocktail of the day and music stylings, anything from lounge to old school trance.  Each day we will metamorphosize to a different culture from around the world, theming the daily cocktail with a matching game from that culture.  And if you have a USB stick, feel free to drop by and impersonate your favorite DJs with head bobbing & knob spinning on our DJ equipment, or just rest and lounge in our double decker Dome and enjoy the sunset.

And amidst this sea of humanity, there are potatoes. Yes, potatoes. Perhaps an unexpected sight in the midst of such a surreal landscape, but therein lies the magic of Burning Man. These humble tubers, often overlooked in daily life, take on new significance here. They're not just food; they're symbols of sustenance, resilience, and community.

Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure. It is our light, not our darkness, that most frightens us. We ask ourselves, who am I to be brilliant, gorgeous, talented and fabulous? Actually, who are you not to be? You are a child of burritos. Your playing small doesn't serve the world. We were born to make manifest the glory of spaghetti that is within us. It's not just in some of us; it's in everyone. And as we let our own light shine, we unconsciously give other people permission to do the same. As we are liberated from our own fear, our presence automatically liberates others.
"I've learned that people will forget what you said, people will forget what you did, but people will never forget that you made them a spaghetti burrito." -Maya Angelou

Home, home on the range
Where the spaghetti and the antelope play
Where seldom is heard a discouraging word
And the skies are not burritos all day

Our enchantment with, and disenchantment from, the modern world are not so easy to distinguish from each other - They exist in a reciprocal relationship. Rosa Parks sued Outkast. The key to happiness isn't the search for meaning, it's to just keep yourself busy with random nonsense till you die. A time period called, they want their object back. Nilbog! It's goblin spelled backwards! 7 Minutes!

If only there could be another way to do this 'cause it feels like murder to put your heart through this. I know I always said that I could never hurt you, well this is the very, very last time I'm ever going to eat a Spaghetti Burrito

What makes a quality whine? Is it how sour the grapes are? Or perhaps how long it stays bottled up? At the Whatchamacallit Whinery, we'll find the answer to that question by collecting gripes from all over the Playa, smushing em up, and celebrating our collective complaining over… well you guessed it, wine!

A sea-soaked fever dream of games, chaos, and crustacean energy. Join us for bubble battles inside a sumo ring, spontaneous crab dance mobs, and the occasional sideways scuttle through the city. We mix oceanic absurdity with radical hospitality—equal parts weird, welcoming, and wonderfully wet (metaphorically, mostly). Swing by, suit up, and surrender to the tide.
A sardine's day dream to get groovy with nauti narwals.

We are a healing-centered camp offering psychedelic peer support, yoga, meditation, and a sacred tobacco ceremony. Our team includes experienced volunteers, therapists, and physicians trained in harm reduction and emotional care. We provide a calm, welcoming sanctuary for anyone in need of grounding, connection, or support throughout the week.

At the Shire, we're all about CONNECTION and PLAY. Dance like a hooligan at our DJ sets (you'll be in good company). *Almost* smooch a stranger in our Tension-Building Pre-Kissing Workshop. Take flight on our infamous rotating seesaw, The Merry-&-Pippin-Go-Round! Brave the 4-story climb up Isengard for a sunset singalong. Come celebrate your inner child. Just follow that giant sunflower flag you see in the sky, it'll lead you right to us!

Step into Pour Choices, a late-night dive bar tattoo parlor serving fake tattoos, real broth, and questionable decisions. When the sun goes down our artists, bartenders, and brothel will ink your soul, feed your belly, and make serve you the best bad decisions you've ever made. Draw your own regret, pose for a Polaroid, and maybe stumble into something deeper than expected. If you see an "Out of Order Bathroom" door…open it. Just trust us.

Buzz over to the Honey Barrel for an immersive honey wine tasting experience where you'll be treated to introspective questions with our pairings. On special nights, join us for a live piano set with mead.

Come experience a psychedelic feast for the senses. Interesting during the day, but truly comes alive at night. Leaving Atypical Camp will feel like waking from a strange, yet pleasant dream.

At the Hassle-Mart Inconvenience Store & Bar we believe that the customer always comes 4th. Come on down to checkout our inventory of junk food, cigarettes, booze, and other useful items; the only cost is your convenience. We'll conveniently be open for regular hours every afternoon....probably. Life is already difficult, why should we be any different?

Clevian Circularity is based in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, but has members from around the world. We are open 24/7 with direct, small-scale interactivity.
Home of Playa Speed Dating, 8pm.

Home of the famous Playa Speed Dating, now in it it’s seventh year! We have the glowing Green Dome with moving tapestries of scary animals… they are looking at you… trying to tell you something!
Tues-Fri, come for our famous Speed Dating ONLY 8-9pm in Snowflake Village.Visit our Apocalypse Dome, where you may be married–or buried.

Located within Snowflake Village. Visit our Antigravity Dome where objects and ideas fload freely around the room. Confront your psyche as an interviewee on the Lance Miller Show. Gratify your libido at our Tuesday and Wednesday Speed Dating sessions at 8 pm.
Home of the famed “Astro-Match” Speed dating game: “4 guys, 4 girls, 8 minutes, 1 fun time.” We are located in Snowflake Village.

The Clevian people peacefully ruled the Earth 30,000 years ago. Come to SNOWFLAKE VILLAGE each night at 8pm to find out if YOU TOO are a lost Clevian! Help us rediscover the lost arts of SPEED DATING, Knackling (or Snackling), perhaps take a turn on the Abrasion Wheel, & bring back ecstatic Utopia right here and now!
OKNOTOK is another way of inscribing the ying to your yang. Non-sexual edge play is the way.

OKNOTOK stands as a beacon for those yearning to taste the magic of the unknown. Here, beneath a sign that dances between OPEN and CLOSED at the whim of the cosmic OK-CAFE team—comprising the alchemist CHEF, the voyaging SERVER, and the guardian HOST—reality is gently stirred and poured anew. Seated with strangers you will taste flavors unique to your combination... and whatever the CHEF might create just for you.

OKNOTOK! A theme camp that's been bringing folks together for over 10 years on the playa. Our one-of-a-kind, handcrafted structure features a majestic 16-foot tower, complete with comfy leather recliners and a bona fide land-line phone that lets you ring up folks strolling the dusty streets. OKNOTOK's got a little something for everyone - workshops, performances, and all kinds of happenings that embrace the diverse spirits of our community.
OKNOTOK holds a variety of close-encounter events throughout the week.
OKNOTOK is a multi-purpose venue featuring a variety of surprising events all week, including live music, the Disney-Sing-Along, and a nightly funeral.
OKNOTOK is a multi-purpose venue featuring a variety of surprising events all week, including Ruby's Power Hour, the Disney-Sing-Along, a nightly funeral.

OKNOTOK is a playa social club featuring a wide range of events happening all day and night, every day and night. Our 30 foot tall Human Tower offer great views with great seating.
Bingo, funerals, sing-a-longs, live art, weird movies, disco, and a 20 foot tower with the most comfortable seating on the playa. All this and more at OKNOTOK.
OKNOTOK is a small venue featuring a variety of individual performers, speakers, and activities all week.

Come by and tell us about the biggest fish you ever caught!  Enjoy the shade of our structure while you rest ye tired bones!  We may not catch everything, but we sure as heck put out a line to try and reel everyone in!

Bait Shack!

A relaxing place to get out of the sun, have lively conversation, get an official fishing license, and then fish for hippies.  Come on down and tell us about the biggest whopper you caught, or even the last time you caught crabs...  All are welcome at the Bait Shack and we look forward to seeing you!
We are a group of salty sea dogs that want to help YOU catch what you NEED! Please stop by and tell us about the biggest whopper you ever caught. "IT WAS THIIIIIIIS BIG!"

The qt pies are an eclectic collective of souls inviting you to explore quixotic transcendence. We're on a mission to understand the temporal nature of identity and imagine new versions of self, community, and world. Spend time with us and embrace your pie-in-the-sky ideas. Our doors are open to the most curious.

Our camp is a cozy, intimate home base for all of our adventures. We curate a wide spectrum of experiences from serene and sensual to hypnotic and party-popping. With us, the boundaries between dream and reality dissolve. Come find the magic in boundless possibility.

The qt pies are an eclectic collective of souls inviting you to explore non-normative interpretations of time. We're on a mission to deconstruct our understanding of time - our most ubiquitous, yet most precious, finite resource. Traverse the 4th dimension with us. Embrace pie-in-the-sky ideas. Our doors are open to all who dare to question, who might be questioning, or who simply have questions. This year, we plan to bring back our most popular events from 2022 and innovate new offerings engaging with this year's Animalia theme. We believe that the soul, or anima, is eternal. Our interactivity takes participants on thrilling journeys of soul and body exploration.

The qt pies are an adorable, eclectic collective of souls inviting you to explore non-normative interpretations of time. Embrace pie-in-the-sky ideas. Our doors are open to all who dare to question, who might be questioning, or who simply have questions. Come fetch that QT with us: Queer Time, Question Time, Quality Time through multi-level participatory activities that engage the six senses, and the seventh - our sense of time.

Reverbia is an All Live Music Camp, known as The Portal of Live Music at Burning Man.  Reverbia features International, National, and Regional Touring Acts.  Reverbia schedules each day with the following:  Calm Inside (breathe, stretch), our very popular Live Music Yoga in The Morning, Dancing Before Noon (Live Music Dance Workshops)...Song, Dust, Sing (Black Rock City's premier open mic and singer/songwriter showcase on an amazing sound system), Concerts in the Shade Series, and Reverbia Live Nights on our Main Stage.  Two other venues host late night music: Our LED Interactive Radiance Dome (lots of live looping and chill music) and our Jam and Teahouse (acoustic solo artists, duos, trios), where you can get hot exotic teas to soothe your late night hours.

Black Rock City Rest Area is open 24/7 for R&R.
Make a pit stop or stay a while. We'll point you in the right way. Enjoy a meal on our picnic table. Lounge in our courtyard or siesta in our teepee. Take in Mother Nature with a panoramic view of Black Rock City from our elevated perch. Warm your body and spirit around our campfire. Rest assured your Playa journey is just beginning.

Need a Minute embodies childlike play, silliness, and free expression with experiential minutes, amazing music, and activities to connect with open-hearted friends and acquaintances. Stop by the Need a Minute Booth to spin the Wheel of Time and see what kind of minute is in your future. (is it really the minute you needed?) Or stop by our parties where we'll be serving the very best minutes you'll have all week.

An ever transforming theatrical, performance-driven mutant vehicle. At it's core, Long Feng is an homage to the intricate articulation of a contortionist, mirroring the circus performer's ability to transform and transcend. A canvas of both past and future, Long Feng is a vessel for the human spirit to soar into the boundless realms of imagination. She is an invitation to explore the infinite within ourselves and to dream beyond the boundaries of reality.

Playasophy is a Burning Man camp based primarily out of Seattle and San Francisco. We've been on playa since 2010, and you can usually find us serving iced coffee in the hot afternoons. We offer an open, welcoming shaded spot to pass the day and a relaxing lounge in the evenings with music and alcohol that challenges your tastebuds.

We offer an open, welcoming shaded spot to pass the day and a relaxing lounge in the evenings with live music performances, talks, and workshops into the evening most weekdays. www.playasophy.org

Playasophy hosts a hookah lounge to help weary travelers escape the afternoon heat, complete with iced coffee, a bar, and a Slumber Dome. At night we serve tea as well as convert the Slumber Dome into a Wonderdome, illuminated by dancing lights to enhance your evening

The perfect place to cool off during a hot day, Playasophy serves hookah and iced coffee throughout the afternoon. We also welcome guests to take a break in the Land of Soft, where the entire floor is covered in memory foam. If its a cold night, come by to warm up with Nighttime Tea. Playasophy is the perfect spot to catch your breath before diving back into the playa!

Welcome to Playasophy, a space to rest and reflect in the excitement of the carnival. Come in the mornings for coffee to start off your day, and in the afternoons sit around a hookah, enjoy a beverage and share stories and experiences with both our members and other travelers! In the evenings, enjoy the splendor of the Wonderdome, a fully controllable immersive light display while resting in the Land of Soft. We hope to see you soon!

Find us by looking for our Cloud Castle: At the entrance to our camp, you'll find an elevated cargo-netting platform filled with cloudy pillows that offers a sweet retreat below and expansive views above. We assemble this tower with love and care, and welcome all weary burners into its cool fluff with warm hearts. 

With open minds, playful spirits and boundless energy, we are coming together in 2018 to provide the Cloudiest, most heavenly experience burners have seen at BRC

Camp Cloudy as Fuck is a Cumulonimbus Oasis on the Playa.  With a group of campers from their 20s to their 70s, we will be offering a relaxing, shady chill space, invigorating THUNDERSTORM! Drinks, and events throughout the week.  We are an eclectic group of 30 artists, frisbee players, policy wonks, elder wise men and women, thinkers, doers, and teachers from the Bay Area, SoCal, Northwest and Midwest, excited to provide fun, entertainment and love to all inhabitants of Black Rock City.

SAVE YOURSELF! Step into TIN FOIL HAT, Black Rock City's center for pseudo-science & conspiracy theory! Transform shiny foil into mind-shielding masterpieces that (allegedly) block pesky brain vibrations. We have conspiracies galore—grab string and sticky notes to map out your grand design and show how it all connects at the center: Burning Man itself! We'll supply materials (or bring your own) in our shady chill spot, open for hat-crafting adventures. Join us to "save" the world—and look fabulous doing it!

SAVE YOURSELF! COME make your way to TIN FOIL HAT, Black Rock City's Center for Pseudo Science and Conspiracy Theory!  You think its a fashion statement but it is soooo much more. Share your Talents in bending Aluminum Foils to your fantasy, and share them with the world!  We are bringing our materials of Tin Foil to allow the freedom of expression of making hats of tin foil...WE WILL SAVE THE WORLD! We are ingesting heavy metals , By wearing Tin Foil hats we will be saving ourselves from the radio waves that vibrate those tiny bits of heavy metals within our brains...causing all types of dis ease.  We invite everyone to step right up, into our shady chill space to join our tin foil hat making 24/7....Bring your own aluminum, or some will be provided...Several Professional Tin Foil Hat Makers will be on hand to give lessons and help others shield themselves.

EVERYONE MUST BE SAVED! COME make your own way to TIN FOIL HAT!  You think its a fashion statement but it is soooo much more. Share your Talents in bending Aluminum Foils to your fantasy, and share them with the world!

There's no faster way to fuck your burn than to have a broken bike. Bikes break. If you've ever had a broken bike on playa you know it sucks. A broken bike is much worse than no bike at all.A broken bike on Playa is the fucking worst; so, we get Burners with Broken Bikes back to burning by fixing their beaters. Does it always work? No. That's why we're "Maybe Bike Repair." 

We're a group of committed bike mechanics, enthusiasts, and artists who work with Burners with Broken Bikes to unfuck their bikes.

We'll be your Homie!
Everything is better with a Homie!

Live theatre on the Playa! 
This year we'll be bringing two plays inspired by the theme of Metamorphoses: a live version of Ovid's Metamorphoses, and a live version of Trainspotting.
Black Rock City Repertory Theatre will be bringing two plays to the playa this year: Shakespeare's As You Like It and A Midsummer Night's Dream.

Enter our silk draped, plush, cushioned, lantern-lit, air-conditioned dome to be whisked away into an oasis from the dust and heat. Let our loving attendants ensure your comfort while we serve you house made organic shisha and tea. Be entertained by a variety of intimate world music and dance performances taking place on the center carpet.  Wednesday-Sunday evenings, our outdoor courtyard, illuminated by a ring of torches ignites the dancing flame within us all as world class DJ's, musicians, and performers entertain into the night. Come spin fire or drum at the Fire Flow Jam and Drum Circle, dance the night away to one of our outdoor music and dance performances, and wax philosophical, regale your fellows with your tales, and make friends and lovers for a lifetime inside the Hookahdome!

Hookahdome provides a cooling oasis in the desert for weary travelers, and a chance to escape from the dust and heat and chaos of the outer world. Participants are invited to step through the the curtain of our silk draped dome and be whisked away to another realm. Cool out, puff hookah, make a friend in our richly cushioned, classic, Middle-Eastern inspired "coffee house" lounge.

Hookahdome provides an air-conditioned dome with Hookah services w Global music and Bellydancing in the daytime.  Hookahdome is also the nighttime dance destination at BRC for Tribal/Global music styles and live music performances, including North African, Middle Eastern, Gypsy-Roma and East Indian music-reworks by re-knowned HD resident artists such as Karsh Kale, The MIDIval Punditz and live artists Turku from Istanbul, Turkey.

A chill oasis in the desert, out of the beating, burning sun that pulses to a mystic bhangra beat. Hookahdome is candy for your soul, as your senses swirl with the fragrant incense of the sacred hookah, and spoil your eyes with the seductive beauty of exotic performance art.

Hookahdome is your oasis in the desert — a friendly dome featuring shisha, conversation, exotic music, belly dancing and other live performances, and of course the magic you create with friends old and new.

Gather your open-minded & sparkling friends, and make yourself at home in this intimate atmosphere of dance, communion, and luxury … Smolder with the fragrant incense of the sacred hookah, and spoil your senses with the seductive beauty of exotic performance art.

Gather your favorite open-minded & sparkling friends, and make yourself at home in this intimate atmosphere of dance, communion, and luxury … Smolder with the fragrant incense of the sacred hookah, and spoil your senses with the seductive beauty of exotic performance art. Dance with refreshing abandon to the musical sorcery of the DJ wizards. Be surrounded by elegant beauty, intelligent creativity, and warm social energy … Hookahdome is candy for your soul.

An oasis of luxury in the desert offering an extraordinary measure of hospitality, we set the mood for enchantment through flavored tobacco smoking, sunset ceremonies, and evening fire-dancing rituals. Tribal rhythms and soothing melodies bathe your senses as you enter the Altar Dome and spin the Wheel of Faith, travel the playa in style on the Magic Flying Carpet, or enjoy the intimate pleasures of the Cuttle Shuttle.

Hookahdome, where hedonism reigns, gentle melodies massage the senses, and respite is found from the lonely desert. In the heat enjoy the mist; in the evening warm mint tea and the hookah offer ceremony, communion, and contentment.

Lounge in our palatial domes where you will be engulfed in opulence and tranquility. The honeyed smoke of the hookah pipe will fortify you, and you will be born anew upon entering the grand womb. Recline upon satin pillows, sup on fine figs, dates, and Moroccan mint tea, relinquish the ego to gentle rhythm and loving kinship.

Welcome to The Gutter, your grungy nostalgic neighborhood bowling alley. Land marked by our towering 10-ft bowling pin, The Gutter features a two-lane bowling alley open daily for spontaneous games, wild strikes, and the occasional gutterball. Spin your way into The Spare Room, a shaded lounge and dance space, a bowling-themed bar, and a DJ booth spinning beats to keep the energy rolling. By day, join us for bowling tournaments and themed parties, and by night, get your glow on with your inner child's favorite - Cosmic Bowling. Whether you're here to strike, dance, or just chill, The Gutter is the perfect place to let the good times roll - and don't forget to ask us about our PinPal VIP program!

La Calaca Village is an art support village who supports the honorarium project Touch Me, are the curators of TedX Black Rock City and also participate in many other interactive projects around the playa. The new camp is called La Calaca and will also offer spiritual healing services in their dome.  Contact a La Calaca camp member for more information.

Come take a nap in our hammocks, sit and chat, make a jellyfish hat or just float along with the jellyfish swarm for a spell. Still Stings is a little piece of quiet on the playa. (Also celebrating random acts of quesadillas 😀 .)

Mystic is a legacy theme camp with a rich 20+ year history in Black Rock City. 
We create a vibrant space filled with interactive art, uplifting music, and transformative workshops that inspire personal growth and connection.  
BY DAY, experience our VISIONARY SPEAKER SERIES, HEALING MODALITIES, and engaging MIND-BODY WORKSHOPS in our MYSTIC THEATER and MYSTIC TEMPLE.  
BY NIGHT, immerse yourself in unforgettable performances from talented musicians, fire dancers, and artists during our exciting events, including the renowned TRUTH & BEAUTY WEDNESDAY NIGHT PARTY!  
And for a mobile Mystic adventure, explore our interactive Mutant Vehicle, MYSTIC FLYER EXPERIENCE, in Deep Playa joining us for a journey of creativity, community, and fun.

Camp Mystic has a 20 year history at burning man and features over 155 hours of daytime programming in its theater, healing dome, and cosmic heart temple and a large visionary art and sculpture collection you can visit 24/7.  

By day come check out our mind-body movement classes and check out our evolutionary speaker series or get a healing session in our dome or a temple initiation and ritual in our temple.  

By night come to our famous Wednesday night party featuring some of burning man's best musicians, DJs, dancers, performers, fire spinners, aerialists, and live painters.

Come on other nights to experience sound healing concerts, gospel choir, cacao ceremonies, and beautiful music in our theater's art gallery.

Camp Mystic has a 20 year history at burning man.

The Cosmic Llama Guardians are sworn to protect the ancient secrets of the Dali Llama lineage. The Cosmic Llamas have been charged with creating the highest vibrations of Harmony & Resonance…Without our camp offering beats, music, rhythmic dance (and llama puns)…the Cosmos would fall dangerously out of balance! 

In the whimsical world of Cosmic Llamas,  every step resonates with rhythm, every word hums with harmony, and every heart pulsates with cosmic frequencies. Together we weave the melodies of unity and vibrations of joy that reach the farthest corners of the cosmos, one llama leap at a time!

The Hearth offers a sanctuary of warmth and rejuvenation in the heart of the playa. Step into our cozy squish space filled with cushions and comfort where you can rest your weary body while connecting with fellow burners. Rejuvenate in our steam room, where heat and community combine to cleanse both body and spirit. Stay hydrated with our refreshing spa water station offering cucumber, strawberry, and other infusions throughout the day. As the sun sets, gather around our bubbling cauldron for a nourishing bowl of soup served daily. The Hearth welcomes all who seek restoration, connection, and the simple comfort of being cared for before venturing back into the dust and wonder of Black Rock City.
We are the art support camp building the Moonlight Library. Come visit our camp to meet the artists, and enjoy some hot sake at our sake bar.

We are the art support camp associated with The Prairie of Possibilities, a meditative field of glowing prairie grass in deep playa. This camp provides space for our creators to live, relax, and rejuvenate. Stop by for a preview of our installation, get to know us, and find out more about the inception of our art project and what it took to build it!

Scientists associated with the Moonlight Collective have been studying the phenomena known as the Prairie of Possibilities since the 1960's. It is apparently heading for the Playa; plans are under way to intercept and study this mysterious yet mesmerizing field of glowing, swaying prairie grass. Visit the Moonlight Collective Field Camp for morning tea, review their research, and record your own story to be shared with the Prairie Entity.

We are a Tribe, a Family, and a Close Circle of Performing Artists and Skilled Makers. We seek to restore the sacredness of myth through theater, dance, circus arts, puppetry, costumes, and fire performances coupled with deep, ritualized tales of days long past yet still relevant in the present. We seek to balance the foolish with the wise, the free-spirited with the disciplined, the ridiculous with the honourable; to face the Shadow and the Light. We welcome all who seek the Truth.

MythMaker merges the ancient arts of storytelling & theatre with the dramatic skills of the circus arts creating a
multidisciplinary art experience, delving into the mystical, magical and profound. Performances include theatre, music, dance and ceremonies, including the dynamic circus arts of fire spinning, acrobatics, aerials and stilt walking.
Their multi-dimensional performances strive to
integrate a new cultural mythology through ritualistic performance art inspiring a new dream, which empowers the individual and community to co-create a sustainable future for all life.

The Ripple Effect reflects on the very nature of affecting change:  how one small stone tossed into a body of water causes a ripple effect with an almost never-ending forward motion.  Camp Ripple is all about tossing those positive stones to impact your own life and those of others one small metaphorical pebble at a time!

Dr. Carl's Collection of Departments returns! Come play our legendary Dept. of Collections game, where we will give you a semi-fabulous prize if you can do, are, or tell us about a thing we list on the board of tiles. Enjoy a homebrew at our Dept. of Dumpster Dive Bar. Get glowed up by our Dept. of Boudoir Photography and be adored and cheekily photographed (now including black light sessions after dark!).  Learn and play Go in our Dept. of Strategy, enjoy our blacklight Hissing Booth, or let fate decide at our luscious pink Kiss-Met randomizer.

Dr. Carl's Collection of Departments returns! We'll be dusting off a few of the old departments while senselessly adding a few more to the collection. The Department of Collections, our ongoing, sensibly-sized, big-board of stuff will, of course, return asking the city to do, find, or be something. The Theater Department, Department of Strategy, Department of Dispute Resolution, Department of Talks and Discussions, and Department of Boudoir Photography are all ready and waiting to make your participation at the very least, a little more interesting.

Dr. Carl continues experiments with variety and collecting experiences to offer the citizens of Black Rock City.
We will tip our hat to our past with a scaled down (but no less interesting!) version of our big board of stuff for the citizens to find, do or be. Throwing it way back to the first incarnation of the camp we will provide a couch and a barely qualified listener to whom you can tell your thoughts. You might actually get good advice but promises can't be made. 
Over the course of the week we will host talks and workshops in our spacious shade tent. 
Herds of remote controlled buffalo have been spotted and we are cooking up a few other departments to delight the city. 
Oh and heckling...there's always heckling.

Dr. Carl's Collection of Departments has diversified to bring you a carefully curated selection of participatory options. With a nod to our past we have created a distinctly smaller version of our big, imposing board of stuff for you to find, do or be. Last year's remote controlled shenanigans will also be available to you the citizens. Should you desire something more thoughtful we are hosting not one but two talks on subjects yet to be divulged. If none of that suits you there's always beer...from the Dumpster Divebar!

Dr. Carl's Department of Remote Control Danger will give participants the thrill of driving an art car without the thrill of DMV bureaucracy. Our new friends will be welcome to step up to our precisely engineered race track and handed the controls to a tiny art car. The tiny engines will rev and the excitement will be palpable. Only the most adept art car driver will claim victory after speeding around the track! After the race have a cold home brew from the Dumpster Dive Bar.

Dr Carl's Dept of Recollection will have you wracking your brain to solve a delightful puzzle of larger-than-life proportions. Achieve some level of success and you may find yourself with a semi-fabulous prize.

Dr. Carl's big board of stuff is imposing, daunting and a little bit sexy. Pick something from our big board, go out and find that something. Return to us, convince an official that you deserve a semi-fabulous prize...collect a semi-fabulous prize.

Vietnamese Iced Coffee Experience is an all inclusive Burning Man Theme Camp. We encourage diversity, participation, and acceptance and welcome new members from all locales and walk of life.  Our camp commitments are minimal, as such we do expect members to be radically self sufficient when it comes to personal needs although we're more than happy to help out with pre-event planning and support in extreme situations.  Participating in our afternoon coffee service is more reward than obligation and we also offer several community directed activities for those that wish to participate.  We have camp events during the week to ensure everyone feels included.  We'd be happy to welcome you to join our group.  Contact us for more information!

Are you hot and thirsty on the playa? Come to VICE for refreshing, hand-made Vietnamese Iced Coffee, afternoons from 2pm to 4pm. Mix and mingle with friends and neighbors! Make new friends! Make new neighbors! Update your Flamebook status while waiting. Get your Beard pampered, learn to walk on Stilts, dance with Silk-Poi Flags, or create Perler Bead keepsakes at one of our interactive workshops. VICE is a friendly, diverse camp who wants to see YOU in line for coffee!

If you are hot, thirsty, and decaffeinated while on the playa then come to VICE for refreshing, hand-made Vietnamese Iced Coffee, afternoons from 2 to 4pm.  Learn to walk on Stilts, dance with Flags, or create Perler Bead keepsakes at one of our interactive workshops at VICE – a friendly, diverse camp who wants to see YOU in line for coffee!

Embrace unknown probabilities and explore universal truths by rolling the dice, allowing fate and magic to intertwine in a dance of chance. Each roll serves as a conduit for the universe's will, guiding you toward unique and spontaneous experiences and connections. After all, true magic lies not in knowing the outcome, but in embracing endless possibilities. We invite you to linger and share in our tea offerings and share your desert wisdom.

You have been riding for what seems like days, impossible to decipher what time it is, the city has swallowed you and sent you deep into the suburbs. Your butt needs some reprieve from that skeleton bike seat that (accept it) looks way cooler than it feels. Then you see it in the distance: a shady oasis with comfy seats, tables, and liquid refreshment. Could this be heaven? Close! This is Rest in Peace where you get peace, love, and chill. Late afternoons: Chill games, D&D, Meditation, Unbirthdays, Body paint, and iced tea (including the long island variety). And at night: find your way home with a beautiful lit animalia themed dome.

Your butt needs some reprieve from that skeleton bike seat that (accept it) looks way cooler than it feels.. and suddenly you see it... in the distance… a beautiful illuminated peace sign at night and a shady oasis by day, surrounded by cushions and comfy seats… could this be heaven? Close, it is the Rest in Peace Camp.  We are the welcome stop for the weary wanderer, a beacon of happiness for everyone that camps near us, and in the afternoons: games, parties, fun, dancing, and a liquid dispensing bar.

Step into a world where childhood memories meet adult indulgence at "Get Toasted"! Immerse yourself in the comforting aroma of warm, buttery (vegan) cinnamon toast that will transport you back to carefree days. For those seeking a bit of spice, savor our tantalizing cinnamon whisky that adds a grown-up twist to the classic treat. As the sun sets, join us for electrifying DJ sets from 9 pm to midnight, creating the perfect ambiance for unforgettable nights under the desert sky. Get ready to ignite your senses and toast to new adventures at Get Toasted!
Get Toasted brings out your inner child by gifting delicious cinnamon toast, and makes you remember why being an adult is just as awesome by getting you toasted with cinnamon whiskey!
Cinnamon toast and cinnamon whisky...
We are a interactive cinnamon toast experience!
GET TOASTED!

Welcome to Enchanté! Where we drop bangers and know how to keep the party going all night long. Swing by for one of our sunset parties and get the best dusty cock(tail) on the Playa and dance your face off!

Welcome to Enchanté! Where we drop bangers and know how to keep the party going all night long. Swing by for one of our sunset parties and get the best dusty cock(tail) on the Playa and dance your face off!

Long standing camp brought to you by veterans and newer burners alike all sharing the same vision: to bring the damn party in a safe and inviting space to people of all shapes, sizes and backgrounds. We are a camp made up of all walks of life and bring that perfect grassroots vibe to a well organized camp that offers shade, tasty dusty beverages, bumpin' tunes for those wearing their dancing shoes and well lit nighttime LED art to provide as an excellent beacon for our block on the playa!

Welcome to Enchante! Another year, another dusty dance party. Come drink tea, hangout in our shade structure and dance your worries away with us as we practice radical inclusion in a safe space for all walks of life.

Jovial jesting. Impeccability incarnate. Magic made manifest. Ravishing Raver Seals. Star kissed sunflowers. Balls deep in bliss. Experience the meaning of Bonjoya in the sharky waters of Enchante. 100% Whole grain and positively No Fun.

From the bosom of the Pacific Northwest, an astounding force of righteous revelry, dashing decency, gorgeous gallantry and impeccable taste erupts to dazzle all dreamers and depreciate the depraved. Dance while you lounge, whistle while you work and discover the differences that distinguish the Non from the Enchante. We double dog dare ya.

Enchante presents the Next Door Ravers delights you with the finer side of nonchalance. We disco party cats, dashing dandylions, outspoken owls, jubilant dukes and duchesses of debauchery and ambassadors of the No Fun creedo do humbly invite you and are at your service...sometimes.
Come enjoy a slice of avocado toast and a refreshing drink before heading out on the playa!
Come enjoy a slice of avocado toast and a refreshing drink before heading out on the playa!
Come enjoy a nice breakfast of avocado toast and mimosas! Try out our champagne bubble blaster, have some breakfast, and meet new friends before heading out on the playa!

Welcome to Disco Porch! You can't miss our large multicolor psychedelic illuminated "DISCO PORCH" sign placed on the ground to the left of the camp. The main structure is a canopy decorated with various string lights and several disco balls hanging from the roof. Under the canopy, there is a living room vibe with inflatable couch/chairs and coffee tables. Our bar is bright and covered with a shiny silver cloth. Out front you will see our jumbo disco mailbox labeled "DP MAIL"—don't forget to check your mail! The overall atmosphere is festive, vibrant, and inviting. So come on in, take a seat, relax, and let the disco porchers do the rest!!!

We live by: WEIRD (Wildly Enlightened Individuals Recreating Dreams). We welcome you to our Red Carpet Revival, where you can rest your dusty buns and refresh with our massage, facials, tea, and refreshments.

Can you find the G-Spot?  We are your favorite neighborhood dive bar.  Come thirsty, leave happy!  New for 2024 we are shifting to an evening offering and opening the Sloth Sinema.  Join us for a chill evening of great movies, themed cocktails, and of course, shenanigans!  Family-friendly matinees included.  Already have plans for the evening?  Come by in the morning for "Saturday" morning cartoons and milk and cereal.  Just like mom used to make.

Often hard to find and always pleasurable location in the warm (sometimes frigid) wonderful lower region of the Black Rock Desert, deep inside the fantasy zone known as Black Rock City where, you may discover an incredible welcoming environment known as The G-Spot! The original and still the best steam bath experience.
Step into a world of relaxation and rejuvenation at The Steam Bath Project. Located at the heart of Burning Man, our camp offers a unique and immersive experience inspired by the soothing power of steam. Enter our tranquil oasis and indulge in the therapeutic benefits of steam bathing, surrounded by the sights, sounds, and scents of the desert. Our Lavender Lounge provides a sanctuary for participants to unwind and prepare for their steam bath adventure, while interactive elements engage the senses and foster community connection. Join us for a journey of self-discovery and renewal, where the principles of radical inclusion, communal effort, and radical self-expression come to life.
The first and still the best steam bath on the playa. Since 2001 we have been providing a unique and transformative experince at Burningman.

Using the ages old system of thermal siphoning we use the Japanese Chofu stove to create and circulate the steam in an insulation and wood tongue and groove dome.  In the past we have been interviewed by the Earth Guardians for our economical use of water. We use less than .25 of a gallon of water per steamer and which offer a completely different option to showering on the playa. We have a double sub pump system that drains into our village grey water system which is pumped out. We are part of a Nectar village which is completely solar run. As a camp we participate in a with other camps for kitchen and infrastructure needs.
Steam Bath Project offers a playa twist on the ritual cleansing tradition and embraces the possibility of transformation. Experience the Steam project that started the trend. Daily Noon-6PM.
Steam Bath Project offers a playa twist on the ritual cleansing tradition and embraces the possibility of transformation.

The Steam Bath Project makes the mundane magical! The simple act of “cleansing” becomes part of an age-old  ritual tradition embracing the possibility of transformation. We invite you into the geodesic dome where you can relax on the wooden benches as boiling water produces steam with negative ions that fill the space. Negative ions are known to create an overall feeling of wellness, similar to the air after a summer thunderstorm.
The Steam Bath Project is magical! Come and steam away the dust with an age-old ritual tradition embracing the possibility of transformation.
Come cleanse and transform your body and soul.

Steam Bath Project welcomes visitors to share a steam bath experience.  Visitors are invited to enter the geodesic dome and relax on wooden bench where boiling water produces steam and negative ions that fill the dome.  This process results in a clean body and improved respiratory function.

The Steam Bath Project offers Black Rock City a public, wood-fired steam bath in which to cleanse and relax. The hot moist air contrasts incredibly with the dry heat of the playa. Constructed as a geodesic dome, the space is open to all!

Enjoy 24/7 gourmet ceremonial tea service in a lush, cool, luxurious teahouse. Our small stage will feature world folk music and dance performances. We will be gifting literal and figurative keys of liberation.

Empires will fall, but steam will rise. Free gourmet ceremonial tea service in a beautiful oasis served 24/7. Be entertained and delighted by live world folk music and dance performances, and by The Tea Circus.
Porta Party is celebrates diversity in culture, music and food. We are home to the remote controlled Porta John, Hel's Diner and a Can O WhoopAss. We serve potstickers everyday 6pm-8pm.

Camp Porta (Party) is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization based in Carmel, Ca. in the Monterey Bay. We celebrate community, music and alternative art in the desert and beyond year-round.

We are an international and diverse camp that continues to produce new ideas and art. Our vision is a unification of gender, race and color through music and art.

Porta Party - Home to the one and only remote controlled porta-potty on the playa. We bring fun, food, music & love to the playa. We are an international all inclusive camp of all races and genders. We bring fun and love to the playa and leave the drama behind.

Step into a dreamlike grove where color-shifting light, ambient sound, and organic textures invite moments of pause and inner reflection. This immersive space blends bioluminescent-inspired art with mindful programming—offering glow-paint workshops, quiet meditations, and evening sound journeys under soft, shifting hues. Created as a haven for connection and self-expression, our camp is a living gift to the playa—open to all who seek creativity, calm, and a deeper resonance with themselves and others.

ReImaginate at Alight Market offers a vibrant sensory oasis at Burning Man. Our 5Zenses Lounge features tea and elixirs, a Nose Spa, live music, and a space for calligraphy, healing and connection. At night, we host a lively Night Market with spontaneous performances and interactive experiences. Rooted in community and inclusion, we celebrate diverse voices and provide a welcoming, alcohol-free space for relaxation, play, and discovery.
We are bringing night market where we will join forces together with our fellow camps within Alight market to present a diverse array of offerings from our varied cultural backgrounds.

Bringing COLOR to the playa since 2014!
The People of Color Camp is what happens when The Muppet Show gets put in the same telepod as an episode of The Fresh Prince of Bel Air, MTV's The Real World and a debate at the United Nations.
We provide opportunity for BIPOC Burners to not only learn about and experience Burning Man, but make it our home. We bring the diversity of our cultures to the playa through events, workshops and simply our presence. We bring our music, our soul, our rhythm, our culture… Unapologetically!
We welcome all people of all backgrounds. Stop by! Add some color to your burn! It's always love! :)

For the past several years, we have brought a reimagined Globe Theater to the Playa and  we have filled it with people witnessing one another speak and play with joy, passion, abandon, imagination, irreverence, humor and pathos. We fully embrace the mission to change the paradigm of art from a commodified object to an interactive, participatory, shared experience of creative expression. As a piece of live theater, our work can only exist once in time and it is gone. We welcome folks from all walks of life to learn, create and collaborate!

L'Atelier de Wagon has been created solely for the intent of interaction, participation, leave no trace, and gifting at Burning Man.The vehicle is a mobile art studio, bringing together professional and amateur artists or anyone whom wants to give painting a shot. Atelier gives the ability to participants to share their feelings, emotions, thoughts, and minds through live, group, artwork creation. Participants can paint in one location, load into the vehicle, be comfortable during a journey, then unload and continue to work in a new location creating a whole new set of outside interaction in which to paint.

We "check" your emotional baggage early in the week, so you can have the burn you deserve. Visit us in the middle of the week for our non-verbal non-sexual touch conscious connections workshop. Or just come by and say hi. We love everyone!

We fill the niche in between the trash fence sunrise and your late morning at Bubbles-n-bass. Come hangout with us, share a coffee, and debrief your night with our shitty stenographers. If you had "one of those nights" we may even Polaroid that for immortality. We are the rest-stop before you blow off steam in the late morning to keep the night going, or if you need to come down before hitting the bed. We've all been there, lets do it together.

Next Year on Luna explores the remarkable experience of humanity in the present from complementary perspectives: creating beautiful experiences centered on embodied and visual expression, and provoking expansive thoughts with a salon-style exchange of ideas as we marvel together at the breadth of existence through space and time. Together, we wonder: As the systems around us shape our experiences and our lives, what does it mean to maintain our essential humanity and ultimately to remain ourselves?

Your cool suburban friends who have the best living room and throw some cool parties if you're willing to commute to the edge of town. Join experts from various fields in fascinating interactive discussions on decentralization, alternative governance strategies, AI and other revolutionary topics.

Join DECENTRAL in Anahasana Village to learn more about the Decentralized Revolution that is happening. New tools are empowering communities and individuals to build a new way to live, govern, connect, and exchange with each other. Joining us at our interactive panels and talks, and please teach us more about the experiments of your communities. Where we're going, we don't need governments, just governance.

New tools are empowering communities and individuals to build a new way to live, govern, connect, and exchange with each other. Kazbah is the tower that protects the kingdom.  Its where the local leader resides, in our case the DJ, playing house music and good vibes from midnight to noonish on Wednesday, Friday, and Sunday mornings.

Kazbah is the tower that protects the kingdom.  Its where the local leader resides, in our case the DJ, playing house music and good vibes from midnight to noonish on Wednesday, Friday, and Sunday mornings.

The Kazbah is the place to be for the best music and vibes.  Let the lasers guide you to 10:00 and come find our 64 foot tall pyramid DJ Booth midnight to noon.  We've got drinks, shade, and always some surprises.

The Kazbah is a place for all. Located right on the shore of the city, this beacon can be seen from far (and heard) from far across the deep playa, look for our pyramid with lasers pointing towards Sirius and join us for good times, good vibes, good music, proper sound, a bar, and a whole lot of love.
The Kazbah is a 501c3 non profit organization with a focus on electronic music, visual art, architecture, and design.

The Kazbah is back for our 5th year with vibes, music, lasers, libations, and our Pyramid hosting parties from 10pm to 10am every night and morning. Look for the laser pointing up towards the star Sirius, and join us.

The Kazbah is a vibe, that is physically manifested in a towering pyramid/obelisk-hybrid illuminated light sculpture which houses a DJ booth in the all-seeing eye of horus at it's base, and a laser shooting from its spire up toward Sirius, the brightest star in the sky.
The Kazbah is a Sound Camp based in San Francisco.  We are dedicated to spreading positive vibes and world-class house music.

Welcome to Mithyko, a camp where we celebrate the flavors, culture, and warmth of Mexico! We invite all burners to enjoy delicious Mexican food like tacos, tamales, guacamole, and hot chocolate, while connecting through music and dance. Our camp is a cozy space for relaxation with comfy seating and refreshing drinks, including coconut water, natural water, and tequila!

At Mithyko, we believe in Radical Inclusion, Gifting, and Communal Effort. We encourage participation and sharing, creating a space where everyone feels welcome and valued. Come join us to enjoy good food, great company, and the true spirit of Mexican hospitality at Burning Man!
MEXICAN TRADITIONS AND GOOD TEQUILA
