As our name implies, at Perihelion, we soar as close as possible to the sun. Welcome a brilliant morning at our Intergalactic brunches, laze through a luminous interlude at our High Tea, or soak in an incandescent sunset with stellar frozen cocktails at our Star Bar!

At Perihelion, you will reach the point in your journey closest to the sun. Enjoy a bright morning at our Intergalactic Pancake Massacres, and find yourself drawn into the orbit of the Star Bar for a stellar frozen cocktail!

At Perihelion, you will reach the point in your journey closest to the sun. Enjoy a bright morning at our Intergalactic Pancake Massacres, and find yourself drawn into the orbit of the Star Bar for a stellar elixir!

Practicing Burning Man in all the best ways! Come by for our daily Practices from arty to farty.  Interact with the truly unique Exquisite Dorks & We Are art pieces. Come see how practice makes camp!

Exquisite Dorks is a collaborative art piece that takes the surrealist game of "Exquisite Corpse" and makes it 1000 feet long. It will be possible for thousands of people to participate.  Drawing materials will be provided and stools will be available for young and disabled persons. Come by any time day or night!

We Are is a life sized portrait book showcasing the unique characters of BRC that make up our incredible city!
Practicing since 2012.   Home of the WE ARE, EXQUISITE DORKS & UNIDENTIFIED art pieces.  Come by and interact with them and us!

Exquisite dorks is a collaborative art piece that takes the surrealist game of "Exquisite Corpse" and makes it 1000 feet long.  It will be possible for thousands of people to participate.  The project is a shaded kiosk with multiple wall panels for participants to draw on while alternating sections of a giant spool of paper are revealed as the roll is periodically rolled through the installation.  Drawing materials will be provided and stools will be available for young and disabled persons.  Come by any time day or night!
Practice makes camp.  Practicing since 2012.  Art support for WE ARE.
Home of the Shitty Kitty Art Car! Come be shitty with us! Practicing since 2012. Practice makes camp!

Dicey Side Quests is a new camp that provides Black Rock Citizens with intimate gaming experiences and connection, guided by passionate gamers of all backgrounds! Our planned events are available to passerbyers looking to get lost for a couple hours in a side quest with a handful of strangers in games and competitions that give a unique outlet for self expression and connection.

We are a small, welcoming camp focused on connection, creativity, and community care. Our central dome hosts daily interactive offerings like conversation games, pop-up workshops, and cozy lounges where anyone can drop in to chill, connect, or collaborate. Whether you're looking for a deep talk, a silly prompt, or a moment of rest, we offer a space that's low-key, low-barrier, and open to all. Come say hi, share a story, or just hang in the shade—everyone is welcome here.
We are a small camp of Big Island Hawaii based campers sharing aloha and Pāʻina Wai Niu coconut water parties and hydration.
We are a small camp of Big Island Hawaii based campers sharing aloha and Pāʻina Wai Niu coconut water parties and hydration.

No Bikini Atoll is a group of Burners from the Big Island of Hawai'i. Our camp's coastlines are rooted in the Hawaiian values of aloha ("love; compassion; kindness; acceptance), mālama ("to care for"), pono ("right; righteousness"), and ʻohana ("family"). We engage in "talking story" with neighbors, inviting friends in, and creating our own playa paradise to set a stage of kindness and inclusion so that we may all act upon what is "pono" or right.

No Bikini Atoll is a group of Burners from the Big Island of Hawaii.  Our camp's coastlines are rooted in the Hawaiian values of aloha ("love; compassion; kindness; acceptance), mālama ("to care for"), pono ("right; righteousness"), and ʻohana ("family").   We engage in "talking story" with neighbors, inviting friends in, and creating our own playa paradise to set a stage of kindness and inclusion so that we may all act upon what is "pono" or right.

Camp No Bikini Atoll is a enclave of dancers, doers, awareness awakeners, movers, and shakers of shakas. As ambassadors of aloha and purveyors of pacific positivity, we strive to reach the masses with our message of light and love, to perpetuate the energy of collective kindness, understanding, and creativity as we voyage into the waters of the future.

Camp No Bikini Atoll is a enclave of dancers, doers, awareness awakeners, movers, and shakers of shakas. As ambassadors of aloha and purveyors of pacific positivity, we strive to reach the masses with our message of light and love, to perpetuate the energy of collective kindness, understanding, and creativity as we voyage into the waters of the future.

We offer passion fruit juice parties, elaborate dance performances, and morning meditations.  We enjoy sustaining and supporting our little tribe and the people around us. 

*Please note: At No Bikini Atoll we are against bikinis and we are against nuclear testing.  Did you know Bikini Atoll is the home to seven nuclear test sites? We say NO! And, if you come to our camp you don't need a bikini. You don't need a bikini at all.

A place where alternate worlds twist your ideas of history -- and what version of our world you actually come from.  The Lounge at the Cross-time Jaunter's Ball is full of twisted timelines and realities that may exist -- as well as shade and hammocks to refresh the weary time traveling citizen.
Play the  Burning Piano ,  get massaged and learn at our presentations. Chill  in our  pillow filled  "Comfort" tent.  Be entertained or dance in our Joy  venue. Make a Tutu on Tuesday.

SEAweed-Seattle Artist Collective.  Building and presenting  art and culture to bring people together from throughout the world. 

KonaZona-Serving Liquid Hugs to Burners and the Burnt

Comfort Cabaret Performance Venue-come learn, laugh and live
KonaZona Coffee Shack-Hawaiian Java served hot and cold
SEAweed Artist Collective-Seattle based Art Support Camp.
SeaWEED Artist Collective. Seattle, WA - teaming up with Portland, OR and Vancouver, BC - to bring a monumental library to the Playa.
SeaWEED Artist Collective. Bringing Seattle to the Playa in the form of our large burnable art.

We are a tea lounge that has yerba mate brewing the entire event. Come by to lurk, chill, and lounge. Relax while thriving, and drinking tea. The way life should be. We have a variety of other teas available throughout the week but always have yerba brewing. Sit down and hydrate while you start or finish your day. Yerba Mate Dub starts every day at 10:30am. Classic dub sounds from around the world as time turns elastic. We are making pancakes in the mornings during the tea parties.

We are a tea lounge that has yerba mate brewing the entire event. Come by to lurk, chill, and lounge. Relax while thriving, and drinking tea. The way life should be. We have a variety of other teas available throughout the week but always have yerba brewing. Sit down and hydrate while you start or finish your day. Yerba Mate Dub starts every day at 10:30am. Classic dub sounds from around the world as time turns elastic.

We are a tea lounge that has yerba mate brewing in our tent the entire event. Come by to lurk, chill, thrive and relate. Relax while thriving, and drink tea. The way life should be. We have a variety of other teas available throughout the week but always have yerba brewing. Sit down and hydrate while you start or finish your day. Yerba Mate Dub starts every day at 10:30am.  Classic dub sounds from around the world as time turns elastic.
Come to our circus tent to drink yerba maté, lounge, and enjoy dub music. Relax while thriving, and drink tea. The way life should be.

Come to our circus tent to drink yerba mate, skank, and enjoy dub music. We will be relaxing, thriving, creating, burning. We have a glow in the dark teether ball court ,and warm tea urns going all night.

Come to our circus tent to drink yerba mate, skank, and enjoy dub music. We will be relaxing, thriving, creating, burning. We have a glow in the dark teether ball court ,and warm tea urns going all night.

Come by to drink yerba mate in our tea lounge. We listen to dub types of music while burning palo santo, copal, and oud. Ride our bike coarse, play tether ball, or sit down a chill while caffeinating yourself.
Come by to drink yerba mate, burn palo santo, lounge, dance, relax and lurk to the sounds of dub music in our tea lounge. Come experience a mellow morning of thrivelry with us.
Come drink yerba mate, listen to dubs, burn copal and palo santo and thrive.
Come by for yerba mate and a variety teas from around the world. Sit down, relax, listen to some dub music and thrive.
Come get some tea, dub, and thrivelry.
Heavy classic dub sounds with yerba mate, fruit tea, and coffee. Come stop by to lounge, play some ping pong, drink tea, watch a film, skank and thrive.
Dub… Were a dub camp and we play a variety of dub sounds. We serve chai tea, yerba mate and coffee, come by to skank, watch a movie, drink some tea and thrive.
We are BRC's long-standing oasis for nurturing, grounding and healing. Stop by to hang out and chill, take a class, or to receive a healing session for the mind, body and spirit.
We are BRC's long-standing oasis for nurturing, grounding and healing. Stop by to hang out and chill, take a class, or to receive a healing session for the mind, body and spirit.
We are an oasis for nurturing, grounding and healing. Stop by to hang out and chill, take a class, or to receive bodywork and healing for the mind, body and spirit.
We are an oasis for nurturing, grounding and healing. Stop by to hang out and chill, take a class, or to receive bodywork and healing of all sorts.
We are an oasis for nurturing, grounding and healing. Stop by to hang out and chill, take a class, or to receive bodywork and healing of all sorts.
HeeBeeGeeBee Healers is an oasis for nurturing, grounding and healing. Stop by to hang out and chill, take a class, or to receive bodywork and healing of all sorts.
HeeBeeGeeBee Healers is an oasis for nurturing, grounding and healing. Stop by to hang out and chill, take a class, or to receive bodywork and healing of all sorts.
BRC's premier healing oasis for 17 years.  Escape the chaos and take care of yourself with our staff of conventional and alternative healers - massage, acupuncture, chiropractic, energy and tantra.
Black Rock City's healing and personal growth oasis offering all kinds of bodywork, yoga and classes.  We have up to 20 healers on staff from 10a-6p daily.

HeeBeeGeeBee Healers is a grounded oasis that creates a nurturing environment and provides healing and personal growth services for the HeeBeeGeeBee community and all of Black Rock City. Our community’s intention is for the healing energy we cultivate to spread into the greater world, promoting love, healing and a higher state of being for everyone.

A Grounded Oasis creating a nurturing environment providing healing and personal growth education for the citizens of Black Rock City.  Our community intention is to cultivate healing that will spread into the world, promoting love and a higher state of being for every soul.
A grounded oasis providing hands on healing in the form of body work, energy, and similar modalities.  Daily yoga and multiple educational events in our classroom from 7am to 8pm.
Black Rock City’s oasis for healing, restoration and growth.  We have over 30 healers, a giant chill space to exchange massages and a classroom running 6-8 topics a day.
Stop by for bodywork daily from 10-6, yoga, and a plethora of classes in our classroom.

HeeBeeGeeBee Healers is a grounded oasis providing nurturing healing services and education to the citizens of Black Rock City.  Stop by for some hands on work, take a class, or just absorb the serenity of our chill space.

HeeBeeGeeBee Healers is a grounded oasis that creates a nurturing environment and provides healing services for Black Rock City.  We are open every day, offering all forms of bodywork and alternative healing including Shamanism, energy medicine, Tantra, emotional processes and many others.

HeeBeeGeeBee Healers is a grounded oasis that creates a nuturing environment and provides healing services for Black Rock City. Our community’s intention is for the healing energy we cultivate to spread into the greater world, promoting love, healing and a higher state of being for everyone.

In the most amazing City on the planet we can get a little overwhelmed, tired and just plan hurtin’ as we run from art to art and the next cool event. When you need a little break, head over to the HeeBeeGeeBee Healers. 8000sq ft of shade and one of the greatest vibes will greet you. We will once again be offering Meditation, Yoga, Bodywork, workshops and so much more. Think of us as the calm in the middle of the storm.We are open every day providing healing services and classes. Guided Meditation opens the day and is then followed by an amazing Yoga class taught by our world class teachers. Then at 10am the body work starts to flow. If you have an ache we might be able to help. We do get full quick but there are always new friends that would love to meet you and help work out the knots in our carpeted and cool healing space.The HeeBees always welcome volunteer Healers. Do you have a wonderful talent in Bodywork and would like a clean organized place to play? Please stop by and lend a hand.The HeeBeeGeeBee Healers are looking forward to seeing you on the playa.

In the midst of the desert, we are your home for healing, quiet meditation, massage, energy work, yoga and grounded community. Come and revel in our 4000 sq feet of quiet, carpeted, cool shade where you are sure to meet new friends and connect with healers from previous years.

HeeBeeGeeBee Healers is a gathering of talented healers that come to Black Rock City every year to provide loving, healing therapies. Our practitioners include reiki masters, massage therapists, reflexology, energy medicine healers, tarot readers and always so much more. Come let us take care of you.

HeebeeGeeBee Healers are coming back to Black Rock City to help in our, oh so out of the ordinary way. Come to our huge shade structure, recline on our floor chairs, enjoy the shade, be prt of a healing community of massage, reiki, aura healers, chiropractors, and healers that will be drawn to our space to do their work. Also enjoy the healing music and smart drinks during the day. At night we will turn up the vibe and invite you to play in our home to during the evening. Our beats and and vibe will draw the fire out of the playa and into our Shadows and Fire Sculpture garden. Here all of the Fire people on the playa will be invited to play in our shadow garden. Fire and Shadows are a hipnotic combination that will astound your optic nerve. Sorry though, you can’t burn down the Sculptures.

'Sundowners' comes from a South African friendship ritual we host Monday to Friday at sunset. A safari-themed art car and joyous South African "shebeen" speakeasy are our experiential tentpoles. Our creative center is Afrofuturism, imagining a positive, inclusive future through speculative art and technology, representing the diverse background and skills of our community. We feel Burning Man, as the planet's largest temporary city, is a fitting ecosystem to explore and express this unique Afrodiasporic ethnographic theme.

'Sundowners' comes from a South African sunset friendship ritual. A safari-themed art car and joyous South African "shebeen" speakeasy are our experiential tentpoles. 'Sundowners' is a wonderful South African drinks ceremony honoring life, art and friendship at sunset. Join our community and celebrate the special transition from day to night with safari inspired beverages, music and performances before your night of adventures. During light hours, our Safari Day Spa will soothe your body and lift your spirits with personalized healing, an oxygen bath and rejuvenating refreshments.

At Sundowners we celebrate a South African ritual known as Sundowners, a drinks ceremony that celebrates life, art and friendship at sunset each night. This transition from day into night is one of South Africa's key rituals, and is a great way to connect with friends and oil up for a night of adventures.
Balls, Bacon and Christmas! Because...why not!? Come volley and whack our balls (volleyballs and baseballs that is) eat some yummy bacon and watch our Christmas light show at night!
Burner Rec Center at Black Rock City! Volleyball, Pickleball, Batting Cages, Corn hole, Tetherball and more...come battle it out on the court or cheer on the homies. ;)

Welcome to BIGTIME! Our BIG shade area will be the perfect oasis for weary burners seeking respite from the blazing desert sun. We'll be serving up refreshing beer every day of the week, so drop by anytime and chill out in our comfy seating area.

We're going back in time to serve up some of the best 80's music during our hot pants 80's day party on Tuesday from 2 - 6PM, and traversing time on Thursday during our all decades dance party from 2 - 6PM. 

Friday we're emptying our coffers and throwing a tiki-bash for the ages. Come by between 2 - 6PM for some of the best punch on the playa. 

We'll have games, pranks, and good times the rest of the week!

Welcome to BIGTIME! Our massive shade area will be the perfect oasis for weary burners seeking respite from the blazing desert sun. We'll be serving up refreshing beers and soothing teas every day of the week, so drop by anytime and chill out in our comfy seating area.

We've got a ton of exciting events planned throughout the week, including BIGTIME TIKI NIGHT, Sax Tag, the Spirit Animal Dance Party, a Witchy Nostalgia Sleepover, and the Radical Participation Party.
Come see, hear, and taste your dreams! If your dreams taste like cold beer, and are filled with LEDs.

etceTerra 

We are bringing your TRIP(https://vimeo.com/332373340): a multi-sensory cosmic voyage! Re-tuned for the playa with maximum participation! When we're not on a TRIP we'll have DJ's, cold beer, and playa ready board games.

We're a family of friends turned camp — an interactive jungle-inspired sanctuary offering deep connection, music, and magic. By day, explore our art gallery curated by talented visual artists, sound healing, massage sessions, and consciousness talks. By night, sip handcrafted cocktails at our Tulum-style bar and dance beneath the stars to sets by gifted DJs on our Void sound system. Stop by to rest, create, connect, or party with heart.

A queer-forward, wildly inclusive, bar and chill zone celebrating 26 years on playa. Featuring a three-story tassel-wrapped DJ and barker platform, a vibrantly lit body wash experience, ADA-accessible care spaces, a secret room, SHHH!, and a chill lounge where you can find reprieve from the chaos. Expect music, mischief, bubbly, and a caring group of folk in equal measure.

Celebrating our 25th Anniversary, BubLo returns to BRC once again, bringing a place for shade, libations, and shenanigans!  Stop by for cold drink, a Quickie Body Wash, Music Healing, shade, funky stylings, and our newest addition... Playa Feud!  And of course, lotsa Bubbles!  A favorited camp by PEERS and that guy LH that we all miss, there's always a good time at our place on the playa!

A place to dance, stretch, rest, or refresh - BubLo has been a part of BRC for over 20 years.  Join us in our 40' lounge, get refreshed at the Quickie Body Wash, or have a drink with us at the BubLo libation station.  Take your selfie within our Sphere's Cubed sculpture!  Open to all and all ages, come by and blow a few bubbles! And remember, the softer you blow, the bigger the bubble!

Bubble Lounge is a place in the shade where you can quench your thirst and dance with unicorns! You may find yourself cosmically  stimulated with our refreshing Qwikie Body wash that provides something for your mind, your body, and your soul!  Come to our "Bubbly at the Bubble Lounge Champagne Mixer on Thursday at 3PM with musical stylings from Charlie The Unicorn mutant vehicle, Candy Mountain!  It's their final year on the playa so don't miss it!  Bubble Lounge is celebrating over 20 years at BRC so come make a memory with us!  And remember, the softer you blow.. the bigger the bubble!

Our lounge is returning for our Silver Anniversary year, providing a space for meeting and interacting. Call out to performers of all types!  All ages and all access to everyone on the playa. Sit, get scrubbed, take in the daily performances, blow your own bubbles, walk through our sculpture, jump into the Hug-O-Tron, meet new burners, have a cold drink, dance, play, and find your inner burner with our crew of experienced citizens of BRC.  Chill with us!  https://www.facebook.com/groups/1185955108233861/

Bubble Lounge:  The 20th Anniversary of our camp bringing the joy of bubbles to the Playa with our bar and the nightly Bubble Trouble Cabaret...and remember, the softer softer you blow, the bigger the bubble!

Tie up your camel and stop in at the Bubble Lounge for refreshments, relaxation, music and BUBBLES.  Dip your wand into the silky, slippery, soapy solution, purse your lips, blow away your fatigue and create a whirling orb of magical swirling colors.  Watch it drift away along with your fears and cares.  And remember, the softer you blow, the bigger the bubble….

Drift into the Bubble Lounge and dip your wand into the nectar of the stars and watch its swirling iridescence evolve into a perfect sphere with the thickness of one molecule.   In the beginning, there was the bubble and it was good…

Visit the Bubble Lounge at Mal-Mart.  In the great American tradition blow some hot air into a swirling globe of illusion in an attempt to assure everyone that all’s right in the the world even though the structure you are creating is only one molecule thick, much like our foreign policy.

The bubble.  Nature’s ephemeral, perfect structure (the smallest possible surface area for a given volume) spinning with all of the iridescent light of the rainbow. Take home your free bubble generator, create bubbles large and small with our bubble toys, dance among the hundreds of colorful orbs floating in the air. Walk into the bubble cube where 75 silver spheres float, illuminated at night by one thousand-five hundred green, acrylic leaves powered by light emitting diodes.“ This life of separateness may be compared to a dream, a phantasm, a shadow, a drop of dew, a flash of lightning, a bubble.” Siddharta, founder of Buddhism

The future is a bubble and is contained in the swirling irridescent orb we call a bubble.  Stop by, pick up your own free personal bubble generator, wonder at the projected “Images of the Future”, and wander in our “Garden of the Future” featuring 100 glowing acrylic flowers, and dance among the bubbles floating day and night.  And remember…the softer you blow, the bigger the bubble!

Slip into the Bubble Dome and relax in a Day-Glo underwater world (performance party Wednesday night). Get your free bubble generator to blow your own… and remember, the softer you blow, the bigger the bubble!

Dedicated to bringing you the Wonderful World of Bubbles where you can let the child you are play under the 40′ Bubble Tower (look for the Flame of Youth atop the glowing tower at night) where magical orbs of gas are generated to infiltrate the world at large with their swirling irridescent colors and random dances. Slip into the Bubble Dome, get your free bottle of bubbles so you can dip your wand into the sweet soapy nectar and blow your own, listening to an eclectic mix of music (day and night), or play with our assortment of motorized bubble toyz!

We are your aid station for body, mind, and spirit refreshment! We are here to hydrate you, beautify you, and keep you on your toes. Sustenance comes with a side of shenanigans; make it through our playful rituals to unlock access to secret surprises that will confuse and alight your taste buds. Come for the misters, mint infused water, electrolyte spritzers and ice cold fruit, stay for the air brushed stencil tattoos, cheeky pranks and unexpected human connection moments. Live DJ's and best playlists on the Playa will play all afternoon!
Look for our pop-up on the esplanade during the ultramarathon!

HHC (formerly Holi High Camp) is rebirthing this year into a kaleidoscopic immersive art experience. Afternoon dance parties accompanied with craft cocktails pair perfectly with making your own kaleidoscope (using MOOP encouraged), painting a friend or partner, painting a parasol, reusable cup or upcycled piece of Playa-essential gear - you'll need to stop by to find out what is on offer ;) As the dance party wraps, join us for a trash fence sunset ride! By the time we convince you to come back to camp, our interactive projection art display will be lit up and ready for you to move and play with art projected on the Playa.

Holi High Camp brings body paint and water blasting cannons to the playa, with a side of deliciously cold beverages and excellent tunes to get colorful and dance the afternoon away. Do you like neon paint? Or a cold blast pf water? Do you like fun? Do you want some pure joy? Stop by!

Holi High Camp brings body paint and water blasting cannons to the playa, with a side of deliciously cold beverages and excellent tunes to get colorful and dance the afternoon away. Do you like neon paint? Or a cold blast pf water? Do you like fun? Do you want some pure joy? Stop by!

Holi High Camp brings the madness and color kaleidoscope of the Indian festival of Holi to the boisterous masses of the playa through body-paint blasting cannons.

We are Camp Tac-O-Cat. We cook tacos for the masses and enjoy serving libations and great conversation. We offer shade, a misty breeze and we have a few gear-heads who like to solve problems. Our camp is made up of Burners with deep roots in playa culture and a few we have newly adopted. People will likely be pulled in by heckling when they pass by, and some of the best connections have come from luring our new friends in from the street. We enjoy cracking people out of their comfort zone and immersing them in dusty happiness.

At sunset Monday, Wednesday and Friday we will be offering tacos. Our tacos are playa-famous and have a special grilled tortilla. We have vegetarian options as well.

Last year we brought out 1,000 pounds of cold beer and plan to do the same this year.

These dusty ass burners serve hot fresh tacos every evening before sunset. Come grab one and wash it down with some warm fireball whisky and enjoy our crappy music and janky art car. We cruise out daily and love a good poesy to ride with us. We also can fix whatever bike you bring to us throughout the day, evening and night.

Nova Heaven Art Support Camp is the behind-the-scenes home of the Nova Heaven Art Installation team. While we are not open to public interactivity at the camp, we welcome the community to engage with our project on deep playa and at LumiNova, where we offer healing workshops during the day and house and trance Djs at night.

Shit breaks on the playa. Electronic shit super breaks. Did you bring a full repair shop? No? Good news - we did. Come to camp MVC and our Blinky Things Hospital to leverage the tools, voltmeters, and engineering talent you need to troubleshoot your ride, exhibit or playa gifts and, hopefully, get it fully functional again. MVC is staffed by the creators of the eight-foot, LED illuminated, motorized, sound-infused Burner Boards (surfboards) you may have seen riding across the playa…. You might even get a ride! But no, we're not going to build you or sell you a board.

Shit breaks on the playa. Electronic shit super breaks. Did you bring a full repair shop? No? Good news - we did. Come to camp MVC and our Blinky Things Hospital to leverage the tools, voltmeters, and engineering talent you need to troubleshoot your ride, exhibit or playa gifts and, hopefully, get it fully functional again. There once were some folks from afar,
Whose love of books knew no bar.
They visited a library so remote,
In search of good quotes,
And they left with improved repertoire.

Come browse our dusty stacks! One year book checkouts!
Come to our stacks to relax and learn facts. A one-year checkout, perhaps? Let it lapse and staff shan't be lax, lest all order collapse. We said quiet in the stacks! No, not us. Union contracts.
Come grab a book at the dustiest library in the world! Serving Black Rock City since 2013. Strict one-year checkout period will apply.
Come grab a book at the dustiest library in the world! Serving Black Rock City since 2013. Strict one-year checkout period will apply.

Come grab a book with a one-year checkout period at the dustiest library in the world, the Black Rock Public Library! Add yourself to the Human Card Catalog to share what you know best, or look up someone who can teach you about a subject anywhere on the playa.

Come check out a book at the dustiest library in the world, the Black Rock Public Library! Strict one-year checkout with a one-week grace period. This year, add yourself to the Human Card Catalog to share what you know best, or look up someone who can teach you about a topic anywhere on the playa.

Cool off and relax, read a classic novel, peruse our comic book collection, pull out a board game, or just hang out with fellow bibliophile Burners. The entire BRPL collection will be available for indefinite checkout starting Wednesday!

Black Rock Public Library is back and better than ever! Cool off and relax, read a classic novel, peruse our large comic book collection, pull out a board game, or just hang out with your fellow bookish burners. Join us for a refreshing literary cocktail Mon-Wed 12-1pm. The entire BRPL collection will be available for indefinite checkout starting Wednesday!

Fruit jams, improv jams, and campfire jams, oh my!

Drop into our little forest oasis for some tea, toast (literal or heartfelt), tunes, and a taste of something sweet, strange, or slightly suspicious.

Come join the weirdest/warmest jam session you never knew you needed.

Ab Avo and Therapy Tea is your place for the avocado toast and hot tea in the morning. Come by and enjoy 100 avocado toasts serving with hot tea Mon-Fri every morning on the first come first served basis!
We're also facilitating therapy workshops teaching how to live a happier life. Check the schedule to find the one that works for you the best and come join our high vibes!

LumiNova is a sanctuary of healing, movement, and light. Join us for workshops, sound journeys, ecstatic and regular dance, and our Art from Ashes ritual. At night, catch a deep house or trance as we turn up the womp womp and the untz untz. Our glowing domes offer space to rest, reconnect, and rise. The fusion of Lumina and Nova symbolizes light emerging from darkness, rebirth, and radiant connection. From stillness to rhythm, from silence to joy—LumiNova invites you to explore, release, and shine in your fullest expression.

Visit us to learn Burningman History from its very beginning to now from experts. Come hear "Meet the Man Base Build Krewe" talk and ask questions Tues @ 3-4:15PM. Bring a shirt & make it a BM t-shirt Tues + Wed 10-Noon, Swag Swag Swag + visit our fabulous day bar for BM themed games & drinks. See Tubatron "the Flaming Tuba guy" do his thing! Get a pic made with a Star Wars character in the image. Add props and costumes to Tomorow's scifi today from the 80's!.

Bring a shirt & make it a BM t-shirt Tues + Wed 10-Noon, Swag Swag Swag + visit our fabulous day bar for BM themed games & drinks. See Tubatron "the Flaming Tuba guy" do his thing!

first event. We gift stickers & swag based on Burningman themes past & present. Stop & ask questions about Burningman history. Bring a t-shirt & get a souvenir Burningman t-shirt made with

Wednesday 2pm-4pm talk/discussion with the Burning Nerds, to hear about/discuss scientific studies about Burningman's effect on the default world and the Burners that attend the event.
Thursday 2pm-4pm talk/discussion about the proposed ORMAT geothermal plant near Gerlach and its threat to Gerlach & the Playa. Find out how to oppose it & get involved.

Well, as the loveliest trash pandas, we firmly believe that sustainability, alternative energy sources, as well as the 4Rs (Reuse, Reduce, Rethink, Recycle) are crucial in our daily human (and raccoon) lives. A raccoon can be crafty and resourceful, responsible and playful, but above all – curious and friendly.

Well, as the loveliest trash pandas, we firmly believe that sustainability, alternative energy sources, as well as the 4Rs (Reuse, Reduce, Rethink, Recycle) are crucial in our daily human (and raccoon) lives. A raccoon can be crafty and resourceful, responsible and playful, but above all – curious and friendly.

Welcome to BRC Racoons - the only camp at Burning Man where our trash is as low as our expectations.
We harness the power of the sun, recycle everything, and rethink the meaning of 'trashy' outfits!. A raccoon can be crafty and resourceful, responsible and playful, but above all – curious and friendly. Come for the eco-friendliness, stay for the dumpster diving. Our energy comes from recycled sarcasm.
BRC Raccoons invite you to make Burning Man Green again and forever!

Dive into an oasis of wonder, where community and enchantment come together! Enjoy captivating magic shows, intimate speakeasy encounters, and daily afternoon treats. Let our skilled team repair your gear, and make your bike stand out with our dazzling decorations.

Deep Sea Kingdom (DSK) is making waves with an immersive undersea adventure where curiosity, creativity, and connection run deep. Our camp is a welcoming reef where you can dive into interactive art, thought-provoking discussions, and playful games. Swim through our glowing dome to add your mark to a living art project, get hooked on our Eel game, or drift into deep conversations. Don't flounder! Join us for workshops, lectures, and dance parties featuring resident and guest DJs dropping beats deeper than the Mariana Trench. Whether you're here to sea-lebrate, create, or just go with the flow, DSK is shore to delight. Dive in! The water's weird.

Wednesday through Saturday from 12-1pm for families with kids, and 1-4:20pm for all.

Wednesday through Saturday from 12-1pm for families with kids, and 1-4:20pm for all.

A Siberian Vodka Bar, Nuclear Powered.
A Siberian Vodka Bar, Nuclear Powered.

We run a Vodka bar. We are from "Russia" and we have a soviet era "nuclear reactor" that we serve drinks from. If you hang out long enough you might get "contaminated" First the "alarms" go off and them we get the "Geiger Counter" and check who has set off the alarms. Once we figure out who is contaminated and indeed "Hot, Hot, Hot," Then we offer them use of the "Decontamination Station" It looks a little like a dancer pole. once inside and "Activated" Grab the pole. We mist them down with a cool mist from a garden sprayer. We say we are open 12-4, both of them, but we really are open much much more then that. We have hosted performance acts of all kinds threw the years. Musicians and Magicians, Puppeteers and Tap Dancers.  We throw themed parties once a day.
Soviet era vodka bar and nuclear power plant.  Come get contaminated 12-4 daily, both of them.
Cool drinks and radiation leaks. Stop by get contaminated, get de-contaminated. Your call.
A Soviet era nuclear power plant somewhere in the back waters of Siberia. Come by for a cool drinkski. Our accents are bad but the drinks are tasty.
Vodka Drinks and Radiation Leaks. Come buy and get contaminated in our pre-Putin Soviet era somewhat leaky nuclear reactor.

Somewhere in the vast expanse of post-appocolyptic Northern Russian territory the mutants of the Siberian Electric Company came to know the Atlantan tribe of the Velvet Soulmine. Years of peaceful co-existence have resulted in a camp within a camp where you can experience all the verbal abuse you need along with a breakfast of whiskey & peanuts, or slush back a toxic vodka drink from a shotski at the bar.

10 years of serving vodka, 3 years in a reactor, stop by, expose yourself, get contaminated, get de-contaminated, repeat. Hazmanhatans, Glowing Grey Hounds. Chernobyl Cosmos, 3:00 Block Party Wednesday, Cabaret Night Thursday Vodka Party Friday afternoon.
A nuclear powered vodka bar with a stage for people who like to expose themselves. Come on by. Get contaminated.
New for 2010, the siberian electric company is bringing power to the people. Someone always has to live next to the power plant so why not a soviet era nuclear reactor, come get contaminated with us.

Our camp is made up of lively, youthful, creative, high energy people who love creating unique and transformative experiences for ALL. The camp is designed to promote an exhilarating and transformative experience, with an emphasis on healing practices and performance arts.
To us, healing includes yoga, breath, intimacy, consent, sex & kink and emotional mastery. 
Our performances include acro-yoga, aerial silks, fire spinning, flow toys, juggling, improv + comedy, contact dancing, DJ sets and live music bands.
Our intention goes beyond celebrating our own blissful flow: we aim to share, inspire, educate and include individuals into our community, space and lives. Our BRC camp is an open door invitation to fully integrate into our world, and an open heart to everyone's unique offerings.

Celestial Sideshow is all about positive energy, intimate connections, and vibes. Come for the dance and acro yoga jams, stay for the chill electronic music and curated elixirs. We strive to facilitate rewarding connections that will leave you feeling uplifted and energized. Join us for a truly unforgettable experience.

Welcome home to Celestial Sideshow. A community drawn together by a shared love of conscious movement, playfulness, healing, music, art, pachamama, and spirituality.

Celestial Sideshow is a place of connection--come to shake it up, play, meditate, elevate. At any given time here you will find us practicing yoga, acroyoga, thai massage, acropeautics, cuddling, meditation, breath work, circus arts, acoustic jams, tea lounge, body painting, and just general playfulness and goof!

Celestial sideshow has brought together yogis, acrobats, healers, dancers, musicians, green witches, visionary artists, activists, and environmentalists to co-create a heart space of love and connection and can't wait to share this love with the citizens of Black Rock City.
Black Rock Brewery specializes in serving home brew creations. Including dozens of varieties of beer, cider, mead, seltzer, wine and tea. We are also home to Utah Fire Tribe conclave group.

Our camp serves cold home brewed beer. We create custom labels for all our beer with names and descriptions that reflect the Burning Man theme and spirit. We gift out shot glasses and encourage taking the time to take in and smell the beer before tasting and analyzing a wide variety of beer styles. Cold brew coffee service with live music provided by Barista and Beats. An interactive lighted art area will be available when our bar is not open.

Our camp serves cold home brewed beer. We create custom labels for all of our beer with names and descriptions that reflect the Burning Man theme and spirit. We encourage everyone to take time and smell the beer before tasting and analyzing a wide variety styles.

The Black Rock Brewery has combined efforts with Baristas and Beats to serve refreshing brews all week long. Cold brew coffee, home brew, live DJ music and UV interactive art. Look for our moon tower, and a giant pinball available 24/7.
The Black Rock Brewery offers daily afternoon tastings that include about 15 different home brews. Cold brewed coffee,hot coffee and tea will be served in the morning hours.

In eternal devotion to the magic of hop and yeast, the Black Rock Brewery brings together home brewers to share their honey ales, lavender meads, ginger beers, bacon porters, and coffee stouts. Join us for daily tastings and learn more about the different styles of brews!  For something special, bring something for us to print on when you stop by to visit.

Celtic Chaos theme camp is back to recharge your soul and deliver top-quality tunes and cold drinks all served with a side of Irish charm! While the camp's roots are Irish, its branches extend worldwide, embracing radical inclusivity with a warm Céad Míle Fáilte (a hundred thousand welcomes) spirit. Check your ego at the door and stop by Bertie's Bar to share a drink, swap stories, or dive into the lively "craic and banter." From sunset to sunrise, dance through the night and embrace the chaos. And of course, we will be bringing back our wild pyro show to light up the playa. Events: Tues (day)  Playa-Olympics Thurs (Day): St. Paddy's Day on the Playa (Traditional Irish Music) night with tantalizing tunes from a serious line-up of international DJs.

​Irish theme camp Celtic Chaos present 'ENCHANTED KINGDOM' a world of Celtic mysticism and magic, where Irish folklore will come to life on the Playa. A domain of fairy forts, a magic toadstool, a causeway and forest of enchantment that will leave you spellbound. Of course we wouldn't be Celtic Chaos without a touch o'blarney... you can expect a mighty good session and epic sound.

Back To Camp is a summer camp oasis in the hot dust of Black Rock City. Come on down for daily movement classes, themed cocktail parties, and our signature arts 'n crafts postcard program. We serve food too! You'll know us by the kitschy camp decor and Playatech pine trees.

Send your virgins down for our Sunday night "Virgin Campfire" where we'll help point them the right way to an enjoyable week as a new Burner and Participant!

Revisit the glory days of summers past and join us in heading back to camp! Write a postcard to tell your parents that you've run out of clean underpants, make your friends at home cool arts and crafts to remind them of your fun vacation, and tell your spookiest story at the campfire! But most importantly, get down with us for themed dance parties! The canteen is open, and we are serving fun!

Back To Camp is a summer camp inspired theme camp bringing a forest lounge, arts+crafts, postcards, games, cold beers, and campfire circles to citizens of Black Rock City. Don't you wanna go back to camp?

Back To Camp is a summer camp inspired theme camp bringing a forest lounge, arts+crafts, postcards, games, cold beers, and campfire circles to citizens of Black Rock City. Don't you wanna go back to camp?

Back to Camp is a summer camp - a playground in the forest where you can be a kid or adult and enjoy timeless camp activities. Stop by at any time all week to relax and sit in the shade while listening to the birds chirp and water flow. Enjoy your coffee at sunrise in our adirondack chairs or take an afternoon nap in the hammock. Come by Monday & Wednesday afternoons for happy hour snacks & beverages, postcards to send home, corn hole, lifesize jenga, friendship bracelets and the CAMP DANCE with line dance lessons from camp counselors. Join us Friday night under the stars around a campfire, to tell ghost stories and sing songs.
A hybrid between Dirty Dancing and Wet Hot American Summer, Back To Camp is a place where the spirit of Tuolumne Family Camp will be continued through a theme camp at Burning Man.

The home of Awesome!(ness), providing and inviting all to enjoy music, art, performances, and good times.  From crafts events to daily parties, come get AWESOME with us!

The home of spontaneous Awesome!(ness), providing and inviting all for music, art, performances, and good times.  From arts and crafts events to daily parties, come join the fun with us - the home of the Tahoe Block Party on Thursday!

The home of spontaneous Awesome!(ness) and upcycling craftyness, providing and inviting music, art, performances, and good times.  Come for the daily happy hour, and don't miss the Tahoe Block Party on Thursday!
We’re Awesome!(ville)… that pretty much sums it up.
We’re Awesome!(ville)… what more can we say…

We are a collection of various artists working in diverse mediums, seeking a range of expression and serendipity. We have interactive art, talks and workshops, Qigong, spirit bar, parties, philosophy slams, and welcoming space for various spontaneous activities all day and night.

We are a collection of various artists working in diverse mediums, seeking a range of expression and serendipity. We have interactive art, DIY art, cocktails, intuitive movement, music, philosophy discussions, and welcoming space for various spontaneous activities all day and night.

We are a collection of various artists working in diverse mediums, seeking a range of expression and serendipity. We have interactive art, DIY art, yoga, story time for toddlers, music, philosophy discussions, and welcoming space for various spontaneous activities all day and night.

We are a collection of various artists working in diverse mediums, seeking a range of expression and serendipity. We have interactive art and performance each afternoon and some presentations that are 24-hours per day, all week long. Our Gnostic Neuron discussions are Mon, Wed & Fri at 10:00 AM.

WEB SITE LISTING: People's Art Congress welcomes Burners to 3 exciting Interactive Art Projects: Come paint our faces, play TWISTHANGER, and have a 3D view of your surroundings as you lie under the Wave. Open day and night, after dark viewing is enhanced by LED lighting.

People's Art Congress welcomes Burners to 3 exciting Interactive Art Projects: Come paint our mobile structure and chill out under the Illuminated Garden Above and The Wave. Open day and night, after dark viewing is enhanced by UV lighting, accentuating the 3 ring circus effect.

People's Art Congress welcomes Burners to 3 exciting Interactive Art Projects: Black Light Portrait Painting, Ride the Wave, and Awesome Blossom. We will also offer 3 scheduled seminars on "A Meeting of Minds", exploring the mind via current neuroscience and psychology. Come paint our faces, enjoy the experience of riding the wave, help us with the illumination of The Awesome Blossom, and participate in seminars on the mind.

People's Art Congress welcomes Burners to 3 exciting Interactive Art Projects: Black Light Portrait Painting, Black Light Marionette Theater, 3D Kaleidoscope. Come paint our faces, pull our strings, and have a 3D view of your surroundings. Open day and night, after dark viewing is enhanced by UV lighting, accentuating the 3 ring circus effect.

People’s Art Congress, where the people and the art are one. Home of four interactive art experiences: the Crucifixion Collider and Scope of Death, Ride the Wind (a meditation experience), Virtual Helicopter Ride, and Portrait Colorization of 4′ x 6′ canvases

People’s Art Congress, where the people and the art are one. Home of four interactive art experiences: the EL-UV Collider and Levitation Kaleidoscope, Riding the Wind (a meditation experience), Virtual Helicopter Ride, and Portrait Colorization of 4′ x 6′ canvases.

People’s Art Congress, where the people and the art are one. Home of three interactive art experiences: the EL-UV Collider with Mega Pod Scope, Riding the Wind (a meditation experience), and Portrait Colorization of 4′ x 6′ canvases of historical figures.

People’s Art Congress, where the people and the art are one. All Black Rock artists are invited to participate in the evolution of the People’s Kaleidoscope, an interactive art project. You provide the imagination – we provide the paint and brushes.

People’s Art Congress, where the People and the Art are One. All fellow Black Rock artists are invited to participate in creating the Presidential Portraits, an interactive art project that requires your participation to make it a success. Paint and brushes are provided. Just bring your imagination.

Come by and cool off!  We are a misting camp. We have 2 to 3 forced air misters. They are active participation, not stationary fans. Camp members bring in street traffic and cool them down.  We are active and interactive with the street for several hours each day.

We are made of a random conglomeration of weirdos, both veterans and virgins, but what we all have in common is we are absolutely stoked to be at Burning Man. We are committed to spreading this feeling of joy to fellow BRC citizens and do so in many ways. But each of these ways usually results in loud exclamations of our mantra: "FUCK YEAH!"

Welcome to Shuttlecocks, where we're bringing Badminton back. Our playa court is open by noon into the evening from  Tuesday to Friday for pick up play. Come on by, grab a racquet and have a go! Don't miss our Tuesday BADminton cheeky happy hour and Friday afternoon tournament where you can challenge your fellow burners. Whether you're showing off your killer smash, whacking a few birdies, or relaxing with a refreshing Pimms cup and a cool misting, there's something for everyone.

Lakes on the Playa is our Village and we are all camps that call the Great Lakes regional burn, Lakes of Fire our home at home. We want to bring a taste of the fun, warmth and hard work that we all come from back home and share some moments with Black Rock City.

Lakes on the Playa is our Village and we are all camps that call the Great Lakes regional burn, Lakes of Fire our home at home. We want to bring a taste of the fun, warmth and hard work that we all come from back home and share some moments with Black Rock City. Come for some touch-less sunscreen & friends , stay for the music, dancing and fire art! We are an all day / all night village that has something for everyone. We are a BED Safe Camp and strive to start conversations about consent and boundaries with the community. Take a ride on Tarna the flaming Jackalope Mutant Vehicle during her debut year on playa. On the outside, it's a metallic art car with a DJ sound stage, complete with lighting and flame effects. On the inside, it's a plush lounge and cozy gallery space.

On the outside, it's a metallic art car with a DJ sound stage, complete with lighting and flame effects. On the inside, it's a plush lounge and cozy gallery space.

Lakes on the Playa is our Village and we all call the Great Lakes regional burn, Lakes of Fire our home at home. We want to bring a taste of the fun, warmth and hard work that we all come from back home and share some moments with Black Rock City. Come visit us anytime of day or night to enjoy some music, shade, sunscreen, fire, community, art, banana suits or whatever we come up with next! Much like the Midwestern cities we come from, we work hard and play hard. Come get a taste of Lucky Lake and take a load off and enjoy the shade!
Lakes on the Playa - the best of the Great Lakes bringing Midwest love to the Playa with Camp SPF, Syncytium and SGC!

The Bureau of Misinformation has been Black Rock City's leading source of radical ridiculosity, ambiguity, and factual inconsistency since the man still lived in his parents basement. In other words, we will ALWAYS tell you the absolute truth, as it is ingrained in the very fiber of our beings.

What is this nonsense? Oh, that's the Bureau of Misinformation... Nothing to see here.

The Bureau of Misinformation has been Black Rock City's leading source of radical ridiculosity, ambiguity, and factual inconsistency since the man still lived in his parents basement. In other words, we will ALWAYS tell you the absolute truth, as it is ingrained in the very fiber of our beings.
We've been doing alternative facts since before alternative facts were the new facts... If you don't know, come ask!
The Bureau of Misinformation is Black Rock City's leading source of radical ridiculosity, ambiguity, and factual inconsistency.

The Bureau of Misinformation is your leading source of radical ridiculousity in an increasingly homogeneous world. We'll challenge your sense of reason with dubious facts, and then we'll pour you a whiskey, spin you around a couple times, and send you off in the wrong direction.

The Bureau of Misinformation is your leading source of radical ridiculousity in an increasingly homogeneous world. We’ll challenge your sense of reason with dubious facts, and then we’ll pour you a whiskey, spin you around a couple times, and send you off in the wrong direction.

Are you lost? Are you looking for the meaning of life or maybe just the way to Center Camp? Swing by the Bureau of Misinformation, where we promise to answer all your burning questions with weird, wild, and witty responses, but don’t expect the truth out of us!  Our (mis)information booth doubles as a full bar where we drink shots out of flavored condoms, do airbrushing and body painting, and provide comfy lounge chairs in shade areas.

Deep C presents: HypnoDrome — a dazzling 26-foot dome lit by over 25,000 LEDs! Step into the light and get lost in an immersive sea of color, rhythm, and movement. By day, it's a shaded oasis to relax, chill, and connect. By night, it transforms into a vibrant beacon of sound and light—perfect for dancing, lounging, or just being hypnotized by the show. Come drift in the Deep.

We are an underwater themed camp with a refreshing Oasis space and karaoke throughout the week. Come during the day to learn flow arts and escape the heat, in the evening to sing to the pleasure or pain of the crowd, or at night to lie under the Starfield and gaze up at the pretty lights.

We are an underwater themed camp with a refreshing Oasis space and karaoke throughout the week. Come during the day for tropical drinks and fanning with palm fronds, in the evening to sing to the pleasure or pain of the crowd, or at night to control the sights and sounds of the Lightdream interactive art installation or lie under the Starfield and gaze up at the pretty lights.

Deep C, a collaboration from Seattle Washington, was conceived to share our love of creating interactive music and light displays with the Burner community. Come join us for karaoke and play on our interactive musical art project!

Deep C, a collaboration from Seattle Washington, was conceived to share our love of creating interactive music and light displays with the Burner community. Come join us for karaoke and play on our interactive musical art project!

Deep C, a collaboration from Seattle Washington, was conceived to share our love of creating interactive music and light displays with the Burner community. With our flagship art project, the Zahnica, we let the viewer bend the sound and light to their will amidst a variety of other collective and creative visual and musical arts and activities.

Camp Deep C, a collaboration from Seattle Washington, was conceived to share our love of creating interactive music and light displays with the Burner community. With our flagship art project, the Deep Pentaphonica, we let the viewer mold the sound and light to their will amidst a variety of other collective and creative arts and activities, from karaoke to body painting.

Stop by our Steampunk inspired tea/coffee/cocktail tent and chill for a bit. With victorian furniture, plush rugs, a cuddle puddle, small library and games you're sure to feel welcome as you prop your feet up and relax. Looking for something more upbeat? Our "Teabag Olympics"  might be for you. With relay races in high heals, granny panty competitions and other hilarious happenings, you're sure to find fun and laughter, all while listening to an array of DJ beats. Our campers are the family you wish you had, we welcome you to stop in and say hi!

Stop by our Steampunk inspired tea/coffee tent and chill for a bit. With victorian furniture, plush rugs, a cuddle puddle, small library and games you're sure to feel welcome as you prop your feet up and relax. Looking for something more upbeat? Our "Weiner Liquor" party might be for you. With fresh grilled hot dogs and tons of toppings you'll get to pick your shot to wash it down, all while listening to an array of DJ beats. Our campers are the family you wish you had, we welcome you to stop in and say hi!

Camp Teapunk (Steampunk without the S and M) - Our speciality is being good neighbors and making you feel welcome either in our camp (if you're lookingn for a new home on the playa) or as a visitor in our Steampunk Tea Tent. With deep couches, a plush cuddle puddle and caring greeters you'll always feel welcome. We start our mornings with coffee, tea, fresh bakes treats and sweet DJ beats. By lunch time we are serving up free hot dogs, libations, and ice-cold towels for your sweaty brow (and other bits). In the afternoon our healers hold time and space for you to celebrate self and bring more light, love and flexibility into your life. We welcome dusty bums in our Tea Tent at any time, and provide a welcome respite during white-outs and blazing temps with ice water and fans to be shared.

At Camp Tea Punk we bring the dusty essentials: beans, bags & beats. To be clear; not soy, blow and punches but coffee in the morning, afternoon tea/sweets & melodic tunes when the vibe needs it. Blend in, literally, as we gather a global blend of different coffees or teabag like you've never seen before. Freshen up the coffee breath with our supreme gum collection or join in on the chaos that is called Burner Bingo. As you can read we love the letter 'B' but we want to 'C U'.

Why Do You Do What You Do?.name: Why Do You Do What You Do?

history.description: Why do you do what you do?  (aka WDYDWYD?)   Visit our WDYDWYD? installation at Center Camp to see portraits of burners answering this question for the last 20 years. You may find something that inspires you, makes giggle, or makes you question. And we want your portrait as well, answering our simple question - WDYDWYD?

Express to the music in conversation with a dance partner - interpret together, create together.  All styles of partner dancing are welcomed and celebrated at PDA: fusion, swing, tango, blues, salsa, zouk, lindy.  Camp with us if you love partner dancing and want it to be a major part of your burn.  Visit our camp for daily lessons and nightly social dance parties (M-F).  Schedule of dances published at the Burn.

Human beings crave connection with other human beings.  Step onto our dance floor, take a partner in your arms, hear the music and move together, a beautiful conversation in dance.   At our camp you can take lessons, practice dance at our socials, and meet partner dance enthusiasts happy to share a dance or a conversation.
Our camp exists to share our love for connection with each other and with the music, so we bring that love. Hard.

Discover what it's like to hold a dance partner in your arms and move to the music. Tango. Blues Dance. Fusion. Experience the magic of creating dance together with a partner.

We will be serving cold brew with milk and dairy alternatives and ice! Hangout space in the shade with chairs provided to get out of the sun and get jittery. Service is in the morning and we will have 1 midnight brew session to help stay up until the sunset!

Jitters and Bitters will be offering the most ok and acceptable cup of cold brew on the playa! Come in the evenings for an espresso martini! Will it have some dust in it? I don't know, probably! come find out!

Camp Beaverton is an intentional, experimental, and experiential Burning Man community theme camp. We are a group of queer women/trans/genderqueer/lesbian/bisexual/heterosexual/etc... or folks who are simply as wayward as the playa is dusty. We celebrate sexuality, self exploration, and respect for one's journey through this life. Our goal is to provide a safe(r), brave(r) space that centers queer women, trans folks, and nonbinary identities on and off-playa. We encourage education, participation, inquiry, conversation, and self-reflection. We extend our goals to the greater Black Rock community by hosting workshops and social events.

The Gecko camp has been a BRC landmark since 2007 and we are ready to rock the playa again this year! Our main bar lights up with an interactive Simon Says Games starting night fall. Our dance floor and lounge focus on deep house disco music. Our resident DJs (DJM, Pottz, GoSouth, Samcake, Loustaoun) will be rocking the Gecko's Camp this year again, every night starting at 7pm. DJM has been playing music for Black Rock City for over 19 years now!

Thursday 4PM, we host our Playa-renowned ABCD PARTY: bring your Ass, eat some Bacon (and pizza), drink some Champagne and dance to Disco!

Visit us in our Tiki Bar at the Golden Guys Camp, where 2 of our campers will serve infused rum cocktails everyday 9pm-2am.

DJ-M has been playing music for Black Rock City for over 17 years now!. 

Oh, and don't forget: on Thursday noon, we host our Playa-renowned ABCD PARTY: bring your Ass, eat some Bacon (and pizza), drink some Champagne and dance to Disco!

Welcome to Camp ING, an ephemeral sanctuary conjured into existence annually by a passionate group of friends from all corners of the globe for the last decade... vibrant camp day and night we embrace the ethos of the playa, build-ing, sweat-ing, laugh-ing, play-ing, and bask-ing in the wonder around us. Here we seek those moments that leave us breathless. Camp ING is not just a place but an experience— where radical participation is key. No sherpas. No spectat-ING! come create some dusty memories 

Parties and events posted outside daily: A Bar, A Slide, An Aerial Rig, Shade!

We are the PlayaNauts! Explorers of the Playa. We've collected interactive games from around the globe.
Volley ball-sized Beirut game or come chill in our 1500sf of shade while you play our various drinking games (we I.D.) Stop by the Bar to try our Playanaut Punch, and don’t forget to Check out our Event schedule for Party, Tournament and Flash-Bar times...Look for our Scarab ArtCar!

In 2010 several creative characters came together to embark on a journey that would change their lives. That trip was the "MoRoadtrip" 21 artists, from 8 countries, traveling 21 days from Austin to Burning Man on a 60ft bus called the "MoBus". Freshly inspired after a life changing trip a few "Mo" came together to form a "Transitional Culture of Mo." Meeting artists and creatives from the many walks of life led to "MoCarnivals", A "MoFarm", events, festivals, collective living, academic/activist discourse, a theme camp and lifetimes of friendships. We continue as an ongoing cavalcade of cosmic characters cultivating a common culture of creativity and convivial community.

The Mo of Motropolis invite you to embark on the quest to explore the meaning of the being Human. Take the Hero’s Journey and enter “The MoLabyrinth of the Divine Self”.

Motropolis arose from an epic adventure of our acquisition of a massive 60ft land-yacht the “MoBus” to take 22 adventurers from 5 countries, with little previous interaction to the burn and and eventual evolution into a tribe of survivors. A culture forged from the deep appreciation and love for the possibilities of a Humanistic, sustainable and interdependent culture of life. Motropolis’ core lies in the basic understanding of “Mo” representing “Humanity and in being so, recognizing the Humanity of others.

When Ragnarokk fell into the sea, we fell deep. Now reborn as Seashell Cartel, we are a sunken society of sea creatures, pirates, mermaids, and misfits living beneath the waves of the playa. We believe in mystery, magic, and the beauty that grows when you give things space to transform.

Ours is a world of coral crowns, morning mermaid rituals, barnacled bars, and glittering deep-sea dreams. We dance in the grotto, we marry under kelp, we drink at the Bait Shack, and we welcome all curious travelers who want to explore the weird and wondrous ocean floor with us.

Dive in. The tide is rising.

Ragnarok is the End and the Beginning. It tells a story where destruction is necessary for creation to flourish. It is rebirth, it is recovery, it is rejuvenation, it is a renaissance, it's renewal, restoration, and resurrection. It is what we are experiencing in our lives right now. It is Burning Man. And now, it's us. We are camp Ragnarokk!

Step into the past with us at the OK Korral!  As you walk along the main street of our simple town, you can marry your playa crush at the chapel, lock up the one who done you wrong in the town jail or enjoy some true cowboy coffee and whiskey at the saloon.  Also, we're into Norse mythology, so check out Thor while you're in town ;)
OK Korral - Support camp for the Thor Mutant Vehicle out of Denver, CO
OK Korral - Denver based camp supporting the mutant vehicle Thor.
Come relax at HexMix and enjoy spa services as well as guided meditations and art workshops .
Come relax at HexMix and enjoy spa services as well as guided meditations and workshops on traditional Indian art forms.
Come relax at Camp HexMix and enjoy spa services as well as guided meditations based on traditional Indian art forms.
HexMix will be open 1pm to 4pm M-F for spa time and meditative activities. Come join us for facemasks, hair care, drawing kolams, singing chants, and the occasional sound bath.

The CentriPEDAL Porch and its Handle Bar is a space full of bike-based furniture and a human-powered blender bar, recycling default world bike parts into new lives and uses on playa. We also host a variety of bike-oriented events, teaching people the delicate art of how to physically and emotionally ride a tandem, jousting on a big wheels trike, the limbo on two wheels, and hosting many other mini-games focused on finding new ways to enjoy and appreciate your playa bike.

CentriPEDAL Porch and its Handle Bar is a space full of bike-based furniture and a human-powered blender bar, pulling bike parts out of the recycling and trash bins and bringing them back into the world. We also host a variety of bike-oriented events, teaching people the delicate art of how to physically and emotionally ride a tandem, how to do the limbo on two wheels, and many other mini-games focused on finding new ways to enjoy and appreciate your playa bike.

Nobo House is an international, quirky Holistic Wellness & Recovery camp that is a place of refuge for playa adventurers, artists, & builders. Our gift is a chill playa spa, that includes a steam room, outdoor gym, dance classes, massages and smoothies.

Nobo House is an international, quirky Holistic Wellness & Recovery camp that is a place of refuge for playa adventurers, artists, & builders. Our gift is a chill playa spa, that includes a steam room, cold room, gym, hair washing/braiding, massages and smoothies.

Let's go to Nobo House. Your destination to find refuge when your burn is a bit too well done. Our wellness-focused camp, offers rejuvenating experiences like steam baths, misting booths, and cool rooms. Quench your thirst at our Smoothie Lounge and Tea Room while engaging in heartfelt conversations. Relax at our Siesta Lounge Space or treat yourself to our Hydrating Beauty Bar's hair and skincare services. Don't miss the Jazz Zone, featuring talented musicians for a soul-stirring treat. Join us for an unforgettable experience in the heart of Black Rock City!

No Boundaries camp is an oasis on the playa that helps fellow burners to discover there are no boundaries around who they are and what they can become, and what their imagination can create. We are creating a space filled with adventure, music, immersive games and where people can be playful, connect, and relax.

Scarbutts Cafe is the leading megacorporate ass-spanking coffee shop on the playa.
Our chipper staff serve strong coffee and fantastic spankings to the groggy masses. Choose from a menu of spankings that range from mild to hot and heavy. After being served their spanking of choice by a friendly bar-assta, they are served a cup of coffee. We come with a sarcastic edge butt provide a warm, welcoming, atmosphere.
New for 2025! Exclusive, Scarbutts After Dark(tm)-brand coffee will be served at a number of after-sundown VIP events including a "Coffee Cocktail Happy Hour", "Midnight Coffee" and more! Wanna know exactly what and when happens After Dark(tm)? Then come visit our Cafe for the nightly schedule ass it becomes available.

Our goal is to provide a morning mecca of taste, stimulation and aural sensation for famished burners of all ages, types and experience levels. We spank your hiney and give you some coffee.

Wake Your Ass Up! Come on by at the crack of Playa dawn to get your daily spanking and hot coffee. Yes, from Tuesday through Friday your friendly semi-corporate pawns will be serving up piping hot and ice cold brewed coffee and brisk spankings! Bring your own cup.

The Intergalactic Sasquatch is returning for its 8th year on Playa, 10 years old- for the day trippers, the night walkers, the virgins to the vets, our funky lil cantina offers a place to escape the madness and go down the rabbit hole! Take a stroll through our fractal forest, guests are welcome to walk about the woods through fractal trees, but we warn you to tread carefully and keep an eye out for the very creatures that find their home in our camp! You might be asked to pay the "squatchtoll" in our interactive gameland and if visitors are 21&older, Squatch O'Hairs offers deliciously refreshing bevvys for in between rounds.

Howdy! Welcome to the Shrimp Ranch, where the Wild West meets the salty sea. We're a camp of new and seasoned looking to create a unique experience for the community in the only way we know how: through quirky food, music and event offerings. 

Our ragtag crew will transport you to an imagined past, where crustaceans roamed the frontier. From shrimp snacks and shrimp brine martinis, to our Shrimp Yoga and Crabbin' Shack, get ready to live your nautical fantasy and somehow leave weirdly warmer (or cooler) than you came.

Howdy! Welcome to the Shrimp Ranch, where the Wild West meets the salty sea. We're a camp of new and seasoned looking to create a unique experience for the community in the only way we know how: through quirky food, music and event offerings. 

Our ragtag crew will transport you to an imagined past, where crustaceans roamed the frontier. From shrimp snacks and cold drinks to our Shrimp Ranch virtual experience to our raucous music, get ready to live your nautical fantasy and somehow leave weirdly warmer (or cooler) than you came.

Howdy! Welcome to the Shrimp Ranch, where the Wild West meets the salty sea. We're a camp of seasoned burners looking to create a unique experience for the community in the only way we know how: through food, music and quirky performance art. 

Our ragtag crew will transport you to an imagined past, where crustaceans roamed the frontier. From shrimp snacks and cold drinks to the INFAMOUS SEAHORSE RODEO to our raucous music, on and off camp, get ready to live your nautical fantasy and somehow leave you weirdly warmer than you came.

Step into a world of color and indulge your caffeine addictions at Kaleidoscope, where we bring people together over exquisite single origin coffee sourced and roasted by our campmates, prepared and brewed in front of you at our bar, one cup at a time. Our vibrant, welcoming space adorned with low tables, cushions, and ambient music, invites you to slow down, savor the moment, and encourages you to engage in meaningful conversations with your fellow Burners.

Finally, don't miss the opportunity to climb our iconic 26 ft crow's nest lookout tower. This unique structure offers a high vantage point to take in the sights and sounds of Black Rock City.

We serve individually brewed cups of exceptional, single-origin coffee prepared by our baristas. Our relaxing lounge area, adorned with low tables, cushions, and ambient music, encourages you to engage in meaningful conversations with fellow Burners.

Finally, don't miss the opportunity to climb our iconic 26 ft crow's nest lookout tower. This unique structure offers a high vantage point to take in the sights and sounds of Black Rock City.

Our vibrant, welcoming space invites you to slow down, savor the moment, and make some genuine connections with your fellow coffee lovers.

We serve individually brewed cups of exceptional, single-origin coffee prepared by our baristas. Our relaxing lounge area, adorned with low tables, cushions, and ambient music, encourages you to engage in meaningful conversations with fellow Burners.

Finally, don't miss the opportunity to climb our iconic 26 ft crow's nest lookout tower. This unique structure offers a high vantage point to take in the sights and sounds of Black Rock City.

Come get your morning caffeine fix with the best coffee on playa!  We serve single-cup pour over coffees from a menu of home-roasted single origin coffee beans from around the world.  And, come get a birds-eye view of playa from our 26 ft crows nest lookout tower!

Get caffeinated!!!! We bring you the best coffee on the playa. Hand roasted in small batches, freshly ground pour-over style with (almost) no dust in it. Drag your ass to our kick ass dome from 9am to 6pm & 9pm-12am daily, BYOC like the good burner you are.

Welcome to Kaleidoscope!  Stop by in the mornings or evenings for some delicious home-roasted slow drip coffee and mellow beats, participate in an interactive workshop, and check out the local neighborhood from our 30ft crows nest lookout towers.  If you're lucky you may even catch some live classical piano!

Welcome to Kaleidoscope! We serve fresh pour over coffee and offer a shaded board game lounge for socializing and play. Join us in the evenings for public workshops and discussions. Find us on the playa by looking for the 25ft climb-able and hang-out-able crows nest lookout tower and wooden geodesic domes.

Welcome to Kaleidoscope. On the surface we serve fresh pour over coffee and offer a shaded game lounge for socializing and play. Stay longer and enjoy our full-size, walk-in kaleidoscope or lounge on our roadside stoop. Here you may also become involved something much bigger, which transcends the scope of the camp itself.

Looking to get melty while having a booty shaking good time?! Look no further than Fun-Do Bar! Our delicious Swiss cheese and chocolate fondue paired with ice cold wine is sure to make your taste buds dance! Join us for our dance party happy hour (4p-6p or until we run out!). Our servers will be scantily clad wearing nothing but aprons, so come on down and melt with happiness while shaking your booty to the beats!

The FUN-DO BAR is all about having fun and fondue. Come eat cheese and chocolate with us in the afternoon, play games and listen to people play music!
Come join us for FUN at the FUN-DO BAR! Fun and fondue. Who can say no to hot melted cheese? Or chocolate?
Serving Cheese and Chocolate Fondue and a whole lot of FUN!
Come play giant games and enjoy cheese and chocolate fondue at the FUN-DO Bar! We will be serving wine in nothing butt our aprons, so come play with us!

**Camp Tada! Where the magic is REAL!** 

Get ready for a summer explosion of creativity, connection, and COLOR!  Think non-stop fun, amazing new friends, and adventures around every corner.  At Camp Tada!, it's not just a summer camp – it's a portal to a world where imagination runs wild!  
Prepare for:
* **CRAZY** crafts that'll blow your mind!
* **UNFORGETTABLE** memories you'll cherish forever! 
* **EPIC** adventures you won't believe! 
Something new and exciting awaits you at every turn!  Ready to unleash your inner artist, explorer, and friend-maker?

The Fountain (of youth) is a longevity-focused camp at BM where we celebrate life and coordinate to fight aging & death.

Our gifts to the playa are LongeviTEA, our signature teahouse and the Rejuvenating IV Lounge.

We have healthy food (inspired by the blueprint diet), IV hydration raffles, and daily workshops on accelerating lon biohacking, and thriving. 
Whether you're seeking a soothing cup of LongeviTea or a deep conversation about defying aging and death, The Fountain (of youth) invites you to sip, connect, rehydrate and explore what it means to live vibrantly on the edge of time.

The Sacred Song Teahouse is a temple for devotional singing on the playa.

There are many traditions of devotional singing, sometimes known as bhajans or kirtan, which help to quiet the mind so that the heart can open to the divine, allowing us to taste the blissful reality that is our true nature. Rather than being a performance in which the audience listens to musicians, it is a participatory spiritual practice in which everyone is encouraged to sing and express their inner joy.

The Sacred Song Teahouse is a Burning Man camp dedicated to creating and maintaining a serene temple oasis for joining our voices and diving into the Divine... together. We welcome the keepers of tea wisdom to join us in our temple space to sooth our throats with their mystical infusions. Together we create Magic!
