Mad Tea(se) Party is a circusy sound camp and interactive lounge. We offer Victorian era ambiance, a robust collection of cat literature and pop up circus events. Since 2019, Mad Tea(se) has hosted tea parties, cabaret shows, and yoga/acroyoga events under its iconic, striped circus tent.

Mad Tea(se) Party is a circusy, satirical and sexy(?) cafe focused on providing the public with interactive day parties and cabaret shows. Since 2019, Mad Tea(se) has hosted cat-theme competitions, circusy wonderland performances, and decompression events under its iconic, red striped circus tent.

Mad Tea(se) Party is a circusy, satirical and sexy(?) cafe focused on providing the public with interactive day parties and cabaret shows. Since 2019, Mad Tea(se) has hosted cat-theme competitions, circusy wonderland performances, and decompression events under its iconic, red circus tent.

Mad Tea(se) Party is a circusy, satirical, sexy(?) cafe featuring themed tea parties from Monday - Friday. Serving tea with a side of silliness, our unique red circus tent cafe space includes Wonderland acrobats, variety shows, DJs, cats & unique offerings that will remind you of the times before Burning Man was commercialized and destroyed by influencers. 

Cafe hours featuring cats, acrobats & disco: 11-3 daily
Dinner and a Show - Weds @ 6 (first come first serve)

MAD TEA(se) PARTY will be serving up a selection of fine teas and flirty teasing all week long. Come "sip and spank" with the full Lewis Carroll cast of characters from Noon to 4PM daily. Our teas and "tea-tails" will be topped off with Cream, Sugar and Sexy Circus Performances!
Serving coffee, smiles, and good ol' fashion kinky fun since 2014
Seattle's Breast Coffee

We will be back again in 2025 serving the coldest frozen margaritas on the Playa. Our amusement center will certainly entertain you and Power to the People will be available to help keep your electrical devices charged.

We will be back again in 2023 serving the coldest frozen margaritas on the Playa. Our amusement center will certainly entertain you and Power to the People will be available to help keep your electrical devices charged.

We will be back again in 2023 serving the coldest frozen margaritas on the Playa. Our amusement center will certainly entertain you and Power to the People will be available to help keep your electrical devices charged.

Brain Freeze Camp is back again! Naturally we will be serving frozen Margaritas, hot coffee in the morning and plenty of entertainment. 
This year we are adding "Power For The People". We will have an area for charging all your electrical devices. This includes cameras & phones all the way up to electric bikes and Mutant Vehicles. It will be available 24/7 during the entire Event.

Once again Brain Freeze / Got Stickers camp will be returning to the Playa. Besides our frozen margaritas and stickers, the Heart On group will be providing temporary tatoos and other forms of non permanent body art. The Black Rock boat people will be offering coffee each morning. The public area will be open each day for your enjoyment.
Brain Freeze / Got stickers camp will again be serving up frozen margaritas and stickers. Along with our various forms of entertainment, no one will get bored.

Temple Oasis is a decompression spot and camp for those who have gathered at, worked at, or been a Guardian at the Temple.

An Oasis on the playa from the heaviness of the Temple and our service to it; a place to find others who are welcome to talk or sit in knowing silence as we unwind our experiences.
Please come join Temple Oasis and unwind from those stressful times out at the Temple or just share a story about your experiences.
Temple Guardians Oasis and Safe Space
Temple Homage Camp supporting the Temple and Temple Guardians
We hold Homage to the Burning Man Temples and Builders and what they represent and our main goal is to interact and welcome to all of those who consider all sacred sites within Burning Man.

We are a family and community, a California-based collective of dreamers, artists, adventurers, and passionate doers, that loves throwing fun off the wall parties as much as we love connecting on deeper levels. We are professionals at being, playing, curating unique experiences, and faffing about - whether it's flow, dance, music, magic, bubbles, movement, fire spinning, food, drinks, art, live jams, deep talks, tiny things or a whole lot of silly nonsense. We're a diverse group of eclectic individuals that operates with love and respect for the 10 Principles of Burning Man. We create interactive and magical experiences together as we inspire others to flow, love, and be their free and fearless selves. We also take lost and found items, including people. ;) Come play and get lost with us!

Flow Therapy is a sacred space for flow, self-actualization, and fucking around for fucking ever... a space for everyone to lose their inhibitions and become the best versions of themselves. We are huge advocates of Flow, the timeless, selfless, expressive state of being, when our inner critic is silenced and our highest self comes to play. We're a family and community, a California-based collective of dreamers, artists, adventurers, and passionate doers, that loves throwing badass parties as much as we love to connect on deeper levels. We are professionals at being, playing, and faffing about - whether it's dancing, music, yoga, fire spinning, cooking, making art, or a whole lot of nonsense. We're a diverse group of eclectic individuals that operates with deep love and respect on the 10 Principles of Burning Man, that create interactive and magical experiences together as we inspire others to dance, flow, love, and be their free and fearless selves. What is your flow?

This is a sacred space for self-actualization and flow. We've built a space for everyone to lose their inhibitions and become the best versions of themselves. We're a family and community, an LA/SF-based collective of dreamers, artists, adventurers, and passionate doers, that loves throwing badass parties as much as we love to connect on deeper levels. We're a diverse group of eclectic individuals that operates with deep love and respect on the 10 Principles of Burning Man, that create interactive experiences and magic together.

Play is good for the soul - come meditate, do yoga, boogie down, play with fire, learn to spin (contact and dragon staff, poi, hoops, fans, palm torches, levitation wand, rope dart), fly on an aerial rig, party 'til the break of dawn, jam out, or whatever else your heart desires. Bring your best vibes!

Welcome to Naked Rainbow, the strip club for your soul! We've built a space for you to lose inhibitions and become the best you. We're a family and community, an LA/SF-based collective of dreamers, artists, adventurers, and passionate doers, that loves throwing badass parties as much as we love to connect on deeper levels. We're a diverse group of eclectic individuals that operates with deep love and respect on the 10 Principles of Burning Man, with aspirations of transforming into a non-profit collective focused on creating art and interactive experiences.

Play is good for the soul - come meditate, do yoga, boogie down, play with fire, learn to spin (contact and dragon staff, poi, hoops, fans, rope dart), fly on an aerial rig, party 'til the break of dawn, enter new dimensions through our VR setup, jam out, chill in our art car, or whatever else your heart desires. Bring your best vibes and we'll take care of the rest!

For a schedule of events, please visit:
www.nakedrainbow.weebly.com

Naked Rainbow, the Strip Club for your Soul. All week - FIRE SPINNING after dark, PICNIC TABLE ART CAR shenanigans at random. ;) TUESDAY 10PM - Come dance in your favorite animal onesie to 90's throwbacks, deep house, Disney tunes, gospel dubstep and more. Sip on jungle juice and unicorn blood all night! THURSDAY 5:30PM - A magical happy hour of live painting, dancing, spinning (contact staff, dragon staff, poi, hoop), lights, essential oils, drums, and more to deep meditative flow music, with a fire spinning circle to an electric violin performance at sunset. Bring your toys and come play!! ART INSTALLATIONS - A life-sized Pyramid shell that incorporates the golden ratio of sacred geometry and sound healing frequencies, is designed to drop bass and sync light to your heartbeat when the glowing core is touched. Also come hang your aspirations and prayers on the Tree of Hope. It will swell throughout the week as individuals leave pieces of themselves to this collective consciousness.

Welcome to Naked Rainbow, the Strip Club for your Soul. Expose your dreams. Flash your fears. Bend over, spread your cheeks and give us a bare-assed view of your inner self. Our safe, open, meaningful and interactive environment plies you with mimosas, Harry Potter cocktails and good conversations to get you naked -- spiritually naked, that is. Share your aspirations on the Tree of Dreams. Unburden your woes on the Tree of Prayers. Take a quiet moment out of your day to pray or meditate. Align your mind and spirit with Mimosa Vinyasa (Wed 5-6PM BYOM). Connect to each other at our modern partner-dancing workshops in costume (Tutu Tuesday 4:30-6PM + Bunny Thursday 3-4:30PM)! Join us for our Harry Potter cocktail hour dressed in your favorite color of the rainbow (Friday 5-7PM BYOC, starting with Andy’s standup routine)! We dare you to come sit in the Bad Advice Chair. You may even find yourself in the middle of an impromptu flow jam or fire spinning session. Even if it’s something as simple as dancing to our live beats or relaxing in the shade of our visually stimulating Dome, we hope you leave the Naked Rainbow with the most vibrant hues of your soul revealed.
Come join us for Exotic Elixirs, BORG, Music, Quests and our own infinity mirror room - just know this will be the funnest Korner on playa!

Come join us for a plethora of experiences whether it be Borg, jungle themed misters, all sorts of music, a prize wheel or an infinity mirror room - just know this will be the funnest Korner on the playa!

Come join us and experience a haven of tranquility. 

Unleash your creativity with paint and canvas, or simply relax in the shade with the gentle breeze of fans and misters while indulging in snacks, water, and tea to keep yourself energized for the rest of the day. 

Our camp is equipped with musical instruments like a rain stick, didgeridoo, and bongos, perfect for impromptu jamming sessions that soothe the soul. 

As night falls, prepare to be mesmerized by a captivating light show that transforms Kosmic Korner into an otherworldly realm, or find yourself a comfortable spot in the Zen Den and let the peaceful ambiance of the Zen Den lull you into a restful night's sleep

A visit to Hack-a-Cola is a reprieve from the heat empowered by a sampling of a wide variety of unique, handcrafted flavors of soda. Hand us a cup and we'll mix cold carbonated water with one or more of our syrups to make a refreshing soda on the spot. We may even put a scoop of ice cream in your soda to make it a float! We tweak our recipes and invent new flavors throughout the week. Inquisitive visitors can learn how to fulfill their own soda making dreams with the guidance of our knowledgeable, helpful soda jerks. We aim to provide a welcoming space where everyone will feel comfortable to stay a while and enjoy the company under our plentiful shade.

aMonkey’srEvolution. Does what seems to have changed only a rePresentation of the familiar?  Is the mud on the stone rolling down the hill changing the course of the universe or only a reassignment of location for a continued oeuvre? No matter how far the poo gets flung is anything really different for the monkey?  Jub Jub, one of your favoritely familiar of monkeys wonders perhaps that the more things change the more they stay the same.

Aren’t all dreams fashioned from the mind that conceives them? What does a monkey dream? What monkey-business will brew up out of his primordial subconscious for you to experience. Jub Jub, the truly American of Monkeys, awaits to inform you.

Our camp will be offering a rooftop deck atop the Bombus Regius Steampunk Airship Art Car ( docked for the summer ) stationed within The Hive Village. Camp Contact is dedicated to offering a more embodied world through Contact Improvisation, Acro Yoga, Ecstatic Dance, Authentic Relating, Internal Family Systems, and other Psychotechnologies.  We bring a dance space and domes for our offerings!  We welcome others who know of these and related practices and modalities to join us in community!

Camp Contact is dedicated to offering a more embodied world through Contact Improvisation, Acro Yoga, Ecstatic Dance, Internal Family Systems, and other Psychotechnologies.  We bring a dance floor, steam bath, and domes for our offerings!

Camp Contact connects the playasphere through Contact Improvisation, Acro Yoga, Authentic Relating, Ecstatic Dance and Liminal Web (Game B) interactivity. We are emerging through the frontiers of embodiment and somatic awareness to allow for non-rivalrous dynamics to unite us and turn conflict into an opportunity for growth. Whimsy and playfulness are core values as we cultivate pre-verbal inner knowing. Grasping a firm sense of the state of our nervous systems, we look for ease and flow states to bring us deeper grounding such that we come to know new truths through paradoxes & oxymorons.

We work to create an ontological space that allows the neoteric manifestations of our souls and communities to emerge.

Transformational Interactions are what we're about at Camp Contact. Through Contact Improvisation Dance, Acro/Yoga, Authentic Relating, Tantra, Meditation, the Steam Bath and more, we gather to bring self-awareness, connection, and heart opening catharsis to the burns and festivals we attend.

Camp Contact’s motto is “Explore Connection” which we do through workshops in Contact Improvisation Dance, Ecstatic Dance, Acro Yoga, Intersubjective Meditation, Interchange and many other forms of embodiment and awareness generating practices.  Come play with us!

Camp Contact is an experiential and experimental laboratory which seeks to ask the question “What is human connection?”  We are a tribe of dancers, somanauts, shamen, and radiant beings who offer our deepest gifts in Contact Improvisation Dance, Thai Massage, Acroyoga, energy work, eye-contact jams, David Deida, Authentic Relating, Action Theatre, Galactic Activation, Thomas Hubel, Bitcoin & more.

Contact Improvisation Dance, AcroYoga, Tantra, Energy Work, Thai Massage, Eye-Contact Jams, and conversations about David Deida’s work are just a few of the events you will find at our camp. We gather to offer classes and workshops within the studio spaces that we erect, and to be a part of our temporary intentional community that values awareness and conscious intention while celebrating the dance.  Jams @ Center Camp every morning!

Camp Contact is devoted to bringing Contact Improvisation Dance and other related somatic practices such as Thai massage, Acro-yoga, authentic movement and more to the playa.  Please join us for classes & workshops at our camp and for Contact Dance in the mornings at Center Camp.

A group of humans that are here to party, as well as break down social barriers around wealth & social status. By building community among folks who might never have interacted with each other, we are creating solidarity & pushing against a staus quo of scarcity & exploitation.  That's a lot of words to say come on by for some mending, camraderie, or a stiff drink. Whatever you're after, we can help you find it.

Uli Baba and the Horny Thieves, also known as Uli Baba's, is a Burning Man theme camp. In addition to the Ten Principles, our guiding inspiration is hospitality. We are always honored to serve our guests, even while subjecting them to cruel humiliation, voluntary servitude, and wanton drunkenness. Our gorgeous Moroccan tents are lushly furnished with wall-to-wall rugs, benches, and more pillows than you can count. Ours is a hard-working group of camp mates who come together to create a Moroccan oasis in Black Rock City. Auctions always Tuesday through Thursday at 2pm!

Welcome, Weary Traveler, to the most Glorious Flesh Market in Black Rock City! Uli Baba and the Horny Thieves, also known as Uli Baba's, is a Burning Man theme camp. In addition to the Ten Principles, our guiding inspiration is hospitality. We are always honored to serve our guests, even while subjecting them to cruel humiliation, voluntary servitude, and wanton drunkenness. Our gorgeous Moroccan tents are lushly furnished with wall-to-wall rugs, benches, and more pillows than you can count. They play host to events throughout the week. Check the What Where When guide for our Auctions and Bizarre Bazaar full of arts and crafts, personal growth workshops, dancing, and more. Our Lord and Master, Uli Baba, commands us to bring our caravan of Flesh Merchants once again into the dust. We wretched Thieves seek to humble ourselves in your service. Step up to the Infamous Auction block! Are you a piece or Merchandise or a potential Buyer? Join us at the Bizarre Bazaar, fight to the death on the Chicken Beam, display yourself for compliments and praise. Find us inside our tent or kitchen and enjoy the finest Moroccan hospitality. Will you be, like us, fully corrupted?

O citizens of the desert! Amidst our wanderings, our caravan of Illustrious Thieves has come upon this pathetic place known as Black Rock City and has deemed it suitable to pitch our fine tent here. Even though you are lowly creatures made of dust, our glorious master--Uli Baba, he who is magnificent and just--permits your presence at his Used People Auction and other debauched events. Sell off your well-used flesh on our stage, bring your most talented belly dancers, and fight on our chicken beam as we celebrate in the name of the master!

At My Favorite Things, we're all about creating unforgettable experiences and fostering community spirit through an array of interactive activities and experiences we love. As you explore our camp, you'll discover a plethora of exciting offerings designed to keep you cool, entertained, and connected: a cacao ceremony to connect with the spirit of ancestors,  an aerial arts workshop, playa dust sculptures, and an amazing Fajita party. Join us as we celebrate creativity, connection, and the magic of Burning Man!

To deviate positively is to play with the rules, reimagine the future, build new realities, and break what no longer serves. It starts small: a question, an experiment, a new way of relating - that quietly reorganizes what’s possible between us and around us.

A respite for weary travelers of Black Rock City. Come relax in the oases of the desert. Lounge out in one of our comfy cabanas, experience ultimate relaxation with our team of expert masseuses, and grab a refreshing drink at our bar.

We're committed to propagating environmentally conscious technology, art, and living through sustainability and innovation. Come experience it yourself at Motel California.

Hotel California is an oasis of generosity where all dusty playa visitors can come re-energize, rest and relax. All guests are welcome to experience our fabulous hospitality: come enjoy our Day Spa and our new EmpaTea Bar, take a class in our Workshop Space, or view panoramic sunsets and sunrises from our rooftop! We will offer Continental Breakfast in the morning, and host Happy Hour in the evening.  Our Pool and Cabanas will be open anytime for napping and lounging. Our giant glowing steel fire bowl will be on fire every night - warm up with us!

Luminary Love is an interactive light portal symbolizing the transition from the present to the future through light and love. It reminds us that the future is built today, and love is the key to transformation. As participants pass through, they leave behind fear and doubt, stepping into a space of new possibilities. The glowing lights reflect the connection between people, showing that we create the future together.

Parley is your dedicated conversation camp.  Come "Parley" with us during our daily facilitated events or drop in anytime for adhoc conversations on your topic of your choice. 

Our mission is to facilitate meaningful conversations and bridge gaps between people who might be different from one another.   The topics and framing are done in a way that everyone can have an opinion and a voice.  During the Parley, ideas and thoughts shall be shared, rapport shall be built and new friends made.

Parley is your dedicated conversation camp.  Come "Parley" with us during our daily facilitated events and our drop in 24/7 for adhoc conversations on topics of your choice (deep, fun or controversial). 

Our mission is to facilitate meaningful conversations and bridge gaps between people who may disagree with each other.  Participants that accept the Parley (and agree to its' rules) shall be under our protection. No one shall be left feeling unwelcome and no one will be silenced or shunned for simply expressing an idea.  The topics and framing are done in a way that everyone can have an opinion and a voice. In our conversation pit, under the flag of truce, ideas and thoughts shall be shared, rapport shall be built and new friends made.
Da Brodega and Le Gentrifique, the snarkiest businesses in town. Millions of dissatisfied customers can't be wrong. Come get a mouthful.

Come get a mouthful at the playa's best inconvenience store, the Brodega. It ain't like New York, but it's damn close, bro. We got some things that you want and all the things you don't for the price of some friendly banter. Stick around to charm the shopkeepers to see what kind of speakeasy is behind the closed doors. Will you get a makeover, a makeout or have to step into the ring of the absurdities? Your mouth may never look or taste the same.

A multi generational camp that brings a variety of offerings to BRC. Our featured attraction is the Jellonator, a trampoline suspended from a giant net of bungee cords. Do you think you're a stable person? Then come and enter our "Last Burner Standing" contests. They happen periodically during the week. We also feature the Brodega. An inconvenience store that carries everything you didn't know that you don't need.   Come in and be a part of the street theatre as burners experience some extraordinarily bazaar moments.

Trampolines are a dime a dozen at Burning Man, but how many of them are hanging from a giant net of bungee cords? Come check out "The Jellanator". Every action has a reaction, every motion has an emotion.
Come by for some crazy nighttime sport activities. Refreshments may be served.
Every action has a reaction; every motion has an emotion. Move and laugh in our bizarre playland.
Fun times on a unique play apparatus. Every action has a reaction, every motion has an emotion.
We are a fun interactive camp, featuring a plaything made from a combination of a trampoline, a metal frame dome, and 1500' of bungee cords. Every action has a reaction, every motion has an emotion.

We spend so much time on our feet at Burning Man that sometimes we just need to get horizontal! So come and indulge your senses at Mattress Society, a huge 24-hour air mattress oasis in the desert. Like any thriving Empire on the brink of decay, our theme is decadence, abundance and over-indulgence.

Once you're all cuddled out, grab a new friend and play a leisurely card game in our bistro area. Enjoy our regular afternoon chillout DJ sets Mon, Tues, Fri (1pm-4pm) with featured drinks and more. Hedonism on display at our Thursday night cocktail party 7pm-12am. 

The day humanity decided to elevate itself from ground to Mattress was the day we detached ourselves from nature to pursue our limitless ambitions. So enjoy… or die! Because, ultimately, nothing else mattress.

As urban communities like BRC threaten migratory birds, concerned citizens are banding together to protect endangered animals and habitats. This led to the formation of the Black Rock Desert Migratory Bird Refuge (BiRDMBR), a new outpost of the Desert National Wildlife Refuge. 

With the creation of the Black Rock Desert Migratory Bird Refuge, birds will have a home in the Great Basin during their migrations as well as habitat preserved for year round residents including cougars, beavers, badgers. 

BiRDMBR plans an extensive permanent Visitor Center with interpretive panels and interactive activities to engage participants of all abilities and ages. 

Join us in our Visitor's Center watering hole and nest for activities like Personalize Your Pee Jug, Bird Bingo, Nature Journaling, and more.
Node is an oasis of epic proportions. Stop by for drinks, vibes and beats. Dont miss our Hip Hop BBQ on Wednesday!
Node is an oasis of epic proportions. serving coffee daily from 830ish-11, followed by morning vibes daily. Dont miss our Hip Hop BBQ on Wednesday!

Node is a space to relax and refuel your physical body, so that we can focus our energies on higher pursuits. Start your mornings with some deliciously strong cold brew at 830am and stick around for some luscious beats and great vibes. Come by node at anytime and you never know what type of amazing recharge you will find.

NODE is a crypto Dreamscape powered by love, music, breath and tea. Join us for beats, ice cold drinks, tea, and a cool place to vibe out. Node is all about the vibes and you will find yourself wondering why you didnt find us sooner.

Node Republik celebrates the future in an optimistic, loving and expressive way. We will be hosting music, dance, meditation and talks that elicit a conversation about what the future holds, abundance and empowerment to create our own destinies.

The Chai Lounge is a place where we celebrate life over a cup of chai, in a drum circle, during ecstatic dance, and inside our portal where we explore the unseen realm! The Lounge's mission is to bring people into sincere interaction with one another and experience deep love and a profound, spiritual, consensual healing. This is facilitated through our camp healers. Come, drop in and connect in a space dedicated to community and creation. come to connect or experience a healing safe place to paint, journal and rest.

Inviting guests to sit and connect over tea and creative activities such as movement and creative activities such as yoga, dance, martial arts, painting and drawing.

We've been a presence at Burning man for 20 years, as Joyism and as a part of Silicon Village, with many people coming up to the art car recognizing it from the past, and coming by our area later to explore as they search for coffee and interaction.
Our coffee kitchen regularly generates lines of people from every corner of the Playa for hours every morning, with hundreds served. We take our coffee seriously!
This year, hundreds of people will interact with our "One Pill makes you Smaller, and One Pill makes you Tall" exhibit, and our "Joyism Cares" tent hands out sunscreen, condoms, pain relievers, hydration and advice.  We may have wifi available for those in dire need.  Come say Hi!!!

Joyism is a camp of some 50 people, whose major contribution is to provide coffee in the mornings between 8 and 11 AM. Several hundred people come by every day. It is clearly a very valuable commodity. We have to bring in a large quantity of water, and we have at least five urns simmering at any one time. People come from several blocks away. Joyism camp is also the informal home of the Joyism artcar, the temple of our new religion Joyism, and from which we serve up, live bands on the front, margaritas for participants of critical tits, and Playa weddings. We also have a climbing wall for users of all levels.

As part of our new religion, Joyism, we aim to spread the joy through offering coffee in the mornings, climbing closer to heaven on a climbing wall and escaping to a better reality in our Dream Drop time machine.
Turtle Camp is a quiet shady spot where SIMON the TURTLE can rest between playa cruises. Come visit SIMON in his "TURTLE CAVE", and cruise the playa in the luxury of SIMON's plushy turtle shell!
Turtle camp is a quiet shady spot where SIMON the TURTLE can rest between playa cruises. Come visit SIMON in his "TURTLE CAVE", and cruise the playa in the luxury of SIMON's plushy turtle shell!

Home of SIMON the Turtle Car, Turtle Camp is a one-hearted collective of people with shared values of wisdom, integrity, kindness and authentic connection with each other and our surrounding community. It is our intention to help others slow down, to be present, and to fully experience the flow of life on the Playa with curiosity and joy.  

Turtle Camp Mantra
by Garrett Brill
Take it slow
You'll find your flow
Wherever you roam, you'll be at home

Lets make some beautiful music together.

The Black Rock Piano lounge is a place where people from all over the world come to meet, enjoy and play great live music.  We bring two of the best piano's to the playa (and tune it several times throughout the week) in one of the coolest lounges.  Live music is played by both camp members and any fellow Burner who stops by to share their talent.  Music plays 24 hours a day and we host parties throughout the week.

The magic of the Black Rock Piano Lounge is that we connect people who have never met before and create amazing live music.  Our 40 by 20 lounge is designed to be open and friendly.  We have several fist time musicians mix with experienced professionals to create a safe environment for everyone to create and share.

Global Camp exists to be a safe place for international participants, and our camp every year has over 30 regions or more represented. Come and hang out with us - and enjoy wellness offerings Tuesday to Friday mornings and afternoons.

Global Camp was founded in 2018 to fill the vacuum of theme camps for Internationals to land. Over the years we have hosted individuals from over 70 countries, and we celebrate each persons diversity, culture and expression. 
We bring elements of this diverse culture to BRC and provide space for those to learn and connect with burners from far away lands. Come and join us for afternoon cultural themed offerings.

NYC Deli will be be serving Seinfeld-esque laughs and scrumptious New York Deli breakfast food 10am-12pm Monday through Saturday during the Burn. Bacon Egg and Cheese is most popular but we also have great Vegan, Veggie and Gluten Free breakfast sandwich options too! Coffee and water served also. Like last year: there is an air conditioned public picnic area to enjoy your meal! 

In addition to the food: NYC Deli also offers Staten Island! Staten Island is an 85-person public cooling center kept at 70 degrees 10am-5pm Monday through Saturday. Most burners use it to sleep or quietly socialize. There is no programming or events inside: just ocean noise playing over a speaker. Ice is available! Staten Island is NYC Deli's response to 2022's heat.

Please stop by! 🥯🐀🗽❤️‍🔥

Come eat at NYC Deli located at the corner of 8th and D. We're exactly what we sound like. We're 70 New Yorkers coming to serve authentic, hot NYC Deli food 9AM-11AM Monday-Saturday during the Burn. 🥯🐀🗽🔥

Come wake up to egg and cheese sandwiches with or without real or fake meat, bagels with cream cheese, coffee and tea. We also will have Vegetarian/Vegan/GF options. All served in a sassy Seinfeld-style service.

While you are getting food with us you will truly feel like you are in New York City. Because no matter where New Yorkers go we cluster and try to reproduce Brooklyn.

See you on-playa!

NYC Deli: where the customer's always wrong. Think Seinfeld on playa, bodega cats included.* Take a bite out of your comedown from all-night shenanigans by stopping by at Camp NYC Deli on your way back to your camp. Let us serve you the best bodega breakfast sandwiches, coffee and tea on-playa Monday through Saturday 9am-11am. We'll gift you some NYC sass on the side! Breakfast includes: egg and cheese on bagels or rolls, bagels and cream cheese, and coffee service. Vegan and vegetarian options available! 

*Not real cats, just cool cats. We're also the cat's pajamas!

The Mystical Grill is a global circle of kindred spirits united by fire, flavor, and story. We gift two styles of traditional Argentinian Asado from our open grill and invite Burners to gather for communal meals, spontaneous storytelling, and soul-warming connection. Sing your heart out at Grill-aoke, sip mate in our shaded nook, or simply bask in the glow of our sacred fire. We honor food as ritual, fire as transformation, and the Playa as our shared home.
Food, Art and Music

Hailing from the sunny Mission District of San Francisco, we invite everyone to enjoy the dusty comforts of our playa outpost. Pull up a bar stool at Flanagan's Pub - open day and night - for a refreshing beverage. Cozy up on one of our couches beneath the ample and breezy shade structure. Let loose on the dance floor. We're a relaxed and fun-loving crowd from all over - San Francisco, Tahoe, Reno, Los Angeles, Washington DC, Boston, New York, Seattle, Portland, Ireland, Germany, Belgium and beyond. Often serving tunes and always serving drink, the Mission Country Club has been calling Black Rock City home since 2004.

We bring a taste of San Francisco's Mission District to Black Rock City! Mission Country Club is an organically-grown camp, consisting of folks from all over - San Francisco, Reno, Los Angeles, Washington DC, Boston, New York, Seattle, Portland, Ireland, Germany, Belgium and beyond. We've been kicking it on playa since 2004 and over the years we've been home to Flannagan's Pub, Flannagan's Tacos + Whiskey, the Magic Kurry Cart, the Sangria Soundclash, the BRC Hip-Hop Playa Ball, the Brian Brunch and Bugaboo the art car. Don't forget to check the book for our 2024 shenanigans! We can't wait to be home with all of you!

Welcome to the Club!  Wake up and smell the fresh roasted coffee we’ve brewed for your daily delectation or to reconnect with your Common Sense at the Paine Society.  And be sure to stop by for our wildly popular Sangria SoundClash party on Thursday afternoon.

Nowhere; Probably is a camp that is designed to be a safe-haven from Society for any who are willing to participate. We are actively considerate of those experiencing unorthodox consciousness, be that temporarily, "neuro-divergent", or otherwise. Our main goal, aside from creating community, art, and more participation, is to show and empower the curious and courageous how to do more with less waste.

Nowhere; Probably is a place where "self"-expression, creation, and exploration are encouraged. We are here to support, help, and learn from each other. We do not need to limit ourselves in the scope of our expression, as our resources come at a seemingly infinite and ever increasing rate. We take what has been ignored or cast aside by Society and use it for living and creating.

This year, The Heart Collective is combining its Squish Lounge, Healing Sanctuary, and Nourishment Lab into one structure: the < < < Nourishment Lounge>>> a one-stop shop for integrated energetic, nutritional, and somatic support. We host services from skilled and ethical practitioners, from massage to reiki to tuning forks to buffing. Come by to receive healing care offered on a first-come-first-serve basis by a rotating cast of practitioners from across the globe, or visit our alcohol-free space with nourishing and hydrating elixirs (both open throughout the afternoon on days later in the week). From sundown to sunup, we welcome burners to our communal fire, a sacred space that helps us greet the darkness and support us through the night.

Our space is a friendly, playful, sacred theme camp full of people who believe in the healing and life-giving power of water, community, and consensual, platonic, & relational intimacy. 
We provide three primary daytime offerings, all available to the public: A Nourishment Lab, where burners coming by are offered a variety of creative, nutrient-packed, non-alcoholic elixirs in the hot afternoons; the playa-famous Healing Sanctuary, where for 6 hours a day, Wed-Fri, dusty travelers can come get their weary bones tuned up or toned down, or receive bodywork, energy healing, and other wellness support; and our Squish Lounge, where curious folks can spend shady time relaxing with friends, enjoying a playshops, or - at night - simply a quiet place to come down or squish out~

This camp is a safe heart filled space that wants to promote and encourage you to take exquisite care of your mind, body, heart, and spirit, so that you can experience the burn from a place of wholeness and bring more of your own talents and gifts to the playa. It is our great honor to provide healing services at our sanctuary, squish in our consensual cuddle lounge, hydrate with superb elixirs at our nourishment lab, serve tea in our lotus lounge and most of all, love you up the heartist way we know how to. Work Heart. Play Heart. Rest Heart.

Heart Tribe is a heart-centered, touch positive group providing a Healing Sanctuary to the Playa. We offer a variety of healing modalities in a beautiful squishy space to bring people into their bodies and hearts.
During the Burn Week, we open our Healing Sanctuary 4 hours each day and welcome people in to receive healing sessions on a first-come-first-served basis.
We'll also be offering non-alcoholic elixirs and a variety of hydrating, tasty delights served at our Nourishment Lab, with the aim of leaving you feeling better than when you found us.
We're also excited to offer a Tea-Pi with tea service, a Bowie Blackstar Vinyl Sanctuary and a Pee-Cone Pie Stand, where ladies can pick up a pee funnel to make their lives easier.
Come squish out with us!
Heart Tribe brings people together to drop in to their heart spaces through opportunities for healthy, consensual physical touch, as well as various forms of nourishment.

Come chill out in our Squish Lounge while you wait for your Healing Session. Heart Tribe has many healing modalities and tons of squish! Come unwind! Get a massage, chiropractic adjustment, reiki healing or other healing session and get "buffed" or buff someone and drop in with other heart-centered peeps. You will leave feeling rejuvenated and alive! Tue-Sat 2-6pm

Heart Tribe offers a chance to engage in platonic touch in our Healing Sanctuary and Movement Revolution Spaces. Come get a massage, reiki session, chiropractic adjustment or squish session in our Healing Sanctuary between the hours of 2-6pm Tuesday through Saturday. 
We are excited to expand our public offering to include yoga, dance and other movement workshops in our Movement Revolution. 
Come play with us and connect to your true essence.

Heart Tribe offers a Healing Sanctuary in which you can come receive healing from any of a variety of modalities. While you wait for your session, squish out with us in our spacious Squish Lounge, which features buffers, comfy mats to stretch and play, and lots of incredible people to drop in with.

Accult is Black Rock City's preeminent venue for ascending to the next plane of existence. Come to us in order to register for planar ascension and join us in our standardized ritual initiation or SRI. F Camp is a collection of individuals all passionate about the future of Environmental, Health, Love, Technology, and Governance.  We have a major focus on sustainability, reusability, and community, and have designed our entire camp with these three focuses in mind.  In our central Ashram we host events, workshops, discussions, and music that allow us to set our intentions, collaborate, and discuss how to shape our futures. Our camp realizes the importance that having a healthy mind, body, and spirit are needed to realize the intentions we set, thus we serve elixirs, meals and host an array of meditation, yoga, and spiritual ceremonies to invigorate us and provide the foundation for collaboration and discussion.

Mayan Warrior is the result of a collaborative project that has united artists, craftsmen, photographers, designers, technologists, architects and musicians from Mexico City and other parts of the world.

The project's original intent was to present to the world the incredible ascent of contemporary Mexican electronic music while paying respect to the deep and ancient sources from which that visual and auditory culture had grown, all of this to help raise awareness and founds for Mayan Communities in need of basic infrastructure to thrive. 

Both light and sound are curated by some of the world's most prominent artists to transport participants to the very origins of the culture – and to a new understanding of contemporary electronic expression.

We are using love, art, and music to unite people and cultures.

Mayan Warrior is both a camp and a massive moving stage.  After years of collaboration and inspiration, a group of artists, designers, musicians, builders, wanderers, lovers, and festival designers created Mayan Warrior to bring an underground culture from Mexico City D.F. to the Playa.

Tree of Life is a symbol of the infinite human connection — through time, nature, culture, and technology. We are not separate; we are one living body, united by billions of ancestors, future lives, and one breath in the now. Our camp explores the sacred union of masculine and feminine energies — the dance of emotion, thought, and soul that births new realities.

Tree of Life hosts an AI oracle, infused with ancestral wisdom, guiding those seeking purpose, strength, or their other half. We invite you to co-create a space where spirit meets science — and life continues through love, unity, and transformation.

The French Maid Brigade is a long standing camp on the Playa, going on 19 years! Our membership is as diverse as they come, and our camp is always friendly to old friends and newcomers alike. Open to the community is our chill space, adjacent to our modest but gorgeously outfitted "French boudoir" inspired meeting spot. Come play toss games in our petite "center camp." And because so many of our members our musicians (of the acoustic variety), visitors can often expect a sing along in the mornings over coffee, or in the evenings circled around our numerous and colorful solar blinky lights. Come to the French Maid Parade on Thursday, or one of our special events: cleanse your spirit with sound healing, get an Ayurvedic head massage, or visit Santa for Christmas on the Playa.

Slightly Conscious is a queer-friendly, body-positive theme camp offering relaxation and rejuvenation. We host morning naked yoga sessions (yin/yang and kundalini awakening), immersive sound baths, tarot readings, astrology / birth chart readings, and guided meditation workshops for spiritual growth. Our wellness center welcomes all to rest, reset, and reconnect in a calm and nurturing environment. Fresh fruit, water, and healthy snacks are served during activities to nourish mind and body. Join us in celebrating presence, play, and conscious community.

Gymnasium celebrates acceptance of everyone in their most natural form, naked.   Come enjoy the freedom of social nudity and take part in some of our recreation events including naked oil wrestling, naked beer mile fun run, yoga, carnival games, the Gym at Gymnasium and gymnastics on a suspended ring.   We hope to see you there!

Our camp is a great mixture of gay and straight burners, men and women of multiple ethnicities and nationalities.  Come by and say hi, experience some of our events, or just take your clothes off and enjoy some shade (it's just about the only area of our camp where the sun doesn't shine).

Gymnasium celebrates the ancient Greek tradition of nude exercise and competitions, a fun and practical way to keep your clothes from getting covered in dust. Our clothing optional camp hosts a variety of events include naked oil wrestling, nude yoga, an aerial rig, pottery and an interactive art wall where everyone is encouraged to contribute and participate.   We welcome attendees of all genders, races, sexual identities and athletic abilities to join us - a smile is the only thing you need to wear. 

www.GymnasiumBurningMan.com
Celebrating the traditions of ancient Greek sports, arts and philosophy with naked oil wrestling, competitions, yoga, pottery making and philosophical conversations in our Taverna.

We want to recreate the atmosphere of the gymnasium in its original, Ancient Greek meaning, as a facility for training and competition in public games, as well as a place for socializing and engaging in intellectual pursuits. The term originates from the word [gymnós] meaning "naked", because historically in Ancient Greece one exercised naked, and we would like to revive this aspect too, as we think that by doing athletic and fun activities naked, participants will experience bonding aspect of such events stronger.

Gymnasium: We want to recreate the atmosphere of gymnasium in its original, Ancient Greek meaning, as a facility for training and competitions in public games, as well a place for socializing and engaging in intellectual pursuits. The term originates from the word [gymnós] meaning “naked”, because historically one exercised naked, and we would like to revive this aspect too, as we think that by doing athletic and fun activities naked, participants will experience bonding aspect of such events stronger and will only feel more comfortable and confident in their own skin.

Somewhere beyond the dust, beneath shifting rhythms of metal, techno, and the occasional string quartet, something strange stirs. Homemade alcohol(-free) gummies whisper secrets under your tongue. Natural wines flow like forgotten dreams. Specialty coffee arrives like a revelation.

Horizon was originally Inspired by the unobstructed view of the open playa - a space beyond the city's limits, where the sun meets the mountains over the vast and empty desert - we gather to create a community built around ideals of curiosity, art, and celebration. Over the years Horizon has moved from the outer rim to plazas and to front lines of Esplanade. No matter where we are on playa we are always thrilled to call it our home!

HORIZON is a camp of community, celebration, curiosity and creativity. Enjoy the stunning views from atop our 16' viewing decks, lounge under our stretch tents, get weird at our corner Carnival Bar, and show us your moves at our variety of dance parties.

HORIZON is a camp of community, celebration, curiosity and creativity, basking in the glow of the sun and a sense of wonder and exploration. Through daily sunset happy hours with music and drinks, daily talks and workshops on an eclectic variety of exciting subjects, aerial performance, and an incredible late night dome video projection show, we invite you to the outer edges of the city to celebrate the beauty of the playa and of one another.

Bringing the funk to the Playa! Join us for groovy tunes ranging from soul to disco, jazz to funk, brass to hip-hop, as well as great conversation and beautiful people.

Step into the shoes of Alice as you enter a world of mysteries and surprises. Take a leap into the rabbit hole and wake up into a world where small appears big, rooms are turned upside down and where you can play with the riddles and mysteries we have placed along the way back into the "real" world of Black Rock City. Along the way you will ponder on the questions of reality, perception and collective consciousness. Enjoy the ride!

Kaleidoscopes bring together light and color in patterns in change. Since 2014 we've been continuing to rotate in an ever more expansive, ever more beautiful way. A Kaleidoscope is also the plural of butterflies, something we celebrate in our imagery, icons, and the beautiful verdant grove we bring to the middle of the desert for our butterflies and other traveler to land in.

Kaleidoscope means "the observation of beautiful forms", but we know you look into a kaleidoscope and see a beautiful mess. That's just what we are. We bring people together through the power of connection paired with a healthy dose of sarcasm. Kaleidoscope Collective. Come with an open mind. We'll take care of the rest.

Pink Dragon is a sonic sanctuary born from the dust, dedicated to the radical ritual of dance and connection. Rooted in the spirit of Burning Man and inspired by the pulsating heartbeats of cities like Los Angeles and San Francisco, Pink Dragon is where music meets transformation.

Our camp curates a full-spectrum sound experience—ranging from deep house and melodic techno to soulful downtempo and surprise sunrise sets. Every DJ in our orbit brings their own flavor, but the mission is the same: to move bodies, stir souls, and keep the playa vibrating.

Stop by to dance and enjoy a beverage from our bar, or connect to our public WiFi.

We welcome all Dusty Burners, and whiskey-soaked ghosts of the Old West. We offer mischief and laughter to rattle your bones—consensually, of course. Or perhaps you'd rather just belly up to the bar, trade tall tales, and plot a Burner takeover of the Default World.

We welcome Dusty Burners wherever they are on their hazy paths through the city and transformation. Old West inspired shenanigans to keep you amused, bemused and maybe a little bruised (consensually). Or just stop for a drink, games or a whine about how much Burning Man sucks, except when compared with the Real World.

Storytime and Dreamtime co-create magic. Storytime is a larger-than-life Tiffany's banker's lamp, building community through the magic of storytelling and reading aloud across the playa. Pick up a book, sit in a circle, and read to friends new and old. Lie back, listen, and watch the stained-glass lampshade slowly change overhead. Share your own stories, or create a new one together. Storytime is a stage for reading and connection, and a comfortable retreat from the noise, throughout the city and in deep playa.

Rest on Dreamtime to inspire, introspect, reflect on dreams past and co-create new visions for the future.

Who better to walk through the waking dream of life with than friends?  In an age of increasing isolation and focus on realities, we've got your back in this surreal dream of life.  We are Friend Manufacturing Cooperative: a worker-owned and -operated foundry configured for the custom production of good-old-fashioned bespoke friendships. Swing by to share stories, drink coffee/tea, meditate on or memorialize old and new friendships!

Raise you hand if you like to learn unusual topics around sexuality. We bring unexpected holistic sexuality topics to the forefront. Come join the conversation and find out things like how dental procedures affect oral sex, how STIs can be your allies and let's get woo with your goo.

UnExSpecTedSexEd Talks is a group of Holistic Sexuality Educators led by 
G-Force to bring you deep into talks about unique, unusual, surprising and unexpected topics sprouting from  the intersection of emotional, physical, mental and spiritual sexuality themes. 

Dental health & sexuality -  Why do I have herpes on my chin or on back of my leg? -  How your energy centers affect your pleasure -  What is this fluid coming out of me? & many more...

Come join us for informative only talks. There is no exchange of fluids nor physical demonstration during the talks.

Moon Landing, a celestial outpost of creativity, exploration, and radical self-expression at Burning Man. Our camp is a launchpad for dreamers, builders, and cosmic wanderers—a space where art, technology, and human connection intersect in gravity-defying ways.

Inspired by the pioneering spirit of lunar exploration, we craft immersive experiences that transport participants beyond the ordinary. Whether it's through interactive installations, mind-expanding discussions, or late-night moonwalks under the neon glow, Moon Landing invites you to step into the unknown and embrace the infinite possibilities of the playa.

Join us as we orbit together in a community fueled by curiosity, collaboration, and a little bit of space dust. The countdown has begun—see you on the moon!

The Black Rock City Hash House Harriers are a group of hashers from around the world that come together to share our love of drinking, singing, sometimes running, and shenanigans with everyone at Burning Man.

Join us for a hash on the playa. In addition to our Annual Red Dress Run (Thursday, 3pm, meet at the man), we host a variety of hash activities and events. Check out our events page for more information!

Stop by our hash house for delicious hash browns, hot sauce, and plenty of cold strong drinks and join us as we strive to live out the 10 principles in the most fun an inclusive way possible!

With members of the BRCH3 found in several camps across the playa, a group of us camp together in the Bike Repair Camp. Our mission: share hashing with BRC while keeping the beer cold and bikes running smoothly.

Join us for a hash on the playa. In addition to our Annual Red Dress Run (Thursday, 3pm, meet at the man), we host a variety of hash activities and events. Check out our events page for more information!

The BRCH3 pays homage to our roots as hashers as we encourage our wankers to live in harmony with the 10 principles of Burning Man while sharing our own hashy culture and community. The two overlap quite nicely!

Black Rock City Hash House Harriers brings the social activity of hashing to the playa.  Hashing is a social running group dedicated to running off our hangover, promoting physical fitness, developing a thirst for beer and making the old not feel as old as they are.

On the playa we provide a Morning Bike Repair station, daily afternoon events in our Dome of Bad Decisions, and on Thursday at 3 pm, we meet at the Man for our Red Dress Run (and Bike), where we follow a trail, and for the 21+ enjoy a few cold beverages, followed by "circle" where we sign dirty songs.

We are the Hash House Harriers of Black Rock City, a drinking group with a running problem with a chapter found in almost every major city in the world. Our camp theme centers around our heritage as hashers. Our goal is to introduce burners to hashing as well as introduce Burning Man and the 10 principles to hashers new to the event.

The Tiniest Camp is a place where people can connect and have meaningful conversations. We offer an intimate and cozy environment.
You won't find any grandiose installations or flashy decorations. Instead, you'll find a humble gathering of burners who are there to share stories, ideas, and experiences. The focus is on creating a space that allows for genuine interactions and deep conversations.
It is a testament to the idea that bigger isn't always better. We place a strong emphasis on creating a welcoming and inclusive environment, and create a space where everyone feels comfortable and valued, regardless of their background or beliefs. 
At the Tiniest Camp, you can disconnect from the distractions of modern life and truly engage with the people around you. It's a beautiful thing to witness.

We're the scientists who are artists. And the artists with a passion for science. We can show you how a crystal is born, and then teach you to make wearable art with it. Want to look at the sun? Want to look at the sun and NOT go blind? We got you, and we'll even paint you up once you're done. Want to learn more about drug tests, or have a question for an OB/GYN? Stop on by for our lively and interesting debate and educational sessions. Feel like pursuing gallery worthy photos of Burning Man through the years? The Academy is the place to be You can also just kick back in the shade, trade a bad idea for a bad drink, and relax at the Bad Idea Bar - worst bar on the Playa (since 2010!).

Welcome to the Academy of Arts and Sciences. We have interactive classes teaching burners about science that can be used to create art, as well as art that makes science real. You can also slake your thirst at the Bad Idea Bar, as long as you have a bad idea to contribute. Come visit!

Burning Man Information Radio (94.5 FM) is your nexus for essential information on the playa. Check BMIR for late-breaking event announcements and a melange of music. In the event of an on-site emergency, tune into BMIR for rumor-free updates and advisories to surf the storm to a sane conclusion.

Come down to BMIR from 12-5pm each day to record event and camp announcements. Or relate your encounters with radical acts of gifting on-air to the city at large.

Experience a unique journey aboard our tethered hot air balloon, 75 feet high, with live instrumentals and electronic beats. Enjoy stunning Black Rock City views and our ground-level dance floor. Join the best show on earth in our old-world circus lounge or relax and rejuvenate in our Oracle's Den.

It's a bird, it's a plane, it's a tethered hot air balloon flying 75 feet high in the sky!

Climb aboard and experience a unique journey while being serenaded by live instrumentals mixed with electronic beats high up in the sky. Enjoy stunning views of Black Rock City and take in the joys of life on our ground-level dance floor.

Craving some pampering? Step into our old world circus lounge where you can snuggle up, dive into cinematic wonders, and recharge with treats, massages, and a sprinkle of delightful surprises.

It's a bird, it's a plane, it's a tethered hot air balloon flying 50 feet high in the sky!

Get on and take a ride, be serenaded by live instrumentals or electronic music sets in an intimate setting, while enjoying the beautiful views of Black Rock City. 

Need a little TLC? Come into our balloon lounge where you will be treated very nicely. Water, massages, and fresh fruit are waiting to nourish you.

Embark on a journey of rejuvenation with HealAF, a one-of-a-kind camp at Burning Man, where we combine traditional Asian techniques to help burners recover and replenish on the playa. Our camp offers an array of healing modalities, ranging from Tai Chi and sound baths to hyperbaric oxygen therapy and moxibustion.

Take a break from the dusty playa to experience the restorative powers of ancient Asian healing arts in our Kezhan-inspired lounge.

Alcedo Camp is a creative hub dedicated to building large-scale artwork and inspiring interaction. Visitors are welcome to explore our sculpture garden, join mini workshops, and connect with the artists behind the work. We believe in shared effort, playful creativity, and fostering meaningful exchanges with fellow Burners.

Home of the Yellow Bike Project. Please bring all Yellow Bikes in need of repair here. We will be fixing them for release back into the city. Remember not to hoard, decorate/alter, or take home Yellow Bikes . Yellow Bikes are not to be inside any camp at any time. SHARE them.

The mission of the Yellow Bike Project (YBP) is to oversee the build, release, maintenance, and collection of Yellow Bikes on playa to foster community participation in the goal of sustainable transportation within Black Rock City and to help reduce the number of abandoned bikes. Yellow Bikes are meant to be used for point to point transportation and are free for anyone to use. Yellow Bikes are not meant to be locked up or decorated.
Black Rock Community Transit runs and operates the Yellow Bike Program. The Yellow Bikes are community bikes to mobilize all citizens of Black Rock City.

We are a department within the Department of Public Works that builds 1,000 bicycles every year and deploys them for free use around Black Rock City. Get on our bikes and ride!
Our crew also manages bicycle lost & found, and abandoned bike clean up efforts on playa post-event.

Whomp Wagon Art Car
The Whomp Wagon Art Car

The Whomp Wagon, Jimmy's origins are sketchy. Legend has it that he was the main ride used by the most popular beat boys of the 1800's. Both DJ's, Lewis and Clark have been rumored to travel from settlement to settlement disrupting society with loud music. Jimmy eventually died of dysentery and the wagon was lost for years! Historians say the trail ended somewhere deep in the Nevada desert! THE WHOMP IS BORN, Found in the deep playa under a cloud of Dust, Dirty Beats & Lasers The Whomp Wagon was born! THE FUTURE The Whomp Crew now pushes our journey into the future with one inclusive vision: To create a platform where musicians of all genres can perform and share their gift for everyone. Burning Man changed our lives for the better and forever! The Whomp Wagon is our gift to Burning Man!
Missed us on the Playa? Stop by and say "hi" when the Whomp Wagon is parked at our camp.

Welcome to Camp Imorgimorphia, a space where creativity and transformation converge. Inspired by the concept of "morphing," we invite you to explore and express your evolving self through art, interactive experiences, and collaboration. Join us for immersive installations, transformative rituals, and workshops focused on personal growth and creative expression. Whether you're seeking self-discovery or community connection, Imorgimorphia is a space to shed the old and embrace the new. Come evolve with us on the Playa!

We also provide a moving cuddle puddle which is all about conscious conversations: opening up, connecting, and sharing what's going on inside oneself.

Looking for some toasted peanut butter and jelly sammiches? Look no further than House of Sammich and keep an eye out for The Great Sammich Ride delivering gooey goodness to your part of the playa!

The House Of Sammich is home to The Great Sammich Ride art car, comfy lounging and gluten free gourmet toasted peanut butter and jelly sammiches, complete with cinnamon butter. And hangtime sammich storytelling evenings around an art burn barrel.
A group of long time burners happy to be in Black Rock City. Come by and visit and check out our Mutant Vehicles.

CRUSH IT w/the Recyclenauts at Recycle Camp. Find us at our new location, 5:35 and just off the Esplanade. Bring us your mesh bags full of empty aluminum cans & ride the amazing bicycle powered Crushing Machine - The Crushinator! (plz no tin/steel/glass/plastic/trash)
CRUSH IT w/the Recyclonauts at Recycle Camp. Bring us your mesh bag of empty aluminum cans (plz no tin/steel/glass/plastic) & ride the amazing bicycle powered Crushinator!

Recycle Camp is located at the intersection of Center Camp Inner Circle and 6:00. We accept aluminum cans only, between 9:00am and 5:00pm, Monday through Sunday of the event week. We want all your aluminum cans. Spread the word!

Want to volunteer? Recycle Camp invites everyone to join in the fun. Take charge at your camp and separate all your recycling and put the aluminum cans in a mesh bag to dry out. Bring your aluminum cans to Recycle Camp and crush them with the State ­of ­the ­Art bike powered can crusher.

Show Us Your Cans! We're back Black Rock City! And we want all of your aluminum cans. Find us at Center Camp Circle and 6:15, between 9am-5pm Monday through Sunday. Ride the State-Of-The-Art can crusher, "The Blue-Duck", and crush it!

Come show us your cans! Pre-crush and sort your empty ALUMINUM cans into a mesh bag (so they dry out!), then bring them to Recycle Camp between 9am & 5pm, Monday through Sunday (we're closed on Labor Day). We're located directly behind the Center Camp Café at 6:00. Come ride the CRUSHINATOR: our juicy, state of the ART bicycle-powered aluminum can crushing machine. Come by early (don't wait until the last day!), come by often (we have great fun!), but by all means come before 5pm Sunday or you'll have to pack them out yourself. Please no glass, plastic, tin, or steel. All proceeds are donated to the Gerlach Schools.

Monday through Sunday, 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. you can stop by to crush and recycle your aluminum cans at Recycle Camp. Be sure to come by before they close Sunday evening! Recycle Camp can be found at 6:00 ON THE INNER CIRCLE OF CENTER CAMP, just behind the Center Camp Café.

Black Rock City Recycle Camp!!! We are located in Center Camp at 6:00, directly behind the Cafe. Camp is open and ready to accept your cans Monday through Sunday, 9am to 5pm. Bring your clean, separated aluminum cans only. We don’t accept any other recyclables, you must pack them out. And we definitely don’t want your trash. All proceeds from the aluminum are donated to the Gerlach K-12 School in Gerlach, NV. Come join in the fun..!

BRC Recycle Camp is located @ 6:00 & Center Camp. Come visit us, bring us you aluminum cans, sort them, no trash please. Ride the bike that powers the state of the art crushing machine. Recycle Camp strives to lead by example, to show the participants of Burning Man how to tread lightly and have fun.

Showing Black Rock citizens the way to reducing waste on the Playa. Leave all unnecessary packaging at home, reduce what you bring to the playa, leave sorry ass glass at home, choose something that you can actually leave behind on the playa. Choose aluminum when buying your beverages. That’s right, we will take all of your aluminum cans and donate them to the Gerlach School and you don’t have to carry them home with you. We will be by early in the week to visit & remind each and ever one of you and pick up anything you have and then remember to bring us the rest of your cans before you leave. Don’t wait till the last minute though cause we only accept cans through Sunday after the Burn until 5pm. Tell your friends and neighbors about us when they offer you a beverage.

Recycle Camp!!! This is where Black Rock City comes to recycle  its aluminum cans. Bring us your cans, help us crush ’em using our State of  the Art Can Crusher, “The Blue Duck”. We donate the cans to the Gerlach High  School and have a lot of fun doing it. We are open to recieve your cans  from 10am to 5pm, Monday August 29th through Sunday September 4th.

Recycle Camp is an all volunteer supported Community Services camp dedicated to educating participants about reducing, re-using and recycling as well as other sustainability practices. Located in Center Camp, we spend the week collecting as many alluminum cans as possible from participants and then we crush them using our state of the “Art” can crushing machine, bag them up and donate them to the Gerlach School. Please come by and see us in action, bring us your alluminum cans and join in the fun while we do are part to save the world.

Camp Cingulata is a vibrant, myth-inspired village dedicated to connection, creativity, and radical inclusion. Anchored by two mutant vehicles—Cingulata, our roving lounge, and MAYA, a temple-like art car—we host sound journeys, rituals, and communal gatherings. Our shaded courtyard features a welcoming kitchen and bar where we serve up shared meals and deep conversation. With music, storytelling, and a spirit of play, Cingulata offers a space to rest, reflect, and reconnect in the heart of the playa.

Earth Guardians are an outreach and communications volunteer group whose mission is to educate and inspire Burning Man participants to Leave No Trace (LNT) at the event. We can go beyond leaving "no trace" and leave instead, positive traces on the land. Come see our many bike nature and geology tours, sustainability speakers, DIY workshops, Aztec Burner dances, or volunteer training and gatherings! Come and volunteer on our LNT and compliance outreach teams or participate in a Gerlach LNT our hot-spring patrol, or jump on our MOOP train.

Earth Guardians inspire our community to embrace LNT /Green principles. Hug the playa, then go beyond no trace and Green Your Burn. Join us for daily yoga, MOOPing, nature walks, hotspring patrol, classes and happy hour. Rest by our bar and expand your mind with our enviromental library and movies.

Earth Guardians inspire our community to embrace Leave No Trace (LNT) and Green principles and practices and lead Black Rock desert restoration activities. Hug the playa, then go beyond no trace (and no MOOP!), celebrate the green man and Green Your Burn. This year we’re celebrating the green in BRC and providing you one stop shopping with information and maps of Green camps, art and events thoughout Black Rock City. We’ll also be examining the dirt below those playa cracked toes and how we use LNT techniques to protect the precious playa. Join us for daily activities including: yoga, MOOPing, nature walks and a new eco-restoration project, hot spring patrols and LNT brainstorming. Classes, cocktail hours and many kids activities. Rest by the water bar and expand your mind with our enviromental library and movies when the day’s greening activities are done.

A Native Tongue speaks to the frequency we all share, a common way of communicating with love, empathy & respect. An acknowledgment of the humanity we recognize in each other.
And also a kick ass rap collective from the 90's!

Native Tongues is home to veteran burners of all colors & backgrounds, brave Virgins who are seekers and people who love life to the fullest.

Native Tongues speak a dialect that only the open heart can understand. 
We dance to a beat only the heart can feel.
We hear the words that speak of love and encouragement.
We acknowledge the signs that point to hope and joy.
We welcome the spirits of transformation to the best versions of ourselves and we support all on that beautiful journey.
Come sit with us to teach, to learn, to laugh and most of all to live.
Worship the present moment without fear of the future or regret of the past.
We speak a Native Tongue known to all but often forgotten.

Black Rock Labs is a Civic Support camp focused on testing/scaling/messaging climate smart regenerative technologies at Black Rock City and the Regionals. Black Rock Labs hosts a daily  1-hour Sustainability Talk Series at 2 pm and a Playa-wide tour on the Abraxas art car at 4 pm  on Thursday to view BRC's expanding deployment of renewables and regenerative climate smart activities.

Black Rock Labs The Expanse camp is an outpost of Black Rock Labs, a not for profit affiliate of the Burning Man Project dedicated to discovering and ground proofing regenerative power, water, and habitat solutions at Black Rock City and championing these solutions beyond the boundaries of Black Rock City.
Our camp celebrates the spirit of unity, simplicity, and radical expression, proudly supporting the first Brazilian mutant vehicle at Burning Man. In our community, all souls are equal.

Burning Man theme camp, focused on sharing the Brazilian culture, driven through simplicity and togetherness. 
Come to drink a lots of caipirinhas, eat one açai bowl, joinnig Brazilian music, house music, carnival, art, gifts from Brazil and good vibes. Adults and kids are welcome!

Come to drink a lots of caipirinhas, Brazilian music, house music, carnaval, art, gifts from Brazil and good vibes. Also we have an amazing schedule of Ecstatic Dance, Cocoa Ceremony and Theta Healing time. Adults and kids are welcome!

Favela means slum in Brazil, is a low-income historically informal urban area. Unable to find places to live, many people found themselves in favelas.
The People are very humble but hardworking. Generally  they are excluded from society but they really know how to enjoy the life with less. Good vibe, amazing food and nice music. All are welcome, come and enjoy us!
Focused on sharing the Brazilian culture and Favela soul experience! Simple life, good food, good music and party people. Crazy brazilian girls will shake their asses.

Add a little bit of magic to your burn this year with a sojourn to Amber Dust. The Burntique at Dollhouse is a whimsical, immersive storefront offering curated playa treasures for any dusty traveler in need. Under pink-and-white striped awnings, we gift goggles, coats, tutus, and essentials with sparkle and heart. Our garden lounge invites you to take a load off, sip something cool, and connect. Whether you're strutting through a fashion show or just need shade and good vibes, the Burntique is here to help you win the burn.

Come learn about the natural and cultural history of the Black Rock Desert! We will have displays, learning activities, and experts available every day to discuss everything from local plants and animals to the Native Americans who once called the Black Rock Desert home.

Bureau of Land Management and the Pershing County Sheriff's Office will have a substation at 5:15 and the Esplanade. You can report a crime to the officers stationed at this substation. If you have any additional questions or wish to say hello, please stop by and visit.

Bureau of Land Management and the Pershing County Sheriff's Office will have a substation in Center Camp.  Stop by to report a crime, fill out a crime report or just to show your appreciation for the law enforcement professionals who work so hard to keep Black Rock City safe.

The Haven by Zendo Project is a new supportive space in Black Rock City for Zendo Project to provide harm reduction and peer support services. The Haven is available to support participants who need help transforming difficult psychedelic experiences - and other complex emotions - into opportunities for learning and growth.

Located at 6:30 between Esplanade and A, The Haven will be open from Monday, August 26 at 6pm through Monday, September 1 at 12pm.
The Black Hole is a Staff Camp supporting the needs of Gate, Perimeter and Exodus.

The Black Hole is the Home of Black Rock City's Gate, Perimeter and Exodus Department, and while we realize it isn't for everybody, it may VERY MUCH be for you. It was for us. If you are down to clown in all black clothes in the middle of the desert in a cloud of dust and car exhaust two miles outside of the best party on earth – then boy howdy have we got an offer for you.

Ballistic Bubbles brought to you by Dust Patrol. Fighting the good fight against dust since 2019.

Come on by our one stop shop for all your dusty needs. We've got vacuum cleaners, dust devils, dirt busters & dusters of all kinds. If you've got dust bunnies, you are a dust bunny, you want to be a dust bunny or you're just plain ol' dusty, this is the place for you. 

Dust Patrol is a great place to suck (the dust away)! After all, the dust is inevitable. We just make it fun!

Download the iBurn App! Your best resource to navigate the activities, theme camps, art installations, and scheduled events on the playa -- all without wifi -- it's GPS enabled! Download the 2025 version of the gifted (free) iBurn app pre-event, or swing by our camp to download on our wifi. It's like having an elf read you the What/Where/When in a dust storm! 32,000 Burners used iBurn last year -- make sure you are one of them.

Come download the iBurn app -- a gift to help you navigate BRC! iBurn can be your compass, your activity guide, your art interpreter, and your savior in a dust storm. Even without wifi, iBurn can help you find your way home, your next adventure, and more. Bring your phone and answer the Burning Man trivia question for indespensable access.

Burning Man Earth / iBurn app is a geo data project started by Larry Harvey and Rod Garrett in 2005 to provide digital mapping and navigation solutions. Although dedicated to BRC it can easily me adapted for solutions for refugee camps or disaster situations.

iBurn is a 10 year project to give burners access to events, art and camps in relation t their own GPS location. It is a free app for iPhone and android but does not connect to the outside world but is downloaded to your phones memory before you get to Burning Man.
All you need is a clear view of the sky.  https://iburnapp.com/
Art support camp for Jukebox Country.  Y'all come back now, ya hear?

We love meeting new people and transport them around the playa on our Fire Breathing Leafy Sea Dragon. Anyone is welcome to hop on and go where Snouty takes us. We do day cruises out to deep playa art installations. Some nights we do "10:00 - 2:00 shuttle bus" to take dancers back and forth between the two big sound camp regions. Sometimes someone hops on board and tells us about something that sounds amazing, so we go.

A place where our beloved art car, the Dirty Goat Roadhouse, calls Home. Sunset and sunrise cruises, we have a sound system that cruises out on the playa to bring music, dancing, and radiant energy our in deep playa. If the car is home, come say hi. If it's not, come find us out on the playa and share a memory or two in the dust!
Home of the Dirty Goat Roadhouse mutant vehicle

We are the support camp for Temple of the Deep, this year's official Burning Man Temple 2025. We are a multinational crew of doers, builders, artists and supporters who have spent the greater part of 2025 bringing this temple to life for our community, We welcome everyone to stop by and learn more about the process of designing and building the temple, and we'd love to hear your thoughts and stories.

We are the support camp for Temple of Together, this year's official Burning Man Temple 2024, designed by Caroline "Glitter Kitty" Ghosn. We will have a branch from the giving tree art car that we have not used on the at car for sometime now. We will be mounting this 8' long horizontally arched branch 15' high off one of our frontage street corners, with 12' long GREEN vines hanging from the branch blowing in the wind like a flag. It looks just like the art car so people will know what camp we are when the art car is away from camp.

The Giving Tree Experience gives hope to inspiration! It's an art car I built for burning man in 2017 and lil did I know it would make the waves we have so far with spreading that positive impact while making so many smiles along the way! It's a 25' tall 26' wide 28' long willow tree. With a short bus tiny tree house inside! Guest of all ages can ascend the later to the roof top deck that is 8' wide by 16' long where you will find all kinds of tree people smiling and laughing! Also you will find another tree trunk in the middle of the upper deck where you can climb further up to the crows nest, when you reach that point you will be captain of the the giving  tree as you steer the actual helm into your own imagination. Then jump in one of four hanging papasan baskets for a nice relax!
